46014035	Kɛ̀ ǹdɔʼ yili lɛ nun cibbi swum ndɔʼ kɛ nywi mwu lɛʼ ndɔʼ, à kɛn ywon cibbɔʼ ɓe næm. À si fyinni lɛ̀ m̀lib kɛ mpæ̀ʼ nzæʼ lɛʼ kɛ nswɔli ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
46014036	Kɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b sɛti twæb kɛ nsòn yin? Kɛ̀ shindɔʼ, sɛ suʼ pyì cǐ shin?
46014037	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ tà nun nɛʼ kɛ̌ kɛ læm ɓwum ɓye ta lɛli kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, shindɔʼ nun ni mwum nɛ cinni mɛ̀ ŋkimmɔʼ nyɛ̌ mbyî ndɔʼ nɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi tǎ fɛ, à limmì lɛ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ mùn kɔʼ ɓyin yɛ, Nyɛli nyɛʼ nɛ yili lɛ ɓwiʼ ci li.
46014038	Son, nun shì yon twɛli lɛ̀ ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ ŋkæ̀mŋkæm, ɓa mwum ndɔʼ kɛ̀ mwù mbyi nyon nun.
46014039	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, li nɛ mun lɛʼ lɛ mɛ̀ nlim nyin ɗyi kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ nlɛli kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, son, ɓa ɓyin kænni lɛʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye cinni ǹkimmɔʼ nlilɔʼ kɛ mɛ ŋkyìn lɛʼ nɛ ɓon lìmmi kan nun.
46014040	Sɛ yili lɛ ywum hwæn lannzì kɛ ŋkyìbli zwɛ̂m, a konndì kuʼ ɓɛ kɛ mbyi nun.
46015001	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, swum sɛ mùn yili mùn sannzi tì ɓyin jenɛ, à si Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ mùn shɛ̀e ɓyin. Ǹtwum Lwɛn màzwùm, ɓe lɛ̀ ɓyin yilâ yon nùn, ɓyin ɓæn tì kuʼ yon.
46015002	Yon yɛ ci tì kuʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓyin mbyi swæti. Ǹswæti màzwǔm, ɓyin woli ɓyin swæʼ yon, ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ta Ǹtwum Lwɛn yi ɓænni wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn shɛ̀e ɓyin yon, shìkì ɓyin njilì fyàʼ ndɔʼ. Ɓyin ɗonnzi swum ndɔʼ nlim, lɛ̀ ɓyin gwannzâ ǹtɛ̀ʼ zwum yin lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
46015003	Swum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm sɛ ɓɛ liseâ mùn, mùn lànnzì kuʼ ɓyin mbyî, à si lɛ Yesù ywie ɓǎ nun pæʼ mɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi nyɛʼ nɛ ɓwiʼ ciâ, wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔe kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
46015004	Ɓɛ gwumme nun, kɛ ŋgyìn mɛ̀ nlè nun, à yìmni kɛ ywi nun, m̀banmbɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔe kuʼ mbyî kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
46015005	Mùn kònnde tì ɓyin shɛ̌ lɛ kwan sɛ nun yìmne kɛ ywi nun, à ɓwùmne kɛ swiʼ Pìɛ̂r, à kònndì ɓwùmnì ɓe kɛ ŋkwìn mɛ ci-ntwum wûm ɓlàn ɓî ɓyon nun hwæn.
46015006	Kɛ nyě yi, à ɓwùmnì tì kɛ swiʼ ɓwum mèan ndɔʼ ɓye ɓe ɓwɛsɔʼ ɓyon. Ɓwum màzwùm ɓe lɛ̀ ɓɛ ti kɛ̀nni ɓwum nɗuʼ nshân lɛ̀ swum ndɔʼ kɛ cìcì fɔʼ kwinni. Kwo fɛʼ she ɓyindɔʼ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum ɓi ywiâ nùn si, mǎn kɛ lɛ̀ mɛʼ.
46015007	A kiìn ɓɛ̀n kwan ndɔʼ ɓe, à ɓwùmnì tì Jâʼ swiʼ, à kònndì ɓwùmnì ɓe ŋkwìn mɛ ci-ntwum ɓyon nun hwæn.
46015008	A kiìn ɓɛ̌n mmlɔ̀kàʼ ɓon hwæn, à ɓwùmnì tì kuʼ mùn làn nyɛ̀m swiʼ, mùn nɛ wɛ̌ ye swɛ̀ʼ.
46015009	Kɛ nyinnìm mɛ ci-ntwum Yesù hwæn, mùn nɛ lwæb ɓe shan. Mùn nɛ ɓe kǎn fɛʼ nyɛ̌ ɓɛ woli ɓɛ kɛ mùn kɛ læm mɛ̀ ci-ntwum ɓyon kɛ ntwiʼ nyɛnnzi vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛ mùn ɓe ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛnnzi nun.
46015010	Son, kɛ ncǐ lwɛn yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìâ mun nun, mùn ni jenɛ kɛ mbɔ̀kì tòn nɛ ɓyin yɛn mun nlim nɛ. Mùn yɛn lɛ ǹcǐ lwɛn yɛ nun cǐ mun yi, yɛ pyì kan ŋgyɔʼ ɗin. Yɛ fyôn cì mùn cìâ she, mùn làn ɓwùlu. Mǔn cì kan she màzwùm lɛ̀ mwù yɛ̂m nɛʼ, son, ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ mûn nywi kɛ ncǐ lwɛn yon nun, yon yɛ ci.
46015011	Kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yi nun hwæn, mùn nɛ ɓɛ fɛʼ ǹlìsàʼ nyin nɛ lìsaʼ ɓyin, kɛ̀ ɓye fɔʼ ndɔʼ, lɛʼ fɔʼ sɛ, ntwiʼ Ǹtwum Lwɛn fɔʼ yɛ ɓwiʼ ta shɛ̀, yon yɛ ɓyin kɛ kuʼ ǹlim kɛ nlim.
46015012	Swum sɛ ɓwiʼ ta shɛ̀, à si lɛ Yesù Kristò yìmnâ kɛ ywi nun. Kɛ à si li, sɛ yɛ tì cì lɛ, ɓyindɔʼ ɓye kɛ nyinnìm shin nun shɛ lɛ ɓwum ywi ɓa ywi yìmni?
46015013	Ɓɛshɛ ɓon lɛʼ li, m̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ, ɓɛ ta lɛʼ lɛ Yesù Kristǒ yìmni kan kɛ ywi nun.
46015014	A ɓê lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ ǎ yìmni kan kɛ ywi nun, Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ ɓwiʼ ta shɛ̀, yɛ ɓê swum ɗin. Ǹtɛ̀ʼ zwum yɛ ɓyin tɛʼ lɛ̀ Yesù hwæn ɓê tì kuʼ ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
46015015	Ɓɛshɛ son ɓê kuʼ li lɛ̀ ɓwum ywi ɓa ywi yìmni, ɓwiʼ nɛʼ ma, ɓwiʼ konndè tì ɓɛ ɓwum ɓye ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b mɛ̀ mɓwɛ̀ʼ linni nywi, kɛ nshɛ̀ yɛ ɓwiʼ ta shɛ̀ lɛ à yìmnzâ Yesù lɛ̀ ǎ yìmnzi kan nun.
46015016	Ɓɛshɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓǎ ɓwum ywi yìmnzi kɛ ywi nun, lɛ̀ ǎ yìmnzê kàn kuʼ Yesù Kristò.
46015017	A konndì ɓɛ lɛ, ɓɛshɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìmnze kàn kuʼ nun ywi nun, lɛ̀ ǹtɛ̀ʼ zwum yɛ ɓyin ta tɛ̀ʼ lɛ̀ nun yi swum ɗin, ɓyin kɛ ɓyɛbbi nyin nwi lɛ̀ zwiʼ nun.
46015018	Sɛ konndè tì kuʼ lìsàʼ lɛ ɓwum ɓye ɓe zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, kwan sɛ ɓɛ ywie ɓɛ ɓwue ɗin.
46015019	Ǹtɛ̀ʼ zwum yɛ ɓwiʼ tɛʼ lɛ̀ Yesù suè kuʼ kɛ nywi ywum wan nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ton jenɛ nlim nɛ, ɓwiʼ ɓê ɓwum nyìmmea ɓɛ lan ɓwùlu ɓɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan hwæn.
46015020	Son, li nɛ ɓan, à si lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ Yesù Kristò yìmne kɛ ywi nun. M̀bɔ̀kì nɛ nun ɓe mwum, nun nɛ tì kuʼ zwimbyiʼ nyìmnǐ ywi, sɛ lisaʼ lɛ ɓwùlu ɓwum ɓɛ ywiâ, ɓɛ yɛ tì kuʼ ywi yìmni.
46015021	Lwikwæ̌n mwum nɛ ci ywi ɗunmi ɓwum ɓænni, lwikwæ̌n mwum ndɔʼ nɛ konndì tì cì ɓwùlu ɓwum yɛ ywi yìmni.
46015022	Ǹdùʼ ɓwum hwæn si Adæ̀m. Li, mwum hwæn tǎ mbyi nyon ɗwon kɛ ywi nun wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun ywie kuʼ. Li nɛ kuʼ kɛ nywi ɓwum ɓye ta mɛ̀ kwù Yesù ɗwon; ɓɛ yɛ ywi yìmni wɛ̌ nun.
46015023	Yesù Kristò nɛ sɛtâ yìmnì mbyî. Nywɔʼ nɛ nun yɛ̌ kuʼ fyònnǐ, ɓwum ɓye ɓe mbyi nyon ɗwon kà yìmni kuʼ làn nyan. Li, mɛ̀ fyàʼ ɓî hwæn cinni yì kwan nyìmnǐ ywi yan kyikyi.
46015024	Kɛ nyě nyìmnǐ ywi yan, Yesù Kristò yɛ̌ mɛ̀ mpùn mɓyibbɔa hwæn kyàkea lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nyɛli ɓyan nun hwæn, à kònndì ɓwum ɓye cinni ywɔʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan ɓye ɓa mbyi nyon nun kyàkea. Kɛ nyě màzwùm yɛ nun yɛ̌ gbaʼ lwun lànnzi ɓe lɛ̀ Ce nyon M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan mlɔ̀ʼ kuʼ nun.
46015025	Kɛ mfyòn yon nun, sɛ yili lɛ Yesù Kristò ton fɛʼ gbaʼ lwun nun, a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ mɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnzì ɓyon kɛ̌ kɛ mɛ kwù ɓyon nji hwæn.
46015026	M̀mlɔ̀kǎʼ ci-ɓyìnnzì sɛ ɓɛ yɛ mlɔ̀sì si ywi.
46015027	Ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ̀â Mwɛn nyon ywum hwæn mɛ kwù nji.» Kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ton yi nun, à si seansean lɛ sàn ni M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ǎ wòli kan à ɓɛ mɛ kwù Mwɛn nyon nji. A si li, ntwiʼ sɛ nun nɛ kɛ Mwɛn nyon ywum hwæn mɛ kwù nji.
46015028	Kwan sɛ ywum hwæn yɛ swɔli mɛ kwù Yesù nji, nun nɛʼ Yesù yɛ̌ waʼ, à kɛ̀ mwù ŋgyɔʼ kɛ swiʼ Ce nyon M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ kɛ̀ nun ywum hwæn mɛ kwù nji. Kɛ kwan si nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓɛ kɛ nywi ywum hwæn.
46015029	Ɓɛshɛ li nɛ shiè ɓɛ, cɛênì fɛʼ mbyi ɓwum ɓɛ ta cì ɓɛ jimnzi ɓon lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ɓwum ywi. Ɓɛ ta cì li lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yɛn? Sɛ ɓê lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ ɓwum ywi ɓa ywi yìmni, sɛ ci tì lɛ ɓɛ yili ǹjimnzi lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yan?
46015030	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ nɛʼ, sɛ ta cì lɛ ɓwiʼ ta ywi jæmmɔʼ kɛ ŋganŋgwu, a shi ɓɛ lɛ̀ ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ mɛ̀ yìmni ywi ɓi kwe.
46015031	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, à si lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ mɛ̀ nywɔʼ mèan ɓɛ hwæn, mùn tǎ tòn lɛ̀ ywi m̀ban. Mùn tǎ lɛʼ li, ntwiʼ sɛ mwù yi mùn zwɛ̂m shèli kɛ nywi yin lɛ̀ m̀ɓæti yɛ ɓwiʼ ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò.
46015032	M̀ɓɔli yɛ mùn ɓɔlâ fɛ Èfɛ̂zɛ̀ kɛ fyaʼ ɓwum ɓɛ ta mun vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi yi m̀banmbɔʼ wɛ̌ mùn ɗwìâ twùʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nyæ̀m nyenea ndɔʼ ɓye ta tòn mbo nun. Ɓê lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nɛ mùn tǎ ɓɔli lɛ̀ ntwiʼ màzwùm, sɛ kpaè mùn lɛ̀ yɛn? Sɛ ɓê lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ ɓwum ywi ɓa tî ywi yìmni, mǔn kɛè kuʼ mwù lɛ̀ lɛʼ ndɔʼ sɛ ɓwùlu ndɔʼ ta lɛʼ lɛ: «Ɓwiʼ jiènì, ɓwiʼ nwi, ɓwiʼ kwe nywi, kɛ ɓwiʼ limmâ lɛ shɛʼ sɛ she ɓwiʼ ta kuʼ ji sɛ, ɓwiʼ yɛ ywi lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kɛ tì ji nùn.»
46015033	Ɓa mwum ndɔʼ pɔʼ ɓyin, à si seansean lɛ ɓǒn ɓyɛbbi ta mwum mwù gwànnzi.
46015034	Lwinnzênì mɛ̀ mwù nyin wɛ̌ tà shɛ sɛ yili, ɓyin pæʼ fyàʼ lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi. Swum sɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓyin shɛ̌ jenɛ sɛ, à si lɛʼ kwɛ̀nnjin kɛ nywi yin. À si lɛ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓyindɔʼ lìmmi kan M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
46015035	Shindɔʼ, ǹdɔʼ lɛ̀ mwum yɛ̌ ɗyi, à cibbi lɛ: «Ɓwum ywi yɛ kuʼ ywi yìmni lɛ? Ɓon, ɓɛ yimnì fɛʼ nùn, kwæʼ nywi shan yɛ kuʼ ɓɛ lɛ?»
46015036	Wù nɛ cibbi paʼ ncibbi yi, wù ɓǎ mwù lwinni; wǔ lìmmi kan lɛ kwan sɛ wù tǎ zɛʼ swum ndɔʼ ɓǐ ŋgyɔʼ nji, sɛ ta ywǐ twæb lɛ̀ làn nɛ ɓe mbyî ɓwùâ ŋgyɔʼ nji?
46015037	Nywɔʼ nɛ wù tǎ ɓì, seansean zɛʼ swum ɓǐ sɛ wù tǎ gwùm ŋgyɔʼ nji, kɛ̀ zɛʼ gwê sɛ, kɛ̀ yà paʼ zɛʼ, swum sɛ wù ɓì ŋgyɔʼ nji, ǹjì nɛ wǔ tà ka hwùki kɛ ŋgyɔʼ nji gwùm, ǎ kà kwain tì ɓe.
46015038	Zɛʼ sɛ wù tǎ ɓì si ta kwan wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili. À tǎ mɛʼ ywum ɓǐ hwæn kwæʼ nywi fɛ kyikyi kwan ntwæb wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun yili.
46015039	Li nɛ kuʼ lɛ̀ ywum ye cinni mvæb nywi hwæn. Yì kwæʼ nywi yi kyikyi. Kwæʼ nywi she ɓwum, she mɛ̀ nyæ̀m, she mɛ̀ kyè, kònndì lɛ̀ she ǹgishì ɓa m̀ban.
46015040	Ywum ye ɗɛb yi tì kuʼ kwe lɛ̀ ye ŋgyɔʼ. Kwæʼ nywi ywum ye ɗɛb cinni lwu shan kyi lɛ̀ lwu she ywum ye ŋgyɔʼ.
46015041	Nywɔʼ cinni ǹɗwùm yon kyi, nywiʼ cinni tì kuʼ paʼ mpwɛb shon kyi. Kwo fɛʼ mɛ̀ nywæb cinni kuʼ paʼ mpwɛb shan. Kɛ nyinnìm mɛ nywæb nun ma, m̀pwɛb ɓa ɓon m̀ban, à yi kyikyi.
46015042	Li nɛ kuʼ lɛ̀ ǹyìmnǐ ywi, ɓwum ɓɛ yɛ kuʼ ywi yìmni yɛ kuʼ yì kwæʼ nywi ye ɗin cinni. Kwæʼ nywi mwum nɛ ywiâ ta ɓwù, ti lɛ̀ she ta yìmnì ɓe, sɛ tà ka tî ɓwù.
46015043	Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ mwum nɛ ywiâ cinni kan tì ǹkimmɔʼ, à ɓǎ ǹlwɛn kɛ ncɛ, son, kɛ nyìmnǐ ywi nyon nun, à yɛ̌ ɓɛ ǹkimmi, à kònndì lwu cinni.
46015044	Kwan sɛ ɓɛ ta mwum gwùmmi, làn nɛ ɓɛ ta gwùm ni ni kwæʼ nywi she ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. Son, kwan sɛ nun tǎ ywi yìmni, kwæʼ nywi she ɗin sɛ nun ɓɛ lɛ̀ son. M̀pùn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ta nun son fɛ. Ɓwiʼ ɓɛ fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun, ɓwiʼ cinni kan kwæʼ nywi? Lìmmênì lɛ kuʼ lɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ tì kuʼ kwæʼ nywi sɛ M̀pùn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ fɛ cinni nywɔʼ ndɔʼ.
46015045	À si wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, she ɓɛ lɛʼ lɛ: «M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɔ̀e Adæ̀m nyɛ̌ zwimbyiʼ mwum, à fɛ nun m̀pùn mɛ̀ yìnnì.» Ti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, mwum nɛ mùn tà tî kuʼ lon lɛ Adæ̀m nyɛ̌ m̀mlɔ̀kàʼ, à ni làn nyon M̀pùn nɛ tǎ ɓwum ǹzison nywæb fɛ kɛ nyě ywi.
46015046	Ɓwiʼ limmi lwɛn lɛ kwæʼ nywi sɛ M̀pùn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ fɛ, son sɛ ɓwiʼ tà ka sɛti cinni kɛ wan nyɛʼ nun. She ɓwiʼ ta sɛti cinni, à si she ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun. Kɛ nyè she ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kà cinni she fɔʼ.
46015047	Adæ̀m nyɛ̌ zwimbyiʼ ɓe mwum nɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓwɛmme nun lɛ̀ mbuʼ ŋgyɔʼ. Ti lɛ̀ Adæ̀m nyɛ̌ m̀bɔʼ, à wai làn nyon kɛ ɗɛb.
46015048	Lan ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan hwæn cinni kwæʼ nywi wɛ̌ she Adæ̀m nyɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓwɛmme lɛ̀ mbuʼ ŋgyɔʼ ni. Ti lɛ̀ kwæʼ nywi she ɓwum ɓye yɛ ɓɛ kwe ɗɛb, sɛ yɛ kuʼ ɓɛ wɛ̌ she nyɛ̌ m̀bɔʼ nɛ wae ɗɛb.
46015049	M̀banmbɔʼ nɛ ɓwiʼ cinni kuʼ kwæʼ nywi mwum nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓwɛmme lɛ̀ mbuʼ ŋgyɔʼ jenɛ, ɓwiʼ yɛ kuʼ ɓɛ kwan ndɔʼ, ɓwiʼ cinni tì kuʼ kwæʼ nywi she wae kɛ ɗɛb.
46015050	Jenɛ, mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, swum sɛ mùn yili mùn shɛ ɓyin, à si lɛ mwum nɛ kɛ kwæʼ nywi sɛ ɓwiʼ cinni jenɛ sɛ nun, ǎ wòli kan à ɗun ywɔʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Sɛ lisaʼ lɛ swum sɛ yɛ ywi kwan ndɔʼ nun, sɛ wòli kan sɛ ɓɛ ɓæti lɛ̀ swum sɛ ɓa ywi shim.
46015051	Jenɛ, mùn yili mùn kwasì tì ɓyin ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ ndɔʼ. À ni lɛ ɓwiʼ hwæn, ɓwiʼ ɓa kuʼ ɓɛ kwan mmlɔ̀kàʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ywiâ hwæn, son, kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ nun, mwum nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ shǐ kwæʼ nywi shon yònnzi, à ɓǎn.
46015052	Kwan sɛ ɓæ̀n sɛ yɛ lìsàʼ lɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan mlɔ̀mɛ yɛ hwæbli, ɓwiʼ ɓa zɛʼ sæbbi lɛ̀ à yònnzâ wɛn nɛ hwæn kwæʼ nywi shon. Ntwiʼ ɓæ̀n si yɛ kuʼ hwæbli ɗin, ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye ɓe lɛ̀ ɓɛ ywiâ hwæn yimnì ywi, ɓɛ cinni kwæʼ nywi she ɓà tî ywi kwan ndɔʼ. Ti lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ɓye kɛ kuʼ lɛ̀ mɛʼ, lɛʼ fɔʼ sɛ, ɓwiʼ yɛ tì kuʼ kwæʼ nywi she nywæb cinni.
46015053	Sɛ lisaʼ lɛ kwæʼ nywi shɛʼ sɛ yɛ ywi, sɛ konndì ɓwù, sɛ yili lɛ sɛ fyonnì she ɓa ywi, shìkì sɛ ɓwû.
46015054	Kwan sɛ kwæʼ nywi shɛʼ sɛ ta ywi, sɛ konndì ɓwù yɛ fyònnì li, kwe nɛ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun yɛ lwinni. Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ lɛ: «M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lèân ywi, à mlɔ̀si nun.»
46015055	Ɓɛ kɔʼ tì cìcì ndɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Ti lɛ̀ wù, ywi, ǹkimmɔʼ ywû yi tì fɛn? Ti ǹsɛm yɛ wù tǎ ɓwum ɗyɛmnzi nun, yɛ fyi fɛn?»
46015056	Jenɛ, ywi wòli kim à ɗyɛmnzi ɓwum, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓon ta cì. Jenɛ tì kuʼ, ɓyɛbbi cinni kuʼ ǹkimmɔʼ yon nywi yɛʼ kɛ nyě lwuà nun.
46015057	Son, ǹtwu ɓɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ tà ɓwiʼ kim fi fyaʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ lan ɓyɛbbi lɛ̀ ywi nun hwæn.
46015058	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, li nɛ mùn shɛ̀ ɓyin lɛ ɓìênì mɛ̀ nɗì ŋgyɔʼ, ɓyin læ̀kì fun. Ɓa ɓyin wonnzì fyàʼ kɛ she sɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ fɛ ɓyin lɛ ɓyin ci nun. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin nɛʼ ɓyin limmâ lìmmi lɛ she sɛ ɓyin ta cì kɛ jin shon nun, sɛ ɓa pyì ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
46016001	Jenɛ, mùn yili mùn lɛli tì kuʼ ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ ndɔʼ kɛ nywi lǒn ɗwìtea yɛ ɓwum ta ɗwìtàʼ lɛ̀ ɓɛ kpaʼ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ kɛ Yèrusàlɛ̀m nun. Mùn yili lɛ ɓyin ci kuʼ m̀banmbɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn shɛ̀e mɛ̀ ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyɛ̌ kɛ Gàlàsî.
46016002	À si lɛ, wɛn nɛ hwæn kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, mɛ̀ nywɔʼ sonndè mèan nun hwæn, à gwum lòn ndɔʼ kɛ næm kyi. M̀bɔ̀kì lòn nɛ nun yɛ̌ gwùm ni wolì kuʼ lɛ̀ m̀bɔ̀kì ncinni lòn nɛ nun tǎ cinni sonndè m̀bɔʼ nun. Mùn lɛʼ li ntwiʼ sɛ kwan sɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n, ɓwiʼ læ̀kì tì hwumni lɛ̀ lɛʼ nɗwìtǎʼ lòn ndɔʼ.
46016003	Kɛ mɓɛ̀n yɛ̂m nun, mùn yɛ̌ cì ɓwum ɓye ɓyin yænnâ mbyî kɛn lɛ̀ ɗèwà sɛ mùn yɛ̌ kɔʼ, mùn fɛ ɓon fyaʼ, ɓɛ kɛn ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ye Yèrusàlɛ̀m lòn yin yɛ ɓyin ɗwitea yi fɛ.
46016004	Ɓɛshɛ sɛ yili lɛ mùn kɛn ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓon, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ yɛ kɛ̀n kwe lɛ̀ ɓon m̀ban.
46016005	Kɛ ŋkìn yɛ mùn tà ɓyin kǐn fi nywi yi, sɛ yili lɛ mùn sɛti fɛʼ fyi kɛ Màsèdwân. Mun ywì ɓɛ̌n cì shin lɛ̀ mùn sɛtâ fɛʼ fyiì kwe.
46016006	Mùn ɓàkàʼ lɛ mùn yɛ̌ kwan ndɔʼ lànnzi ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin m̀ban, shindɔʼ ma, mùn lànnzi kwan mbɛb hwæn fi lɛ̀ ɓyin. Li, kɛ kwan ŋwaʼ kɛ̀n shɛ̂m nun, ɓyin woli ɓyin kpaʼ mùn kɛ kɛ̌n màzwùm nun, yili cìcǐ kɛ̀n shɛ̂m ɓɛ fɛʼ fɛn.
46016007	Mǔn yili kan mùn swɛbsi kɛ nyinnìm shin nun ɗin. A M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, mùn yili lɛ ǹgyìn ɓæʼ mùn kwe cì shin.
46016008	Mǔn kɛ fɛʼ fɛ Èfɛ̂zɛ̀ a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kɛ ŋgwìn nyɛ̌ ɓɛ ta lon lɛ Pàntɛ̀kɔ̂ʼ nun.
46016009	Ntwiʼ sɛ mùn yɛn lɛ mbyi ŋkæ̀mŋkæm ndɔʼ wòâ mùn swiʼ kɛ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b sɛ mùn tǎ shɛ̀ sɛ nun, mbyi nɛ wòli lɛʼ màzwùm kwannzi mwù. A konndì ɓɛ, mɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnzì ɓɛ tà ka ghæm she shɛ̂m màzwùm yili ɓi tì fɛ ŋea.
46016010	Tìmòtê nɛ ɓɛn kuʼ cì shin nùn, ɓa ɓyin ci à ɓɛ ǹɗiɗɔa, yèênì nun lwɛn ntwiʼ she Nyɛli nyɛʼ ɓwiʼ hwæn sɛ nun tà kuʼ cì wɛ̌ mùn.
46016011	Li, ɓa mwum ndɔʼ lwùm nun njìli. Son, kpeànì nun kɛ kɛ̀n shon nun, lɛ̀ nun waì ɓyin fyaʼ ǹlim pyǐ, à kiìn tì kuʼ mùn ɓɛ̀nni ɓe fyaʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi fɛ mɓòn yon nun, ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓwùlu ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye fɛ.
46016012	Kɛ mbyi ŋgyinni nyɛʼ Àpòlô nun, mùn ywɔ̀keâ nun shě lɛ à kɛn ɓyin yɛnni ɓon lɛ̀ ɓwùlu ɓwum Yesù Kristò, son, ǎ yili kan ghæm ǹkìn ɓyin yɛnni jenɛ. M̀ɓɛ̀n yon kɛ cì shin sumɛ tì kwan sɛ nun nɛʼ cinnimɛ kwan.
46016013	Ɓa ɓyin ɗye, fɔ̀sênì mɛ̀ nlim nyin ɗyili kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Ɓa ɓyin cinni mɛ̀ nlim zwum wɛ̌ nyɛ̌ mɛ̀ yib, mɛ̀ nlim nyin fyǒn ɓɛ ǹkimmɔa.
46016014	Kwo yǎ paʼ swum sɛ ɓyin ta fɛʼ cì, cìênì son lɛ̀ ǹyili ɓwulu zwum.
46016015	-
46016016	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓyin limmi lɛ Stɛ̀fanà lɛ̀ ɗwon nyon nun hwæn, ɓon ɓɛ ɓwum zwimbyiʼ ɓɛ sɛte ǹɗwon mbyi Yesù Kristò yili kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Grɛ̂ʼ nun. Ɓɛ fɛâ ɓon nɛʼ mwù lɛ̀ mɛ̀ kwù nun ɓǎ ɓɛ kpaʼ ɓwùlu ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Paʼ ɓwum sɛ li si, mùn swuleâ ɓyin lɛ ɓyin ywɔli ɓon, ɓyin mwumnzi tì kuʼ ɓwum ɓye ta ɓon nɛʼ fɛ kɛ ncǐ she fɔʼ si nun lɛ̀ ɓon m̀ban.
46016017	Mùn ni lɛ̀ ǹdàli she Stɛ̀fanà, Fòrtùnatù ɓon lɛ̀ Àkàyìkû ɓɛnnâ kɛ cì shɛ̂m. Ɓɛ kiân lɛʼ sɛ ɓe mùn m̀ɓàkàʼ fɛ nlim nun kpæ̀li. À si lɛ ǹyɛn yɛ mùn tà ɓon yɛnni ton wɛ̌ ɓyin hwæn ɓɛ mùn tǎ yɛn.
46016018	Ɓɛ tɛtâ mùn zwùm m̀banmbɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ sɛtâ kuʼ ɓyin tɛ̀ti. Paʼ ɓwum sɛ li si, ɓænnênì lɛ ɓon mɛ̀ fyàʼ ɓî, ɓyin fɔsì ɓon ŋwum ywɔli.
46016019	Mɛ̀ ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyɛ̌ fɛ ŋgyɔʼ Àzî nun hwæsi ɓyin. Àkyìlâ ɓon lɛ̀ Prìsî, kònndì lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ye ta swɔlaʼ ɗwon nyan gbaʼ hwæsi ɓyin lwɛn lɛ̀ ntwiʼ m̀ɓæti yɛ ɓyin ti ɓæti lɛ̀ ɓon kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò.
46016020	Ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye mbyî fɛ hwæn hwæsi tì kuʼ ɓyin. Mùn yili tì kuʼ lɛ ɓyin hwæsi ɓwùlu wɛ̌ tà shɛ sɛ cibbi lɛ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni hwæsi ɓon nɛʼ.
46016021	Cìcì mɛ hwæsi sɛ lwæbmɛ sɛ, mǔn nɛʼ Pɔ̂l nɛ kɔi son lɛ̀ fyàʼ yɛ̂m.
46016022	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ tà ka Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò yili, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b zæbsi nun. Mùn shɛ̀ lɛ: «Màrànâ tà””, sù ni lɛ: Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò, kìîn!
46016023	Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì ɓyin.
46016024	Mùn yili ɓyin, ɓyin ɓɛ ti ɓwum Yesù Kristò wɛ̌ mùn, ɓyin ɓi mùn nlim nun kwan mèan hwæn.
47001001	Mùn Pɔ̂l, mùn ni ci-ntwum Yesù Kristò ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ kɛ mun li. Ɓwiʼ ɓɛ kɔi ɓyin ɗèwà ton sɛ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ŋgyinni nyɛʼ Tìmòtê. Ɓwiʼ kɔi son lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ye kɛ Kòrɛ̂n, kònndì lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓyon ɓye fɔʼ ɓɛ ta tòn kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Àkàyî nun hwæn.
47001002	Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì ɓyin, ɓɛ fɛ ɓyin flɔa.
47001003	Fɛêni ǹtwu lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi Ce Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. À ni Ce ci-kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim, nun nɛ ta ɓwiʼ mɛ̀ nlim flɔsi kwan hwæn.
47001004	À tà ɓwiʼ nun flɔsi kɛ mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ta yɛn nun hwæn. M̀flɔsi nlim màzwùm ta cì, ǹlim ton ɓwiʼ zwum pyǐ, li, ɓwiʼ woli ɓwiʼ flɔsi tì kuʼ ɓwùlu ɓye ta mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni kyikyi.
47001005	Ɓwiʼ ta mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni mèan wɛ̌ tà shɛ Yesù Kristò yɛnne mbyî kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. M̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ, ɓwiʼ ta flɔʼ nlim cinni kɛ ntwiʼ yon.
47001006	Ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ ta vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni, ywum màzwùm ta lànnzì li lɛ̀ ɓyin ton kɛ flɔa nun, ɓyin cinni tì ǹzison. Son, ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ cinnâ flɔʼ nlim, ywum màzwùm ta kuʼ lànnzì li lɛ̀ ɓyin cinni flɔa. Flɔa màzwùm yɛ̌ ɓyin ǹkimmɔʼ fɛ lɛ̀ ɓyin fyimnzi mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nyɛ̌ m̀bɔʼ nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ta kuʼ yɛn.
47001007	Li, ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ ɓyin, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ ɓwiʼ ta vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ fɔʼ yɛnni ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin, ɓwiʼ yɛ tì kuʼ flɔʼ nlim cinni ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin.
47001008	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓwiʼ yili kan ɓyin ton ɗin shìkì ɓyin shi vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ yɛnni kɛ Àzî lìmmi. Vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ màzwùm leân ɓwiʼ mwù, ɓwiʼ ɓe kàn tî zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ ǹzison shɛʼ.
47001009	Ɓwiʼ nɛʼ, ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓàkàʼ kɛ mɛ nlim nun lɛ ɓɛ yɛ ɓwiʼ wu. Swum màzwùm cie li lɛ̀ sɛ lisàʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ ɓa ɓwiʼ tɛʼ zwùm lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ nɛʼ. Son, ɓwiʼ sukuʼ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ tǎ ɓwum yìmnzi kɛ ywi nun.
47001010	Ywi nɛ ɓe lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ yɛ ywi ni, à nywæ̀sì ɓwiʼ. À ywìmɛ tì ɓwiʼ nywæ̀si li kwan ndɔʼ. À si li, ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun lɛ nun nɛ yɛ tì ɓwiʼ nywæ̀si.
47001011	Ti lɛ̀ ɓyin, ɓyin yɛ ɓwiʼ kpea kɛ ŋkeli yɛ ɓyin yɛ keli kɛ ntwiʼ yɛʼ. Mɛ̀ ŋkeli nɛ ɓwum mèan yɛ keli, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ nun fyònnzi. Li, màn ɓwum yɛ̌ nun osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili lɛ̀ lwɛn nɛ nun cì kɛ ntwiʼ yɛʼ.
47001012	Ɓwiʼ cinni mbyi nshelaʼ nywi, à si lɛ ǹlim ti ɓwiʼ zwum pyǐ lɛ̀ she kwǔ kɛ̀n shɛʼ si sanmi kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, a lan lɔʼ ɗyě, she kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin. Kon mwum wan sɛ cì kan, kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b sɛ ɓe ɓwiʼ kɛ̀nnzi.
47001013	-
47001014	Kɛ yi ɗèwà yɛʼ nun, ɓwiʼ tà ka swum kyìbli ndɔʼ kɔi a lan kuʼ swum sɛ ɓyin woli kim ɓyin nzanŋgaʼ, ɓyin konndì son ywo. Swum sɛ ɓyin ywɔe kǎn mbyî lwɛn, mùn fɔ̀kaʼ lɛ ɓyin yɛ son ywɔti jenɛ seansean. Li, nywɔʼ nɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n, ɓyin yɛ nywi shelea ntwiʼ yɛʼ, ɓwiʼ shelaʼ tì kuʼ ntwiʼ yin.
47001015	Kɛ mfɔ̀kàʼ yɛ mùn ɓe fɔ̀kàʼ li nun, mwù ɗyie mùn lɛ mùn kiìn kɛ cì shin ɓǎ ɓyin cinni ǹlwukaʼ nlim kæ̀mmì ɓî.
47001016	Mùn sɛte kɛ̀ mbyî lɛ mùn yɛ̌ fyi kɛ nsòn yin kɛ kɛ̀n sɛ mun kɛ̀nmɛ kɛ Màsèdwân. Li, kwan sɛ mùn yɛ̌ tì fyònnì ɓe ǹwaì ye kɛ Màsèdwân, mùn kònndì ɓyin yɛnni, lɛ̀ ɓyin kà fɔ̀si mun kɛ̀n she mùn kɛ̀nmɛ kɛ Jùdê.
47001017	Kwan sɛ mùn kɛ̀kea mɛ̀ mwù lɛʼ màzwùm li, ɓyin ta fɔ̀kàʼ lɛ mùn cǐ wɛ̌ mwum nɛ tǎ lɛlɔʼ kɛ zwozwô ɗin? Kwan sɛ mùn kɛ̀kea mɛ̀ mwù lɛʼ nyɛ̀m, mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ mwum wan nɛ twɔti mùn lɛ mùn ci li? Kɛ nyě yi, mùn wòli kim mùn cinni mɛ̀ ŋwum mɓì, mun yilimɛ, mùn ɓyìnnɔ̀ʼ tì nùn?
47001018	Ayi, m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kwan hwæn, mùn ɓǎ mwum nɛ tǎ lɛʼ yili, kɛ nyě yi, mùn kwɛbsi tì ŋwum ɓe.
47001019	Ntwiʼ Yesù Kristò Mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ɓe lɛli kɛ nywi yon kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ Sìlasì, Tìmòtê lɛ̀ mùn nɛʼ, ǎ kǐn kǎn cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ɓî yɛ kɛ ŋwum. Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm yi lɛ m̀ɓyìnnɔ̀ʼ ɓon lɛ̀ ǹyili. Son, Yesù lìsaʼ lɛŋkæ̀m Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ nywi yon.
47001020	Mɛ̀ ŋkàli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b hwæn cinni ǹlwinni kɛ nywi yon. Li, kɛ nywi Yesù ɓwiʼ ta lɛʼ lɛ: «Àmɛ̀n””, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ fɛ ǹtwu lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
47001021	Mwum nɛ tǎ cì ɓwiʼ ɗyi kimmi kɛ nywi Kristò, ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin hwæn, ni M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Nun nɛʼ nɛ yæn ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ kwǔ kɛ̀n shɛʼ ɓɛ kyi kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum nun.
47001022	À ɗæ̀n ɓwiʼ m̀ɓùʼ nywi lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon. M̀ɓǔʼ màzwùm yi M̀pùn Nsanmi nɛ nun kɛ̀ kɛ mɛ nlim nyɛʼ nun. M̀pùn Nsanmi ni tǎ lìsàʼ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ tì ɓwiʼ ywum lwukea ndɔʼ fɛ, ye nun kɛ̀â ɓwiʼ kɛ cì shon.
47001023	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi shìtàkwù shɛ̂m, mùn kwinne ǹkìn ye kɛ cì shin ntwiʼ sɛ mǔn yili kan mùn yɛnnzi ɓyin vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ.
47001024	Àma, sɛ ɓa lɛ ɓwiʼ yili ɓwiʼ ci ɓyin dòlɛ̀ʼ kɛ nywi mbɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin yɛ mbyi Yesù ɗwon, ntwiʼ ɓyin ti kimmi kɛ nɗwon mbyi Yesù nun. Son, ɓwiʼ yili lɛ ɓwiʼ ci she ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓǎ ǹlim nlwukaʼ ɓyin.
47002001	Son sɛ ci mùn shɛ̀ lɛ, mùn ɓà tî fyòìn ɓe kɛ cì shin, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nlim nyin læ̀kì yimmi tì ɓe.
47002002	Ntwiʼ sɛ mun cì mɛ̀ nlim nyin ɓyɛb kɛ zwum, yà mwum nɛ yɛ tì cì ǹlim lwukaʼ mùn ɓe, a shi kuʼ ɓɛ ɓyin, ɓyin ɓɛ mùn yɛ̌ cì ǹlim ɓyɛb ɓyin zwum ɓi?
47002003	Li nɛ ci, mùn kɔe ɓyin ɗèwà ton si. Mǔn ɓe kǎn yili mùn ɓɛn kɛ cì shin, ǹlim ɓyɛb mùn zwum lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓe lɛ̀ ɓɛ yɛ mùn ǹlim lwusi zwum. Ntwiʼ sɛ mùn lìmmi lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ, kwan sɛ ǹlim ta mun lwukea, ɓyin hwæn, ɓyin ɓi kuʼ lɛ̀ ǹlwukaʼ nlim.
47002004	Kwan sɛ mùn kɔe ɓyin ɗèwà si, mùn ɓe lɛ̀ m̀fyonŋgaʼ kɛ nlim lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ɗuʼ ɓi mùn kɛ mɛʼ. Mǔn kɔe kǎn lɛ mùn ɓyɛbsi ɓyin ǹlim, son, ɓǎ ɓyin limmì m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ mùn tà ɓyin yili.
47002005	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ cì ǹyimmi ɓɛn, mùn nɛ nun ɓyɛbsi kan ǹlim zwum, son ɓyin hwæn. Lɛ̀ mǔn læ̀kì kwùm nùn, ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyindɔʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun.
47002006	Vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ she ǹkwìn ɓwum yɛnnzi mwum màzwùm wolâ.
47002007	Li, jenɛ à si lwɛn lɛ ɓyin swi nun mvub nywi, ɓyin flɔsi nun ǹlim kɛ zwum ɓǎ mɛ̀ yiye ɓyon læ̀kì nun mbyi ɓwusi.
47002008	Mùn tà ɓyin swulea kɛ ɓe nyě yi lɛ, cìênì nun lwɛn lɛ̀ nun limmì lɛ ɓyin yili nun.
47002009	Li, ǹkɔʼ yɛ mùn kɔi ɓyin ɗèwà si, mùn kɔe son lɛ̀ mùn ɓwɛb ɓyin, lɛ̀ mùn cɛ fɛʼ ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ɓi ywɔli kɛ ywum yɛ mùn tà ɓyin lìsea nun.
47002010	Kwan sɛ ɓyin ta mwum ndɔʼ nɛ cìâ ɓyɛbbi mvub swì nywi, mùn kuʼ, mùn tà kuʼ nun mvub swǐ nywi. Ntwiʼ ɓɛshɛ nun cìâ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ kɛ nywi yɛ̂m, mùn tà nun mvub swǐ nywi, mùn tǎ cì li kɛ ntwiʼ yin kɛ swiʼ Yesù Kristò.
47002011	Ǹcì yɛ mùn cǐ li, à yi ntwiʼ ɓwiʼ læ̀kì Satæ̀n mbyi ɗonnzi nlwon lɛ̀ nun pli ɓwiʼ fyàʼ mwu, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ limmi ɓyɛbbi nɛ nun yili nun ci ɓwiʼ.
47002012	M̀ɓɛ̀n yɛ mun ɓɛ̀nni kɛ Tròâsɛ̀ lɛ̀ mùn shɛ Ǹtwum Lwɛn kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, mùn kɛ̀n yɛn lɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ fɛ mùn mbyi nɛ mùn yɛ̌ she cǐ kwe.
47002013	Son, ǹlim ɓe kàn mûn zwum pyǐ, ntwiʼ sɛ mǔn cinni kan ŋgyinni nyɛʼ Tîtɛ̀. Li nɛ ci mǔn mgbæ̀nni kan kwe, mùn lɛb ɓon, mùn kɛ̀nnɔ̀ʼ mùn mbyî kɛ Màsèdwân.
47002014	Ǹtwu ɓɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ntwiʼ sɛ nun tà ɓwiʼ kɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ ǹdàli kwan hwæn kɛ nyě Yesù Kristò, ɓǎ nun lisàʼ lɛ à lèân wì, ɓwiʼ ti ɓwum ɓyon. Nun nɛ fɛ ɓwiʼ she kɛ fyaʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ci ɓwum limmì Yesù yì cìcì hwæn, wɛ̌ mlǎʼ ŋgwɔ̂ʼ mɛ nwùm lwɛn yɛ ta mɛ̀ nwùm yon læ̀mnzi cìcì hwæn.
47002015	Ɓwiʼ ɓi wɛ̌ mlǎʼ ŋgwɔ̂ʼ mɛ nwùm lwɛn yɛ lwukaʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹlim. Ɓwum ɓye yilâ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b swæti ɓon, ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ nwǔm màzwùm ywo, m̀banmban kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ta ɓon nɛʼ ɓwusi.
47002016	Kɛ cìcì ɓwum ɓye yilâ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b swæti ɓon, ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ nwùm lwɛn ywo, ye lisaʼ lɛ ɓɛ yɛ ǹzison cinni. Kɛ cɛ̌ ɓwum ɓye ta ɓon nɛʼ ɓwusi, ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ nwùm ywi ywo ye lisaʼ lɛ ɓɛ yɛ ywi nùn. Kɛ à si li, yà mwum nɛ woli à cì she nlæ̀mnzǐ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b si lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yon? Mwum ndɔʼ ɓǎn.
47002017	Son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun nɛʼ nɛ fyie ɓwiʼ. Ɓwiʼ ɓa wɛ̌ ɓyindɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta ɓwum mbɛ̀ti, ɓɛ kà kyǐ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓǎ ɓon yê lòn. Son, ɓwiʼ ta lɛli lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
47003001	Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ mùn lɛli yɛ, ɓyin yɛ shɛ̀ lɛ ɓwiʼ ɗunmâ tì nywi shelea ɓe? Kɛ̀ ɓyin yili lɛ ɓwiʼ ci wɛ̌ ɓyindɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum, ɓɛ kin kɛ cì shin lɛ̀ yì ɗèwà kɛ fyaʼ, ye lisaʼ lɛ à ɓi mɛ̀ ci-she ŋkæ̀mŋkæm? Kɛ̀ shindɔʼ ɓyin yili lɛ ɓwiʼ cibbi ɓyin yì ɗèwà yi fyaʼ?
47003002	Ayi, ɓwiʼ ɓa cì li, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin nɛʼ, ɓyin ɓɛ ɗyi wɛ̌ ɗèwà shɛʼ, she ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ mɛ nlim nyɛʼ nun. Mwum hwæn wòli kim à limmì son, à nzanŋgaʼ tì kuʼ.
47003003	À si mwum hwæn mɛʼ seansean lɛ ɓyin ɓi ɗèwà she Yesù Kristò kɔi, à næ̀mnzì son kɛ fyaʼ yɛʼ. Yesù kɔʼ kan ɗèwǎ ton sɛ lɛ̀ ǹgɔ̀ʼ ɗèwà, son, à kɔʼ son lɛ̀ M̀pùn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi ǹzison. Ǎ kɔʼ kan son kɛ ɓlon sɛ ɓɛ paʼ lɛ̀ ǹgwɔ̀ʼ, à kɔʼ son kɛ mɛ nlim ɓwum nun.
47003004	Ɓwiʼ ta ɗyi kimmi kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ni nun kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ntwiʼ sɛ Yesù Kristò nɛ ci ɓwiʼ ǹlìmmǐ màzwùm.
47003005	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ wòli kan kim ɓwiʼ shɛ lɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ she màzwùm lwinnzi lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ nɛʼ. Ŋ̀kimmɔʼ yɛʼ hwæn ta waì fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
47003006	Ntwiʼ sɛ nun nɛ fɛ ɓwiʼ kim lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-ncì she ɓyon, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ sannzi lɛʼ ŋgwòn nywæb lɛ̀ ɓwum. Ŋ̀gwòn nywæb màzwǔm, à ɓǎ lɛ ɓwiʼ ɗwon mɛ̀ lwuà ɓye ɓɛ kɔe ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê, son, ɓwiʼ mwumnzi M̀pùn Nsanmi. Ntwiʼ sɛ mɛ̀ lwuà ta ɓwum lìsea lɛ ɓɛ ɓwuâ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ yɛ ywi. Son, M̀pùn Nsanmi tà ɓwiʼ ǹzison fɛ.
47003007	Mɛ̀ lwuà ɓye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe Mòîzɛ̀, à kɔâ ɓon kɛ yi ɓlon yɛ ɓɛ paʼ lɛ̀ ǹgwɔ̀ʼ. Kɛ kwan màzwùm nun, ǹtwu Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b cie lɛ fli mɛʼ Mòîzɛ̀ ɗunmi ɗwùmnàʼ ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, han mvu ɓwum Izràɛ̂l wòli kan kim ɓɛ cɛ nun mɛʼ. Kànmbɛʼ, ǹɗwùmnǎʼ màzwǔm yɛ ti kuʼ ɓon mlɔ̀ʼ nùn. Li, mɛ̀ lwuà ɓɛnne kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan lɛ̀ ǹtwu, ɓon ɓɛ ta ɓwum lìsea lɛ ɓɛ ɓwuâ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ yɛ ywi. Kɛ ǹtwu yan ɓe twun li,
47003008	yì kæ̀mmì nyi yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ kuʼ shǐ ǹtwu yon lìsea kɛ nywi she sɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi tǎ cì?
47003009	Ɓɛshɛ mɛ̀ lwuà ɓye ta cì kyìtæ̀ʼ ɓæn ɓwum ta ǹtwu Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìsea, yì kæ̀mmì nyi yɛ she sɛ Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ ta ɓwum swæti yɛ shǐ ǹtwu Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìsea, a lan li?
47003010	Ɓwiʼ woli kim ɓwiʼ lɛʼ lɛ, swum sɛ sɛte ǹtwu cinni, a ɓa tî lɛ̀ ǹtwu, ntwiʼ sɛ ǹtwu ndɔʼ ɓɛnnâ jenɛ yɛ lan ye mbyî.
47003011	Ɓɛshɛ swum sɛ mgbæ̀nne kǎn mbyî cinne ǹtwu, yì kæ̀mmì nyi lɛ̀ she yɛ tòn ɗwùmɗwùm?
47003012	Ǹlim ta ɓwiʼ ɗyi kɛ lɛʼ màzwùm nun, son sɛ ci ɓwiʼ ta lɛli mwù zwô kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum nun.
47003013	Ɓwiʼ ɓa wɛ̌ Mòîzɛ̀ nɛ ɗwɔke fli mɛʼ shon lɛ̀ plè ndɔʼ ɓǎ mvu ɓwum Izràɛ̂l læ̀kì ǹdǔʼ ŋwanni yɛnni.
47003014	Mvu ɓwum Izràɛ̂l màzwùm ɓe mwù kimmi. A kiìn ɓɛ̀n jenɛ, ɓwɛn ɓyan ɓi kuʼ m̀banmban li. Kwan sɛ ɓon ta yì ɗèwà yɛ kɛ pwìn ŋgwòn nun nzanŋgea, ɓɛ ywɔʼ kan. À si wɛ̌ plè màzwùm kɛ ɓon mɛʼ ǹɗwɔki. Sukuʼ mwum fyonnì fyaʼ Yesù Kristò, plè màzwǔm kà pæ̀li.
47003015	Mùn shɛ̀ ɓyin lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ, a kiìn ɓɛ̀n ɗyě, kwan sɛ mvu ɓwum Izràɛ̂l ta mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀ nzanŋgea, plè màzwùm kɛ ɓon kɛ mɛ nlim nun ǹɗwɔki.
47003016	Son, kwan sɛ mwum tǎ yònnì mbyi Yesù Kristò nun, ɓɛ ta plè màzwùm pæ̀li.
47003017	Ntwiʼ sɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù ni swum fɔʼ ɓon lɛ̀ M̀pùn Nsanmi. Li, cìcì sɛ M̀pùn Nyɛli nyɛʼ ni kwe, tǒn mgbonmgbon si kwe.
47003018	Ɓwiʼ hwæn, ɓwiʼ ta ǹtwu Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù yɛnni, shìkì ɓwiʼ ɗwɔki mɛʼ lɛ̀ plè. Kɛ nyɛn yɛ ɓwiʼ ta nun yɛnni li, ɓwiʼ ta fyònnì wɛ̌ nun, ǹtwu yɛʼ ta kònndì mbyimbyî ɓǎ yɛ ɓɛ wɛ̌ yon. Swum sɛ M̀pùn Nyɛli nyɛʼ kǐn cì, à si.
47004001	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe ɓwiʼ she si kɛ fyaʼ kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon nun. Li nɛ ci ɓwiʼ tà ka mwù ɓwæti lɛ̀ son.
47004002	Ɓwiʼ kɛsâ nywi lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ kwɛ̀nnjin nɛ ɓwum ta cì kɛ mɛ gwùmnì nun. Ɓwiʼ tà ka ɓwum pɔkea, shìkì ɓwiʼ kwɛbsi kuʼ swum ndɔʼ kɛ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Son, ɓwiʼ ta fyǒn cì lɛ̀ ɓwum limmì lɛŋkæ̌m màzwùm seansean. Ɓwiʼ yili lɛ mwum hwæn yili ǹgwòn kɛ lɛʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ta lɛʼ nun kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
47004003	Son, ɓyindɔʼ ɓi kwe ɓye ywɔti kan Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ ɓwiʼ ta shɛ̀ yɛ. À si li kɛ cɛ̌ ɓwum ɓye yɛ ɓwu nùn.
47004004	Ɓwum màzwǔm tà ka ywɔti ntwiʼ sɛ ǹswæ̀b yɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan shimndâ ɓon mɛʼ lɛ̀ ɓɛ læ̀kì ǹwanŋwan she kanndi ɓon yɛnni. Ŋ̀wanŋwan màzwùm si Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ ta ǹtwu Yesù Kristò lìsea. Nun, Yesù Kristò nɛ ɗyi popò gwili Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
47004005	Kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ta lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b shɛ̌, ɓwiʼ tà ka ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ shɛ̌ ɓe kɛ nywi yɛʼ nɛʼ, ɓwiʼ ta lɛli kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò. Ɓwiʼ lɛ: Yesù Kristò nɛ ɗyi Nyɛli ywum hwæn. Ti lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, ɓwiʼ ɓi mɛ̀ ci-ncì she ɓyin kɛ ntwiʼ yon.
47004006	Kɛ nɗunmi ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛle lɛ: «Ŋ̀wanŋwan kwan kɛ njimmi nun””, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b m̀bɔʼ màzwùm nɛ ci ǹwanŋwan ta ɗwùm kɛ mɛ nlim nyɛʼ nun, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ yɛn ǹtwu Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ ta ɗwùm kɛ fli mɛʼ Yesù Kristò zwɛm.
47004007	Ɓwiʼ cinni ǹjònndì màzwùm, son, ɓwiʼ ɓi ɓwæli wɛ̌ yì ɗɛblê kɔʼ. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ci li ɓǎ ɓwum limmì lwɛn lɛ ǹkimmɔʼ twun ǹcǐ she màzwùm wai kɛ cǐ shon, a tà ka waʼ kɛ nywi yɛʼ.
47004008	Ɓwiʼ nɛʼ, ɓwiʼ ta yì vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni mɛ̀ ŋgyinŋgyin, son, yɛ làn ka ɓwiʼ mwù. Ɓwiʼ ta fyonŋgaʼ, son, ɓwiʼ tà ka ɓwæʼ kwɛ̀nnzi.
47004009	Ɓɛ zæbsi ɓwiʼ, son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b kyììli kan lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ. Ɓɛ wɔʼ ɓwiʼ kɛ ŋgyɔʼ, son, ɓɛ mlɔ̀si kan ɓwiʼ ǹzison shɛʼ.
47004010	Yì kwan hwæn ɓwiʼ ta ywi Yesù lìsea kɛ kwæʼ nywi nun, ɓǎ ɓwum yɛn ǹzison shon kɛ kwæʼ nywi shɛʼ nun.
47004011	Sɛ lisaʼ lɛ, mɛ̀ ŋgyinŋgyin, ɓwiʼ ta ywi shiɔʼ kɛ ŋganŋgwu kɛ ntwiʼ Yesù, ɓǎ ɓwum yɛn lɛ Yesù ni ǹzison kɛ kwæʼ nywi shɛʼ sɛ yɛ ywi nùn nun.
47004012	Li, ywi tà ɓwiʼ yònnea kɛ nywi, son ɓyin, ǹzison si ɓyin nywi.
47004013	Ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Swum sɛ mùn yilâ lɛ lɛŋkæ̀m sɛ, son sɛ mùn tǎ lɛli.» Li nɛ ci, ɓwiʼ kuʼ, swum sɛ ɓwiʼ yilâ lɛ lɛŋkæ̀m sɛ kɛ mbyi Yesù nun, son sɛ ɓwiʼ ta ɓyin shɛ̌.
47004014	Ɓwiʼ limmi lwɛn lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yìmnzi Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù kɛ ywi nun, à yɛ̌ kuʼ ɓwiʼ yìmnzi wɛ̌ nun. À yɛ̌ cì ɓwiʼ ɗyi kɛ swiʼ shon ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin.
47004015	Ywum màzwùm ta lànnzì hwæn li ntwiʼ yin, lɛ̀ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b læm nywi ɓwum mèan. Li, ɓɛ yɛ yæki màn ɓǎ ɓɛ yili M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ. Ǹtwu Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ kɛ̀n mbyî.
47004016	Li nɛ ci ɓwiʼ tà ka mwù ɓwæti. Kwo fɛʼ she kwæʼ nywi shɛʼ ta lwublaʼ kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan si, mɛ̀ nlim nyɛʼ tǎ ǹkimmɔʼ nywæb ndɔʼ cinni mɛ̀ ŋgyinŋgyin.
47004017	Vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ she ɓwiʼ ta yɛn jenɛ fyôn ɓwiʼ mɛʼ ɗonmi, sɛ ɓɛ tì kɛ kwan kwæʼ nun. Ntwiʼ m̀fyimnzi yɛ ɓwiʼ ta son fyimnzi, ɓwiʼ yɛ ǹtwu ndɔʼ cinni yɛ lan ywum hwæn, yɛ ton ɗwùmɗwùm.
47004018	Ɓwiʼ tà ka ɓàkàʼ kɛ nywi ywum yɛ kanndi ɓwiʼ, son, ɓwiʼ ta ɓàkàʼ kɛ nywi ywum yɛ ɗyi kɛ cǐ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ywum yɛ kanndi ɓwiʼ yɛ, yɛ tà ka nòn kwan læ̀bbi, son, ywum yɛ ɗyi kɛ cǐ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yi, yon yɛ ta tòn ɗwùmɗwùm.
47005001	Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ kwo fɛʼ she ɗwun sɛ ɓwiʼ ta tòn kɛ nlim fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan gwan, (she lisaʼ lɛ kwæʼ nywi shɛʼ), ɓwiʼ yɛ nye nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɔ̀si ɓwiʼ kɛ ɗɛb cinni, nye nyɛ̌ mwum wan nɛ gwe kan. Nye màzwùm yɛ̌ ɓɛ ɗwùmɗwùm.
47005002	Kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ kɛ kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun, ɓwiʼ ta fyon ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ suʼ yili lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓwiʼ nye nywæb nyɛ̌ kɛ ɗɛb.
47005003	Li, kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ ɗun kwe, ɓwiʼ ɓa tì ɓɛ kɛ wan.
47005004	Son, tòn sɛ ɓwiʼ ta tòn jenɛ kɛ ɗwun shɛʼ si nun, ɓwiʼ ta fyon wɛ̌ ɓwum ɓɛ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nshe kyìblea kɛ mwu. A ɓa lɛ ɓwiʼ yili ɓwiʼ kpæʼ kwæʼ nywi sɛ ɓwiʼ cinni ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, son, ɓwiʼ yili ɓwiʼ cinni tì kuʼ kwæʼ nywi shɛʼ kɛ ɗɛb, ɓǎ swum sɛ cinni ǹzison ɗwùmɗwùm kwɛbsi swum sɛ yɛ ywi nùn.
47005005	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun nɛʼ nɛ fɔʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ limmì paʼ ŋkwɛbsi màzwùm, à fɛâ ɓwiʼ M̀pùn Nsanmi nyon nɛ lisaʼ lɛ à yɛ̌ tì ɓwiʼ ywum lwukea ndɔʼ fɛ, ye nun kɛ̀â ɓwiʼ kɛ cì shon.
47005006	Kɛ à si li, ɓwiʼ ta mɛʼ kpæmmi kwan hwæn. Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ kɛ tòn kɛ kwæʼ nywi ton sɛ nun, ɓwiʼ kɛ læ̀bbi lɛ̀ cǐ tòn Nyɛli nyɛʼ.
47005007	Tòn sɛ ɓwiʼ ta tòn cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, ɓwiʼ tà ka ywum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛnni lɛ̀ mɛʼ, son, ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ yon.
47005008	Ɓwiʼ ta lɔʼ mɛʼ kpæmmi. Ɓwiʼ lɛ: ǹdikàʼ lɛ ɓwiʼ kyiilì lɛ̀ kwæʼ nywi ton sɛ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kɛn tòn kɛ ke Nyɛli nyɛʼ.
47005009	Son, swum zwimbyiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ yili ɓwiʼ ci, kwo fɛʼ she ɓwiʼ kɛ kɛ kwæʼ nywi ton sɛ nun, kwo fɛʼ she ɓwiʼ kwean son nùn, à si lɛ ɓwiʼ lwusi nun ǹlim kɛ zwum.
47005010	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ hwæn, ɓwiʼ yɛ làn kɛ swiʼ shon ɓǎ nun lannzì ɓwiʼ kyìtæ̀ʼ, lɛ̀ mwum hwæn cinni ɗɛ̀bbi yon kɛ lwɛn nɛ nun ɓe cì nun, shindɔʼ ɓyɛbbi nɛ nun ɓe cì nun kwan sɛ nun ɓe kɛ kwæʼ nywi shon nun.
47005011	Kɛ nlìmmì yɛ ɓwiʼ limmi li nun, ɓwiʼ ta Nyɛli nyɛʼ yi, son sɛ ci, ɓwiʼ ta ɓwum ɓònnzi lɛ̀ ɓɛ kiìn Ǹtwum Lwɛn ywo. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìmmi ɓwiʼ lwɛn seansean. Li, mùn yili lɛ kɛ mɛ nzwon mɛ̀ nlim nyin nun, ɓyin limmì tì kuʼ mùn seansean.
47005012	Ɓyin yɛ shɛ̀ lɛ ɓwiʼ ɗunmâ tì nywi shelea ɓe? Ayi, son, ɓwiʼ yili ɓwiʼ wô ɓyin mbyi ɓǎ ɓyin shelaʼ nywi kɛ ntwiʼ yɛʼ. Li, ɓyin yɛ ŋwum fyònnzì lɛʼ cinni lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye yili ɓɛ wɛsì ɓwiʼ. Ɓon ɓɛ ta nywi shelea kɛ nywi ywum yɛ ɓon cinni kɛ mɛʼ ɓwum. Son, a ɓɛ kan ɓon kɛ mɛ nlim nun.
47005013	Kɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ɓi yì ɗyimi wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓon ta lɛʼ? Lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi yì ɗyimi, a si li ntwiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Son, ɓɛshɛ kon si ɓwiʼ mwu lwinni lwɛn, a si ntwiʼ ɓǎ ɓwiʼ kpaʼ ɓyin.
47005014	Ǹyili Yesù Kristò nɛ ta ɓwiʼ kɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ci she shon, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ mwum m̀bɔʼ ywie kɛ ntwiʼ ɓwum mèan, li, ɓon hwæn ɓɛ ywiâ kuʼ lɛ̀ nun m̀ban.
47005015	À ywie ntwiʼ ɓwum hwæn pæʼ, li lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɗyi ǹzison, ɓɛ læ̀kì ǹzison màzwùm twɛli lɛ̀ shan nɛʼ, son, ɓɛ ci swum sɛ nun yili. Ntwiʼ sɛ à ywi kɛ ntwiʼ yan, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìmnzì kuʼ nun kɛ ntwiʼ yan.
47005016	Kɛ à si li, ǹdìkàʼ nɗunmi ye jenɛ, ɓwiʼ tà ka tî suʼ mwum ndɔʼ cɛ kɛ fli mɛʼ zwɛ̂m. Kwo fɛʼ she ɓwiʼ ɓe Yesù Kristò twɛli mbyî kɛ mɛʼ zwɛm si, jenɛ, ɓwiʼ tà ka tî nun twɛli li.
47005017	Kwan sɛ mwum ti m̀ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, à ti swum nywæb she lwɛn. Ywum yɛ ɓe mbyî leàn, jenɛ, ywum yɛ nun kɛ swiʼ ti nywæbnywæb.
47005018	Ywum màzwùm hwæn li ta waì kɛ cǐ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Nun nɛ ci ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓe ŋwum fɔʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun kɛ ntwiʼ she sɛ Yesù Kristò cìe. À fɛ ɓwiʼ she nlìsàʼ ɓwum mbyi nɛ ɓɛ yɛ tòn ŋwum fɔʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
47005019	Ɓwiʼ ta ɓon shɛ̌ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìâ ɓwum ton ŋwum fɔʼ lɛ̀ nun kɛ nyě Yesù Kristò. Ǎ tà ka tî ɓyɛbbi nyan cɛ. À fɛ ɓwiʼ she nshɛ̌ lɛʼ ntǒn ŋwum fɔʼ si kɛ fyaʼ.
47005020	Ɓwiʼ ta lɛli kɛ ŋwum Yesù Kristò nun. À si wɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun nɛʼ nɛ ta ɓwum lon kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ta lɛli. Ɓwiʼ ta ɓyin swulea kɛ jin Yesù Kristò nun lɛ, yilênì lɛ ɓyin ɓɛ ŋwum fɔʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
47005021	Yesù Kristò ɓe kǎn lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ kɛ nywi, son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kyìli nun ɓyɛbbi nyɛʼ kɛ nywi, lɛ̀ kɛ mɓæti yɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ ɓæti lɛ̀ nun, ɓwiʼ fyonnì sanmi kɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
47006001	Li, ɓwiʼ ta she cǐ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b m̀banmban. Ɓwiʼ ta ɓyin swulea lɛ ɓa ɓyin gwannzì lwɛn nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛâ ɓyin ni ɗinɗin.
47006002	Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ lɛʼ lɛ: «Kwan sɛ kwan ŋŋgæ̀nni wole, mùn ywɔe ǹkeli ywû. Ŋ̀gyìn swæti ɓwum wòle, mùn kìen wù kpea.» Cɛ lɛ fɛʼ, kwan ŋŋgæ̀nni sɛ she. Ŋ̀gyìn nswæʼ nɛ ɗyě.
47006003	Ɓwiʼ yili kan ɓwiʼ ci mwum m̀bɔʼ ndɔʼ pæ̀ʼ kwù kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓɛ læ̀kì she shɛʼ wɛ̀si.
47006004	Son, kɛ ncǐ ywum hwæn pæʼ nun, ɓwiʼ ta lìsàʼ lɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi mɛ̀ ci-she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓwiʼ ta ǹlim ɓænni ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ kɛ yi vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nun, kɛ mɛ mfyonŋgaʼ nun, kwo fɛʼ kɛ moan ywi.
47006005	Ɓwiʼ fyimnze kwan sɛ ɓon ɓe ɓwiʼ ɓo, ɓɛ twɔʼ ɓwiʼ kɛ mɛ nye njè, ɓɛ twumnzi ɓwum lɛ̀ ɓɛ ci ɓwiʼ ɓyɛbbi. Ɓwiʼ cie mɛ̀ she ŋkyìbli, shi ɗye ɓe ɓwiʼ ɓænni, lɛ̀ ǹjè kònndi ɓwiʼ kwɛ̀nni.
47006006	A konndì ɓɛ, ɓwiʼ ta ɓwum lìsea lɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi mɛ̀ ci-she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ kwǔ kɛ̀n sanmi shɛʼ nun, kɛ ncǐ yɛ ɓwiʼ ta ywum cǐ lɛ̀ ǹlìmmì, kɛ mɓæn yɛ ɓwiʼ ta mɛ̀ nlim ɓænni, kɛ lwɛn nɛ ɓwiʼ ta ɓwùlu cǐ nun. M̀pùn Nsanmi ti ɓwiʼ nywi. Ɓwiʼ yili ɓwùlu lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ.
47006007	Ɓwiʼ ta Ǹtwum Lwɛn shɛ̌ lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓwiʼ konndi ywum cǐ lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Mɛ̀ kwǒn wì ɓye ɓwiʼ ta ɓæn mɛ fyàʼ ɓi kwǔ kɛ̀n lwɛn shɛʼ. Son sɛ ɓwiʼ ta kɛ̌n wì ɗwǐ lɛ̀ son, ɓwiʼ ghɔʼ tì kuʼ ɓwiʼ nɛʼ ɓe lɛ̀ son.
47006008	Ɓyindɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ta ɓwiʼ twuli, ɓyindɔʼ njilì tì kuʼ ɓwiʼ ɓe. Ɓyindɔʼ ta ɓwiʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea shɛ̀kea kɛ nywi, ɓyindɔʼ shɛ tì kuʼ ɓwiʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa ɓe nywi. Ɓɛ ta ɓwiʼ twɛli wɛ̌ mɛ̀ ci-mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ, kànmbɛʼ, ɓwiʼ ta lɛŋkæ̀m shɛ̌.
47006009	Ɓɛ ta ɓwiʼ twɛli wɛ̌ mɛ̀ kyìn, kwo fɛʼ she ɓwiʼ ɓi ɓwum lìmmi si. Ɓɛ ta ɓwiʼ twɛli lɛ̀ yì ɗwon, kwo fɛʼ she ɓwiʼ ɓi ǹzison. Ɓɛ ta ɓwiʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi shìkì ɓɛ wu ɓwiʼ.
47006010	Ɓɛ ta ɓwiʼ ǹlim ɓyɛbsi kɛ zwum, son, ɓwiʼ ton lɛ̀ ǹlwukaʼ nlim kwan hwæn. Ɓwiʼ ɓi mɛ̀ ci-nzæmnzæm, son, ɓwiʼ ta ɓwum ǹjònndì fɛ mèan. Ɓwiʼ ɓi kɛ mɛʼ wɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ɓi mɛ̀ fyàʼ pwìnpwìn, son, lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m, ywum hwæn yi ɓwiʼ kɛ fyaʼ.
47006011	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, lan Kòrɛ̂n, ɓwiʼ gwùmnze kǎn ɓyin swum ndɔʼ, ɓwiʼ shɛâ ɓyin ywum yɛ ɓe ɓwiʼ mɛ nlim nyɛʼ nun hwæn.
47006012	Ɓwiʼ kwɛbsi kan ǹyili yɛ ɓwiʼ cinni kɛ nywi yin, son, ɓyin ɓɛ kwɛbsi mɛ̀ nlim nyin lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ.
47006013	Jenɛ, mùn yɛ̌ lɛli lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ wɛ̌ ɓyin ɓi ɓwɛn ɓyɛ̂m. Mùn shɛ̀ ɓyin lɛ, cinnênì mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ m̀bɔʼ kɛ nywi yɛʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwiʼ cinni kɛ nywi yin, ɓyin wo mɛ̀ nlim nyin hwæn kɛ nywi yɛʼ.
47006014	Ɓa ɓyin ɓæti mɛ̀ kwù lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye tà ka mbyi Yesù ɗwon. Mɛ̀ ŋwè ɓyin ɓɛ ɓa ɓyi. Yǎ mɓwùkì yɛ ɗyi kɛ nyinnìm swum lwɛn lɛ̀ swum ɓyɛbbi? Ŋ̀wanni woli kim a ton kɛ cìcì fɔʼ lɛ̀ njimmi?
47006015	Ɓyin fɔkaʼ lɛ Yesù Kristò wòli kim à cinni tǒn ŋwum fɔʼ lɛ̀ Satæ̀n? Mwum nɛ tǎ mbyi Yesù Kristò ɗwon, ǎ cinni kan mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ m̀bɔʼ ɓon lɛ̀ mwum nɛ ɓyìnnɔâ mbyi Yesù.
47006016	M̀ɓwùkì ɓan kɛ nyinnìm nye Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ swæ̌b fɔ̀kea. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi nyenswæ̀b nyɛ̌ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi ǹzison tǎ tòn kɛ nlim. A si wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun nɛʼ lɛle lɛ: «Mùn yɛ̌ tòn kɛ nyinnìm shan nun, ɓwiʼ ɓa kyììlì ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓon. Mùn yɛ̌ ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyan, ɓon kuʼ, ɓɛ ɓɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyɛ̂m.»
47006017	Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛle li, à kònndì ɓwum ɓyon shɛ̀ ɓe lɛ: «Weànì kɛ nyinnìm mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi, ɓyin kyiilì lɛ̀ ɓon. Ɓa ɓyin yinndì ywum yɛ ɓa sanmi. Li, mùn yɛ̌ ɓyin yě.
47006018	Mùn yɛ̌ ɓɛ Ce nyin, ɓyin ɓɛ tì kuʼ ɓwɛn ɓyɛ̂m. Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yi wai ŋwum Nyɛli nyin M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ cinni ywum hwæn.»
47007001	Mɛ̀ ŋwè ɓyɛ̂m, kɛ mɛ̀ ŋkàli nɛ hwæn ni ǹyɛʼ, ɓwiʼ kɛsènì nywi lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi nɛ tà ɓwiʼ kwæʼ nywi shɛʼ gwànnzi. Mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyɛʼ ɓɛ kuʼ ǹsanmi. Kwǔ kɛ̀n shɛʼ ɓɛ lwɛn kɛ nyi yɛ ɓwiʼ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yi nun.
47007002	Yilênì ɓwiʼ kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun. Ɓwiʼ cì kan ɓyɛbbi lɛ̀ mwum ndɔʼ. Ɓwiʼ ɓwusi kan mwum ndɔʼ shìkì ɓwiʼ se kuʼ kɛ nywi mwum ndɔʼ.
47007003	Mǔn tà ka ywum ton yɛ lɛli lɛ̀ mùn wɛsì ɓyin. Ɓyin ɓi mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ ɓye ɓwiʼ yili, wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn shǐ ɓyin mbyî. Ɓwiʼ yɛ ɓɛ lɛ̀ ɓyin kwan hwæn ɓæti, kwo fɛʼ kɛ ywi nun, kwo fɛʼ kɛ tǒn nzison nun.
47007004	Mùn tǎ ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ ɓyin ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, ɓyin ɓɛ ci ǹlim ta mun lwukea. Kwo fɛʼ kɛ nyɛn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛʼ nun, ǹlim ti mun zwum pyǐ, mùn ni ǹlwinni lɛ̀ ǹdàli kɛ ntwiʼ yin.
47007005	Mǔn tà ka lɛli ɗin, ntwiʼ sɛ kwo fɛʼ kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓɛnne kɛ Màsèdwân, ɓwiʼ cinne kǎn pon mɛ yìnnì. Mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ suʼ ɓwiʼ ɗwon, ɓwiʼ cinni klwǐ lɛʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum. Ti kɛ mɛ nlim nyɛʼ nun, yi ɓe ɓwiʼ kwɛ̀nni.
47007006	Son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ ɓwum ɓye hwummâ kɛ mɛ mɓàkàʼ nyan nun mɛ̀ nlim flɔsi, à flɔsi ɓwiʼ mɛ̀ nlim kɛ mɓɛ̀n yɛ Tîtɛ̀ ɓɛ̀nne nun.
47007007	Ǹlim suʼ kan ɓwiʼ flɔa zwum ntwiʼ mɓɛ̀n yon, son, yɛ konndi tì ɓwiʼ flɔa kɛ zwum lɛ̀ ǹshɛ̀ yɛ nun shɛ̀ ɓwiʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin flɔse kuʼ nun nɛʼ nlim zwum. À shɛ̀ tì kuʼ mùn wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin yili ǹyɛn yɛ̂m, m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin ɓi lɛ̀ mɛ̀ yiye. À kònndì tì mùn shɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin yili ɓyin ɗyi ǹgìm nyɛ̀m. Li nɛ ci, ǹlim ta mun yæki lwukea kɛ zwum.
47007008	Kwo fɛʼ she ɗèwà sɛ mùn kɔe ɓyin nyɛnnze ɓyin ǹlim kɛ zwum, mǔn tà ka ǹnyɛnnzi nlim màzwùm ɓàkea jenɛ. Mùn ɓe yon ɓàkea kwan sɛ mùn yɛnne lɛ ɗèwǎ màzwùm nyɛnnzi ɓyin ǹlim kɛ kwan kwæʼ nun.
47007009	Son jenɛ, ǹlim ta mun lwukea kɛ zwum. A ɓa ntwiʼ sɛ mùn nyɛnnzi ɓyin ǹlim kɛ zwum, son, ntwiʼ sɛ ǹnyɛnnzi nlim màzwùm ciâ ɓyin kwɛbsi kwǔ kɛ̀n shin. Ywum yi lannze hwæn li ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yile. Li, ɓwiʼ cìe kǎn ɓyin ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ.
47007010	Ǹnyɛnnzi nlim yɛ wai kɛ fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̌b, yon yɛ ta cì ɓwum kwɛbsi kwǔ kɛ̀n shan, ɓɛ ɗun kɛ mbyi nɛ ɓon yɛ swæʼ nun. Son sɛ ci, ǹnyɛnnzi nlim yi ton yi, ɓwiʼ cinni kan tì mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ kɛ nlim. Ti lɛ̀ ǹnyɛnnzi nlim yɛ ta waʼ kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, yon yɛ ta ɓwum kɛ̀nnzi kɛ ywi nun.
47007011	Cɛênì fɛʼ, ǹnyɛnnzi nlim yɛ wae kɛ fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ciâ kà ɓyin lwɛn kɛ nyinnìm shin nun? A ciâ lɛ ɓyin ɗyili mwù kɛ lɛʼ màzwùm nun, ɓyin yili ɓyin lusì mɛ̀ mwù nyin. Mɛ̀ nlim nyeneâ ɓyin kɛ zwum, yi konndì ɓyin kwɛ̀nni. Ɓyin yili ɓyin yɛn mùn m̀byìmmi, ɓyin yili ɓyin fɛ ɓyin nɛʼ kɛ she nun, ɓyin konndì tì mwum nɛ cìâ ɓyɛbbi ni vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi. Kɛ ncǐ ywum hwæn li, ɓyin liseâ seansean lɛ ɓyin ɓi mɛ̀ fyàʼ ɓlɔtɔʼ kɛ lɛʼ màzwùm nun.
47007012	Ɗèwà she mùn kɔe ɓyin si, mǔn kɔe kǎn son kɛ ntwiʼ mwum nɛ cìe ɓyɛbbi, shìkì kuʼ kɛ ntwiʼ mwum nɛ yɛnne vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ ɓyɛbbi màzwùm. Son, mùn kɔe ɗèwà si ɓǎ ɓyin yɛn seansean kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin fɛ ɓyin nɛʼ kɛ she nun ntwiʼ yɛʼ.
47007013	Son sɛ ci, ǹlim flɔʼ ɓwiʼ kɛ zwum. Flɔʼ nlim sɛ sue kǎn, son, ǹlim yæke ɓwiʼ lwukea mbyî kɛ zwum lɛ̀ ǹyɛn yɛ ɓwiʼ yɛnne lɛ Tîtɛ̀ ni lɛ̀ ǹlwukaʼ nlim. Ǹlim ɓe nun zwum pyǐ ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓɛ kimnzi nun ǹlim, ɓyin hwæn.
47007014	Mùn ɓe nun ǹjè yin shɛ̌ lɛ̀ mùn tǎ nywi shelea, kɛ nyě yi, ɓyin kɛ̀ kan mun kwɛ̀nnjin kɛ mwu. M̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓyin lɛŋkæ̀m shɛ̌ kɛ nywi ywum hwæn nun, m̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ ǹshelaʼ nywi yɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe shelaʼ kɛ swiʼ Tîtɛ̀ kɛ ntwiʼ yin kwan kuʼ li lɛŋkæ̀m.
47007015	Ǹlim yon hwæn yi kɛ nywi yin kwan sɛ nun tǎ m̀mwumnzi yɛ ɓyin mwumnze nun ɓǔn, lɛ̀ ǹyè yɛ ɓyin ye nun kɛ kwɛ̌n yi nun lɛ̀ nywi ta ɓyin gwɛnnzi.
47007016	Ǹlim ta mun lwukea zwum ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ ntwiʼ yin, ntwiʼ sɛ mùn lìmmi lɛ ɓyin woli kim ɓyin ci wɛ̌ swum sɛ mun yili.
47008001	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓwiʼ yili ɓyin limmì swum sɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum Yesù ɓye kɛ Màsèdwân nun.
47008002	Mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nyan lèân ǹkimmɔʼ, son, kɛ nlwukaʼ nlim yan nun, ɓɛ fɛâ swum sɛ ɓe ɓon fyaʼ lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, kwo fɛʼ she ɓon ɓe mɛ̀ ci-nzæmnzæm si.
47008003	Mùn tà ɓyin shɛ̌ lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ ɓɛ fɛe ywum mèan, ɓɛ yile tì ɓɛ fɛ a lan li.
47008004	Ɓɛ ɓe ɓwiʼ ŋgwɛb wɛbbi lɛ ɓon ɓi yili lɛ ɓon ɓi ɗwitàʼ kuʼ ywum ndɔʼ ɓǎ ɓon ɓi kpaʼ ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù ye ta tòn kɛ Jùdê.
47008005	Ɓɛ fɛ, a lan swum sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓàkàʼ ɓɛ yɛ fɛ. Ɓɛ sɛte ɓon nɛʼ fɛ lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù, kɛ nyě yi, ɓɛ fɛ tì kuʼ ɓon nɛʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili.
47008006	Li nɛ ci, ɓwiʼ ɗɔâ Tîtɛ̀ lɛ à fyonnì ɓe kɛ cì shin, ɓǎ nun kɛnnzì she sɛ nun ɓe lɛ̀ à ɗunmâ mbyî kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, lɛ̀ ɓyin kuʼ, ɓyin mlɔ̂ʼ she kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shin.
47008007	Ɓyin cinni ǹjònndì mèan kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Ǹjònndì màzwùm ni lɛ: ɓyin ta mbyi Yesù ɗwon lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, ɓyin cinni ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ lwukea kɛ ŋwum kwan sɛ ɓyin ta lɛʼ-Nswæ̀b shɛ̌, ɓyin cinni tì kuʼ ǹlìmmì, ɓyin ci she shìkì ɓyin hwum, ɓyin yili ɓwiʼ ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ. Li, ɓwiʼ yili lɛ ɓyin ɓɛ tì kuʼ mɛ̀ ci-njônndì kɛ she kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim si nun.
47008008	Mǔn lɛʼ kan lɛʼ sɛ lɛ̀ mùn ci ɓyin dòlɛ̀ʼ, son, mùn tǎ lɛli kɛ nywi she sɛ ɓwùlu ta cì, ɓǎ mùn cæsi kuʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin ta ɓwùlu yili.
47008009	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin limmi kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Nun nɛ cinne ywum hwæn, à fyɔ̀sì nun nɛʼ ǹshi kɛ ntwiʼ yin. À cìe li, ɓǎ kɛ tòn nshi shon nun, à fyɔsì ɓyin mɛ̀ ci-njônndì.
47008010	Ndɛb yɛ mùn yili mùn lɛb ɓyin kɛ lɛʼ màzwùm nun yi lɛ, à si lwɛn lɛ ɓyin kɛ mwù kɛ she sɛ ɓyin ɗunme ɗwùm ndɔʼ si nun. Ɓyin ɓɛ ɓe ɓwum ɓɛ sɛte fyàʼ kɛ̌ kɛ she màzwùm nun. Ŋ̀kɛ̀ fyaʼ yɛ sue kǎn, ɓyin ɓe tì kuʼ ɓwum ɓɛ sɛte yili lɛ ɓon yɛ ɓon nɛʼ fɛ kɛ she si nun.
47008011	Kɛ̀ênì mwù kɛ she màzwùm nun ɓǎ ɓyin mlɔ̂ʼ son. Kpæmmênì mɛʼ lɛ̀ m̀mlɔ̌ʼ she si lɛ̀ ywum yɛ ti ɓyin fyaʼ, m̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin kpæmme mɛʼ kɛ nɗunmi.
47008012	Ɓɛshɛ mwum tǎ swum ndɔʼ fɛ lɛ̀ ǹyili yon hwæn, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ fɛ màzwùm yě. À tǎ lwɛn ywo kɛ nywi swum sɛ mwum fɛ nun, ǎ tà ka ɓyɛbbi ywo kɛ nywi swum sɛ mwum cinni kan.
47008013	Mǔn tà ka lɛʼ si lɛli ɓǎ ɓyin pyi kɛ nzæmnzæm nun lɛ̀ ɓyindɔʼ se kuʼ ɓon, son, mùn tǎ yili lɛ̀ ɓwum cinni ywum m̀banmban.
47008014	Kɛ kwan sɛ jenɛ nun, ɓyin ɓi kɛ wɛʼ nun, li, ɓyin woli kim ɓyin kpaʼ ɓwum ɓye cinni kan swum ndɔʼ. Kwan ndɔʼ, ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ɓɛ kɛ nzæmnzæm nun, ɓon ɓɛ ɓɛ kuʼ kɛ wɛʼ nun, ɓɛ woli kim ɓɛ kiìn ɓyin kpea. Li nɛ yɛ cì, ǹcinni ywum m̀banmban ɓɛ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun.
47008015	A si wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Mwum nɛ hwɛnni ji mèan, à ji, ǹdǔʼ nzwon kan. Mwum nɛ hwɛnni kwæʼ, à ji, à ɓyim tì kuʼ.»
47008016	Ǹtwu ɓɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ntwiʼ sɛ nun nɛ ci Tîtɛ̀ shìnnì nun nɛʼ kɛ she nun kɛ nywi yin wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi kuʼ.
47008017	Tîtɛ̀ yilâ ǹcibbi yɛ ɓwiʼ cibbi nun lɛ̀ à kiìn kɛ cì shin. Kɛ she ta nun ǹlim lwukea, ɓe lɛ̀ nun nɛʼ kɛ̀â mbyî lɛ nun ni kǐnmɛ̀ kɛ cì shin.
47008018	Ɓwiʼ fyi tì kuʼ ŋgyinni nyɛʼ ndɔʼ m̀ban ɓon lɛ̀ nun. Nun nɛ mɛ̀ ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù hwæn ta jin shon sean lɛ̀ ǹshɛ̌ Ntwum Lwɛn yɛ nun tǎ shɛ̀.
47008019	A konndì tì ɓɛ, mɛ̀ ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù yænni nun lɛ à kɛn ɓwiʼ lànnzi kɛ kɛ̀n shɛʼ nun, à kpaʼ tì kuʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ she kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim si ɓǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinni ǹtwu. Lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ lisàʼ tì kuʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓwiʼ yili ɓwiʼ kpaʼ ɓwùlu.
47008020	Lòn yɛ ɓwiʼ ta yèkàʼ yi mèan. Li, ɓwiʼ ta twùʼ ɗwǐ lɛ̀ mwum ndɔʼ læ̀kì ɓwiʼ wɛ̀si kɛ she màzwùm nun.
47008021	Ɓwiʼ yili ɓwiʼ ci lwɛn, a suʼ kan kɛ mɛʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ, son, à si tì kuʼ kɛ mɛʼ ɓwum.
47008022	Ɓwiʼ ta ɓyin ŋgyinni ndɔʼ fyi lɛ̀ ɓon m̀ban. Nun màzwùm, ɓwiʼ ɓwɛbbâ nun kɛ mɛ mbyi mèan nun, son, à lìsaʼ nun nɛʼ lɛ nun ni ci-ncì she ŋkæ̀mŋkæm. Jenɛ, ǹkimmɔʼ ncì she yækâ nun ɗun nywi ntwiʼ sɛ nun kɛ̌ ǹlim kɛ nywi yin.
47008023	Ti lɛ̀ Tîtɛ̀, à ni ŋwè ci-kɛ̀n nyɛ̀m. Ɓwiʼ ta she cǐ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun ntwiʼ yin. Ti lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓye kin nun lànnzi, mɛ̀ ci-mfyi mɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù ɓɛ. Ɓɛ ta she cǐ lɛ̀ ɓɛ fɛ ǹtwu lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
47008024	Lìseànì ɓon lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ ɓyin yili ɓon, ɓǎ ɓwum ɓɛ kɛ mɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù nun limmì ǹyili yin seansean, ɓɛ yɛn tì kuʼ lɛ ɓwiʼ ci cìnɛʼ kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ shelaʼ nywi kɛ ntwiʼ yin.
47009001	Mǔn yɛn kan mwǔ mɓùnnzì yɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓyin ɓùnnzi kɛ nywi ywum ɗwìtea yɛ ɓyin yɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù ye kɛ Jùdê kpea nun.
47009002	Ntwiʼ sɛ mùn lìmmi ǹyili yɛ ɓyin kɛâ, mùn shelaʼ tì nywi kɛ jin shin nun swiʼ ɓwum ɓɛ Màsèdwân, mùn shɛ̀ ɓon lɛ: «Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓye kɛ Àkàyî ɗunme lɛʼ màzwùm fɔ̀sea ǹdìkàʼ ɗwùm ndɔʼ.» Ǹcǐ she yin wase ɓyindɔʼ ǹlim kɛ zwum.
47009003	Son sɛ ci mùn fyi ɓyin mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ton ɓɛ lɛ̀ ɓa ǹshelaʼ nywi yɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe shelaʼ kɛ jin shin nun kwan ɗinɗin. Mùn yili lɛ ɓyin fɔsì ywum kɛ mbyî wɛ̌ tà shɛ mun shɛ̀e ɓon.
47009004	A shi ɓɛ li, ɓɛshɛ ɓwum Màsèdwân ndɔʼ kiìn mùn lànnzi, ɓɛ cinni kan lɛ ɓyin fɔsâ ywum mbyî, kwɛ̀nnjin yɛ ɓwiʼ ɓænni, (mǔn lɛʼ kan fɛʼ lɛ̀ kwɛ̀nnjin nyin nɛʼ), ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ shɛe ɓon lɛ ɓwiʼ limmi ǹcǐ she yin seansean.
47009005	Li nɛ ci, mùn yɛn lɛ ǹdikàʼ mùn fyiì ɓyin mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ton ɓɛ kɛ cì shin lɛ̀ mǔn ɓɛ̀n kifɛʼ, ɓǎ ɓon ɗunmi lɛʼ fɛ màzwùm fɔ̀si, she ɓyin kɛe ǹkàli kɛ nlim. Li, kwan sɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓɛ̌n, mùn cinni lɛ fɛ màzwùm ti m̀fɔ̀si, mùn konndì tì kuʼ yɛn lɛ ɓyin fɛ nun lɛ̀ ǹlwukaʼ nlim, ɓa kì lɛ̀ m̀fyonŋgaʼ.
47009006	Ɓɛ ta ǹkæ̌n lɛʼ ndɔʼ ɗwǐ lɛ: «Mwum nɛ tǎ ɗyìm kwæʼ, à tà kuʼ fyæ̀b kwæʼ. Mwum nɛ tǎ ɗyìm mèan, à tà kuʼ fyæ̀b mèan.»
47009007	Sɛ yili lɛ mwum hwæn fɛ wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun ɓàkaʼ kɛ nlim yon nun. Ɓa à fɛ lɛ̀ ǹzwòn, shìkì à fɛ kuʼ nun lɛ̀ dòlɛ̀ʼ. Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili mwum nɛ tǎ fɛ lɛ̀ ǹlwukaʼ nlim.
47009008	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b wòli kim, à kònndì ɓyin ywum mèan, ɓyin ton kɛ wɛʼ nun kwan hwæn, shìkì swum ndɔʼ shi ɓyin. Li, ɓyin yɛ tì kuʼ ywum yɛ ɓyin yɛ mɛ̀ she nlwukea kɛ̀nnzi mbyî nun cinni.
47009009	A si wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun kɛ nywi mwum màzwùm lɛ: «À læ̀mnzâ lwɛn nyon kɛ nywi mɛ ci-nzæmnzæm, kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon tà ka mlɔ̀ʼ.»
47009010	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ta ci-ɗyìm mvu ywum fɛ, à fɛ tì kuʼ nun ji nɛ nun yɛ̌ nun nɛʼ ɗǐ nun. À yɛ̌ tì kuʼ ɓyin mvu ywum yɛ ɓyin yili fɛ, à yɛ̌ fɛ, à næ̀nndì fyàʼ, à cì ywum màzwùm san mèan, lɛ̀ she ncǐ lwɛn shin kɛn mbyî.
47009011	À yɛ̌ cì ɓyin ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-njônndì kwan hwæn, ɓǎ ɓyin lisàʼ tì kuʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ǹlim yin yi zwum lwɛn kwan hwæn. Li, ɓwum ɓye yɛ fɛ yin yě kɛ fyaʼ yɛʼ, ɓɛ yɛ ɓɛ mèan, ɓɛ fɛ ǹtwu lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
47009012	Ntwiʼ kwan sɛ ɓyin ta she mfɛ si cǐ, ɓyin tà ka suʼ mɛ̀ ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù kpea, son, ɓyin ta cì lɛ ɓwum yili M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ kwan hwæn kɛ ntwiʼ mkpaʼ màzwùm.
47009013	She sɛ ɓyin ta cì si yɛ shìtàkwù ɗyi kɛ nywi yin, sɛ lisaʼ lɛ ɓyin yilâ Ǹtwum Lwɛn kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, ɓyin mwumnzi yon. Ɓwum yɛ ǹtwu fɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ntwiʼ yin. Ɓɛ konndi tì kuʼ ǹtwu fɛ ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ciâ ɓon lwɛn, ɓyin fɛ tì kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum hwæn.
47009014	Ɓɛ yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli kɛ mɛ myin nyin nun, ɓɛ yili ɓyin lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ ntwiʼ lwɛn nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b læ̀mnzi kɛ nyinnìm shin nun.
47009015	Ɓwiʼ wɛbbènì ŋgwɛb ɓe lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ntwiʼ lwɛn nɛ nun cǐ, nyɛ̌ lǎn ywum hwæn.
47010001	Mùn, Pɔ̂l, mùn yili mùn cibbi ɓyin swum ndɔʼ. Mùn nɛ ɓɛ ta lɛʼ lɛ mùn ni flɔa kwan sɛ mùn ni kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ti kwan sɛ mùn ni ǹlæ̀bbi lɛ̀ ɓyin, mùn tǎ lɛli lɛ̀ ǹkwu kimmi. Son, Yesù Kristò ɓe flɔa, ǹlim ɓe nun kwɛ̀nni lɛ̀ ɓwum. Li nɛ ci,
47010002	mùn tà ɓyin swulea lɛ kwan sɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n kɛ cì shin, ɓa ɓyin ci mùn lɛli lɛ̀ ǹkwu kimmi. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyindɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ta shɛ̀ lɛ mùn tǎ she cǐ ɓǎ mùn cinni ywum kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. Àma, mùn lìmmi swum sɛ mùn yɛ̌ cì lɛ̀ paʼ ɓwum màzwùm.
47010003	Kwo fɛʼ she ɓwiʼ ta tòn fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, ɓwiʼ tà ka twùʼ ɗwǐ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ ta ɗwì kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan.
47010004	Ntwiʼ sɛ mɛ̀ kwǒn wì ɓye ɓwiʼ ta twùʼ ɗwǐ lɛ̀ ɓon ɓa ɓye kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. Mɛ̀ kwǒn wì ɓyɛʼ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ woli kim ɓɛ kyasì mɛ̀ ŋkwìn mɛ ci-ɓyìnnzì Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓwiʼ ta mɛ̀ ŋwum mɛ̀ ci-mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ twɔ̀a,
47010005	ɓwiʼ twɔtaʼ ywum yɛ mɛ̀ ci-nshelaʼ nywi ta ɗyilaʼ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun ɓǎ ɓwum læ̀kì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìmmi. Ɓwiʼ ta mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ hwæn cæsi wɛ̌ ɓwiʼ kɛâ nun kɛ nye njè lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ tɛlì nun ɓǎ nun mwumnzi Yesù Kristò.
47010006	Ɓwiʼ ɓɛ tì kuʼ kɛ mɓònŋgàʼ nun lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ yɛnnzi vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye tà ka ɓwiʼ mwumnzi, sukuʼ kwan sɛ ɓyin yɛ lìsàʼ lɛ ɓyin ta ɓwiʼ mwumnzi lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m.
47010007	Ɓyin ta ywum yɛ ɓyin swiʼ sukuʼ yɛnni. Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ shɛ̀ lɛ nun ni kɛ fyaʼ Yesù Kristò nun, à jiji kɛ mwu yon nun lɛ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ nun ni kɛ fyaʼ Yesù Kristò, ɓwiʼ kuʼ, ɓwiʼ ɓi kɛ fyaʼ Yesù Kristò wɛ̌ nun.
47010008	Kwɛ̀nnjin ɓæn kan mun kwo fɛʼ she mùn sheleâ nywi kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ yɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ fɛ ɓwiʼ nun. Ntwiʼ sɛ ǹkimmɔʼ màzwùm yi ɓǎ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyin kɛn mbyî, ɓa kì yɛ fyôn ɓe lɛ̀ ǹyè.
47010009	Mǔn yili kan lɛ ɓyin fɔkàʼ lɛ mùn tà ɓyin yisi kɛ yi ɗèwà yɛ̂m nun.
47010010	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ ta lɛʼ kɛ nywi yɛ̂m lɛ: «Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ kyìblea ta kwan kɛ yi ɗèwà yon nun yɛ ɓɛ tì kimmi. Ti kwan sɛ nun nɛʼ ni kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ nun, à ɓǎ ǹkimmi, ǎ lìmmi kan lɛli kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum nun.»
47010011	Ɓwum ɓɛ ta lɛli li, ɓɛ limmì lwɛn lɛ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛʼ yi kɛ yi ɗèwà nun kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓa kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, li nɛ ɓwiʼ ta kuʼ cì kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ta kuʼ ɓɛ̀n kɛ cì shin.
47010012	Ɓwiʼ tà ka mwù wònndi lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta ɓon nɛʼ twɛli lɛ̀ ɓwum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm, shìkì ɓwiʼ ɓɛ swum fɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓon. Ɓɛ ta ɓon nɛʼ fǒ lɛ̀ m̀bɔ̀kì nyan nɛʼ, ɓɛ cæsi kuʼ ɓon nɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm shan nun. Kon ɓa ɓon mwu.
47010013	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, ɓwiʼ tà ka nywi shelea a shi ɓɛ kɛ nywi she sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓwiʼ, ɓwiʼ yɛ nywi shelea kɛ mɛ mbyi she ɓye Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kiìn ɓɛ̀n han kɛ cì shin.
47010014	Ɓwiʼ ɓe kǎn mɛ̀ sɔ̀à ɓye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe ɓwiʼ lèan kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ kien ɓɛ̀n kɛ cì shin lɛ̀ Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò. Ɓɛshɛ ɓyin shiè ɓɛ kɛ mɛ sɔ̀à màzwùm nun, ɓwiʼ ɓɛnnè kan kɛ cì shin.
47010015	Li, ɓwiʼ tà ka nywi shelea kɛ she sɛ ɓwùlu ɓɛ ci nun. She shan yɛn kan ɓwiʼ. Son, ɓwiʼ yili lɛ ɓyin kɛn mbyî kɛ mbyi Yesù nun, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ci tì mɛ̀ she mbyimbyî kɛ nyinnìm shin nun. Son, ɓwiʼ yɛ cì ɓwiʼ suʼ kɛ mɛ sɔ̀à ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓwiʼ nun.
47010016	Li, kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ waʼ cì shin, ɓwiʼ yɛ mbyi nshɛ̌ Ntwum Lwɛn cinni kɛ mɛ ŋgyɔʼ ɓye kɛ nyè yin, shìkì ɓwiʼ shelaʼ kuʼ nywi kɛ swuʼ she sɛ mwum ndɔʼ cìâ nun.
47010017	Ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Mwum nɛ yili ǹshelaʼ nywi, à shelaʼ yon kɛ ntwiʼ swum sɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cǐ.»
47010018	Ntwiʼ sɛ mwum nɛ tǎ nun nɛʼ ǹtwu fɛ, nun nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b tà ka ǹgwòn yili, sukuʼ mwum nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ta ǹtwu fɛ, nun nɛ nun tǎ ǹgwòn yili.
47011001	Mùn yili lɛ ɓyin ɓæn ǹlim lɛ̀ m̀mgbɔ̀tàʼ yɛ mùn yɛ̌ mgbɔ̀tàʼ nun. À si li, ɓænnênì ǹlim.
47011002	Mùn tǎ ŋwɛnŋgyî shin kwɛ̀nni, ŋwɛnŋgyî she wai kɛ cǐ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ntwiʼ sɛ mùn yæ̀nni ɓyin lɛ̀ ǹɗwɛb m̀bɔʼ ti kuʼ mbɔʼ nɛ ɗyi Yesù Kristò, ɓǎ mùn lannzì ɓyin kɛ fyaʼ yon wɛ̌ popò ntwum mlib.
47011003	Son, m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ nywun pɔkae Ɛvɛ̀ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ dàbàrì nyon, yi ta mun kwɛ̀nni lɛ shindɔʼ mwum ndɔʼ kìn ɓyin ɓwuli, li, ɓyin yonnzì ǹyè lɛ̀ ǹyili Yesù Kristò.
47011004	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta wɛn nɛ hwæn ɗonnzi lɛ̀ à kiìn kɛ cì shin, à ɗunmi mɛ̀ lɛʼ nyɛ̌ ɗin ndɔʼ shɛ̌ kɛ nywi Yesù, à ɗonnzi nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓyin shɛ̌. Ɓyin konndi tì yili ɓyin ye m̀pùn nyɛ̌ ɗin ndɔʼ, nyɛ̌ ɓyin cinni kifɛʼ mbyî, ɓyin yili tì ǹywɔʼ Ntwum Lwɛn ye ɗin ndɔʼ ye ɓyin ywɔʼ kifɛʼ mbyî.
47011005	Ɓyin ta ɓwum màzwùm twɛli wɛ̌ mɛ̀ ci-ntwum klwɔkea. Son, mùn lìmmi lɛ kwo fɛʼ yà mbyi nun, mùn ɓǎ lwæ̀b ɓe shan.
47011006	Kwo fɛʼ she mùn ni mwum nɛ lìmmi kan m̀bɔ̀kì nlɛli kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum nun, kɛ mbyi kon nun, mùn cinni ǹlìmmì. Mùn lìseâ ɓyin yon kɛ nyinnìm shin nun yì kæ̀mmì mèan.
47011007	Kwan sɛ mùn ɓe ɓyin Ǹtwum Lwɛn sannzi, mǔn shɛ̀e kan lɛ ɓyin fɛ mùn swum ndɔʼ. Son, mùn fyɔ̀sì mùn nɛʼ kwæʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin fyonnì ɓwum klwɔkea. Kɛ ncǐ yɛ mùn cìe li, ɓyɛbbi nɛ mùn cìe ɓyin?
47011008	Mɛ̀ ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù ye fɔʼ yɛ mùn pyìse shìtwɔ̂ʼ kwan sɛ mùn yèe ɓon lòn fyaʼ ɓǎ mùn kiìn ɓyin kpea.
47011009	A konndì ɓɛ, kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin, mǔn cibbe kǎn lɛ mwum ndɔʼ kpaʼ mùn kwan sɛ swum ndɔʼ ɓe mùn shi. Ntwiʼ swum sɛ ɓe mùn shi, mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓye wai kɛ Màsèdwân fɛâ mùn son. Mǔn ɓe kǎn yili mùn hwumnzi ɓyin lɛ̀ ǹcibbi. Li, mùn ɓà kuʼ ɓyin hwumnzi nywɔʼ ndɔʼ kwo fɛʼ kɛ yǎ mbyi nun lɛ̀ ǹcibbi swum ndɔʼ.
47011010	Mwum ndɔʼ wòli kan kim à kænni mùn ǹshelaʼ nywi yɛ mùn tǎ shelaʼ kɛ mɛ ŋgyɔʼ Àkàyî nun hwæn ntwiʼ ncì yɛ li. M̀bɔ̀kì nɛ Yesù Kristò ni mùn nywi, mùn tà kuʼ lɛŋkæ̀m shon lɛli kɛ cɛ̌.
47011011	Mùn lɛʼ li ntwiʼ yɛn? Ntwiʼ sɛ mǔn yili kan ɓyin? M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìmmi lɛ mùn yili ɓyin.
47011012	Son, mùn yɛ̌ tì kònndi kɛ̀n mbyî lɛ̀ ǹcǐ she wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn cìe mbyî kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓǎ mùn twɔ̂ʼ ŋwum lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye yili ɓɛ kæb mbyi, lɛ̀ ɓon ɓɛ kuʼ wɛ̌ ɓwiʼ kɛ ywum yɛ ɓɛ ta nywi shelea nun.
47011013	Ɓwum màzwùm ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-ntwum mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ. Mɛ̀ ci-ncì she ɓye ta ɓwum pɔkea ɓɛ tì kuʼ. Ɓɛ ta ɓwum pɔkea lɛ ɓon ɓi mɛ̀ ci-ntwum Yesù Kristò ŋkæ̀mŋkæm.
47011014	Swum màzwùm ɓa lɛʼ shìmmea, ntwiʼ sɛ Satæ̀n nun nɛʼ wòli à pɔkaʼ ɓwum, à ɓwùmnì wɛ̌ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
47011015	Kɛ à si li, ɓɛshɛ mɛ̀ ci-she Satæ̀n ta ɓwum pɔkea, ɓɛ yonnzì ɓon nɛʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-she lwinni, lɛʼ shìmmea sɛ ɓan. Kɛ mmlɔ̀kàʼ yan nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓon mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ lànnzi kɛ nywi ywum yɛ ɓon ciâ.
47011016	Mùn tà ɓyin kònndi shɛ̌ lɛ ɓa mwum ndɔʼ twɛʼ mùn lɛ̀ ɗyimi. Ɓɛshɛ ɓyin twɛʼ lɔʼ mùn li, fyimnzênì mùn wɛ̌ ɗyimi lɛ̀ mùn shelaʼ kuʼ nywi kwæʼ.
47011017	Swum sɛ mùn tǎ lɛli jenɛ sɛ, lɛʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù sɛ ɓan, à si wɛ̌ lɛʼ ɗyimi.
47011018	Kɛ màn ɓwum tǎ nywi shelea kɛ nywi ywum yɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun, mùn kuʼ, mùn yɛ̌ kuʼ nywi shelea.
47011019	Ɓyin ɓɛ ta ɓàkàʼ lɛ ɓyin ɓi konnea, ǹlim ta ɓyin lwukea lɛ̀ m̀fyimnzi ɓwum ɓɛ ɗyi ɗyɛmnea?
47011020	Ɓyin ta fyimni lɛ̀ ɓɛ pimmaʼ ɓyin wɛ̌ mɛ̀ son, ɓɛ ji ɓyin mɛʼ lɛ̀ ɓɛ se tì kuʼ ɓyin kɛ nywi, ɓɛ twɛʼ ɓon nɛʼ wɛ̌ ɓwumŋkæ̀m ɓyin, ɓɛ simmɔ̀ʼ tì kuʼ ɓyin.
47011021	Ti mǔn, mǔn ɓe kǎn cì li. Ɓyin ta ɓàkàʼ lɛ mùn ɓe wònŋgea ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ ntwiʼ sɛ mǔn cìe kǎn li? Àma, swìênì mùn mvub kɛ nywi. Jenɛ, mùn yɛ̌ lɛli wɛ̌ mwum nɛ ɗyi ɗyimi. Kɛ mɛ mbyi ɓɛ ɓwum ta nywi shelea, mùn kuʼ, mùn wòli kim mùn shelaʼ kuʼ.
47011022	Ɓɛ ta nywi shelea ntwiʼ sɛ à ɓi lan Èbrû. Mùn kuʼ, mùn ni mwum Èbrû. Ɓɛ ta nywi shelea ntwiʼ sɛ à ɓi ɓwum Izràɛ̂l. Mùn kuʼ, mùn ni mwum Ìzràɛ̂l. Ɓɛ ta nywi shelea ntwiʼ sɛ à ɓi kɛ mvu ɓwum Abràhâm nun. Mùn kuʼ, mùn ni kɛ mvu ɓwum Abràhâm nun.
47011023	À ɓi mɛ̀ ci-she Yesù Kristò. Mùn yɛ̌ lɛli wɛ̌ mwum ndɔʼ nɛ mwù ɓa lwinni, mùn làn ɓon nùn. Mùn cìâ she, mùn làn ɓon. Mɛ̀ ci-zwiʼ twɔkea mùn kɛ mɛ nye njè yì kæ̀mmì mèan, mùn làn ɓon. Ɓɛ ɓɔe mùn lɛ̀ ǹgwæ̀ʼ, mùn làn ɓon. Mùn ɓe ywi shinɔʼ kɛ ŋganŋgwu zwɛm yì kæ̀mmì mèan.
47011024	Mɛ̀ Yudà ɓɔe mùn lɛ̀ ǹgwæ̀ʼ kæ̀mmì shân. Kɛ kæ̀mmì fɔʼ nun, ɓɛ ɓe mùn ɓo ǹgwæ̀ʼ mwum lê ɓlàn tânnì.
47011025	Ɓwum ɓye kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Rɔ̂m nun ɓɔe mùn lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mɔ̀ʼ yì kæ̀mmì lê. Kɛ nsòn ndɔʼ nun, ɓwum ywummɔe mùn lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋgwɔ̀ʼ ɓǎ ɓɛ wu mùn. Cìʼ kpìte lɛ̀ mùn kæ̀mmì lê, mùn lànnze tì shikpon fɔʼ lɛ̀ kpòn m̀bɔʼ kɛ ɗuʼ ndwun nun.
47011026	Kɛ mɛ ŋkɛ̀nkɛ̀n mèan nyɛ̀m nun, mùn yɛnne vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kɛ ntwiʼ mɛ ɗuʼ ɓye hwue, mùn yɛnne kuʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kɛ ntwiʼ mɛ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi. Mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ndɔʼ, mùn yɛnne kɛ fyaʼ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m mɛ̀ Yudà, yindɔʼ, mùn yɛnne kɛ fyaʼ mɛ kyìn ɓwum. Mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ɓe mùn cinni kɛ mɛ myi, kɛ nlim kyɔʼ, lɛ̀ kɛ ɗuʼ ndwun nun. Mɛ̀ ci-ntwum mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ ɓe kuʼ mùn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi.
47011027	Mùn ɓe she kimmi cǐ, she lan mun mwù nùn. Kɛ kwan ndɔʼ nun, mǔn cinne kǎn kwan ɗye. Ǹjè ɓe mùn kwɛ̀nni, ǹlim fyo tì mùn. Kwan ndɔʼ ɓe tì wòlǐ, mǔn cinne kǎn kwan ji, shi mɛ plè ɓe tì mùn ɓænni, mbɛb kwɛ̀n tì mùn ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ.
47011028	Kɛ nyě ywum ton yi hwæn, mwù yi mùn lwinni lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nɛ mɛ̀ ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù ta mun fɛ.
47011029	Yà mwum nɛ ɗyi ǹswublea, li, mǔn fyonŋgaʼ kan kɛ ntwiʼ yon? Yà mwum nɛ pyi ɓyɛbbi nun, ǹlim yɛ̂m kwɛ̀n kan lɛ̀ nun?
47011030	Ɓɛshɛ a yili lɛ mùn shelaʼ nywi, mùn yɛ̌ nywi shelea kɛ nywi ywum yɛ mùn ni kɛ nlim ǹswublea.
47011031	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi Ce Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù, nun nɛ cinni ǹtwu kwan hwæn, à lìmmì lɛ mǔn tà ka ɓwɛ̀lì.
47011032	Kwan sɛ mùn ɓe kɛ Dàmasì, gwɛmnà ndɔʼ ɓe kwe nɛ ɓe kɛ she mvɛ̀n ndwun Àrɛ̀tasì nun. À kɛ̀e mɛ̀ mɓòn kɛ mɛ mbyi nun hwæn ɓǎ ɓɛ ɓæn mùn.
47011033	Son, ɓwum Yesù ndɔʼ kɛe mùn kɛ kea nun, ɓɛ kyilì mùn kɛ zæʼ nye nun, li nɛ ci, mùn nywæ̀li nun kɛ fyaʼ.
47012001	A yili lɛ mùn shelaʼ nywi, kwo fɛʼ she a tà ka mun kpea lɛ̀ swum ndɔʼ. Son, mùn yɛ̌ lɛli jenɛ kɛ nywi ywum yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwàsi mùn kɛ ndɛmndɛm nun.
47012002	Mùn lìmmi mwum Yesù Kristò ndɔʼ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b wase nun kɛ nlim ɗɛb, a ti kɛ̀nni ɗye ɗwùm wûm ɓlàn nyî. Kɛ̀ à kɛ̀nne kɛ kwæʼ nywi shon nun? Kɛ̀ à yɛnne kɛ ndɛmndɛm nun? Mǔn lìmmi kan. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun kyishon nɛ sukuʼ lìmmì.
47012003	-
47012004	Mùn lìmmi lɛ mwum màzwùm, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b wase nun, à kɛ̀n ɓɛ̀n kɛ Pàràdî. Mǔn lìmmi kan ɓɛshɛ nun kɛ̀nne kɛ kwæʼ nywi shon nun, kɛ̀ à yɛnne kɛ ndɛmndɛm nun. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun kyishon nɛ sukuʼ lìmmì. Kɛ kwe, à ywɔe ywum yɛ mwum wan wòli kan kim à yònnzì kɛ lɛʼ shon nun, shìkì ɓɛ fɛ kuʼ nun ǹkimmɔʼ ye nun yɛ̌ yon shɛ̌.
47012005	Mùn yɛ̌ nywi shelea kɛ ntwiʼ jin mwum màzwùm, mùn ɓǎ nywi shelea kɛ ntwiʼ yɛ̂m, a shi ɓɛ kɛ nywi ywum yɛ mùn ni kɛ nlim ǹswublea.
47012006	Ɓɛshɛ mǔn yilê ǹshelaʼ nywi, mǔn ɓê kǎn ɗyimi, ntwiʼ sɛ mun lɛlè lɛŋkæ̀m. Son, mǔn yili kan mùn shelaʼ nywi, ntwiʼ sɛ mǔn yili kan lɛ mwum ndɔʼ twɛʼ mùn wɛ̌ mwumŋkæ̀m, a shi ɓɛ kɛ ntwiʼ swum sɛ nun tǎ yɛn lɛ mùn ci, kònndì lɛ̀ swum sɛ nun tǎ ywɔʼ kɛ ŋwum yɛ̂m.
47012007	Lɛ̀ mǔn læ̀kì mwù twuli kɛ ywum shìmmea yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwàsi mun nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ̀ mun vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ kimmi ndɔʼ kɛ nywi. À si wɛ̌ cikpuʼ Satæ̀n ndɔʼ nɛ kin mùn ɓo, lɛ̀ mǔn læ̀kì mwù twuli.
47012008	Kæ̀mmì ti lê mùn kelâ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ à nywæsì mùn kɛ vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ màzwùm nun.
47012009	Son, à fyònnzì lɛ̀ mùn lɛ: «Kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shɛ̂m si wù nywi, ɓæn ǹlim, ntwiʼ sɛ ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ̂m ta she cǐ kɛ nywi swum sɛ ɗyi swublea.» Li, mùn tǎ ǹdàli ywo, mùn shelaʼ tì kuʼ nywi kɛ nywi ywum yɛ mùn ni kɛ nlim ǹswublea, lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Yesù kiìn mùn kànnzi.
47012010	Li nɛ ci mùn tǎ lwɛn ywo kɛ nywi ywum yɛ mùn ni kɛ nlim ǹswublea, mɛ̀ nsɛ̌m, yì vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ, ǹzæbsi yɛ ɓɛ ta ɓwiʼ zæbsi, mɛ̀ mfyonŋgaʼ, hwæn li kɛ ntwiʼ Yesù Kristò. Ntwiʼ kwan sɛ mùn ni ǹswublea, kwan màzwùm sɛ mùn tǎ ǹkimmɔʼ ŋkæ̀mŋkæm cinni.
47012011	Mùn ɓe lɛli wɛ̌ mùn ti ɗyimi. Son, ɓyin ɓɛ cie mùn dòlɛ̀ʼ lɛ̀ ǹcì yɛ li. Sɛ yile ma lɛ ɓyin ɓɛ ɗyi ǹgìm nyɛ̀m. Kwo fɛʼ she mùn ni fɛʼ swum ɗinɗin, mùn ɓǎ lwæ̀b ɓe mɛ ci-ntwum klwɔkea ɓyin.
47012012	Ɓyin yɛnnâ mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n lɛ̀ yì hìlea yɛ mùn cìe kwan sɛ mùn ɓe she cǐ lɛ̀ m̀kpæm mɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun. Yon yɛ lisaʼ lɛ mùn ni ci-ntwum Yesù ŋkæ̀mŋkæm.
47012013	Yǎ lwɛn nɛ mun cìe mɛ̀ ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù ndɔʼ, mǔn cìe kǎn lɛ̀ ɓyin? Swum fɔʼ sɛ mǔn cìe kǎn kɛ cì shin, mǔn cibbi kan swum ndɔʼ kɛ fyaʼ yin. Swìênì mùn mvub kɛ nywi lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi màzwùm.
47012014	Kæ̀mmì mɛ nlè si she mun ti fɔ̀si lɛ̀ mùn kiìn kɛ cì shin sɛ. Mùn ɓà ɓyin swum ndɔʼ cibbi fyaʼ kɛ kæ̀mmì shɛ nun, ntwiʼ sɛ mǔn tà ka ywum yɛ ɓyin fyaʼ kæbbi, son, ɓyin nɛʼ ɓɛ mùn yili. Ɓwɛn tà ka ywum kæbbi ɓǎ ɓon ɗî mɛ̀ ce ɓyan nun, son, mɛ̀ ce ɓɛ ta ywum kæbbi lɛ̀ ɓon ɗî ɓwɛn ɓyan nun.
47012015	Li, mùn ni lɛ̀ ǹlwukaʼ nlim lɛ mùn fɛ ywum yɛ mùn cinni hwæn, kwo fɛʼ kwæʼ nywi shɛ̂m, lɛ̀ mùn kpaʼ ɓyin. Ɓɛshɛ ǹyili yɛ̂m yɛ mun tà ɓyin yili ta kɛ̀n kɛ mbyî, ǹyili yɛ ɓyin ta mun yili yɛ fyòn ɓe lɛ̀ nyè?
47012016	Ɓyin yilâ lɛ mǔn yèe kǎn swum ndɔʼ fyaʼ yin. Son, mwum ndɔʼ yɛ̌ shɛ̀ lɛ mùn ni ci-mɛ dàbàrì, mùn ni pɔkaʼ ɓyin ɓǎ mùn ni yê ɓyin ywum kɛ fyaʼ.
47012017	Mùn pɔkeâ ɓyin kɛ yǎ mbyi nun? Mùn ɓe ɓyin se kɛ nywi nyè ɓwum ɓɛ mun fyie kɛ cì shin? Ayi.
47012018	Mùn nɛ cibbe Tîtɛ̀ lɛ à kiìn kɛ cì shin, mùn fyi tì kuʼ nun ɓon lɛ̀ ŋgyinni ndɔʼ nyɛ̌ ɓyin limmi lwɛn. Tîtɛ̀ se kɛ nywi yin? Ayi. Ɓwiʼ kuʼ, ɓwiʼ cinni m̀ɓàkàʼ ncǐ she fɔʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun, ɓwiʼ ɗwon tì kuʼ mbyi m̀bɔʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun.
47012019	Kɛ̀ shindɔʼ, ɓyin ta fɔ̀kàʼ lɛ ɓwiʼ ta mɛ̀ mbyi kæbbi lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ lusì mɛ̀ mwù nyɛʼ kɛ swiʼ shin? Ayi, sɛ ɓa li. Ɓwiʼ ta lɛli kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b wɛ̌ tà shɛ Yesù Kristò yili. Mɛ̀ ŋwè ɓyɛ̂m, ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ɓwiʼ ta lɛli jenɛ yɛ, à yi ɓǎ ɓwiʼ kɛnnzì ɓyin mbyî kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
47012020	Ti lɛ̀ mǔn, yi ta mun kwɛ̀nni lɛ kwan sɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n kɛ cì shin, shindɔʼ mǔn læ̀kì ɓyin cinni wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn yili, lɛ̀ ɓyin læ̀kì kuʼ mùn yɛnni wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin yili. Yi ta mûn kwɛ̀nni lɛ̀ mǔn læ̀kì ǹklwǐ lɛʼ cinni, kɛ̀ shindɔʼ, ɓyìnnzì, nyeni nlim, m̀bànni, mɛ̀ nsɛ̀m, yì ɓòɓo, ǹshelaʼ nywi, ǹkyàsì mɛ lɛʼ.
47012021	Kɛ mɓɛ̀n yɛ mun yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n kɛ cì shin, yi ta mûn kwɛ̀nni lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b læ̀kì cì kwɛ̀nnjin ɓæn mùn kɛ swiʼ shon kɛ ntwiʼ yin. Shindɔʼ ǹlim kpanndi mùn kɛ zwum kɛ nywi ɓwum mèan ɓye pyiâ kɛ ɓyɛbbi nun mbyî, son, ɓɛ yònnzi kan mɛ̀ nlim nyan. Ɓɛ ɗonnzi kifɛʼ kwǔ kɛ̀n ɓyɛbbi shan, ɓɛ ci mɛ̀ lɛʼ kwɛ̀nnjin kwan hwæn wɛ̌ tà shɛ mɛ̀ nlim nyan yili.
47013001	Kæ̀mmì mɛ nlè sɛ she mùn yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n kɛ cì shin sɛ. Ɓwiʼ yɛ cì wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, she ɓɛ lɛʼ lɛ: «Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ɓyin yɛ fɔ̀sàʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, yɛ kwan kɛ ŋwum yi shìtàkwù ɓî, shindɔʼ lê.»
47013002	Mùn cinni ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ ndɔʼ nɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓwum ɓɛ cie ɓyɛbbi mbyî ywiʼ ɗwosi lɛ̀ ɓye fɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum tì. Mùn lɛlâ ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm mbyî kɛ kæ̀mmǐ mɓɛ̀n she mɛ mɓì nun. Son, mùn yɛ̌ tì kònndi kwùbtaʼ jenɛ kwan sɛ mùn ɓà kwe. A si lɛ, kwan sɛ mùn yɛ̌ tì kònndi ɓɛ̀n ɓe kɛ cì shin, mùn ɓǎ mwum ndɔʼ ɗonnzi.
47013003	Kɛ ɓyin yili lɛ ɓyin yɛn lɛ mùn tǎ lɛli kɛ ŋwum Yesù Kristò nun, ɓyin yɛ kuʼ yɛn. Yesù Kristò ɓǎ ǹswublea kɛ ncǐ she nun kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, son, à tǎ ǹkimmɔʼ yon lìsea.
47013004	À si lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ kwan sɛ ɓɛ ywummɔe nun kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛ̂m, à ɗonnzi nun nɛʼ, à fyònnì ǹswublea, son jenɛ, à cinni ǹzison kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Ɓwiʼ kuʼ, kɛ mɓæti yɛ ɓwiʼ ti ɓæti lɛ̀ nun, ɓwiʼ ɓi swublea. Son, kɛ tòn yɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ tòn ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ ɓɛ̀n kɛ cì shin, ɓwiʼ yɛ ǹzison shon lìsea, lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yon nun.
47013005	Cæsênì ɓyin nɛʼ, ɓyin cɛ ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ta Yesù Kristò ɗwon lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ. Kɛ̀ ɓyin lìmmi kan lɛ Yesù Kristò tǎ tòn kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun? À tǎ tòn kwe, a shi ɓɛ li, lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓǎ ɓwum ɓyon ŋkæ̀mŋkæm.
47013006	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, mùn fɔ̀kàʼ lɛ ɓyin yɛ lìmmì lɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi mɛ̀ ci-ntwum Yesù ŋkæ̀mŋkæm.
47013007	Jenɛ, ɓwiʼ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli lɛ̀ mɛ̀ myin nyin lɛ ɓa ɓyin ci lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ. A ɓa lɛ ɓwiʼ yili lɛ ɓwiʼ lisàʼ ɓwum ǹkimmɔʼ yɛʼ kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ ɓɛ̀n kɛ cì shin, son, ɓwiʼ yili lɛ ɓyin ci lwɛn. Ɓwiʼ yili li, kwo fɛʼ she ɓwiʼ cinne kǎn tî mbyi lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ lisàʼ ǹkimmɔʼ yɛʼ.
47013008	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ wòli kan kim ɓwiʼ fyinnzi lɛŋkæ̌m Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ ta cì hwæn, ɓwiʼ ta ɗyi lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̌m màzwùm.
47013009	Ǹlim ta ɓwiʼ lwukea kɛ nyɛn yɛ ɓwiʼ ta ɓyin yɛnni ɓyin ɓi kimmɔa, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ swublea. Ɓwiʼ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli kɛ mɛ myin nyin nun lɛ nun kɛnnzì ɓyin mbyî kɛ mbyi nyon nun.
47013010	Mùn tà ɓyin ywum ton yi kɔi lɛ̀ mùn ɓǎn kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓǎ kwan sɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n, mǔn læ̀kì ɓyin nyɛnndi kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ yɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ fɛ mun nun. À fɛ mùn ǹkimmɔʼ màzwùm lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyin kɛn kɛ mbyî, ɓa kì yɛ fyôn ɓe lɛ̀ ǹyè.
47013011	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, mùn lɛbbâ ɓyin. Kpæmmênì mɛʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin kɛn mbyî kɛ she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓyin kimnzi ɓwùlu mɛ̀ nlim kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓyin ton ŋwum fɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, flɔa ɓɛ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ tà ɓwiʼ yili, à kònndì tì ɓwiʼ flɔa fɛ, à yɛ̌ ɓɛ lɛ̀ ɓyin.
47013012	Hwæsênì ɓwùlu mɛ̀ hwæsi ɓye ɓwum ɓɛ ta ɓwùlu yili. Ɓwum Yesù hwæn ta ɓyin hwæsi.
47013013	Ŋ̀ŋgæ̀nni yɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò tà ɓwiʼ ŋgæ̀nni, ǹyili yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tà ɓwiʼ yili, lɛ̀ m̀ɓæti yɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi tà ɓwiʼ ɓæti lɛ̀ ɓwùlu kɛ ŋkwìn yɛʼ nun, yɛ ton lɛ̀ ɓyin, ɓyin hwæn.
48001001	Mùn Pɔ̂l nɛ kɔi ɓyin ɗèwà ton sɛ. Mùn ni ci-ntwum Yesù Kristò ɓa kì ntwiʼ sɛ mwum ndɔʼ nɛ yæn mun, shìkì mwum ndɔʼ nɛ fyi mùn, son, Yesù Kristò ɓon lɛ̀ Ce M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yìmnzâ Yesù kɛ ywi nun, ɓon ɓɛ fyi mùn.
48001002	Ɓwiʼ kɔi ɓyin ɗèwǎ màzwùm ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓwum Kristò ɓye kɛ fɛ, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ hwæsi ɓyin ɓɛ mɛ̀ ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò ɓye kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Gàlàsî nun.
48001003	Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì ɓyin, ɓɛ fɛ ɓyin flɔa.
48001004	Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù nɛ fɛe nun nɛʼ ɓǎ nun pæʼ ɓwiʼ kɛ ɓyɛbbi nun, nun swæti ɓwiʼ kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nɛ ɓyɛbbi ni kɛ nlim. Li nɛ Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili lɛ à ci.
48001005	Ǹtwu ɓɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwan hwæn! Àmɛ̀n.
48001006	Àma, shìmmea ta mun cǐ lɛ̀ swum sɛ ɓyin ta cì. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b loen ɓyin kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Yesù Kristò nun lɛ ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon, son, ɓyin mgbæ̀nni kan, ɓyin ɗwiâ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ fyǎʼ mɛ̀ʼ, ɓyin ɗunmi mwù kɛ̌ lɛ̀ ǹtwum lwɛn ye ɗin.
48001007	Sɛ ɓa lɛ ǹtwum lwɛn ndɔʼ yi tì kwe. Son, ɓwum ndɔʼ ɓi kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓɛ ta ɓyin mwù gwànnzi, ɓɛ yili ɓɛ kwɛbsi Ǹtwum Lwɛn ye kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò.
48001008	Son, mùn shɛ̀ ɓyin jenɛ lɛ, ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ ɓɛ̀n, nun ɓɛ fɛʼ kɛ ŋkwìn yɛʼ nun, kwo fɛʼ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ kyilì fɛʼ ǹwaì ye kɛ ɗɛb, ɓɛshɛ à ɗunmi ɓyin ǹtwum lwɛn ye ɗin shɛ̌, yɛ lân ye ɓwiʼ shɛâ ɓyin mbyî, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛnnzi nun vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ.
48001009	Mùn shɛ̀â ɓyin mbyî, mùn yɛ̌ tì kònndi kwùbtàʼ jenɛ: Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ ɓɛ̀n, à ɗunmi ɓyin ǹtwum lwɛn ye ɗin ndɔʼ shɛ̌, yɛ lân ye ɓyin ywɔâ mbyî, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛnnzi nun vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ.
48001010	Ɓyin fɔkaʼ lɛ mùn shɛ̌ lɛʼ si li ɓǎ ɓwum fɛ mùn ǹtwu? Ayi, mùn sukuʼ yili lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili mùn ǹgwòn. Kɛ̀ mùn yili mùn lwusi ɓwum ǹlim kɛ zwum? Ɓɛshɛ mun yilê lɛ mùn yɛ̌ mùn ɓwum ǹlim lwusi zwum, mǔn ɓê kǎn ci-she Yesù Kristò.
48001011	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, mùn tà ɓyin shɛ̌ lɛ mwum ndɔʼ nɛ ghe kǎn Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ mùn shɛ̀â ɓyin.
48001012	Mǔn ywɔʼ kan yon ŋwum mwum ndɔʼ, shìkì mwum ndɔʼ lìsàʼ kuʼ mùn yon. Son, Yesù Kristò nɛ kwasi mun yon.
48001013	Ɓyin limmi kwǔ kɛ̀n shɛ̂m kwan sɛ mùn ɓe ɓɛ̀ʼ mɛ Yudà ɗwon. Kɛ kwan màzwùm nun, mùn ɓe ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, mùn yile lɛ mùn kyasì yon.
48001014	Kɛ nɗwon yɛ mùn ɓe ɓɛ̀ʼ mɛ Yudà ɗwon nun, mùn ɓe ɓwum ɓɛ ɓwiʼ cinne kwan ye fɔʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓon lèan. Mùn ɓe mwù kɛ̌ kɛ nywi yi ɓɛ̀ʼ mɛ mbibea ɓyɛʼ nun ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ.
48001015	Son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon nun, à yæ̀nne mùn lɛ̀ ɓɛ ye kifɛʼ mun, à lon mùn lɛ̀ mùn kiìn she shon cǐ.
48001016	Kwan sɛ sɛ woli nun lɛ nun yɛ̌ mùn mwɛn nyon kwàsi ɓǎ mùn ɗyi shìtàkwù shon kɛ swiʼ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà, mǔn kɛ̀nne kǎn mwum ndɔʼ cibbi lɛ à lisàʼ mùn ywum màzwùm,
48001017	shìkì mùn kɛ̀n kuʼ kɛ Yèrusàlɛ̀m ɓǎ mùn yɛn ɓwum ɓɛ sɛti ɓɛ zwimbyiʼ shɛ̂m mɛ̀ ci-ntwum Yesù. Son, mùn waɔʼ kɛ̀n ǹnywɛ̀n kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Àràbî. Kɛ nyě yi, mùn fyòìn ɓe kɛ Dàmasì.
48001018	A lan ɓe ɗwùm lê, mǔn kà kɛ̀n kɛ Yèrusàlɛ̀m ɓǎ mùn kɛn Pìɛ̂r ɓæ̀ti. Ɓwiʼ non kwe ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun ŋgyìn wûm ɓlàn shân.
48001019	Mǔn yɛn kan ɓwùlu mɛ̀ ci-ntwum Yesù, a shi ɓɛ Jâʼ, ŋgyinni Nyɛli nyɛʼ.
48001020	(Ywum yɛ mùn tà ɓyin kɔʼ yɛ yi lɛŋkæ̀m. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìmmi lɛ mǔn tà ka ɓwɛ̀lì ɗin.)
48001021	Kɛ nyě yi, mùn waʼ kɛ̀n, mùn kɛ̀n ɓɛ̀n kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Sìrî nun lɛ̀ kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Sìlìsî.
48001022	Kɛ kwan màzwùm nun, mɛ̀ ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò ɓye kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Jùdê nun, ɓe lɛ̀ ǎ yɛn kifɛʼ fli mɛʼ shɛ̂m.
48001023	À ɓe suʼ ywɔʼ swum sɛ ɓwum ɓe lɛli kɛ nywi yɛ̂m lɛ: «Ci-nyɛnnzi ɓwum vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nɛ ɓɛkàʼ mbyî, jenɛ à tǎ ɓwum Ǹtwum Lwɛn Yesù Kristò lìsea, swum sɛ nun yile lɛ nun kyasì.»
48001024	Li, ɓwum ton ɓi ɗunmi M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b twuli kɛ jin shɛ̂m nun.
48002001	Kɛ nyě ɗwùm wûm ɓlàn nyî, ɓwiʼ konndì tì kɛ̀n ɓe Yèrusàlɛ̀m ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ Bàrnàbâ. Ɓwiʼ twɛlɔ̀ʼ tì kuʼ Tîtɛ̀ kɛ fyaʼ.
48002002	Mùn kɛ̀nne li ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ shɛe mùn lɛ mùn kɛn. Kwan sɛ mun ɓɛ̌n kwe, ɓwiʼ swɔli lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-zwiʼ nyenswæ̀b ɓye kwe, mùn sannzi ɓon kɛ kwiʼ nun Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ mùn tǎ shɛ̀ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà. Mùn sannze ɓon li ntwiʼ sɛ mǔn yili kan lɛ she sɛ mùn cìâ mbyî lɛ̀ she mun tǎ cì jenɛ, sɛ ywiɔ̀ʼ ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
48002003	Son, kwan sɛ ɓɛ ywɔʼ hwæn, ɓɛ shɛ̀ kan lɛ̀ Tîtɛ̀, mwum grɛ̂ʼ nɛ ɓwiʼ kɛnne ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun lɛ nyǐ ni ɗun ǹdùn.
48002004	Ɓyindɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛnni ɓe nyènye, mɛ̀ ci-mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ ndɔʼ ɓɛ ɓi, ɓɛ yili lɛ ɓɛ ɗunnzi nun ǹdùn. Ɓwum màzwùm ɗun kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum yɛʼ nun shìkì ɓwiʼ limmì ɓǎ ɓɛ yɛn m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓwiʼ ɓa tî kɛ mɛ lwuà mɛ Yudà nun, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Ɓɛ yili lɛ ɓɛ fyɔsì ɓwiʼ mɛ̀ son mɛ lwuà yan.
48002005	Son, ɓwiʼ ɓe mɛ̀ ywiʼ sæ̀ti kɛ ywum yɛ ɓɛ ɓe ɓwiʼ shɛ̌ nun. Ɓwiʼ yili lɛ Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ ɗyi lɛŋkæ̀m yɛ ton kɛ nyinnìm shin nun kwan hwæn, shìkì ɓɛ kwɛbsi yon.
48002006	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ɓyin ta lon lɛ mɛ̀ ci-zwiʼ nyenswæ̀b, (kɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-zwiʼ ɓɛkè, kɛ̀ ɓon ɓɛ ɓan, swum fɔʼ sɛ kɛ mɛʼ yɛ̂m, ntwiʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b tà ka mwum ndɔʼ cɛ kɛ mɛʼ zwɛ̂m), ɓwum màzwǔm shɛ̀ kan lɛ mùn konndì swum ndɔʼ kɛ Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ mùn ɓe shɛ̀ mbyî nun.
48002007	Son, ɓɛ fyon yɛn lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ mun she nshɛ̌ Ntwum Lwɛn yi lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà, wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun fɛe she màzwùm kuʼ lɛ̀ Pìɛ̂r lɛ nyǐ ni kɛn mɛ̀ Yudà shɛ̌.
48002008	M̀bɔ̀kì nɛ nun kɛ̀â Pìɛ̂r wɛ̌ ci-ntwum Yesù kɛ nywi mɛ Yudǎ, m̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ à kɛ̀â kuʼ mùn wɛ̌ ci-ntwum Yesù kɛ nywi ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà.
48002009	Jâʼ, Pìɛ̂r lɛ̀ Jân, ɓon ɓɛ ɓyin ta twɛʼ wɛ̌ mɛ̀ ci-zwiʼ, ɓɛ limme lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe mùn she ŋkæ̀mŋkæm si fyaʼ, li, ɓɛ ɗunmi ɓwiʼ mɛ̀ fyàʼ fɛkea ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ Bàrnàbâ, swum sɛ lisea lɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi ŋwum fɔʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓon. Li, ɓwiʼ sunndi lɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ kɛ̌n Ǹtwum Lwɛn shɛ̌ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà, ɓon kuʼ, ɓɛ kɛn shɛ̌ cǐ mɛ Yudà.
48002010	Swum sɛ ɓon sue kuʼ ɓwiʼ cibbi, à si lɛ ɓwiʼ kpaʼ mɛ̀ ci-nzæmnzæm ɓyan. Swum màzwùm sɛ mùn yile kuʼ mbyî lɛ mùn ci.
48002011	Son, kwan sɛ Pìɛ̂r ɓɛ̀nne kɛ Àntìyɔ̂shì, ɓwiʼ cinni lɛʼ ndɔʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun kɛ swiʼ ɓwum, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ à pyìâ lɛʼ.
48002012	Kwan sɛ nun ɓɛ̀nne, à ɓe ji ji lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà. Son, kwan sɛ mɛ̀ Yudà ɓye Jâʼ fyie ɓɛn, Pìɛ̂r kɛsi nywi, ǎ ji kan tî ji lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà, ntwiʼ sɛ nun lìmme lɛ yì ɓɛ̀ʼ yan ɓyinnɔʼ ǹji ji lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà. Li, à ɓe mɛ̀ Yudà yi.
48002013	Mɛ̀ Yudà ndɔʼ ɓye ɓe ɓwum Yesù Kristò ɓe kwe, ɓɛ ɗunmi kuʼ cì wɛ̌ Pìɛ̂r. Kwo fɛʼ Bàrnàbâ nun nɛʼ ɓe kɛ læm màzwùm nun.
48002014	Kwan sɛ mùn yɛn lɛ ɓɛ ɓe kàn tî kwǔ kɛ̀n she zuʼ kɛ̀nni wɛ̌ shɛ Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ ɗyi lɛŋkæ̀m yili, mùn waʼ zwô kɛ swiʼ ɓwum hwæn, mùn shɛ̀ lɛ̀ Pìɛ̂r lɛ: «Wù ni mwum Yudà, son, kwan sɛ wù ɓe tòn kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum ɓɛ ɓe kǎn mɛ̀ Yudà nun, wù ɓe cì wɛ̌ ɓwum màzwùm, wǔ ɓe kǎn yì ɓɛ̀ʼ mɛ Yudà ɗwon. Ti jenɛ, yɛn sɛ ci wù yili wù ci dòlɛ̀ʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà lɛ ɓɛ ɗwon yì ɓɛ̀ʼ mɛ Yudà?»
48002015	Ɓwiʼ, ɓwiʼ ɓi mɛ̀ Yudà mɛ̀ kwù lɛ̀ mwù nun. Ɓwiʼ ɓa ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà, mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi ɓi.
48002016	Son, ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b tà ka mwum fyɔ̀si ǹsanmi kɛ swiʼ shon ntwiʼ sɛ nun tǎ mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀ ɗwon. À tǎ mwum fyɔ̀si ǹsanmi kwan sɛ mwum ni ta ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Li, ɓwiʼ kuʼ, ɓwiʼ kɛâ ǹlim kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò ɓǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyɔsì ɓwiʼ sanmi kɛ nyě kɛ̌ nlim màzwùm, ɓa kì ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ta mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀ ɗwon. Ntwiʼ ǹɗwonnzi mɛ lwuà yɛ ɓa cǐ mwum ɓɛ ǹlwinni kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
48002017	Ɓwiʼ yili lɛ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ lwinni kɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ta ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Kɛ kwan màzwùm nun, ɓɛ shɛ lɛ ɓwiʼ ɗuân kɛ læm mɛ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi nun. Kɛ à si li, sɛ lisaʼ lɛ Yesù Kristò nɛ kin ɓwiʼ ɗunnzi kɛ ɓyɛbbi nun? Ayi, sɛ ɓa li.
48002018	Ɓɛshɛ mùn ɗonnzi ǹɗwonnzi mɛ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀, kɛ nyě yi, mùn ɗunmi tì ɗwon ɓe, mùn cìâ ɓyɛbbi kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
48002019	Kɛ swiʼ lwuà mùn ni ɗwon. Lwuà nɛ ci mùn ywi ɓǎ mùn cinni ǹzison kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓɛ ywummɔʼ ɓwiʼ kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛm ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò m̀ban,
48002020	li, ǹzison shɛ mùn cinni jenɛ, shɛ̂m sɛ ɓan, Yesù Kristò nɛ kin tòn kɛ nywi yɛ̂m. Tòn shɛ̂m sɛ mùn tǎ tòn fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, mùn tǎ tòn lɛ̀ kɛ̌ nlim lɛ̀ Mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, nun nɛ yili mun, à ywi kɛ ntwiʼ yɛ̂m.
48002021	Mǔn tà ka kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b twɛli lɛ̀ swum ɗin. Ɓɛshɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyɔsè mwum ǹsanmi ntwiʼ nɗwonnzi mɛ lwuà, sɛ lisaè lɛ Yesù ywi ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
48003001	O! Lan Gàlàsî, ɓyin ɓa lɛ̀ mwù nun! Yà mwum nɛ pɔkaʼ ɓyin? Mùn sannzâ ɓyin m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓɛ ywummɔâ Yesù Kristò kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛm fɔ̀sì lwɛn.
48003002	Swum fɔʼ sɛ mùn yili lɛ ɓyin shɛ mùn lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋwum yin si lɛ: M̀pùn Nsanmi ɓɛ̀nne ɓyin kɛ nywi ntwiʼ ɓyin ɓe mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀ ɗwon, kɛ̀ ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ywɔe Ǹtwum Lwɛn?
48003003	Ɓyin ɓa lɛ̀ mwù nun? Ɓyin ɗunme kɛ̀n mbyî lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Mpùn Nsanmi, ti jenɛ, ɓyin yili ɓyin kɛn kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ yin nɛʼ nun ntwiʼ yɛn?
48003004	Ywum yɛ lan ɓyin nywi yi à yi ŋgyɔʼ ɗin? Ɓan, yɛ ɓa ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
48003005	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɛ ɓyin M̀pùn nyon, à tà tî yì hìlea cǐ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓyin ɓakaʼ lɛ à tà yon cǐ li ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀ ɗwon, kɛ̀ ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ywɔe Ǹtwum Lwɛn?
48003006	À si wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ nywi Abràhâm lɛ: «Abràhâm tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, li nɛ ci M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyɔ̀se nun ǹsanmi kɛ swiʼ shon.»
48003007	Kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yi nun ɓyin woli ɓyin limmì lɛ ɓwum ɓɛ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓon ɓɛ ɗyi ɓwɛn Abràhâm.
48003008	Ɓɛ kɔe kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà fyɔ̀si sanmi kwan sɛ ɓɛ ta ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ nun. Li, Abràhâm ywɔe Ǹtwum Lwɛn màzwùm ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê, yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b shɛ̀e nun lɛ: «Mùn yɛ̌ ɓwum hwæn lwɛn cǐ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun kɛ ntwiʼ ywû.»
48003009	Abràhâm tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìâ nun lwɛn. Li nɛ ci, ɓwum ɓɛ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓon lwɛn cǐ wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun cìâ Abràhâm.
48003010	Ɓwum ɓɛ ta mwù kɛ̌ kɛ nɗwonnzi mɛ lwuà nun, ǹke Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ ɓon ɓænni. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Ŋ̀ke ɗwon mwum nɛ tà ka ywum yɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mòîzɛ̀ nun ɗwonnzi hwæn pæʼ.»
48003011	Mwum hwæn lìmmi lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b tà ka mwum ndɔʼ fyɔ̀si ǹsanmi kɛ swiʼ shon ntwiʼ sɛ nun tǎ mɛ̀ lwuà ɗwon. Ntwiʼ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Mwum nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyɔ̀sâ ǹsanmi yɛ̌ ǹzison ɗwùmɗwùm cinni ntwiʼ sɛ nun tǎ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun””.
48003012	Li, ɓwiʼ yɛn lɛ ǹɗwonnzi mɛ lwuà yi kyi, ǹtɛ̀ʼ zwum yi kuʼ kyi. Mwum nɛ tǎ mwù kɛ̌ mɛ lwuà nun, à yɛ̌ ǹzison cinni kɛ nyě yɛ nun lwinnzi mɛ̀ lwuà màzwùm hwæn pæʼ nun.
48003013	Son, Yesù Kristò libbea ɓwiʼ kɛ ŋke yɛ ɓɛ ke ɓwiʼ kɛ lwuà nun. Ŋ̀ke màzwùm fyôn nun ɓe nywi kɛ ntwiʼ yɛʼ. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Ŋ̀ke ɗwon mwum nɛ ɓɛ ta yìlì kɛ zwô ŋgæʼ zwɛm.»
48003014	Yesù Kristò cìe li ɓǎ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà yê ǹŋgæ̀nni yɛ ɓe kɛ nywi Abràhâm. Li, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ yê M̀pùn Nsanmi nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ɓwiʼ ǹkàli ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun.
48003015	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni, mùn yili mùn twɛʼ m̀bɔ̀kì lɛʼ ndɔʼ lɛ̀ ywum yɛ ta lànnzì kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. Kwan sɛ mwum ndɔʼ tǎ ɓɛ, à jinâ ǹgwòn ɓon lɛ̀ lwikwæ̌n wɛ̌ shɛ sɛ yili, mwum nyan ndɔʼ wòli kan à sɛ̀mnzì ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ ndɔʼ kɛ nlim, shìkì à kònndì kuʼ nyɛ̌ ɗin.
48003016	M̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ǹkàli lɛ̀ Abràhâm lɛ̀ tì kuʼ lɛ̀ mwɛn nyon. Ɓɛ kɔʼ kan kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìâ ǹkàli lɛ̀ ɓwɛn Abràhâm, à si wɛ̌ ɓɛ lɛʼ kɛ nywi ɓwum mèan. Ɓɛ suʼ kɔʼ lɛ: «Ŋ̀kàli yi yɛn mwɛn nywù””. Kɛ nzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm nun, mwum m̀bɔʼ nɛ nun lɛʼ, nun nɛ ɗyi Yesù Kristò.
48003017	Swum sɛ mùn yili mùn shɛ ɓyin, à si lɛ: M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b sɛte ǹgwòn jini ɓon lɛ̀ Abràhâm, a lan ɓe nyè yi ɗwǔm nɗuʼ nnyì lɛ̀ mwùm lê, mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀ kà kwan. Li, mɛ̀ lwuà ɓi wòli kan kim ɓɛ sɛmnzì ǹgwòn nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b jine mbyî lɛ̀ Abràhâm, shìkì ɓɛ twɔʼ kuʼ ǹkàli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
48003018	Ɓɛshɛ mɛ̀ lwuà ɓɛ ta cì mwum kà yě swum lwɛn kɛ fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ǹkàli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ ɓa tî yi. Son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ǹkàli lɛ̀ Abràhâm lɛ nun ni yɛ nyǐ lwɛn fɛ.
48003019	Ɓɛshɛ à si li, mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀ ta kpaʼ lɛ̀ yɛn? M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe ɓon ɓǎ ɓɛ lisàʼ ɓwum ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓwum ta cì kɛ nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. À kɛ̀e ɓon han a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kwan sɛ mwɛn Abràhâm nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ǹkàli kɛ nywi yon yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe mɛ̀ lwuà màzwùm kɛ fyaʼ mɛ cikpuʼ ɓyon ɓye ɗɛb, ɓe nyě yi, mwum m̀bɔʼ ndɔʼ nɛ kɛn ɓon yèi, à kìn lɛ̀ ɓon.
48003020	Mwum màzwùm lànnze lɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ kwan sɛ mwum lànnzi lɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum ɓî, lɛʼ sɛ sɛ yɛn mɛ̀ fyàʼ ɓî. Son, ti lɛ̀ ǹkàli yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe, nun nɛ sukuʼ ǹlim kyi.
48003021	Sɛ lisaʼ lɛ mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀ ɓyinnzi ywum yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ǹkàli lɛ̀ yon? Ayi, sɛ ɓa li. Ɓɛshɛ lwuà ndɔʼ ɓe kwe nyɛ̌ ɓwum woli ɓɛ cinni ǹzison kɛ nyè yon, li, mwum ɓê ǹlwinni kɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ntwiʼ sɛ nun tǎ lwuà ni ɗwon.
48003022	Son, ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ mwum hwæn nɛ kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔʼ zwɛm ni kɛ kwǔ ɓyɛbbi nji. Li, ɓwum ɓɛ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò yɛ ywum yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ǹkàli lɛ̀ Abràhâm yě kɛ ntwiʼ ntɛ̀ʼ zwum yan.
48003023	Lɛ̀ ǹgyìn yɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ Yesù kà wòli, ɓe lɛ̀ lwuà kpæmmâ ɓwiʼ wɛ̌ mɛ̀ ci-nye njè. Ɓwiʼ toen kpimmea li han a kiìn ɓɛ̀n kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b wòe ɓwiʼ mbyi nɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
48003024	Li, mɛ̀ lwuà ɓɛ ɓe ɓwiʼ ɓǒn a kiìn ɓɛ̀n kɛ kwan sɛ Yesù Kristò ɓɛ̀n nun. À ɓòn ɓwiʼ li ɓǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyɔsì ɓwiʼ sanmi kɛ swiʼ shon kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ Yesù.
48003025	Jenɛ, kwan ntɛ̀ʼ zwum ɓɛnnâ, mɛ̀ lwuǎ tà ka tî ɓwiʼ ɓǒn.
48003026	Kɛ ɓyin tɛlâ zwùm lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, ɓyin ɓi ɓwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓi ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù.
48003027	Ɓyin hwæn ɓɛ ɓɛ jimnze kɛ jin Yesù Kristò nun, ɓyin fyonnâ ɓwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b wɛ̌ nun.
48003028	Jenɛ, ǹkyììli ɓa tî kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum Yudà lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà. Ŋ̀kyììli ɓa tî kɛ nyinnìm mɛ son lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɗyi mgbonmgbon. Ŋ̀kyììli ɓa tî kuʼ kɛ nyinnìm mɛ ɗwɛb lɛ̀ mɛ̀ yib. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓi swum fɔʼ kɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓi ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
48003029	Ɓɛshɛ à si lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ ɓyin ɓi ɓwum Kristò, ɓyin ɓi tì kuʼ ɓwɛn Abràhâm. Ɓyin ɓi kɛ læm ɓwum ɓye yɛ ywum yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ǹkàli lɛ̀ Abràhâm yě.
48004001	Mùn yili mùn sannzi tì ɓyin ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm. À si lɛ: Mwɛn nɛ yɛ̌ kwiʼ ce nyon ji, kwan sɛ nun kɛ dèdɛʼ, ǹkyììli ɓa kɛ nyinnìm shon ɓon lɛ̀ son nɛ kwe næm, kwo fɛʼ she nun ni ci-ɗwon si.
48004002	Kwan sɛ nun kɛ mwɛsɔ̀ʼ si, à tǎ lɛʼ ywo kɛ ŋwum ɓwum ɓɛ ta nun ɓǒn, ɓɛ konni tì kuʼ lɛ̀ ywum yon a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kwan sɛ ce nyon tean.
48004003	Ɓwiʼ kuʼ, kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ mɛʼ sanmi kifɛʼ ɓwiʼ, ɓwiʼ ɓe mɛ̀ son mɛ swæ̀b ɓɛ fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan.
48004004	Son, kwan sɛ a woli M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ fyaʼ, à fyiì Mwɛn nyon, m̀lib ndɔʼ nɛ ye nun, mwɛn màzwùm ɓe mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀ ɗwon.
48004005	À ɓɛ̌n ɓǎ nun libbaʼ mɛ̀ mwù ɓwum ɓye kɛ kɛ mɛ lwuà nun, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ fyonnì ɓwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
48004006	Ɓyin ti jenɛ ɓwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛŋkæ̀m, li, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyie ɓyin M̀pùn Mwɛn nyon, à kìn tòn kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun. M̀pùn màzwùm tǎ cì ɓwiʼ lon M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ: «Bùba! Ce nyɛ!»
48004007	Li, wù ɓà tî son, wù ni mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Kɛ wù ni mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, wù yɛ̌ tì kuʼ ywum lwɛn nyon cinni.
48004008	Kɛ kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî nun, lɛ̀ ɓyin lìmme kifɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓyin ɓe mɛ̀ son mɛ swæ̀b ɗinɗin ɓɛ ɓa M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
48004009	Son jenɛ, ɓyin limmâ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, (ǹdikàʼ mùn shɛ̀ lɛ jenɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìmmâ ɓyin). Ti yɛn sɛ ci ɓyin yili ɓyin ɗwon tì mɛ̀ swæ̀b ɓɛ ɗyi swublea? ɓyin fyonnì tì ɓɛ mɛ̀ son ɓyan?
48004010	Ɓyin ta ǹgyìn ndɔʼ kɛ̌ lɛ ǹgyìn ndwun nɛ nyɛ̌, ɓyin kɛ tì mɛ̀ nywiʼ ndɔʼ, lɛ̀ yì ɗwùm ndɔʼ lɛ yɛ klwɔkea yɛ.
48004011	Kɛ ncì yɛ ɓyin ta cì li, ǹlim ta mun ponpon zwum lɛ shindɔʼ she sɛ mùn cì kɛ cì shin si ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
48004012	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, mùn tà ɓyin ɗɔa lɛ, fyònnênì mgbonmgbon wɛ̌ mùn, wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ mùn fyònni mgbonmgbon kwan sɛ mùn kìân ɗun kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun. Ɓyin cìe kǎn mun lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ.
48004013	Ɓyin limmi lwɛn lɛ mùn sɛte ɓyin kǐn Ǹtwum Lwɛn shɛ̌ kɛ kæ̀mmì she zwimbyiʼ nun ntwiʼ sɛ mùn ɓe ǹgwɛ̀nŋgwɛ̀n.
48004014	Ŋ̀gwɛ̀nŋgwɛ̌n màzwùm ciâ lɛ ɓyin hwummâ kɛ ntwiʼ yɛ̂m. Kwo fɛʼ li, ɓyin nzwonnzi kan mun. Son, ɓyin fyôn mun yě wɛ̌ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ndɔʼ. A lan lɔʼ ɗyě, ɓyin yee mun wɛ̌ Yesù Kristò nun nɛʼ.
48004015	Kɛ kwan màzwùm nun, ɓyin ɓe ǹdàli ywo ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ. Ti jenɛ, yɛn sɛ ci ɓyin? Mùn wòli mùn ɗyi shìtàkwù kɛ nywi yin lɛ, kwan sɛ mùn ɓe kwɛ̌n, ɓyin cinnè mbyi mpìlàʼ mɛ mɛʼ nyin, ɓyin kwɛbsê yon lɛ̀ yɛ̂m.
48004016	Ti jenɛ, mùn ti tì ci-ɓyìnnì nyin kɛ ntwiʼ lɛŋkæ̀m sɛ mùn tà ɓyin shɛ̌?
48004017	Ɓwum ɓye fɔʼ màzwùm, ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ɓɛ ta ɓyin shɛ̌, ɓɛ ta ɓyin mbɛ̀ti ɗin. Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ pwìnpwìn yɛ. Swum sɛ ɓɛ yili, à si lɛ ɓɛ gwannzì mùn lɛ̀ ɓyin, ɓǎ ɓyin ɗunmi ɓon mwù kɛ̌ kɛ nywi.
48004018	À si lwɛn lɛ mwum mbɛtì lwikwæ̌n, son, kɛ mbyi lwɛn nun. Mùn yili li kwan hwæn, a suʼ kan kwan sɛ mùn ni ŋgyɔʼ.
48004019	Ɓwɛn ɓyɛ̂m, nywi ta tî mùn kònndi kwɛ̀nni kɛ ntwiʼ yin wɛ̌ tà shɛ ye tǎ m̀lib kwɛ̀nni. Kwɛ̀nnì nywi màzwùm yɛ ɓɛ li han a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kwan sɛ ɓyin yɛ m̀bɔ̀kì Yesù lìsea ɓe kɛ mbɔ̀kì tòn nyin nun.
48004020	Jenɛ, mùn yili mùn ɓɛ kɛ ke shin ɓǎ mùn limmì swum sɛ mun yɛ̌ lɛli lɛ̀ ɓyin. Àma, mùn tǎ fyonŋgaʼ kɛ ntwiʼ yin.
48004021	Ɓyin ɓɛ yili ɓyin ɓɛ mɛ̀ son mɛ lwuà, mùn yili mùn cibbi ɓyin swum ndɔʼ. Ɓyin tà ka swum sɛ mɛ̀ lwuà ta shɛ̀ ywo?
48004022	Ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ mɛ lwuà nun lɛ Abràhâm ye ɓwɛn ɓî, nyɛ̌ m̀bɔʼ mon nyon ɓe son, jin shon ɓe lɛ Hagà. Nyɛ̌ mɛ̀ mɓì ɓe mwɛn mlib nɛ ɓe mgbonmgbon, jin shon ɓe lɛ Sarà.
48004023	Mwɛn nyɛ̌ Abràhâm ye ɓon lɛ̀ son nyon, à ye nun kɛ nlwinnzi yi ɓɛ̀ʼ yɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔʼ zwɛm. Son, ti lɛ̀ nyɛ̌ nun ye ɓon lɛ̀ Sarà, ǹkàli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ lwinne.
48004024	Ɓwiʼ woli ɓwiʼ yɛn m̀bɔ̀kì ndɔʼ kɛ lɛʼ màzwùm nun. M̀bɔ̀kì màzwùm ni lɛ mɛ̀ yib ɓî màzwùm, ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ ŋgwòn ɓî lìsea. M̀bɔ̀kì nɛ Hagà tǎ lìsàʼ, à ni ǹgwòn nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b jine kɛ kpaʼ Sìnàî zwɛm ɓon lɛ̀ ɓwum Izràɛ̂l.
