Ɓwɛn Hagà ɓe mɛ̀ son, li nɛ kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b jine ǹgwòn lɛ̀ ɓon kɛ Sìnàî, ɓon ɓe mɛ̀ son mɛ lwuà.
48004025	Jin Hagà si, ɓɛ ta kpaʼ Sìnàî nɛ kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Àràbî nun lon lɛ̀ jin màzwùm. Ɓwiʼ woli ɓwiʼ lon kuʼ Yèrusàlɛ̀m lɛ̀ jin fɔʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwum ɓɛ myi màzwùm nun ɓi mɛ̀ son.
48004026	Son, Yèrusàlɛ̀m she kɛ ɗɛb, à si mgbonmgbon, son sɛ ɗyi wɛ̌ mon nyɛʼ.
48004027	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Kìm m̀lib nɛ ye kifɛʼ mwɛn, ywɔʼ ǹdàli. Wù nɛ ywɔʼ kifɛʼ kwɛ̀nni nywi nye mwɛn, lwon kyikye. Ntwiʼ sɛ m̀lib nɛ cinne kan ɓwɛn yɛ̌ ɓwɛn ye à làn m̀lib nɛ tòn lɛ̀ ywon.»
48004028	Ti lɛ̀ ɓyin mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓyin ɓi ɓwɛn ɓye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ǹkàli ɓon lɛ̀ Abràhâm lɛ à yɛ̌ nun fɛ, wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ ye Izàʼ kɛ nyě ŋkàli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
48004029	Kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî, mwɛn nɛ ɓɛ ye kɛ nlwinnzi yi ɓɛ̀ʼ yɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔʼ zwɛm ɓe mwɛn nɛ ɓɛ ye kɛ ŋkàli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun zæbsi. Han a kiìn ɓɛ̀n jenɛ, sɛ kɛ kuʼ li.
48004030	Son, ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Fyinni son ni ɓon lɛ̀ mwɛn nyon. Ntwiʼ mwɛn son ɓǎ kwiʼ ce ji ɓon lɛ̀ mwɛn mlib ɗæm.»
48004031	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, li nɛ kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, ɓwiʼ ɓa ɓwɛn mɛ son, ɓwiʼ ɓi ɓwɛn mlib ɗæm.
48005001	Yesù Kristò libbeâ ɓwiʼ kɛ nye son nɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe nlim, jenɛ, ɓwiʼ ti mgbonmgbon lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m. Kɛ à si li, ɗyiênì kɛ nlim kimmi, ɓyin konni ɓyin læ̀kì fyònnì ɓe mɛ̀ son.
48005002	Ywɔênì fɛʼ, mùn Pɔ̂l, mùn shɛ̀ ɓyin lɛ ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ci ɓɛ ɗunnzi ɓyin ǹdùn, sɛ lisaʼ lɛ she sɛ Yesù Kristò cì kɛ nywi yin si ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
48005003	Mùn kònndì ɓyin shɛ̀ ɓe lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ, ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ yili lɛ ɓɛ ɗunnzi nun ǹdùn, à si nun nywi dòlɛ̀ʼ lɛ à lwinnzi mɛ̀ lwuà ɓye mbyî hwæn.
48005004	Ɓyin ɓɛ yili ɓyin ɓɛ lwinni ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta mɛ̀ lwuà ɗwonnzi, ɓyin ɓa tî ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Ɓyin yonnzâ ǹyè lɛ̀ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
48005005	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, swum sɛ ɓwiʼ ta mwù kɛ̌ lɛ̀ son, à si lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ fyɔ̀si sanmi kɛ swiʼ shon. Li, ɓwiʼ ton lɛ̀ m̀ɓònŋgàʼ nywɔʼ màzwùm ntwiʼ M̀pùn Nsanmi nɛ ta cì ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
48005006	Mwum nɛ ɗyi m̀ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, kwo fɛʼ ɓɛ ɗunnzi nun ǹdùn, kwo fɛʼ ɓɛ shi fɛʼ nun ɗunnzi, sɛ tà ka kpaʼ lɛ̀ swum ndɔʼ. Ŋgyi lɛʼ ni lɛ ɓyin lisaʼ kɛ̌ nlim shin kɛ nyili yɛ ɓyin ta ɓwùlu yili nun.
48005007	Ɓyin ɓi lɛʼ si ɓænni lwɛn, ti wɛn nɛ kænni ɓyin jenɛ lɛ ɓa ɓyin kɛn mbyî lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m.
48005008	Ŋ̀kænni yi waʼ kan kɛ cɛ̌ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ lon ɓyin.
48005009	Ɓɛ ta ka ǹkæ̌n lɛʼ ndɔʼ ɗwǐ lɛ: «M̀bɔ̀kì mbùn kwæʼ lɛ nɛ ta mɛ̀ wɔ̌ʼ lǒn mèan wasi?»
48005010	Mùn lìmmi lwɛn lɛ kɛ mɓæti yɛ ɓyin ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ, ɓyin ɓa mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyɛ̌ ɗin ndɔʼ cinni. Son, mwum nɛ tà ɓyin hwumnzi fi ni, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ nun mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ lànnzi, kwo nun ɓɛ fɛʼ wɛn.
48005011	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ti lɛ̀ mùn, ɓɛshɛ ɓe lɛ̀ mǔn kɛ shɛ̀ lɛ ɓwum ɗun ǹdùn, yɛn sɛ ɓwum ta mun vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi kɛ ntwiʼ lɛʼ màzwùm nun? Sɛ ɓê lɛŋkæ̀m li, ɓwum ɓa tî ɓyɛbbi ywo lɛ̀ Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ mùn tǎ shɛ̀ kɛ nywi Yesù nɛ ywie kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛ̂m.
48005012	Mùn yili ma lɛ, ɓwum ɓɛ ta ɓyin hwumnzi lɛ̀ lɛʼ nɗunnzi ndùn ɓi, ɓɛ kpæm mɛʼ kɛ she shan nun, ɓɛ san ɓon nɛʼ ŋwɔʼ.
48005013	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lon ɓyin ɓǎ ɓyin ɓɛ mgbonmgbon. Son, kɛ tǒn mgbonmgbon shin nun, ɓa ɓyin fɔkàʼ lɛ ɓyin yɛ ywum hwæn cǐ mwù zwô. Son, ɓɛênì mɛ̀ ci-she ɓwulu kɛ nyili yɛ ɓyin cinni kɛ nyinnìm shin nun.
48005014	Ntwiʼ sɛ mɛ̀ lwuà hwæn swɔli kɛ lwuà m̀bɔʼ nun, nyɛ̌ lɛʼ lɛ: «Yili lwikwæ̌n nywù wɛ̌ tà shɛ wù tǎ wù nɛʼ yili.»
48005015	Son, ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ta cì wɛ̌ mɛ̀ nyæ̀m nyenea ɓye kɛ mbo nun, ɓyin ta ɓwùlu ɗyɛmnzea, ɓyin zæbsi tì ɓyin nɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, konnênì, ɓyin læ̀kì ɓyin nɛʼ mlɔ̀si.
48005016	Swum sɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓyin shɛ̌, à si lɛ: ɗonnzênì ɓyin nɛʼ M̀pùn Nsanmi kɛnnzì ɓyin kɛ tòn shin nun. Li, ɓyin ɓa ɓyɛbbi nɛ tà ɓyin wai kɛ mɛ nlim nun cǐ.
48005017	Ntwiʼ sɛ ywum yɛ ta ɓwiʼ wai kɛ mɛ nlim nun ɓa ywum yɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi yili. M̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ, ywum yɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi tǎ yili lɛ ɓwiʼ ci, yon yɛ mɛ̀ nlim nyɛʼ ɓyìnnɔ̀ʼ ǹcì. M̀pùn Nsanmi ɓon lɛ̀ ywum yɛ mɛ̀ nlim nyɛʼ yili cinni kan ŋwɛn kɛ nyinnìm shan nun. Li, ɓyin wòli kan kim ɓyin ci swum sɛ ɓyin yili.
48005018	Son, ɓɛshɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi nɛ ta ɓyin kɛ̀nnzi, ɓyin ɓa tî kɛ kwù mɛ lwuà nji.
48005019	Ywum yɛ ta waì kɛ mɛ nlim nyɛʼ nun, ɓwiʼ limmi yon seansean. Ɓwum ta mɛ̀ nlàʼ ywikea, ɓɛ cinni mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ mɓyibbɔa, ɓɛ ci ywum hwæn wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓon yili.
48005020	Ɓɛ ta yì fɔ̀kì mwumnzi, ɓɛ kwan ǹdæ̀m. Ɓwum ta ɓwùlu ɓyìnnzi, ɓɛ klwikàʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ, ɓɛ kɛ mɛ̀ mkpì lɛ̀ ɓwùlu. Mɛ̀ nlim ɓɛ ɓon kɛ zwum ŋæ̀lea, ɓɛ ɓɛ tì mɛ̀ ci-nshelaʼ nywi. Ɓɛ ta ɓon nɛʼ kyììlea, ɓɛ fɔʼ mɛ̀ ŋkwìn kyikyi.
48005021	Ɓɛ ta ywum ɓwulu tæmmi, ɓɛ nwikaʼ mɛ̀ ŋkan han kon ɓwu ɓon mwu. Ɓɛ ta tî kònndi ywum ɗin ndɔʼ cì tî. Mùn shɛ̀ ɓyin lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ ɓwum ɓɛ ta ywum màzwùm cǐ, ɓɛ ɓa mbyi nɗun kɛ ywɔʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun cinni.
48005022	Son, M̀pùn Nsanmi nɛ ta cì ɓwum cinni mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nlwukea. Nun nɛ ta cì ɓwum ta ɓwùlu yili, ɓɛ ton lɛ̀ ǹdàli, ɓɛ ton tì mɛ̀ ywiʼ ɗɔ̀ʼ lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, ɓɛ fyimnzi mɛ̀ lɛʼ, ɓɛ ɗwi ɓwùlu fyàʼ nywi, ɓɛ ci lwɛn lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, ɓɛ ɓɛ lwinnɔa kɛ mɛ lɛʼ nyan nun hwæn.
48005023	Ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓwum flɔkea, ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ nlim nyan ɓænni. Mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n hwæn li, lwuà ndɔʼ ɓǎn nyɛ̌ kænni ɓwum lɛ ɓa ɓɛ ci nun.
48005024	Ɓwum ɓɛ ɗyi ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, ɓɛ ɗonnzâ mɛ̀ lɛʼ ɓyibbɔa nɛ ɓe ɓon kɛ kwæʼ nywiʼ nun. À si wɛ̌ ɓon ywummɔa ywum màzwùm kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ Yesù zwɛm.
48005025	Kɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi nɛ ta ɓwiʼ ǹzison she nywæb fɛ, ǹdikàʼ ɓwiʼ kɛnnènì kɛ kwǔ kɛ̀n she nun tà ɓwiʼ lìsea nun.
48005026	Ɓa kì ɓwiʼ ɓɛènì mɛ̀ ci-ntwuli mwu, shìkì ɓwiʼ kæbsi ɓwùlu mɛ̀ lɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ nun. Ɓa ɓwiʼ ci m̀bànni lɛ̀ ɓwùlu.
48006001	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ɓænnzi mwum nyin ndɔʼ lɛ̀ à tǎ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ cǐ, ɓyin ɓɛ M̀pùn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni kɛ nywi ɓi, ɓyin ɓi yɛ nun ɗyili ɓe kɛ mbyi nyɛ̌ zuʼ nun. Ɓyin yɛ cì li kɛ ŋkwu flɔa nun. Wù yɛ̌ tì konni lɛ̀ wù nɛʼ, wǔ læ̀kì tì kuʼ pyì kɛ mɛ mɓwɛb nun.
48006002	Kpeànì ɓwùlu ɓye mɛ̀ lɛʼ ta ɓon kyìbli mwu, li, ɓyin yɛ lwuà Yesù Kristò lwinnzi.
48006003	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ tǎ fɔ̀kàʼ kɛ nlim yon nun lɛ nun nɛ ɗyi mwum ndwun, son, lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m à ni swum ɗin, à tǎ nun nɛʼ pɔkea.
48006004	Sɛ yili lɛ mwum hwæn cæsi kwǔ kɛ̀n shon. Ɓɛshɛ nun cinni swum nshelaʼ nywi, à shelaʼ lɛ̀ nun nɛʼ, ɓa à shelaʼ nywi ntwiʼ sɛ nun lan lwikwæ̌n,
48006005	ntwiʼ sɛ sɛ yili lɛ mwum hwæn shɛ ǹshe yon lɛ̀ nun nɛʼ.
48006006	Mwum nɛ ɓɛ ta lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìsea, à kyiilàʼ lwɛn nyon nɛ nun cinni ɓon lɛ̀ ǹlìsàʼ nyon.
48006007	Ɓa ɓyin pɔkaʼ ɓyin nɛʼ, mwum wòli kan à twɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ɗyimi. Ɓɛ ta ǹkæ̌n lɛʼ ndɔʼ ɗwǐ lɛ: «Swum sɛ mwum yɛ ɓǐ, son sɛ nun yɛ̌ kuʼ fyæ̀b.»
48006008	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ suʼ swum sɛ ta waʼ kɛ nlim yon nun cǐ, swum sɛ nun yɛ̌ kuʼ fyæ̀b ɓe kɛ nyě mɓǐ màzwùm nun, à si ywi. Son, nun cì swum sɛ M̀pùn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, ǹzison ɗwùmɗwùm sɛ nun ywìmɛ fyæ̀b ɓe kɛ nyě yi.
48006009	Ɓa kì ɓwæʼ ci ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ǹcǐ lwɛn. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ shi mɛʼ nywusi, kwan ta kìn she ɓwiʼ yɛ ywum lwɛn cinni fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
48006010	Kɛ à si li, kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ cinni mbyi ncǐ lwɛn, ɓwiʼ konnènì mɛ̀ fyàʼ, ɓwiʼ ci lwɛn lɛ̀ ɓwum hwæn, a lan lɔʼ ɗyě mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓwum Yesù Kristò.
48006011	Cɛênì fɛʼ paʼ ŋgɔʼ klwɔkea ndɔʼ sɛ mùn kɔi ɓyin ɗèwà ɗyě lɛ̀ son. Mùn kɔʼ son lɛ̀ fyàʼ yɛ̂m ɓǎ ɓyin kɛ mwù kɛ nlim.
48006012	Ɓwum ɓɛ ta ɓyin dòlɛ̀ʼ cǐ lɛ̀ ɓyin ɗun ǹdùn, ɓon ɓɛ kæb lɛ ɓwùlu yili ɓon ǹgwòn kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum nun. Son, ɓɛ ta suʼ cì li ɓǎ mɛ̀ Yudà læ̀kì ɓon vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi kɛ ntwiʼ Ntwum Lwɛn yɛ ɓɛ ta shɛ̀ kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò nɛ ywie kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛ̂m.
48006013	Kwo fɛʼ ɓon ɓɛ yili nɗun ǹdùn ɓi, ɓon nɛʼ ma ɓɛ tà ka mɛ̀ lwuà ɗwon hwæn. Ɓɛ sukuʼ yili lɛ ɓyin ɓi ɗun ǹdùn ɓǎ ɓon cinni mbyi ǹtwuli mwù kɛ nywi yin.
48006014	Ti lɛ̀ mùn, mùn ɓǎ nywi shelea kɛ nywi swum ndɔʼ, a shi ɓɛ kɛ nywi ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Nun nɛ ci ywum ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan fyonnì ywum ɗinɗin kɛ cì shɛ̂m. M̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ, mùn ni wɛ̌ mwum ywi kɛ nyili yɛ mùn yɛ̌ ywum ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan yili nun.
48006015	Ɓɛshɛ ɓɛ ɗunnzi fɛʼ ɓyin ǹdùn, kwo fɛʼ ɓɛ shi fɛʼ ɗunnzi, sɛ tà ka kpaʼ lɛ̀ swum ndɔʼ. Swum sɛ ɗyi zwimbyiʼ si lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɔʼ wù m̀fɔ̀ʼ ye nywæb.
48006016	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwɛnnzì ǹlim lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ta lwuà màzwùm ɗwon, à fɛ flɔa kɛ nyinnìm shan nun, à fɛ tì flɔa lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b hwæn.
48006017	M̀mlɔ̀kàʼ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ̂m yi lɛ: ɓa kì mwum ndɔʼ yɛnnzi tì mùn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ. Ntwiʼ sɛ yì ɓàn mbon yi mùn kɛ nywi yɛ lisaʼ lɛ mùn ni ci-she Yesù Kristò.
48006018	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì ɓyin, ɓyin hwæn. Àmɛ̀n.
49001001	Mùn Pɔ̂l, ci-ntwum Yesù Kristò nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̌n, mùn kɔi ɗèwà ton sɛ lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwum Yesù Kristò ɓye kɛ Èfɛ̂zɛ̀, ɓyin ɓɛ ta Yesù Kristò ɗwon lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, ɓyin ɓɛ tì ɓæti lɛ̀ nun.
49001002	Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì ɓyin, ɓɛ fɛ ɓyin flɔa.
49001003	Twulênì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, Ce Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Nun nɛ ŋgænnâ ɓwiʼ, à fɛâ ɓwiʼ ywum lwukea ye kɛ nsòn ye nlim ɗɛb nun hwæn. À fɛâ yon lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
49001004	Lɛ̀ ǎ fɔ̀ʼ kifɛʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, à yæ̀nne ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon kɛ nyè yɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. À yæ̀nne ɓwiʼ li lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓwum sanmea ɓye ɓyɛbbi m̀bɔʼ ndɔʼ ɓà ɓwiʼ nywi kɛ swiʼ shon. À yile ɓwiʼ,
49001005	son sɛ ci à fyɔ̀sì ɓwiʼ, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓwɛn ɓyon kɛ ntwiʼ she sɛ Yesù Kristò cìe. Ǹlim ɓe nun lwukea lɛ̀ ǹcì yɛ li,
49001006	ɓǎ ɓwiʼ twuli nun lɛ̀ lwɛn ndwun nɛ nun cìâ ɓwiʼ. À cìe nun ɗinɗin lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ti ɓæti lɛ̀ mwɛn nlim nyon, Yesù Kristò.
49001007	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b libbaʼ ɓwiʼ kɛ ɓyɛbbi nyɛʼ nun lɛ̀ mvæb mwɛn nyon Yesù, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù. À zùsì ɓwiʼ ɓyɛbbi nyɛʼ, li, à lìsàʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ lwɛn nɛ nun tǎ ɓwiʼ cǐ, à ni mèan.
49001008	À kònndi ɓwiʼ lwɛn ni li, à lwinnzi ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ kon ɓǎ ɓwiʼ limmì swum sɛ nun yili.
49001009	Ɓe lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ lìmmi kifɛʼ swum sɛ nun ɓe lɛ̀ à yɛ̌ cì kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, son jenɛ, à kwàsâ ɓwiʼ son.
49001010	Swum sɛ nun yile nun yɛ̌ cì, sɛ ɓe lɛ, kwan sɛ kwan ywimɛ wòlǐ, à yɛ̌ ywum hwæn ye kɛ ɗɛb, lɛ̀ ye kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun swɔsi, yɛ ɓɛ kɛ ywɔʼ Yesù Kristò nun.
49001011	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ ywum hwæn cǐ wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ nun yili lɛ yɛ ɓɛ. Li nɛ ci, à yæ̀n ɓwiʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ m̀ɓàkàʼ yon yili, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
49001012	Kwan sɛ ɓwum ta lwɛn nɛ nun cì ɓwiʼ yɛnni, ɓɛ yɛ nun twuli kɛ ntwiʼ yɛʼ, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ sɛte ǹlim kɛ̌ kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò.
49001013	Ɓyin kuʼ, kwan sɛ ɓyin ywɔe lɛʼ lɛŋkæ̀m she Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b swætâ ɓyin, ɓyin kɛe kuʼ mɛ̀ nlim nyin kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò. Ɓyin ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Li nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗæ̀n ɓyin m̀ɓùʼ kɛ nywi lɛ ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon. M̀ɓǔʼ màzwùm yi M̀pùn Nsanmi nɛ nun cìe ɓwiʼ ǹkàli lɛ nun yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ fɛ.
49001014	M̀pùn Nsanmi ni tǎ lìsàʼ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ywum lwukea ndɔʼ fɛ, ye nun kɛ̀â ɓwiʼ kɛ cì shon. Ɓwiʼ yɛ ywum màzwùm cinni kwan sɛ nun yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ swæti kɛ mmlɔ̀kàʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. Ɓwiʼ twulènì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, nun nɛ ɗyi Ce ndwun nyɛʼ.
49001015	Li nɛ ci, mùn tǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yin. Mùn ywɔe m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin ta kɛ̀n mbyî lɛ̀ ǹkɛ̀ mwu kɛ mbyi Yesù Kristò nun, ɓyin konndì ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon yili. Li nɛ ta cì
49001016	mùn tǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili kɛ ŋkeli nun lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yin kwan hwæn.
49001017	Mùn ɗɔa Ce ndwun M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, nun nɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ɓe ɗwon. Mùn ɗɔa nun lɛ à fɛ ɓyin ǹlìmmǐ, à ci tì ɓyin ɓɛ ywɔli, ɓyin limmì nun seansean.
49001018	Mùn ɗɔa tì kuʼ lɛ à sannzi ɓyin mɛʼ, lɛ̀ ɓyin limmì swum sɛ nun lon ɓyin lɛ̀ ɓyin cinni son. Ɓyin limmì tì kuʼ swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lwæ̀si lɛ nun yɛ̌ ɓyin fɛ, à si swum twun ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ. À kɛ̌ swum màzwùm ntwiʼ yin, kònndì lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ɓwùlu ɓye tì kuʼ ɓwum ɓyon.
49001019	Mùn yili lɛ ɓyin limmì tì kuʼ lɛ ǹkimmɔʼ yon yi twun, yɛ lan ywum hwæn. Yon yɛ ta she cǐ kɛ nywi yɛʼ, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ta mbyi Yesù Kristò ɗwon. Ŋ̀kimmɔʼ fɔʼ màzwùm,
49001020	yon yɛ ɓe kuʼ nywi Yesù Kristò kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìmnze nun kɛ ywi nun, à fɛ nun gbaʼ tòn kɛ fyaʼ ji yon kɛ nlim ɗɛb.
49001021	Kɛ kwe nlim ɗɛb, nun nɛ ɗyi mwù kɛ swiʼ mɛ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lwun ɓyan, lɛ̀ ywum hwæn yɛ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ kɛ ɗɛb. Jin ndɔʼ cinni kan tî ǹtwu mbyî kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nɛ tòn nɛ nun, sɛ lan jin Yesù Kristò, kwo fɛʼ kɛ wan nyɛ̌ tǎ kìn nun.
49001022	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ Yesù ǹkimmɔʼ ywum hwæn fyaʼ, à kɛ̀ nun m̀vɛ̀n ndwun. Nun nɛ ɗyi mwǔ ŋkwìn ɓwum ɓyon.
49001023	Ŋ̀kwìn ɓwum ɓyon yɛ kuʼ wɛ̌ kwæʼ nywi shon. À yi lwinni lɛ̀ m̀pùn nyon, wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun nɛʼ, Yesù ni ǹlwinni cìcì hwæn.
49002001	Ɓyin ɓe mbyî wɛ̌ ɓwum ɓɛ ywiâ nùn kɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ntwiʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nyin nyɛ̌ ɓyin ɓe cì.
49002002	Ɓyin ɓe suʼ mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nyɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan cǐ. Ɓyin ɓe suʼ mwù kɛ̌ lɛ̀ m̀vɛ̀n mɛ̀ swæ̌b ɓyibbɔa nyɛ̌ tǎ tòn kɛ mpùn nun, nun nɛ ta she cǐ kɛ mɛ nlim ɓwum ɓye ɓa ywɔli lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
49002003	Ɓwiʼ hwæn, ɓwiʼ ɓe kuʼ m̀banmban wɛ̌ ɓon, kwan hwæn ɓwiʼ ɓe ywum ɓyibbɔa yɛ mɛ̀ nlim nyɛʼ ɓe yili cǐ. Mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyɛʼ ɓe suʼ kɛ̀n ɓe kɛ lwɛn nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ nɛʼ nun. Paʼ tòn sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe nlim si, ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓwum ɓɛ yɛnnè vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b wɛ̌ ɓwùlu mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi.
49002004	-
49002005	Son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywɔâ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ǹzwɔʼ. Kwo fɛʼ she ɓe lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ti wɛ̌ ɓwum ywi lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ɓyɛbbi nyɛʼ si, kɛ nyili twun yon nun, à fɛâ ɓwiʼ ǹzison she nywæb lɛ̀ Yesù m̀ban. (Li, à swæti ɓyin kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon nun.)
49002006	Kɛ ɓwiʼ ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesǔ, à yìmnzâ ɓwiʼ kɛ ywi nun m̀banmban ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun, à tònnzì ɓwiʼ kɛ ywɔʼ shon nun.
49002007	À cì ɓwiʼ lwɛn ni li kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò ɓǎ nun lisàʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum hwæn kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan lɛ, lwɛn nɛ nun cì ɓwiʼ kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon nun ni swum shìmmea.
49002008	-
49002009	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b swætâ ɓyin ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin tɛlâ zwùm lɛ̀ nun. Ǹswæti màzwǔm wai kǎn fyaʼ yin, a ɓa ntwiʼ she ndɔʼ sɛ ɓyin lwinnzâ, à si lɔʼ swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìâ ɓyin ɗinɗin kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon nun. Li, mwum ndɔʼ cinni kan mbyi nshelaʼ nywi.
49002010	À si li ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɔe ɓwiʼ, à kònndì ɓwiʼ kɛ̌ kɛ fyaʼ Yesù Kristò, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ci mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea. À fɔ̀se mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea ni ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ lwinnzi nun.
49002011	Ɓyin ɓɛ ɓɛ kɛ mvu ɓwum mɛ Yudà nun, kwan sɛ ɓyin yɛ tòn, ɓyin ɓunŋgàʼ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nɛ ɓyin ɓe mbyî nun. Mɛ̀ Yudà, ɓwum ɓɛ ɓe ɓon nɛʼ twɛli lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɗuân ǹdùn, ɓɛ ɓe ɓyin lon lɛ mɛ̀ nswìʼ. A ɓe ɓɛ̀ʼ ndɔʼ sɛ ɓon ɓe suʼ cì kɛ kwæʼ nywi zwɛm.
49002012	Lìmmênì lɛ kɛ kwan màzwùm nun, ɓyin lìmme kǎn Yesù Kristò. Ɓyin ɓe kǎn ɓwɛn mɛ Izràɛ̂l. Kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b jine ǹgwòn lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon, à cì tì ɓon ǹkàli lɛ nun yɛ̌ ɓon lwɛn ndɔʼ cǐ, ɓyin ɓe kǎn kɛ nlim. Ɓyin ɓe kǎn lɛ̀ m̀ɓàkàʼ ncinni swum ndɔʼ kɛ fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓyin ɓe kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun, son, ɓyin lìmme kǎn M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
49002013	Ɓyin ɓe læ̀bbi lɛ̀ mbyi nyon, son jenɛ, ɓyin ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò kɛ ntwiʼ mvæb yɛ nun swie kɛ ntwiʼ yin. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwɛmnzâ ɓyin kɛ ke shon.
49002014	Yesù Kristò nɛ ciâ ɓwiʼ ton ŋwum fɔʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin, ǹkyììli ɓa tî kɛ nyinnìm mɛ Yudà lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà. À ɓlɔâ ǹkaʼ yɛ kɛe ɓwiʼ ǹkyììli kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ nun kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓwiʼ nɛʼ ɓyìnnzi. À ɓlɔâ yon lɛ̀ ywi nɛ nun ywie kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛ̂m.
49002015	À ɓyìtì mɛ̀ lwuà mɛ Yudà lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mwù ywum yɛ ɓon ɓe lwinnzi kɛ mɛ lwuà màzwùm nun hwæn. À cìe li lɛ̀ ɓwum hwæn ɓɛ swum fɔʼ, mɛ̀ Yudà lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà. À cìe mɛ̀ paʼ ɓwum mɓì fyònnì ŋwum fɔʼ, ɓɛ fyôn ǹkwìn ɓwum nywæb kɛ mɓæti yɛ ɓon ti ɓæti lɛ̀ nun. Li nɛ nun fɛe flɔa kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ nun.
49002016	À mlɔ̀sâ ɓyìnnzì sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓwiʼ nɛʼ ɓyìnnzi kwan sɛ nun ywie kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ nun. Mɛ̀ paʼ ɓwum mɓì hwæn, à cìâ ɓon, ɓɛ ɓɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum fɔʼ, à mlɔ̀sâ lɛʼ shan lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
49002017	She sɛ Yesù Kristò kìen cì kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, a si lɛ nun shɛ Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ ta flɔa fɛ lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ ɓe læ̀bbi lɛ̀ mbyi nyon, kònndì lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓe tì kuʼ kwukwâʼ lɛ̀ nun.
49002018	Kɛ nyě yon, ɓwiʼ hwæn, ɓwiʼ woli kim ɓwiʼ kwɛmmi lɛ̀ Ce M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. M̀pùn Nsanmi m̀bɔʼ ni nɛ ta ɓwiʼ mbyi màzwùm lìsea.
49002019	Kɛ à si li, ɓyin ɓa tî mɛ̀ kyìn, shìkì ɓyin ɓɛ kuʼ ɓwum ɓye wai pɛɗin kɛ nyinnìm ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓyin ti jenɛ ɓwɛn mɛ ci-ŋgyɔʼ wɛ̌ ɓwùlu ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓyin ɓɛ tì ɓwum ɓye kɛ ɗwon Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
49002020	Ɓyin kuʼ, ɓyin ti wɛ̌ nye nɛ ɓɛ wasi. Mɛ̀ ci-ntwum Yesù, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓɛ ɗyi mɛ̀ kwù nye màzwùm. Yesù Kristò nun nɛʼ nɛ ɗyi ǹshimmbyiʼ nye.
49002021	Nun nɛ ǹkimmɔʼ nye hwæn kɛn swɔli nywi, li, m̀ɓwɛm nye ta nàn mbyimbyî, lɛ̀ nun fyonnì nye nsanmi nyɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ tòn kɛ nlim.
49002022	Kɛ mɓæti yɛ ɓyin ɓætâ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristǒ, ɓwiʼ ti kuʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin wɛ̌ nye nɛ ni, nyɛ̌ M̀pùn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ tòn kɛ nlim.
49003001	Kɛ ntwiʼ she sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe kɛ nyinnìm shin nun si, mùn tà nun keli kwan mèan hwæn. Mùn ni jenɛ ci-nye njè kɛ ntwiʼ she Yesù Kristò sɛ mùn ɓe cì nun lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yin, ɓyin ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà.
49003002	Mùn fɔ̀kaʼ lɛ ɓyin ywɔâ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ mûn she ton sɛ fyaʼ lɛ̀ mùn ci son ntwiʼ yin. À fɛ mun son lɛ̀ ǹyili nlim lwɛn yon.
49003003	À kwàsâ mùn m̀ɓàkàʼ yon yɛ ɓe gwùmni ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê. Mùn sɛtâ ɓyin ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ ndɔʼ kɔa mbyî kɛ nywi lɛʼ màzwùm kɛ nɗunmi ɗèwà ton sɛ nun.
49003004	Kwan sɛ ɓyin yɛ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yi nzanŋgea, ɓyin yɛ lìmmì lɛ mùn cinni ǹlìmmì kɛ nzæʼ lɛʼ gwùmni ndɔʼ ye ɗyi kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò.
49003005	Kɛ kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìsae kǎn ywum màzwùm lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mbibea ɓyɛʼ. Son jenɛ, m̀pùn nyon kwàsâ yon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-ntwum Yesù, kònndì lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓon ɓɛ ɗyi ɓwum ɓyon.
49003006	Ywum gwùmni màzwùm yi lɛ: lwɛn nɛ nun kɛ̀e lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum mɛ Yudà, à yɛ̌ kuʼ nun fɛ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà. Mɛ̀ Yudà, lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà, ɓɛ ti paʼ ɓwum fɔʼ. Swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ǹkàli lɛ nun ywìmɛ cì lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ti fyaʼ Yesù Kristò, à yɛ̌ kuʼ son cǐ lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓye ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà. À yɛ̌ cì li ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin kɛâ mwù lɛ̀ Ǹtwum Lwɛn.
49003007	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìâ mùn lwɛn lɛ̀ she nun kɛ̀ mun lɛ̀ ci-she nyon, à fɛâ mùn ǹkimmɔʼ yon ɓǎ mùn shɛ Ǹtwum Lwɛn.
49003008	Kwo fɛʼ she mùn ni lwæ̀b ɓe kɛ nyinnìm ŋkwìn ɓwum ɓyon nun, à yilâ lɛ mùn kɛn Ǹtwum Lwɛn yon shɛ̌ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà, mùn lìsàʼ ɓon lwɛn nɛ ɓwiʼ cinni kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò nun. Lwɛn màzwǔm cinni kan m̀mlɔ̀kàʼ.
49003009	À kònndì tì yili lɛ mùn sannzi m̀ɓàkàʼ yon yɛ ɓe gwùmni wɛ̌ tà shɛ yɛ yɛ kwàlì. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɔ̀e ywum hwæn, à gwùmme m̀ɓàkàʼ yi ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê han sɛ kiìn ɓɛ̀n ɗyě.
49003010	Jenɛ, à kwàsâ yon kɛ fyaʼ ŋkwìn ɓwum ɓyon, ɓǎ mɛ̀ cikpuʼ ɓyon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mvɛ̀n ɓyan kɛ ɗɛb limmì wɛ̌ tà shɛ ǹlìmmì yon yi mɛ̀ paʼ mèan.
49003011	Li nɛ ci, à kɛ̀kae mɛ̀ mwù lɛʼ nɛ nun ɓe fɔ̀kàʼ kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ ǎ fɔ̀ʼ kifɛʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. À lwinnze nun kɛ fyaʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò.
49003012	Kɛ ɓwiʼ ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, ɓwiʼ woli ɓwiʼ kwɛmmi lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ǹlim pyǐ, shìkì ɓwiʼ yi swum ndɔʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ Yesù.
49003013	Li, mùn swuleâ ɓyin lɛ ɓa ɓwæʼ ci ɓyin kɛ ntwiʼ mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nyɛ̌ mùn tǎ yɛn kɛ ntwiʼ yin. Mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ni nɛ yɛ ɓyin kpea, ɓyin kà cinni ǹtwu.
49003014	Kɛ ntwiʼ ywum màzwǔm, mùn tǎ swummi kɛ swiʼ Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b,
49003015	nun nɛ fɔ̀e mɛ̀ paʼ ɓwum hwæn nyɛ̌ kɛ ɗɛb lɛ̀ nyɛ̌ kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan.
49003016	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni ǹdwun, à cinni ywum hwæn. Li, mùn tà nun keli lɛ M̀pùn nyon fɛ ɓyin ǹkimmɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin ɗyi kimmi kɛ mbyi nyon nun.
49003017	Mùn kònndì tì keli lɛ Yesù Kristò kiìn tòn kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun. Mùn yili lɛ ɓyin yili ɓwùlu. Kɛ kwan si nun, ɓyin ywimɛ ɓɛ kimmi wɛ̌ ŋgæʼ nɛ ghim mɛ̀ nɗì kɛ ŋgyɔʼ kimmi. Ŋ̀kimmɔʼ yin konndì ɓɛ wɛ̌ kwùmkwùm nye she ɓɛ shim mɛ̀ kwù nye lwɛn.
49003018	Li, ɓyin lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù hwæn, ɓyin yɛ ǹkimmɔʼ cinni ɓǎ ɓyin limmì wɛ̌ tà shɛ ǹyili Yesù yi twun, yɛ cinni kan m̀mlɔ̀kàʼ.
49003019	Ǹyili yon yi lan ǹlìmmì ɓwum. Yili yɛ ɓɛ fɛʼ li, mùn tǎ keli lɛ ɓyin limmì yon ɓǎ ɓyin ɓɛ kuʼ kwan hwæn kɛ paʼ tǒn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
49003020	Ɓwiʼ twulênì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, nun nɛ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ ncì ywum hwæn yɛ lan fɛʼ mɛ̀ mfɔ̀kàʼ nyɛʼ, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ncibbi nɛ ɓwiʼ ta nun cibbi. À tǎ cì li lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yon yɛ ta she cǐ kɛ nywi yɛʼ.
49003021	Ǹtwu ɓɛ lɛ̀ nun kɛ ntwiʼ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon. Ǹtwu ɓɛ tì lɛ̀ nun kɛ ntwiʼ Yesù Kristò. Yɛ ɓɛ lɛ̀ nun li kwan hwæn, a kɛn ɓɛ̌n mmlɔ̀kàʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. Àmɛ̀n.
49004001	Jenɛ, mùn yɛ̌ lɛli kɛ nywi paʼ tòn sɛ ɓyin ta tòn nun. Mùn nɛ ɓɛ kɛ kɛ nye njè ntwiʼ sɛ mùn tǎ she Yesù Kristò cǐ, mùn swuleâ ɓyin lɛ: cinnênì kwǔ kɛ̀n she lwɛn wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yile lɛ ɓyin cinni kwan sɛ nun loen ɓyin.
49004002	Ɓyin yɛ tǒn, ɓa ɓyin lisàʼ nywi, son, ɓɛênì flɔkea kwan mèan hwæn, ɓyin fyimnzi mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa, ɓyin ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-mɓæn nlim, ɓyin kwɛnnzì ǹlim lɛ̀ ɓwùlu.
49004003	Ɓyin konndì tì nywi kimnzi lɛ̀ tǒn ŋwum fɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi fɛâ ɓyin flɔa lɛ̀ ɓyin ton ɓæti lɛ̀ ɓwùlu.
49004004	Ŋ̀kwìn ɓwum Yesù sukuʼ fɔʼ, M̀pùn Nsanmi ɓɛ tì kuʼ m̀bɔʼ. Swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lon ɓyin lɛ̀ ɓyin kiìn son cinni kɛ fyaʼ yon, à si tì kuʼ fɔʼ.
49004005	Ɓwiʼ hwæn, ɓwiʼ cinni Nyɛli m̀bɔʼ, mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni m̀bɔʼ, mwǔ njimnzi yɛʼ yi tì kuʼ fɔʼ.
49004006	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni m̀bɔʼ, à ni Ce ɓwum hwæn, ywum hwæn yi nun fyaʼ. À tǎ she shon cǐ cìcì hwæn, cìcì ndɔʼ ɓa ɗin à shì ɓɛ kwe.
49004007	Son, mwum hwæn ni lɛ̀ mwǔ she yon kyi kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun wɛ̌ tà shɛ Yesù Kristò fɛ nun.
49004008	Ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò lɛ: «Ǹnàn yɛ nun nèân kɛ nlim ɗɛb, à hwɛnnâ mɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnzì ɓyon, à kɛ̀n lɛ̀ ɓon. Kɛ nyě yi, à fɛkaʼ ɗàsì lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan.»
49004009	Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nyɛ̌ lɛ: «À nèân ɓe kɛ nlim ɗɛb”” lìsaʼ lɛ yɛn? À lìsaʼ lɛ, ɓe lɛ̀ à sɛtâ kyìlì fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan.
49004010	Yesù Kristò nɛ kyìle fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun, nun nɛ konndi ti kuʼ nàn ɓe han ŋgwɛmmi ɓan kɛ nlim ɗɛb, cìcì shɛ lan ywum hwæn ɓǎ m̀pùn nyon ɓɛ cìcì hwæn.
49004011	Nun Yesù Kristò, nun nɛ kyiilaʼ ɓwum mɛ̀ mwù she kyikyi. À fɛ ɓyindɔʼ lɛ ɓyi ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-ntwum ɓyon, ɓyindɔʼ, à kɛ̀ ɓon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Ti lɛ̀ ɓye fɔʼ ndɔʼ, à kɛ̀ ɓon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-nshɛ̌ Ntwum Lwɛn lɛ̀ lan wan, ɓye fɔʼ ndɔʼ tì kuʼ, à kɛ̀ ɓon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ pàsìtê, kònndì lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nlìsǎʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
49004012	À kyììlaʼ ɓon li, ɓǎ mwum hwæn limmì she sɛ nun yɛ̌ cì ɓǎ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ ɗyi wɛ̌ kwæʼ nywi shon kɛn mbyî kɛ mbyi nyon nun.
49004013	Kɛ kwan màzwùm nun, ɓwiʼ yɛ tòn ŋwum fɔʼ kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ nun, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ hwæn, ɓwiʼ limmi Yesù, Mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓwiʼ kɛâ tì kuʼ mɛ̀ nlim nyɛʼ lɛ̀ nun. Li, ɓwiʼ yɛ fyònnì ɓwum ɓɛ kwùm zwum yili, ɓwiʼ wolì kuʼ wɛ̌ nun nɛʼ Yesù Kristò.
49004014	Ɓwiʼ ɓa tî ɓɛ kɛ paʼ ɓwɛsɔʼ ɓye ta ɓwu kwan sɛ mɛ̀ ci-mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ ta ɓon pɔkea lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mmyimmea. Ɓwiʼ ɓa tî ɓɛ wɛ̌ mvub ŋgæʼ yɛ m̀pùn ta yònnzàʼ.
49004015	Son, sɛ yili lɛ ɓwiʼ yilênì ɓwiʼ nɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ nun, ɓwiʼ shɛènì ɓwùlu lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ lwinnzênì mwum shɛʼ, ɓwiʼ kà fyònni wɛ̌ nun nɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Nun nɛ ɗyi wɛ̌ mwǔ ŋkwìn ɓwum ɓyon.
49004016	Nun nɛ ta ɓwum ɓyon swɔsi m̀banmban, ɓǎ ɓon ɓɛ swum fɔʼ wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ kwæʼ nywi si wònndea lɛ̀ yì wòn. Kɛ kwæʼ nywi mwum nun, kwan sɛ mvæb nywi ta làn lwɛn, kwan si sɛ mwum yɛ̌ fòn lwɛn. Li nɛ kuʼ lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù, kwan sɛ ɓon ta ɓon nɛʼ yili kɛ nyinnìm shan nun, ɓɛ yɛ kɛ̀n mbyimbyî kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
49004017	Swum sɛ mùn yili mùn shɛ ɓyin kɛ jin Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, à si lɛ, ɓa ɓyin ɗwon tì mɛ̀ kwù ɓwum ɓye tà ka M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yi. Mɛ̀ mfɔ̀kàʼ nyan cinni kan mwù.
49004018	Mɛ̀ nlim nyan tà ka lɛŋkæ̀m yili. À ɓi mɛ̀ kyìn kɛ nzison nywæb sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ fɛ nun, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ ti mɛ̀ mwù ŋkimmɔa kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Li, ɓɛ kɛ kɛ njimmi nun.
49004019	Ɓɛ kyikeâ mɛ̀ mwù nyan kɛ mɛ paʼ mɛ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nun mèan, ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ lɛʼ kwɛ̀nnjin cǐ, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nlim nyan tǎ fyǒn dàlì nùn. Ɓɛ ɓa tî lɛ̀ kwɛ̀nnjin kɛ mwu.
49004020	Ti lɛ̀ ɓyin, kɛ mɛ kìkæ̀n nyɛ̌ ɓon ta cì ni nun, à ɓǎ nyɛ̌ ɓyin yusea kɛ jin Yesù Kristò nun.
49004021	Mùn fɔ̀kaʼ lɛ ɓyin ywɔâ swum sɛ ɓɛ lɛle kɛ nywi yon, ɓɛ konndì tì lɛŋkæ̀m she ɗyi kɛ nywi yon lìsea lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ ta nun ɗwon.
49004022	Kɛ ɓyin limmâ mbyi nyon nlwɛn, ɓa ɓyin cinni tì kwǔ kɛ̀n she ɓyin ɓe mbyî nun. Paʼ tǒn si ɓe ɓyin mbyi ɓwuli lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ywum ɓyibbɔa yɛ mɛ̀ nlim nyin ɓe yili, ye ɓe ɓyin pɔkea nûn.
49004023	Ɗonnzênì ɓyin nɛʼ kɛ fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓǎ nun ci mɛ̀ nlim nyin fyonnì ɓe nywæbnywæb.
49004024	Ɓyin cinni kwǔ kɛ̀n she nywæb sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yònnzâ ɓyin nlim, lɛ̀ shi si gwili kuʼ shon. Kwǔ kɛ̀n sɛ nun yònnzi ɓyin nlim si si zuʼ, son sɛ ta nun ǹdàli fɛ, ntwiʼ sɛ son sɛ ta lɛŋkæ̀m lìsea.
49004025	Kɛ à si li, ɓa ɓyin shɛ tì mɛ̀ mɓwɛ̀ʼ. Lɛlênì lɛŋkæ̀m kɛ nyinnìm shin nun lɛ̀ ɓwùlukwæ̌n, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi ɓwum fɔʼ.
49004026	Ɓɛshɛ lɛʼ nyeni nlim ndɔʼ cinni mwum nyin ndɔʼ, ɓa mwum cì ɓyɛbbi. Ɓa ɓyin ton lɛ̀ nyeni nlim han kwæ̀bbi pyi.
49004027	Ɓa ɓyin fɛ Satæ̀n mbyi mpɔkaʼ yin.
49004028	Mwum nɛ ɓe ci-nywiʼ, ɓa à yib tì. Ǹdikàʼ à cì she lɛ̀ mɛ̀ fyàʼ ɓyon nɛʼ, li, à yɛ̌ tì kuʼ swum ndɔʼ cinni lɛ̀ à kpaʼ mɛ̀ ci-nzæmnzæm.
49004029	Ɓa ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ɓyibbɔa kwan ɓyin ŋwum, son, lɛlênì mɛ̀ lɛʼ nɛ wòli à kimnzi ɓwùlu kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ywum yɛ woli yɛ kpaʼ ɓwum ɓɛ ta ɓyin ywɔti.
49004030	Ɓa ɓyin ɓyɛbsi M̀pùn Nsanmi nlim kɛ zwum, nun nɛ ɗyi m̀ɓùʼ yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗæ̀n ɓyin nywi, à lìsàʼ lɛ ɓyin ti ɓwum ɓyon. À lìsàʼ tì kuʼ lɛ nywɔʼ nɛ ǹgyìn nɛ ni yɛ̌ wòlǐ, à yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ swæti ǹgyìnmbɔʼ.
49004031	Mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ mɓyibbɔa, nyeni nlim, ǹklwìkàʼ mɛ lɛʼ, lɛ̀ ǹcìkàʼ mɛ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa hwæn, ɗwìênì yon ɓe nyè.
49004032	Ɓyin ɓɛ sàsi kɛ nyinnìm ɓwulu nun, ɓyin ci ɓon lwɛn, ɓyin fyeli tì kuʼ ǹlim lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ɓyibbɔa yɛ ɓon ta ɓyin cìkea, wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyeli kuʼ ǹlim lɛ̀ yin kɛ ntwiʼ Yesù Kristò.
49005001	Jenɛ, ɓyin ti wɛ̌ ɓwɛn ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ. Kɛ à si li, kònnzeànì nun.
49005002	Kɛ tòn shin nun, yilênì ɓyin nɛʼ kwan hwæn wɛ̌ tà shɛ Yesù Kristò yili ɓwiʼ, han à kɛ̀n ywi kɛ ntwiʼ mɛ mwù nyɛʼ. Ywi nɛ nun ywie ni, à ni wɛ̌ mlǎʼ ŋgwɔ̂ʼ lwɛn ndɔʼ yɛ ɓɛ fɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ye ta nun ǹlim lwukea.
49005003	Ɓyin ti ɓwum Yesù, sɛ yili lɛ ɓyin ɗonnzi mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa. Ɓyin kyiilì lɛ̀ ǹlon hwæ̌n, ɓyin ɗonnzi tì kuʼ ǹtæm ywum ɓwulu.
49005004	Mɛ̀ njě kwɛ̀nnjin, mɛ̀ lɛʼ mpwìnpwìn, lɛ̀ yì fyɔ̌ʼ ɓyibbɔa, ɓa yɛ kwan ɓyin ŋwum. Son, à si lwɛn lɛ ɓyin yili M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ lɛ̀ ntwiʼ lwɛn nɛ nun cìe lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ.
49005005	Ɓwum ɓye ta mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa cǐ, kònndì lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-nzæmmì, lìmmênì lɛ ɓɛ ɓa swum ndɔʼ yě kɛ ywɔʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinni nun ɓon lɛ̀ mwɛn nyon Yesù Kristò. Ɓwum ɓye ta ywum ɓwulu tæmmi, m̀banmbɔʼ nɛ kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓon, ntwiʼ sɛ ywum yi ta ɓon ǹlim lwukea yɛ lan M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Li, ywum màzwùm ti wɛ̌ m̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyan.
49005006	Konnênì lɛ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye yili ɓɛ pɔkaʼ ɓyin lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ pwìnpwìn yi, ntwiʼ sɛ mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n mɓyibbɔa ni nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ nyeni nun lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta mwù kimmi lɛ̀ nun.
49005007	Ɓa ɓyin ɓæti mɛ̀ kwǔ kɛ̀n lɛ̀ paʼ ɓwum màzwùm.
49005008	Ɓyin ɓe mbyî kɛ njimmi nun, son, ɓyin ti jenɛ kɛ ŋwanŋwan nun, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ti fyaʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Li, tòênnì kwan hwæn wɛ̌ ɓwum ɓɛ ti kɛ ŋwanŋwan nun.
49005009	Ywum yɛ kɛ ŋwanŋwan nun yi ywum ye lwukea, ye lwinni, yɛ konndì ɓɛ ye lɛŋkæ̀m.
49005010	Jijiênì kɛ mɛ mwù nyin nun, ɓyin limmì, ɓyin ci tì kuʼ ywum yɛ ta Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ǹlim lwukea.
49005011	Ɓa ɓyin ɓæti mɛ̀ kwù lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta mɛ̀ she cǐ kɛ njimmi nun, mɛ̀ she nyɛ̌ cinni kan m̀kpaʼ. Lìseànì ɓon pisean lɛ mɛ̀ she nyan ɓǎ ǹlwukea.
49005012	Ywum yɛ ɓon ta cì gwùmnea, ɓwiʼ wòli kan ɓwiʼ shɛ yon lɛ̀ ntwiʼ kwɛ̀nnjin.
49005013	Son, kwan sɛ ɓyin pwælâ yon, ɓyin yɛ yon fɔ̀si yɛnni seansean.
49005014	Ntwiʼ swum sɛ ɓɛ ta kwannzi kɛ bàbà nun, à ti kɛ ŋwanŋwan nun. Li nɛ ɓɛ ta lɛʼ kɛ cì ndɔʼ lɛ: «Wù, mwum nɛ tǎ ɗye ɗye, yìmni ɗye. Wù nɛ kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum ywi nun, waʼ zwô. Li, ǹwanŋwan Yesù yɛ wù ɗwùmmi nywi.»
49005015	Kɛ à si li, konnênì lɛ̀ kwǔ kɛ̀n shin lwɛn. Ɓa sɛ ɓɛ wɛ̌ she mɛ̀ nshì-nlìmmì, son, sɛ ɓɛ she mɛ̀ ci-kon.
49005016	Ɓa ɓyin ɓwuli kwan sɛ sɛ yili lɛ ɓyin ci mɛ̀ she nlwukea, ntwiʼ sɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ton jenɛ nlim nɛ, ɓyɛbbi lèân mwù.
49005017	Ɓa ɓyin ɓɛ wɛ̌ ɓwum ɓɛ cinni kan mwù, son, kɛ̀ênì mwù kɛ swum sɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù yili lɛ ɓyin ci nun.
49005018	Ɓa ɓyin ywi ywum nwi, ntwiʼ sɛ ǹywi ywum nwi ta ɓyin mwù kyèa. Fyòênnì ɗonnzi M̀pùn Nsanmi lwinnzi ɓyin mɛ̀ nlim.
49005019	Kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, sàkeànì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ mɛ nshib nun. Ɓyin sakàʼ nun kɛ mɛ nshib kyikyi nɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi tà ɓyin ɓɛ̀nnzi mwu nun, ɓyin twuli nun lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ.
49005020	Yilênì Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ kwan hwæn kɛ jin Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò nun lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ywum hwæn yɛ ta ɓwiʼ lèan nywi.
49005021	Ɓyin ɓɛ ta Yesù Kristò yi, kyìbsênì ɓyin nɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun.
49005022	Ɓyin, mɛ̀ yib, kyìbsênì mɛ̀ ɗwɛb ɓyin wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin ta Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò kyìbsi.
49005023	Ntwiʼ sɛ ǹɗwɛb nɛ ɗyi mwǔ mlib wɛ̌ tà shɛ Yesù Kristò nɛ ɗyi mwǔ ŋkwìn ɓwum ɓyon. Nun nɛʼ nɛ swæti yon, yon yɛ ɗyi wɛ̌ kwæʼ nywi shon.
49005024	Kɛ ǹɗwɛb nɛ mwǔ mlib, sɛ yili lɛ mɛ̀ yib kyibsì mɛ̀ ɗwɛb ɓyan wɛ̌ tà shɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù ta Yesù Kristò kyìbsi.
49005025	Ti kuʼ ɓyin mɛ̀ ɗwɛb, wɛn nɛ hwæn yili m̀myon wɛ̌ tà shɛ Yesù yili ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon, à kɛ̀n ywi lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yan.
49005026	Mwǔ ywi yon yi lɛ, ɓǎ nun fyɔsì ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon sanmi, à fɛ yon lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ŋ̀kwìn ɓwum yi, à ɓɔsi yon lɛ̀ mlǎʼ, à sannzâ yon lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yon,
49005027	ɓǎ yon fyonnì nun swiʼ swum sɛ cinni ǹtwu, yɛ ɓɛ sanmi shìkì swum ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ ɓɛ, ɓa ǹzɛ̀n ndɔʼ ɓɛ yon nywi.
49005028	Li nɛ sɛ yili kuʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ɗwɛb, wɛn nɛ hwæn yili m̀myon wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun yili kwæʼ nywi shon. Mwum nɛ tǎ m̀myon yili, sɛ lisaʼ lɛ à yili nun nɛʼ.
49005029	Ntwiʼ sɛ mwum ndɔʼ ɓǎn nyɛ̌ tǎ kwæʼ nywi shon ɓyìnnzi. Mwum hwæn yili kwæʼ nywi shon, à tà son ɗǐ, à giti son wɛ̌ tà shɛ Yesù Kristò tǎ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon giti.
49005030	Ɓwiʼ hwæn, ɓwiʼ ɓi wɛ̌ kwæʼ nywi shon.
49005031	Ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Son sɛ yɛ cì, ǹɗwɛb ɗonnzi ɗwòn bùba nyon, ɓɛ fɔʼ kuʼ ɗwòn nyan ɓon ɓî ɓon lɛ̀ m̀myon, ɓɛ fyonnì swum fɔʼ.»
49005032	Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ tòn ni, à ni ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ ŋkæ̀mŋkæm nyɛ̌ tǎ fyǒn lɛli kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò ɓon lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon.
49005033	Hwæn li, ǹdùʼ si lɛ wɛn nɛ hwæn yili m̀myon wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun yili nun nɛʼ. Mɛ̀ yib tì kuʼ, ɓɛ kyibsì mɛ̀ ɗwɛb ɓyan.
49006001	Ɓyin ɓwɛn, ywɔlênì mɛ̀ ŋwum mɛ̀ ce ɓyin lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mon ɓyin lwɛn, ntwiʼ sɛ à si lwɛn lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò lɛ ɓon ci li.
49006002	Lwuà Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ndɔʼ lɛli lɛ: «Mwumnzi ce nywù lɛ̀ mon nywù””. Lwuà ni nɛ ɗyi lwuà nyɛ̌ zwimbyiʼ nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cǐ ɓwum ǹkàli nlim.
49006003	Ŋ̀kàli màzwùm yi lɛ: «A wu mwumnzi ce nywù lɛ̀ mon nywù, wù yɛ̌ tòn lwɛn, wù ji ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan kwan tìtì””.
49006004	Ɓyin mɛ̀ ce ɓwɛn tì kuʼ, ɓa ɓyin nyɛnnzi ɓwɛn ɓyin mɛ̀ nlim. Son, lɛbbênì ɓon ndɛb, ɓyin swɛmnzi ɓon kɛ mbyi nɛ Yesù Kristò tà ɓyin lìsea nun.
49006005	Ɓyin mɛ̀ son, ywɔlênì mɛ̀ ŋwum mɛ̀ nyɛli ɓyin lwɛn. Ɓyin mwumnzi ɓon, ɓyin ci ɓon she lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin ta kuʼ cì lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
49006006	Ɓa ɓyin suʼ she cǐ kwan sɛ ɓon ɓi ŋgyɔʼ, lɛ̀ ɓon yili ɓyin. Son, cìênì ywum yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓi mɛ̀ ci-she Yesù Kristò.
49006007	Cìênì ɓon she lɛ̀ ǹyili nlim lwɛn. Ɓa ɓyin ci son wɛ̌ she mwum ndɔʼ sɛ, cìênì son wɛ̌ she Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò sɛ ɓyin ta cì.
49006008	Lìmmênì lɛ wu ɓɛ fɛʼ son, wù ɓɛ fɛʼ lɛ̀ mwù ywû, mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea nɛ wù tǎ cì hwæn, Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò yɛ̌ wù fyàʼ fyɔ̀si.
49006009	Ɓyin mɛ̀ nyɛli ɓye cinni mɛ̀ son, cìênì kuʼ ɓon lwɛn. Ɓa ɓyin nyɛnndi ɓon. Lìmmênì lɛ, ɓyin lɛ̀ mɛ̀ son ɓyin nun, ɓyin cinni nyɛli m̀bɔʼ nyɛ̌ kɛ ɗɛb. Ǎ tà ka ǹkyììli kɛ̌ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum nun.
49006010	M̀mlɔ̀kàʼ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ̂m yi lɛ: Lɛ̀ ɓyin kà cinni ǹkimmɔʼ, ɗyiênì kɛ nyě Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò kɛ mɓæti yɛ ɓyin ɓi ɓæti lɛ̀ nun kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ twun yon nun.
49006011	Kpæmmênì nywi wì, ɓyin sheli mɛ̀ ŋwum wì hwæn nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tà ɓyin fɛ. À fɛ ɓyin ywum wì yi, ɓyin læ̀kì pyì kɛ mɛ mɓwɛb nɛ Satæ̀n tà ɓyin ɓwɛbbi nun.
49006012	Ntwiʼ wì sɛ ɓwiʼ kɛâ mwù kɛ nlim sɛ, sɛ ɓa wì sɛ ɓwiʼ ta ɗwì lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye lɛ̀ ǹnywùn kɛ mwu. Ɓwiʼ ta son ɗwǐ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mpùn mɓyibbɔa, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mvɛ̀n ɓyan ɓye ta lwun sea kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nɛ ǹlwinni lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi. Ɓwiʼ ta ti kuʼ ɗwì lɛ̀ ywum ɓyibbɔa hwæn yɛ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ kɛ zwô kɛ mpùn nun.
49006013	Li nɛ sɛ yili lɛ ɓyin sheli ywum wì yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓyin hwæn ɓǎ ɓyin ɗyi kimmi nywɔʼ nɛ ǹgyìn mɓyɛbbi ni yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n, lɛ̀ ɓyin ɗwi wì a kɛn ɓɛ̌n mmlɔ̀kàʼ, ɓyin pyì kan.
49006014	Fɔ̀sênì lɛ, ɓyin ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-lɛŋkæ̀m, ntwiʼ sɛ lɛŋkæ̀m si wɛ̌ ǹkæ̀nndan yɛ ɓɛ ta plè kpæmmi nun, ɓǎ mwum ɓɛ ɗonmi kɛ wì nun. Ɓyin ɓɛ tì kuʼ lwinni, ntwiʼ ǹlwinni yi, yon yɛ wɛ̌ plè ǹwum nɛ ǹwum wì ndɔʼ tà ka ɗwo.
49006015	Ɓyin ɗyi kɛ mɛ kwù zwɛm, ɓǎ ɓyin kɛn Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ ta ɓwum flɔa fɛ shɛ̌. Ǹɗyi màzwùm yi wɛ̌ mɛ̀ dibaʼ yɛ ɓyin swon kɛ mɛ kwù ɓǎ ɓyin fɔsì kɛ̀n kɛ wì nun lwɛn.
49006016	Ɓyin tɛli zwùm kwan hwæn lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Ǹtɛ̀ʼ zwum màzwùm yi wɛ̌ ǹgàn wì nyɛ̌ tà ɓyin gho kwan sɛ Satæ̀n tà ɓyin le lɛ̀ yì sàn. Kwo fɛʼ win nyænnì fɛʼ kɛ yi sǎn màzwùm zwɛm, ǹgàn wì ni yɛ̌ yon njimnzea.
49006017	Yilênì lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b swæti ɓyin. Ǹswæti màzwùm yi wɛ̌ tæ̀m nyɛ̌ ǹwum nɛ ɓyin ta mwù gwùmnzi nun. Kɛ fyaʼ, ɓænnênì ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, yon yɛ wɛ̌ ǹjìm wì nɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi tà ɓyin fɛ.
49006018	Kelênì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwan hwæn lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, ɓyin swulaʼ nun wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi tà ɓyin lìsea. Ɓyin ton lɛ̀ mɛʼ, ɓa ɓyin ɗyê. Ɓyin keli M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwan hwæn lɛ̀ mɛ̀ myin ɓwum ɓyon.
49006019	Ɓyin keli tì kuʼ nun lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yɛ̂m, ɓǎ nun lisàʼ mùn ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ mùn yɛ̌ shɛ̀, mùn sannzi Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwàsâ ɓwiʼ, ɓǎ mùn shɛ yon mwù zwô.
49006020	Mùn ni ci-ntwum Yesù Kristò kɛ ntwiʼ Ntwum Lwɛn màzwùm, kwo fɛʼ she mùn ni kɛ nye njè sɛ. Kelênì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ mùn sannzi yon mwù zwô wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ sɛ yili.
49006021	Mùn yili lɛ ɓyin limmì m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyɛ̌ mùn tòn jenɛ kɛ nlim, lɛ̀ ywum yɛ mùn tǎ cì. Li nɛ mùn fyii ɓyin ŋgyinni nyɛʼ Tìshîʼ, nun nɛ ta she Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò cǐ lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, ɓǎ nun sannzi ɓyin ywum hwæn.
49006022	Mùn fyii ɓyin nun ɓǎ ɓyin limmì m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyɛʼ, lɛ̀ nun kimnzi ɓyin mɛ̀ nlim kɛ zwum.
49006023	Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò fɛ flɔa lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓye kɛ cì shin hwæn.
49006024	Ɓwum ɓye ta Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò yili lɛ̀ ǹyili yɛ tà ka mlɔ̀ʼ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgænnì ɓon, ɓon hwæn.
50001001	Mùn Pɔ̂l ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ Tìmòtê ɓɛ mɛ̀ cikpuʼ Yesù Kristò, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ta ɓyin ɗèwà ton sɛ kɔi. Ɓwiʼ ta son kɔi lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò ye kɛ Fìlîb, yɛ ɓætâ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Ɓwiʼ konndì tì kuʼ kɔi lɛ̀ ɓwumŋkæ̀m kɛ nyenswæ̀b nyin, lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta she cǐ kwe.
50001002	Ce ndwun nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì ɓyin, ɓɛ fɛ ɓyin flɔa.
50001003	Mùn tǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili ntwiʼ yin yì kwan hwæn yɛ mùn tǎ lɛʼ shin ɓǔn.
50001004	Mùn tǎ tòn lɛ̀ ǹlim lwɛn yì kwan hwæn yɛ mùn tǎ ɓɛ mùn kelâ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ jin shin.
50001005	Mùn tǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓætâ lɛ̀ mùn kɛ she nshɛ̌ Ntwum Lwɛn nun, ǹwaʼ yɛ ǹgyìn zwimbyiʼ nɛ ɓyin ɗunme ǹlim ɗyili kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, han a kiìn ɓɛ̀n jenɛ.
50001006	Mùn lìmmi seansean lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗunme she lwɛn cǐ kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun, à ywìmɛ she màzwùm kɛ̀nnzi mbyimbyî, sɛ kwannzi mwù, a kɛn ɓɛ̌n m̀mlɔ̀kàʼ nywɔʼ nɛ Yesù Kristò ywìmɛ fyònnì.
50001007	À si wòli lɛ mùn fɔkàʼ li kɛ ntwiʼ yin. Ɓyin ɓi mùn kɛ nlim, ntwiʼ ǹŋgæ̀nni fɔʼ yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgæ̀nni mun, à ŋgæ̀nnâ tì kuʼ ɓyin. Son sɛ ci, ɓyin ta mun kpea jenɛ fɛ nye njè, kwo fɛʼ kɛ nɗyi shìtàkwǔ Ntwum Lwɛn yɛ mùn ɓe ɗyi lɛ à yi lɛŋkæ̀m.
50001008	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni shìtàkwù lɛ mùn yili ɓyin lɛŋkæ̀m, ǹyili yɛ mùn yili ɓyin nun ta kuʼ waì nywi Yesù Kristò nun nɛʼ.
50001009	Ywɔênì fɛʼ swum sɛ mùn tǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli lɛ̀ jin shin. Mùn tà nun keli lɛ à ci ɓyin yili ɓwùlukwæ̌n mbyimbyî kɛ nyinnìm shin nun. À ci tì kuʼ kɛ nyili màzwùm nun, ɓyin fɔsì lɛŋkæ̀m lìmmi, ɓyin limmì tì kuʼ ǹkɛ̌ ŋkyììli kɛ nyinnìm mɛ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa lɛ̀ nyɛ̌ ǹlwukea,
50001010	ɓǎ ɓyin yæn mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea. Li, nywɔʼ nɛ Yesù Kristò yɛ̌ fyònnǐ, mɛ̀ nlim nyin ɓɛ ǹsanmea; ɓa ɓyin ɓɛ lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ nywi.
50001011	Mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nyin yɛ̌ tì kuʼ ɓɛ ǹlwukea kwan mèan hwæn. Ŋ̀kimmɔʼ ncinni mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nlwukea màzwùm hwæn yɛ̌ waʼ kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ Yesù Kristò nun. Li nɛ ywimɛ cì ɓwum sakàʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ twuli nun.
50001012	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, mùn yili lɛ ɓyin limmì lɛ mɛ̀ lɛʼ nɛ cinni mun fɛ tɛ̀ʼ kan lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓe nyè, à fyǒn cì sɛ kɛn mbyî.
50001013	Mɛ̀ lɛʼ ni nɛ ci mɛ̀ suzæ̀n hwæn ɓye ta nye gwɛmnà ɓǒn, lɛ̀ ɓwum mèan ndɔʼ tì kuʼ limmì lɛ mùn ni nye njè ntwiʼ sɛ mùn ni mwum Yesù Kristò.
50001014	A konndì tì ɓɛ kɛ ŋkɛ̀ yɛ ɓɛ kɛ mun nye njè yɛ, yɛ fɛâ tì kuʼ ǹkimmɔʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-nɗwon mbyi Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ. Yi tà ka tî ɓon kwɛ̀nni, ɓɛ ti lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b sannzi mwù zwô.
50001015	Mùn lìmmì seansean lɛ ɓyindɔʼ ta lɛʼ Yesù Kristò sannzi lɛ̀ ɓon ci m̀bànni lɛ̀ mùn. Ti kuʼ kɛ fyaʼ ndɔʼ nun, ɓye ta lɛʼ shon shɛ̌ lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, à ɓi tì kuʼ kwe.
50001016	Ɓon ɓi ta lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b shɛ̌ lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ li ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ yili mûn. Ɓɛ limmi lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyi mùn fɛ ɓǎ mùn ɗyi, mùn lisàʼ lɛ Ǹtwum Lwɛn yi swum sɛ ɗyi lɛŋkæ̀m.
50001017	Ɓye ta m̀bànni cǐ lɛ̀ mùn ɓi, ɓɛ ta lɛʼ Yesù Kristò sannzi ɓǎ ɓon cinni ǹtwu, ɓɛ lan mùn. Lɛʼ sɛ ɓon ta lɛʼ hwæn cinni kan cǐ tòn kɛ mɛ nlim nyan nun, sɛ suʼ kɛ ŋwum. Ɓɛ ta shɛ̀ li, ɓǎ ɓon konndì mùn vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ fɛ nye njè.
50001018	Son, nywi kwɛ̀nnâ kan mûn. Kwo ɓɛ shɛ fɛʼ lɛ̀ m̀ɓàkǎʼ ɓyɛbbi nlim, shindɔʼ ɓɛ shɛ lɛ̀ m̀ɓàkǎʼ lwɛn, swum twun si lɛ lɛʼ Yesù Kristò ta fɔ̀si kɛ̀nnɔ̀ʼ mbyî. Mǔn kɛ̀ kan lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ nlim lɛ̀ ntwiʼ màzwùm, mùn tǎ fɔ̀si dàlì mbyî nùn.
50001019	Ntwiʼ sɛ mùn lìmmi lɛ kɛ ywum màzwùm nun hwæn, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ mùn nywæ̀si nun ntwiʼ mɛ̀ ŋkeli nɛ ɓyin ta keli lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yɛ̂m, lɛ̀ m̀kpaʼ yɛ M̀pùn Yesù Kristò tà mûn kpea.
50001020	Swum sɛ ǹlim ta mun fɔ̀si ɗyi kɛ nlim lwɛn, à si lɛ kwɛ̀nnjin ɓà mun ɓænni kɛ swiʼ ɓwum. Mùn yɛ̌ fyǒn tòn lɛ̀ m̀ɓònŋgàʼ lɛ ɓa ǹlim sænndi mùn, mùn ton kwan hwæn wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn tòn jenɛ lɛ̀ mùn lisàʼ ɓwum kɛ mbɔ̀kì tòn nyɛ̀m nun hwæn lɛ Yesù Kristò ni ǹdwun; mùn nɛ ɓɛ fɛʼ lɛ̀ mɛʼ, kwo mùn ywi fɛʼ nùn.
50001021	Ti lɛ̀ mǔn, kwan sɛ mǔn kɛ lɛ̀ mɛʼ, Yesù Kristò nɛ swum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm shɛ̂m. Ywi ni cì shɛ̂m wɛ̌ ɗàsì nyɛ̌ làn fɛʼ ǹzison ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan.
50001022	Ɓɛshɛ ǹgyìn yɛ̂m kɛɔ̂ʼ mbyî, mùn wòli mùn cì tì she ndɔʼ she ywimɛ ɓwum kpea. Li, mùn ni mɛ̀ nyinnìm, mǔn lìmmi kan fyàʼ yɛ mùn yɛ̌ yæ̀n.
50001023	Mùn ni mɛ̀ nyinnìm li, swum sɛ mùn yili lwɛn à si ywi, ɓǎ mùn kɛn tòn m̀ban ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Son si sɛ lwu sɛ lan tòn she fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan.
50001024	Son, tòn shɛ̂m kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun si tì kuʼ lwɛn ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, ɓǎ mùn kpaʼ ɓyin.
50001025	Mùn kɛ̀nnâ yɛn ɓe lɛ mǔn kɛ fɛʼ tǒn wan nùn. Mùn yɛ̌ fɛʼ tòn ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin m̀banmban ɓǎ ɓyin hwæn, ɓyin fɔsì mɛ̀ nlim nyin ɗyili mbyî kɛ nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓyin konndì tì kuʼ tòn lɛ̀ ǹdàli kɛ nɗyili nlim màzwùm nun.
50001026	Li, kwan sɛ mǔn kà kwankàʼ nye njè, ɓwiʼ ywimɛ tì cinnènì ɓe; ɓyin yɛ Yesù Kristò twuli mbyimbyî, ntwiʼ sɛ mùn ɓɛ̀nnâ nsòn yin.
50001027	Ŋgyi swum nɛ ɓyin ywimɛ cì à ni lɛ, m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyin ɓɛ swum sɛ ywimɛ lìsàʼ lɛ ɓyin ta ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò. Mùn yili lɛ kwan sɛ mùn ywìmɛ ɓyin kǐn yɛnni, shindɔʼ mùn nɛ shi fɛʼ kǐn, mùn ywɔʼ lɛ ɓyin ɗyi kimmi kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓyin ta suʼ tòn ŋwum fɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, ɓyin ɗwi ti kuʼ twùʼ lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ ɓǎ Ǹtwum Lwɛn kɛnnɔ̀ʼ mbyî.
50001028	Ɓa ɓyin yi tì mɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnzì ɓyin, kwo fɛʼ kɛ ya mbyi nun. Kwan sɛ a yɛ ɓɛ ɓyin tà ka tî ɓon yi, a ywimɛ ɓon ǹlìmmì cǐ lɛ ɓɛ ti ɓwum ɓye ɓwuâ nùn, ɓyin ɓɛ kuʼ làn nyin ɓwum ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b swætâ. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ywimɛ ɓon ǹlìmmǐ màzwùm cǐ.
50001029	Kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwɛ̀nnzâ lɛ̀ ɓyin, à wò ɓyin mbyi lɛ̀ ɓyin ɗwon Yesù Kristò, a suʼ kan seansean ǹɗyili nlim yɛ ɓyin ɗyili nywi yon, à si tì kuʼ lɛ ɓyin yɛn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yon.
50001030	Kɛ à si li, ɓyin ɗuân twùʼ m̀bɔʼ nɛ mùn tǎ ɗwì. Ǹɗwì twuʼ màzwùm yi ye ɓyin yɛnne mun ɓe ɗwì wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin ta ywɔʼ jenɛ fyaʼ lɛ mùn tǎ ɗwì.
50002001	M̀ɓæti yɛ ɓyin ɓi ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò tɛ̀ti kan ɓyin zwùm? Ǹyili yon yɛ nun tà ɓyin yili fɛâ kan ɓyin kpæm mɛʼ? M̀pùn Nsanmi ti kàn ɓyin nywi? Kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim lɛ̀ ɓwùlu ɗuân kǎn nyinnìm shin nun? Ɓyin ti kan ɓwùlu yili nùn?
50002002	Kɛ ɓyin ti nyinnìm ywum màzwùm hwæn li, fɔ̀sênì mùn ǹlim lwuli mbyî kɛ tǒn ŋwum fɔʼ nun, ɓyin yili ɓwùlu, ɓa ǹlim ndɔʼ ɓɛ kyi, ɓyin kɛnnzì ywum hwæn lwɛn, ǹkyììli læ̀kì ɓɛ nyinnìm shin nun.
50002003	Ɓa ɓyin sukuʼ lwɛn nyɛ̌ ɓyin nɛʼ fɔ̀kea, shìkì ɓyin twuli kuʼ ɓyin nɛʼ, fyòênnì ɓyin nɛʼ twɛli ŋgyɔʼ, ɓyin cɛ ɓwùlukwæ̌n wɛ̌ ɓwum ɓye lan ɓyin nùn.
50002004	Mwum hwæn ci swum sɛ woli sɛ kpaʼ lwikwæ̌n. Ɓa ɓyin sukuʼ ɓyin nɛʼ nyæ̀mmi.
50002005	Ɗwoênnì m̀bɔ̀kì Yesù Kristò kɛ mɛ mɓàkàʼ nyon nyɛ̌ nun cinne hwæn nun.
50002006	Tòn shon ɓe lɛ, kwo fɛʼ she nun ni swum fɔʼ ɓon lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b si, ǎ ɓe kǎn m̀bànni cǐ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
50002007	Son, à ɗonnze paʼ tǒn màzwùm mbɛti, à lànnzì mwum shon kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan wɛ̌ ɓwiʼ, à fyɔ̀sì nun nɛʼ lɛ̀ ci-she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Kwan sɛ nun ɓe mwum wɛ̌ ɓwiʼ,
50002008	à fyɔ̀se nun nɛʼ ɓe ŋgyɔʼ, à ywɔli M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, li han a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kɛ ywi nun, kwo fɛʼ ywi vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nyɛ̌ ɓɛ ywummɔe nun kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛ̂m.
50002009	Li nɛ ci, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b twuli nun à làn ywum hwæn, à kɛ̀ nun jin she lan ɓwùlu mɛ̀ myin hwæn,
50002010	ɓǎ ɓwum hwæn ɓye kɛ ɗɛb lɛ̀ ɓye ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, kwo fɛʼ ɓye ŋgyɔʼ nji, kwan sɛ ɓon ywimɛ jin Yesù ywo, ɓɛ kiìn swummi kɛ swiʼ shon, ɓɛ twuli nun.
50002011	Kwo wɛn ywìmɛ shɛ̀ lɛ̀ ŋwum yon lɛ Yesù Kristò ni Nyɛli ɓwum hwæn. Li, ɓɛ yɛ kònndì Ce M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b twuli.
50002012	Mɛ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, kɛ ɓyin yɛnnâ ǹywɔli yɛ Yesù ɓe ywɔli lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, sɛ yili lɛ ɓyin ɓɛ ywɔli wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì kwan sɛ mùn ɓe ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin. Jenɛ nɛ mùn ɓà tî ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin, ywɔlênì tì sɛ lan li. Ǹywɔli màzwùm yi lɛ, kɛ nswæti yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b swætâ ɓyin nun, sɛ yili lɛ ɓyin ci kuʼ she sɛ yɛ lìsàʼ lɛ ɓyin swælâ, ɓa ɓyin ɓwæti mwù lɛ̀ ǹlìsǎʼ nswæti yin.
50002013	Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ta ɓyin ɗyi nyè, ɓyin kà yili ywum yɛ ta nun ǹlim lwukea, à fɛ tì kuʼ ɓyin kim ncǐ ywum màzwùm.
50002014	Kɛ mɛ she nyin nɛ ɓyin ta cì nun hwæn, ɓa ɓyin ŋgunnàʼ ɓwùlu, shìkì ɓyin pyisì kuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ,
50002015	ɓyin læ̀kì ɓɛ lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ nywi, son, ɓǎ ɓyin ɓɛ sanmea, ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye cinni kan ɗɛ̀m ndɔʼ nywi. Ɓyin ɓi nyinnìm ɓwum ɓɛ cinni mɛ̀ ŋwum mɓì-mɓì, ɓye ta mbyi mɓyɛbbi ɗwon, kɛ nyinnìm shan ɓyin ɓi wɛ̌ ǹwanŋwan,
50002016	ɓyin ta ɓon ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ta ɓwum ǹzison ŋkæ̀mŋkæm fɛ sannzi. Ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ci li, ǹgyìn nɛ Yesù Kristò ywìmɛ fyònnǐ, mùn ywìmɛ dàlì kɛ swiʼ shon ntwiʼ yin. Ntwiʼ son sɛ yɛ lìsàʼ lɛ mǔn ywie kǎn she ɗin.
50002017	Kɛ̌ nlim sɛ ɓyin ta kɛ̀ kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, à si wɛ̌ sàtìkæ̀ʼ shin sɛ ɓyin ta fɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓɛ wu fɛʼ mun nùn, mùn yɛ̌ tòn lwɛn, ntwiʼ mvæb yɛ̂m yɛ ɓɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ sɛ mùn kònndi kɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ shin nun, li, ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin, ɓwiʼ yɛ dàlì ɓwiʼ hwæn.
50002018	Ɓyin kuʼ, ɓɛênì kuʼ lɛ̀ ǹlim lwɛn lɛ̀ mùn m̀ban, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ dalènì.
50002019	Ɓɛshɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò yili, mùn yɛ̌ ɓyin Tìmòtê fyi ǹgyìɛn, ɓǎ kwan sɛ nun ywìmɛ fyònnǐ, à shɛ̀ kuʼ mùn wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin ton, ɓǎ zwùm tɛʼ kuʼ mùn kɛ nlim.
50002020	Mwum m̀bɔʼ ndɔʼ ɓǎn nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ cinni mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ m̀ban ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun, shi kuʼ ɓɛ nun, Tìmòtê. À tǎ lɛʼ shin ɓàkea ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ.
50002021	Ɓwùlukwæ̌n hwæn ta suʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ nyan nɛʼ nyæ̀mmi, ɓɛ tà ka ɓàkàʼ nywi ywum Yesù Kristò.
50002022	Ti lɛ̀ Tìmòtê, ɓyin limmi mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nlwukea nyon. Ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun, ɓwiʼ ciâ Ǹtwum Lwɛn kɛn mbyî; à tà mun kpea lɛ̀ she màzwùm wɛ̌ tà shɛ mwɛn tǎ ce nyon kpea.
50002023	Li, kwan sɛ a yɛ ɓɛ lɛ̀ ɓɛ linnâ mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ ɓyɛ̂m, mùn yili mùn fyî ɓyin nun m̀byìmmi.
50002024	Mùn lìmmi seansean lɛ ɓɛshɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò yili, mǔn nɛʼ yɛ̌ kuʼ ɓǐn cì shin kwan kwæʼ.
50002025	A konndì tì kuʼ ɓɛ lɛ ŋgyinni nyɛ̀m Èpàflòdîtɛ̀, mwum nyɛ̌ ɓyin fyiê lɛ à kiìn mùn ywum yɛ ɓe mùn shi fɛ, ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun, ɓwiʼ ciâ she m̀banmban, ɓwiʼ ɓɔlâ she ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ. Mùn fɔ̀keâ jenɛ lɛ ǹdikàʼ mùn fyî nun ɓe cì shin,
50002026	ntwiʼ sɛ ǹjè nyɛn yin tà nun kwɛ̀nni ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ. Ǹlim ta nun kwɛ̀nni lɛ̀ ɓyin ntwiʼ sɛ à lìmmi lɛ ɓyin ywɔâ lɛ nun kwɛ̀nnâ.
50002027	Lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓe lɛ̀ à kwɛ̀nnâ. Ɓe lɛ̀ sɛ nzwonmɛ kwæʼ ɓǎ nun ywi, son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ kwɛnnzi ǹlim lɛ̀ nun, à kimnzi nun; ǎ suʼ kan ǹlim kwɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ nun, à kwɛ̀nnzi tî kuʼ ǹlim lɛ̀ mǔn, ntwiʼ nun læ̀kì mùn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ndɔʼ kònndi nywi.
50002028	Kɛ ntwiʼ màzwǔm, ǹlim ta mun suʼ ɗyi lɛ mùn fyɔsì nun ɓe cì shin m̀byìmmi, ɓǎ kwan sɛ ɓyin ywimɛ nun yɛnni, ǹlim lwukaʼ ɓyin. Ti lɛ̀ mǔn, ǹlim pyi kuʼ mùn zwum.
50002029	Li, kwan sɛ nun ywìmɛ ɓɛ̌n, yèênì nun lwɛn, ɓyin yê nun lɛ̀ ǹdàli ntwiʼ sɛ nun nɛ kuʼ mwum Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Twulênì paʼ mwum sɛ wɛ̌ nun si,
50002030	ntwiʼ ɓe lɛ̀ à nzwonmɛ kwæʼ ɓǎ nun ywi kɛ she Yesù Kristò nun. She sɛ ɓyin ɓɛ ɓê cɛ̌, ɓyin kpaʼ mùn, son sɛ nun ci, han à shinɔ̂ʼ ywi ŋganŋgwu.
50003001	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, m̀mlɔ̀kàʼ nzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nyɛ̀m ni lɛ ɓyin dalì ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓi ɓwum Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Sɛ ɓa mûn nywi hwum lɛ̀ ǹŋæti nzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ mùn kɔâ ɓyin mbyî nùn. Kwo fɛʼ li, mùn yɛn ma lɛ à si lwɛn li kɛ cì shin.
50003002	Son sɛ mùn lɛʼ lɛ, cìênì lɔʼ kon lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye wɛ̌ ɓwɛn mbyiʼ nyenea ɓye ta mɛ̀ she mɓyibbɔa cǐ, ɓɛ ta suʼ fɔ̀kàʼ lɛ lɛʼ lwɛn sɛ sukuʼ ǹɗunnzi ǹdùn.
50003003	Ɓɛ lɛ̀ ǹɗunnzi ǹdùn ye ǹkæ̀mŋkæm, à yi kyi. Ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Mpùn Nsanmi, ɓwiʼ twuli Yesù Kristò, ɓwiʼ kɛ̀ kan mwù kɛ yi ɓɛ̀ʼ yɛ ɓwum ta ghekaʼ nun, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ti ɓwum ɓye ɓɛ ɗunnzâ ǹdùn she ǹkæ̀mŋkæm kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓa tì ɓon.
50003004	Yì ɓɛ̌ʼ màzwǔm ɓê ywum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm, mǔn kɛè mwù kɛ nlim, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ shɛ̀ lɛ nun ni kɛ yi ɓɛ̌ʼ màzwùm nun ǹwòli, mùn lìmmi lɛ mùn ni nlim ǹwòli, mùn làn nun.
50003005	Ǹɗunmi zwimbyiʼ yi lɛ: mùn ni seansean mwum Èbrû, sɛ konndì ɓɛ mùn ni mwɛn nyɛ̌ ŋgyɔʼ Ìzràɛ̂l kɛ mvu ɓwum Bɛ̀njàmɛ̂n nun. Kwan sɛ ɓɛ yee mǔn, mùn wòle ǹgyǐn nìni ɓɛ ɗunnzi mùn ǹdùn. Kɛ mbyi mɛ lwuà mɛ Yudà nun, mùn ɓe Fàrìzìɛ̂n.
50003006	Mùn ɓe m̀ɓyi kɛ mbyi mɛ̀ Yudà nun, han mùn ɓe ma ɓwum Yesù Kristò zæbsi. Mǔn ɓe kǎn mɛ̀ lwuà mɛ Yudà ndɔʼ lèan. Li, mùn ɓe kwan hwæn ǹlwinni.
50003007	Mùn ɓe fɔ̀kàʼ lɛ ywum màzwùm wole kim yɛ kpaʼ mùn, son jenɛ, kɛ ntwiʼ Yesù Kristò, mùn lìmmâ lɛ ywum pwìnpwìn yɛ ɓe.
50003008	Lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m, mùn pæ̀lâ fyàʼ lɛ̀ ywum hwæn li, ntwiʼ nlìmmì yɛ mùn lìmmâ Nyɛli nyɛ̀m Yesù Kristǒ, yɛ lan ywum yɛ mbyî hwæn. Kɛ ntwiʼ yon nun kyishon, mùn ɗonnzâ ywum hwæn. Mùn tǎ ywum màzwùm cɛ jenɛ wɛ̌ ywum yɛ ɓɛ swiâ twuʼ, hwæn li, ɓǎ mùn ɓɛ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
50003009	Ɓa m̀ɓɛ yɛ fyàʼ fɔʼ, son, ɓǎ mùn ɓɛɔ̂ʼ nun fyaʼ gwùm. Mùn ɓà tî lɛ̀ m̀ɓàkǎʼ nshɛ̀ yɛ lɛ mùn ni ǹsanmi kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ntwiʼ sɛ mùn tǎ mɛ̀ lwuà mɛ Yudà ɗwonnzi. Swum sɛ ta mun fyɔ̀si ǹsanmi kɛ swiʼ shon, à si kɛ̌ nlim sɛ mùn kɛ̌ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tà mun cɛ ǹsanmi ntwiʼ kɛ̌ nlim màzwùm.
50003010	Swum sɛ mùn sukuʼ yili ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, à si lɛ mùn fɔsì Yesù Kristò lìmmi, mùn limmì tì kuʼ ǹkimmɔʼ yon, ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ nun lèan ywi nun. Mùn yili mùn yɛn kuʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun yɛnne, ywi nyɛ̀m ɓɛ kuʼ wɛ̌ ǹyon,
50003011	ɓǎ ɓɛshɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, à yìmnzì kuʼ mùn wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun yìmnze kuʼ Yesù Kristò.
50003012	Mɛ̀ lɛʼ nɛ mùn lɛʼ hwæn ni, mǔn lɛʼ kan lɛ mùn lwinnzâ ywum màzwùm hwæn, shindɔʼ mǔn cinni kan tî ɓyɛbbi, son, mùn tǎ nywi kimnzi fyaʼ ɓǎ mun kwumndi mɛ̀ lɛʼ màzwùm hwæn, a ɓɛ ǹyɛ̀m, ntwiʼ mun ti mwum nɛ Yesù Kristò kwumndâ nùn.
50003013	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, mùn tà ɓyin shɛ̌ lɛ m̀ɓàkàʼ yɛ̂m ɓa lɛ mùn kwumndâ mɛ̀ lɛʼ màzwùm nùn. Swum fɔʼ sɛ mùn tǎ cì, à si lɛ mǔn tà ka tî ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ ywum yɛ mùn ɓe mbyî nlim. Mùn tǎ nywi kimnzi lɛ̀ mùn kɛnnɔ̀ʼ mbyî ywum ye zwimbyiʼ nun.
50003014	Mùn tǎ lwùmnì lɛ̀ kɛ̀n, ɓǎ mun ɓɛn mwu, mùn yê ɗàsì nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tà mûn lon lɛ̀ nun ntwiʼ sɛ mùn ni mwum Yesù Kristò. Ɗàsì màzwùm ni ǹtòn yɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ tòn kwe ɗɛb ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun.
50003015	Ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ti ɓwum ɓye kwùm zwum yili kɛ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, sɛ yili lɛ ɓwiʼ cinnênì paʼ mɓàkǎʼ màzwùm. Ɓɛshɛ ɓyindɔʼ cinni mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyɛ̌ ɗin ndɔʼ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywìmɛ ɓyin fɔ̀si lìsea lɛ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyin ɓǎ ǹlwukea.
50003016	Swum fɔʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ cì suʼ lɛ ɓwiʼ limmènì lɛ̀ ǹyè mbyi nɛ ɓwiʼ ti nlim, ɓa ɓwiʼ fyôn ɓe ɓwæ̀b nun, ɓwiʼ kɛnnènì mbyimbyî lɛ̀ kwǔ kɛ̌n fɔʼ.
50003017	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɗwoênnì mɛ̀ kwǔ kɛ̀n ɓyɛ̂m, ɓyin hwæn. Ɓwiʼ liseâ ɓwum m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyɛ̌ ǹlwɛn. Ɗwoênnì mɛ̀ kwù ɓyan, ɓɛshɛ ɓyin yɛn lɛ ɓɛ cinni kuʼ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn m̀bɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ.
50003018	Ɓwum mèan ndɔʼ ɓi kwe, m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyan tǎ lìsàʼ lɛ à ɓi mɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnzì Yesù Kristò nɛ ywie kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛ̂m. Mùn ŋætâ ɓyin mɛ̀ lɛʼ tòn nɛ kæ̀mmì ti mèan, jenɛ, mùn tǎ tì lɔʼ ɓyin nun shɛ̌ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ɗuʼ kɛ mɛʼ.
50003019	Kɛ cì ɓwum màzwǔm, m̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ndɔʼ ɓa mbyî, a lan kuʼ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyan nɛ kɛ zwum shan nun, swum kwɛ̀nnjin sɛ ɓon ta cì sɛ ɓɛ ta fyǒn ɓon nɛʼ twuli nun, mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyan tǎ suʼ kɛ̀n kɛ ywum ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun. Kɛ mmlɔ̀kàʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywìmɛ ǹzison nyan ɓwuli lɛ̀ ntwiʼ màzwùm.
50003020	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, ŋgyɔʼ ŋkæ̀mŋkæm nyɛʼ ni kɛ ɗɛb cɛ̌ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓwiʼ ta suʼ tòn lɛ̀ m̀ɓònŋgàʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò nɛ Ci-nswæti nyɛʼ.
50003021	Kwan sɛ nun yɛ̌ ɓɛ̌n, à yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ kwæʼ nywi she ɓwiʼ cinni ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan sɛ yònnzi, sɛ fyôn kuʼ kwæʼ nywi she cinni ǹtwu wɛ̌ shon. À yɛ̌ cì li lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yon yɛ nun tǎ ywum hwæn kɛ̌ kɛ mɛ kwù nji.
50004001	Kɛ ɓyin limmâ li, mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɗyiênì kimmi kɛ mɓæti yɛ ɓyin ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Mùn yili ɓyin ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, ǹlim yɛ̂m ta suʼ ɗyi lɛ mùn kònndì tì ɓyin yɛnni ɓe, mùn tǎ dàlì ntwiʼ yin, ɓyin ɓi swum sɛ lisaʼ lɛ she shɛ̂m kwannzâ mwù.
50004002	Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ mùn yili mùn shɛ lɛ̀ Èvòdî ɓon lɛ̀ Sæ̀ntìshî, à ni lɛ mùn swuleâ ɓon, ɓɛ ton ŋwum fɔʼ ɓon kɛ nyinnìm shan nun, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓon ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
50004003	Mùn shɛ̀ tì kuʼ lɛ̀ lwikwæ̌n she nyɛ̀m lɛ à kpaʼ mɛ̀ yib ɓî màzwùm, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓon, ɓwiʼ ɓɔlâ lɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kɛ nsannzi Ntwum Yesù Kristò lɛ̀ ɓwum hwæn. Ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ yib màzwùm, kònndì lɛ̀ Klèmân, lɛ̀ ɓwùlukwæ̌n ndɔʼ tì kuʼ, ɓwiʼ ciâ she fɔʼ m̀banmban lɛ̀ ɓon hwæn li, mɛ̀ myin nyan ti fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ɗèwǎ nzison nun.
50004004	Dàlênì kwan hwæn kɛ mɓæti yɛ ɓyin ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò nun, mùn tà lɔʼ ɓyin ŋæti, dàlênì mɛ̀.
50004005	Ɓɛênì flɔa kɛ swiʼ ɓwum hwæn, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin limmi lɛ m̀ɓɛ̌n Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ti kwukwæʼ.
50004006	Ɓa ɓyin fyon swum ndɔʼ mɛ nlim nyin nun, son, shɛ̀ênì ywum hwæn yɛ ta ɓyin shini lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ fɛʼ yɛn, kelênì nun, ɓyin yili tì kuʼ nun osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ.
50004007	Ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ci li, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓyin flɔa fɛ, flɔa nyɛ̌ lǎn ǹlìmmì ɓwum hwæn. Flɔa màzwùm yɛ̌ mɛ̀ nlim nyin, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyin ɓǒn kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò.
50004008	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, m̀mlɔ̀kàʼ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ̂m yi lɛ, kɛ̀ênì mɛ̀ nlim nyin kɛ nywi ywum ye ɗyi ǹkæ̀mŋkæm yɛ woli yɛ cinni ǹtwu wɛ̌ ywum ye ɗyi lɛŋkæ̌m, ywum ye cinni ǹkyìblǐ, ywum lwinnea, ywum sanmea, mɛ̀ lɛʼ myimmea, lɛ̀ ywum lwukea yɛ ta mwum hwæn ǹdàli fɛ nlim. Ywum màzwùm hwæn li, fɔ̀keànì lɛ̀ yon kwan hwæn.
50004009	Ywum yɛ mùn lìsae ɓyin yɛ ɓyin yilâ, kònndì lɛ̀ ywum yɛ ɓyin ywɔe mùn kɛ ŋwum, kwo fɛʼ ye ɓyin yɛnne mùn kɛ ncì, cìênì kuʼ yon. Li, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ tǎ ɓwum flɔa fɛ yɛ̌ ɓyin ɓǒn.
50004010	Mùn ywɔâ ǹdàli kɛ nywi Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin konndâ tì fɔ̀kàʼ ɗyě lɛ̀ mùn. Mùn lìmmâ lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ ɓyin ta lɛʼ shɛ̂m fɔ̀kea kwan hwæn, son, ɓyin cinne kǎn mbyi m̀kpaʼ yɛ̂m.
50004011	Mǔn tà ka lɛʼ li ntwiʼ sɛ mùn ni kɛ shiʼ nun. Mùn mɛ̀nndâ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ paʼ tòn hwæn, ɓɛ fɛʼ ɓyɛbbi, lɛ̀ lwɛn, mùn tǎ tòn, shìkì mùn fyon.
50004012	Tòn sɛ mùn tǎ tòn kwan sɛ mùn ni kɛ shiʼ nun, mùn lìmmi son, she mùn tà kuʼ tòn kwan sɛ mùn ni kɛ wɛʼ nun, mùn lìmmi tî kuʼ son hwæn. Mɛ̀ paʼ tòn màzwùm ti mùn mɛʼ seansean; mùn lìmmi mbyi nɛ mùn ywìmɛ tòn kɛ nlim, mǔn hwumni kan kwo fɛʼ she mùn cinni swum ji, shindɔʼ ǹjè nɛ ta mûn kwɛ̀nni, mun shì fɛʼ ywum cinni, kɛ̀ mùn nɛ cinni fɛʼ mèan.
50004013	Mùn wòli mùn làn mɛ̀ paʼ tòn hwæn lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ Yesù Kristò tà mun fɛ.
50004014	Kɛ nyě màzwùm hwæn li, ɓyin ciâ lwɛn kɛ mkpaʼ yɛ ɓyin kpaʼ mùn kɛ mɛ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nun.
50004015	Ɓyin ɓɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò ye kɛ Fìlîb, ɓyin limmi lɛ kwan sɛ ɓɛ ɗunme Ǹtwum Yesù Kristò shɛ̌ kɛ Màsèdwân, ɓyin ɓɛ ɓe mùn suʼ kpea, a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kɛ ŋwai ye mùn wai kwe. Ɓyin ɓɛ ɓe ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò yɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ywum fyìkea nyinnìm shɛʼ.
50004016	Kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ mǔn kɛ kɛ Tɛ̀sàlònikà, ɓyin næmnze mùn ywum yɛ ɓe mùn shi kæ̀mmì mèan.
50004017	Sɛ ɓa lɛ fɛ nyɛ̌ ɓyin ta mun fɛ nɛ suʼ mun ǹlim lwu, son, mùn tǎ dàlì, ntwiʼ sɛ mùn lìmmi lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓyin ŋgæ̀nni kɛ fɛ nɛ ɓyin ta mun fɛ nun.
50004018	Mùn yɛnnâ ywum yɛ ɓyin næmnzi mùn hwæn, yɛ lan tì fɛʼ yɛ ɓe mùn shi. Kwan sɛ Èpàflòdîtɛ̀ fɛ mun ywum yɛ nun ɓɛ̀nne lɛ̀ yon, swum ndɔʼ shiʼ kan tî mùn. Ywum màzwùm yi wɛ̌ sàtìkæ̌ʼ lwɛn sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ yili, sɛ ta nun ǹlim lwukea ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ.
50004019	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinni ǹjònndì ndwun, kɛ njònndì nyon nun, à yɛ̌ ɓyin ywum hwæn yɛ ta ɓyin shi fɛ fyaʼ Yesù Kristò.
50004020	Ǹtwu ɓɛ lɛ̀ Ce Ndwun nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yì ɗwùmɗwǔm mèan hwæn. Àmɛ̀n.
50004021	Hwæsênì ɓwum Yesù Kristò hwæn. Ɓye ɓwiʼ ɓi fɛ lɛ̀ ɓon hwæsi tì kuʼ ɓyin.
50004022	Ɓwum Yesù Kristò ɓye mbyî hwæn hwæsi ɓyin. Ɓye hwæsi ɓyin ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ à ɓi ɓwum ɓye kɛ ɗwon mvɛ̀n ndwun Sèzâr.
50004023	Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì ɓyin.
51001001	Mùn Pɔ̂l ci-ntwum Yesù Kristò nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̌n, ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ŋgyinni nyɛʼ Tìmòtê, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ta ɓyin ɗèwà ton sɛ kɔi.
51001002	Ɓwiʼ ta son kɔi lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò ye kɛ Kòlɔsì. Ɓyin ɓi mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ ɓye ta Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ɗwon lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ. Ɓyin ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Ce ndwun nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgænnì ɓyin, à fɛ ɓyin flɔa.
51001003	Ɓwiʼ ta Ce ndwun M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi Ce Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili yì kwan hwæn yɛ ɓwiʼ ta nun keli lɛ̀ jin shin.
51001004	Ɓwiʼ ta nun osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ywɔâ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin kɛâ ǹlim kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, ɓyin ta tî kuʼ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon yili.
51001005	Hwæn li, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ ywum lwukea yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɔ̀sâ lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yin kɛ ɗɛb. Ɓe lɛ̀ ɓɛ sannzâ ɓyin lɛʼ ywum lwukea màzwùm kwan sɛ ɓyin sɛte Ǹtwum Lwɛn ywo, ǹtwum ye kɛ nywi nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ŋkæ̀mŋkæm.
51001006	Ǹtwum Lwɛn màzwùm ta kònndi læ̀m kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun hwæn. À yi wɛ̌ ŋgæʼ nyɛ̌ tǎ gwǔm lwukea sean ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwum ɓye ta mwù kɛ̌ lɛ̀ ǹtwum màzwùm ta fɔ̀si màn mbyimbyî. Li, ǹtwum màzwùm ta kuʼ kɛ̀n mbyimbyî kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ǹdìkàʼ nywɔʼ nɛ ɓyin sɛte ywo m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwɛ̀nnzâ ǹlim lɛ̀ ɓyin, a kiìn ɓɛ̀n ɗyě. Ɓyin limmâ jenɛ lɛ son nɛʼ, kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim sɛ.
51001007	Ǹtwum Lwɛn màzwùm, ɓyin ywɔʼ yon kɛ ŋwum Èpàflâ. Èpàflâ màzwùm ni ŋwè nlim nyɛʼ. Ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓon, ɓwiʼ ɓi mɛ̀ ci-she Yesù Kristò. À tǎ she Yesù Kristò cǐ lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, à tǎ she cǐ kɛ nsòn yin kɛ ɓàn shɛʼ nun.
51001008	Nun nɛ shɛ ɓwiʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin ta ɓwùlukwæ̌n yili lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Mpùn Nsanmi.
51001009	Li nɛ ci, ǹdìkàʼ nywɔʼ nɛ ɓwiʼ ywɔe lɛʼ màzwùm, ɓwiʼ tà ka mwù ɓwæti lɛ̀ ǹkeli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ jin shin. Ɓwiʼ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli, ɓwiʼ cibbi nun lɛ à ci ɓyin fɔsì ywum yɛ ta nun ǹlim lwukea lìmmi, lɛ̀ ɓyin cinni tì kuʼ ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi nyon tà ɓyin fɛ, ɓǎ ywum hwæn pæʼ ɓɛ ɓyin mɛʼ seansean kɛ mbyi nyon nun.
51001010	Li, paʼ tòn shin yɛ ɓɛ wɛ̌ tà shɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò tǎ yili. Ɓyin yɛ nun ǹlim lwukea kɛ mɛ kìkæ̀n nyin nun hwæn, ɓyin fɔsì tì mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nlwukea cinni, ɓyin konndì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìmmi mbyimbyî.
51001011	Ɓwiʼ ta tî kuʼ kònndi keli lɛ, kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ yon yɛ lan ywum hwæn, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ci ɓyin ɗyi kwan hwæn kimmi kɛ mbyi nyon nun. Li, kɛ kwan hwæn nun, ɓyin yɛ mɛ̀ lɛʼ fyimnzi, ɓyin ɓæn tì ǹlim lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, ɓyin ɓɛ tì kuʼ kɛ ndàli nun.
51001012	Yilênì Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ, nun nɛ wo ɓyin mbyi nlwɛn, ɓǎ ɓyin cinni kuʼ swum sɛ nun kɛ̀ kɛ cìcǐ ŋwanŋwan kɛ ɗɛb lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon.
51001013	Nun nɛ nywæsi ɓwiʼ kɛ cǐ tòn njimmi she Satæ̀n nɛ ta ywɔʼ kwe, à kɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kɛ ywɔʼ mwɛn nlim nyon Yesù Kristò nji.
51001014	Yesù Kristò nɛ nywæsi ɓwiʼ, à zùsì tì kuʼ ɓwiʼ ɓyɛbbi nyɛʼ.
51001015	Mwum ndɔʼ tà ka M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛnni lɛ̀ zɛʼ, son, Yesù Kristò nɛ ɓwum yɛnnâ nùn, nun nɛ ɗyi fli mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à lìsaʼ ɓwiʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǒn. Yesù Kristò nɛ Mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à cinni ǹtwu, à làn ywum hwæn pæʼ yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɔ̌.
51001016	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ma nun ǹkimmɔʼ mfɔ̀ʼ ywum hwæn ye kɛ ɗɛb lɛ̀ ye kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, ywum ye cinni kwæʼ nywi lɛ̀ ye ɓɛ tà ka yɛn. Ywum ye cinni ǹkimmɔʼ kɛ ɗɛb hwæn, kwo fɛʼ mɛ̀ paʼ mɛ̀ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ cinni ǹtwu kɛ nlim ɗɛb hwæn, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ǹkimmɔʼ mfɔ̀ʼ yan hwæn kɛ fyaʼ mwɛn nyon Yesù Kristò. Ywum yɛ nun fɔ̀e hwæn yi, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ tì kuʼ nun yon fyaʼ.
51001017	Kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan kwan kifɛʼ, a ɓe lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò ti kwe. Nun nɛ ta ywum hwæn giti lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yon.
51001018	Nun nɛ mwǔ ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yi wɛ̌ kwæʼ nywi shon, nun nɛʼ ɓɛ kuʼ wɛ̌ mwù. Nun nɛ sɛte ɓɛ, kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan kwan kifɛʼ. Nun nɛ sɛti tì kuʼ ywi yìmni. Sɛ lisaʼ lɛ à ni ǹdwun, à làn ywum hwæn, nun nɛ zwimbyiʼ ywum hwæn,
51001019	ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yili lɛ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ nun nɛʼ tǒn, mwɛn nyon Yesù Kristò ɓɛ kuʼ hwæn pæʼ li.
51001020	À yili ti kuʼ lɛ, kɛ mvæb mwɛn nyon Yesù Kristò nun, à cì ywum ye ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan lɛ̀ ye kɛ ɗɛb nun hwæn, yɛ fyôn ŋwum fɔʼ lɛ̀ nun. Mvæb fɔʼ màzwùm nun yɛ mwɛn nyon swìe kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛm, yon yɛ fɛâ flɔa kɛ nyinnìm shon lɛ̀ ɓwum.
51001021	Ɓyin, kɛ kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî nun, ɓyin ɓe mɛ̀ kyìn, ɓyin ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnzì Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ mɛ mɓàkàʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ ɓyin ɓe ɓàkàʼ, kònndì lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ ɓyin ɓe tì kuʼ cì.
51001022	Son jenɛ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b mlɔ̀keâ lɛʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin kɛ ywi nyɛ̌ mwɛn nyon nɛ fyònne mwum wɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ywie. À ywie li, ɓǎ ɓyin ɓɛ sanmi, ɓǎ nun ɓɛn lɛ̀ ɓyin kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ m̀bɔʼ ɓà ɓyin kɛ nywi, lɛ̀ mwum ndɔʼ læ̀kì ɓyin lɛʼ wɛ̀ʼ cinni nywi.
51001023	Kwo fɛʼ li, sɛ yili lɛ ɓyin kɛn mbyî lɛ̀ ǹkɛ̌ nlim yɛ ɓyin ta kɛ̀ kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, ɓa kì ɓyin nywuli mɛʼ lɛ̀ ywum yɛ ɓɛ shɛ ɓyin kɛ Ntwum Lwɛn nun, ye ɓyin limmâ lɛ ɓyin yɛ cinni. Ǹtwum màzwùm yɛ ɓɛ shɛ̀â lɛ̀ ɓwum hwæn ɓɛ kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun. Mùn Pɔ̂l, she shɛ̂m si lɛ mùn shɛ tì kuʼ Ǹtwum màzwùm lɛ̀ ɓwum.
51001024	Mùn tǎ dàlì jenɛ ntwiʼ sɛ mùn tǎ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni kɛ jin shin nun. M̀bɔ̀kì nɛ Yesù Kristò yɛnne kuʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ mbyî, m̀banmbɔʼ ni nɛ mun tà kuʼ yɛn kɛ ntwiʼ sɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ wɛ̌ kwæʼ nywi Yesù Kristò. Mùn tǎ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni li, ɓǎ she shon kɛn ɓɛ̀n kɛ mmlɔ̀kàʼ.
51001025	Mùn ti ci-she kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɛ mûn she màzwùm fyaʼ ɓǎ mùn kpaʼ ɓyin. She màzwùm si lɛ mùn shɛ ɓwum hwæn ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yon lɛ̀ ǹdùʼ nun.
51001026	Kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî ɓe lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yon kwan kifɛʼ pisean, son jenɛ, à kwàsâ yon lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon.
51001027	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yilâ nun lisàʼ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon lɛ m̀bɔ̀kì swum sɛ nun yili nun ci si, swum twun sɛ lan ywum hwæn sɛ, sɛ yɛ ɓwum kpea yì cìcì hwæn kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. Swum màzwùm si lɛ Yesù Kristò ni kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun. Kɛ ntwiʼ màzwǔm, ɓyin limmì lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywìmɛ cì ɓyin ɗun kɛ ywɔʼ ntwu shon nun.
51001028	Nun Yesù Kristò nɛ ɓwiʼ ta lɛʼ shon shɛ̌, ɓwiʼ ta ɓwum hwæn konnzi, ɓwiʼ lisàʼ lɛʼ shon lɛ̀ kon sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓwiʼ. Ɓwiʼ yili lɛ ɓwum hwæn ɓye kɛ mbyi Yesù Kristò nun, ɓɛ fyonnì ɓwum ɓye kwùm zwum yili.
51001029	Li nɛ ci, mùn tǎ kɛ̀n mbyimbyî, mùn tǎ ɓɔli lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ twun yɛ Yesù Kristò fɛ mûn ɓǎ mùn kpeli mwu she màzwùm.
51002001	Mùn yili lɛ ɓyin limmì m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ mùn tǎ ɓɔli lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yin, lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ɓwum ɓye kɛ Làòdìsê, kònndì lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ɓwum mèan ɓyindɔʼ ɓye yɛn kifɛʼ mun mbyî wɛ̌ ɓyin.
51002002	Mùn tǎ ɓɔli li, ɓǎ zwùm tɛʼ ɓyin, ɓyin yili tì kuʼ ɓwùlu kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓyin ɓɛ swum fɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwùlukwæ̌n. Mùn yili ti kuʼ lɛ, ɓyin ywɔti lɛ̀ ǹdùʼ nun swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwàsi pisean, ɓǎ ɓyin ɓɛ kɛ nlim kimmi, lɛ̀ nun fɛ ɓyin ǹŋgæ̀nni lɛ̀ ntwiʼ swum màzwùm. Swum màzwùm sɛ nun kwàsi pisean si, à si Yesù Kristò.
51002003	Nun Yesù Kristò nɛ ta ɓwiʼ kon fɛ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ywɔti mɛ̀ lɛʼ nyon hwæn pæʼ, kon màzwùm si wɛ̌ ǹjònndì.
51002004	Mùn tà ɓyin shɛ̌ li ntwiʼ mwum ndɔʼ læ̀kì ɓyin mɛʼ dwùsi lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ myimmea.
51002005	Lìmmênì lɛ ɓɛ fɛʼ she mun ɓà kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun si, mùn tǎ ɓàkàʼ kwan hwæn lɛ̀ ɓyin. Mùn tǎ dàlì lɛ̀ she ɓyin ta ywum hwæn cǐ kɛ mbyi nun, lɛ̀ she ɓyin ta ɗyi kimmi kɛ kɛ̌ nlim she ɓyin ta kɛ̀ nywi Yesù Kristò.
51002006	Jenɛ, ɓyin yilâ lɛ Yesù Kristò ɓɛ nyɛli nyin. Kɛ à si li, mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nyin ɓɛ wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun yili.
51002007	Tòênnì kɛ fyaʼ yon kimmi wɛ̌ tà shɛ ŋgæʼ tǎ mɛ̀ nɗì ghimmi kɛ ŋgyɔʼ. Ɓyin kɛn mbyimbyî kɛ mbyi Yesù Kristò nun, ɓyin fɔsì ǹlim yin kɛ̌ kɛ nywi yon wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ lisae ɓyin. Ɓyin konndì tì kuʼ kɛ̀n mbyî lɛ̀ ǹyili osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
51002008	Konnênì, ɓa mwum ndɔʼ pɔkaʼ ɓyin lɛ̀ ǹlìmmì yɛ ɓǎ ǹlìmmì ye ǹkæ̀mŋkæm. Ǹlìmmǐ màzwùm yi ye ɓwum, yɛ ɓɛ tì kuʼ ye mɛ̀ mpùn mɓyibbɔa nɛ fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, yɛ ɓa ǹlìmmì ye Yesù Kristò.
51002009	Ntwiʼ sɛ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǒn, mwɛn nyon Yesù Kristò ni kuʼ li lɛŋkæ̀m.
51002010	Kɛ mɓæti yɛ ɓyin ɓætâ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristǒ, ɓyin ti kuʼ lwinni lɛ̀ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyon. Ywum yɛ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ kɛ ɗɛb hwæn, nun nɛ lan yon hwæn.
51002011	Kɛ ɓyin ti ɓæti lɛ̀ nun, ɓyin ti wɛ̌ ɓwum ɓye ɓɛ ɗunnzâ ǹdùn kɛ swiʼ shon. Ǹɗunnzi ndǔn màzwùm ɓa swum fɔʼ lɛ̀ ye ɓwum ta ɗunnzi kwan hwæn, yɛ fyôn lìsàʼ lɛ Yesù Kristò kwɛbsâ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn mɓyɛbbi nyin nyɛ̌ ɓe mbyî.
51002012	Ǹjimnzi yɛ ɓɛ jimnze ɓyin yɛ lisaʼ lɛ ɓɛ gwumme ɓyin m̀banmban lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Ŋ̀kwan yɛ ɓyin kwean mlaʼ nun yɛ lisaʼ kuʼ lɛ ɓyin yimnâ ywi lɛ̀ nun m̀banmban. A si li ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yìmnze Yesù Kristò kɛ ywi nun, à cinni tî kuʼ ǹkimmɔʼ nyìmnzì yin.
51002013	Kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî, ɓyin ɓe wɛ̌ yì ɗwon kɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓe kǎn ɓwum ɓyon, ɓyin ɓe ɓyɛbbi cǐ. Jenɛ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛâ ɓyin m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyɛ̌ nywæb lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò m̀ban, à zùsì ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin m̀ban ɓyɛbbi nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ɓe cì.
51002014	Ɗèwà mɛ lwuà ɓe wɛ̌ ke sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ̀e ɓwiʼ. Kɛ nywummɔʼ yɛ ɓɛ ywummɔe Yesù Kristò kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛm, à si wɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̀teâ ɗèwǎ ke màzwùm, à ywummɔʼ son kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛm.
51002015	Kɛ ywi nɛ Yesù Kristò ywie nun, à lèân ywum yɛ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ kɛ ɗɛb hwæn lɛ̀ kim, à pæ̀lâ yon ǹkimmɔʼ hwæn, à kwannzi yon mgbon.
51002016	Kɛ à si li, ɓa mwum ndɔʼ wɛ̀sì ɓyin kɛ ywum yɛ ɓyin ta ji nun, ywum yɛ ɓyin ta nwi, lɛ mɛ̀ ŋgwìn ndɔʼ ɓye ɓyin tà ka ji, wɛ̌ ǹgwìn nywiʼ nywæb, lɛ̀ ǹgwìn mɛ̀ yìnnì.
51002017	Ywum màzwùm hwæn pæʼ, à yi wɛ̌ fyìnfyinnì yɛ ɓe ɓwum lìsea lɛ swum lɛŋkæ̀m ndɔʼ yɛ ɓɛ̀n. Swum lɛŋkæ̀m màzwùm si Yesù Kristò.
51002018	Ɓwum ndɔʼ ɓi kwe ɓye ta nywi shelea kɛ ntwɛʼ yɛ ɓɛ ta ɓon nɛʼ twɛli lɛ̀ yì lwæ̀b ɓe, ɓye ta tî mɛ̀ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye ɗɛb twuli. Ɓa ɓyin ci ɓɛ cinni swum wɛ̀ʼ ndɔʼ nywi yin. Ɓɛ ta mwù twuli lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìseâ ɓon ywum. Kànmbɛʼ, ǹlìmmì yan ɓǎ ǹlìmmì ye ŋkæ̀mŋkæm.
51002019	Ɓɛ ɓa tî ɓæti lɛ Yesù Kristò nɛ mwù yan. Ɓwum ɓye ti ɓæti lɛ̀ nun, à tà ɓon swum sɛ ta ɓon shi fɛ, à cì ɓɛ ɓɛ ŋwum fɔʼ. Li, ɓɛ kɛn mbyimbyî kɛ mbyi nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili nun. Yesù Kristò tǎ ɓwum ɓyon ɓæti lɛ̀ nun nɛʼ lɛ̀ ɓon ɓɛ swum fɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ nywi mwum yi wònŋgea lɛ̀ yì wòn, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ntæ̀n.
51002020	-
51002021	Ɓyin limmi lɛ ɓyin ywie m̀ban lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò lɛŋkæ̀m. Li, mɛ̀ mpùn mɓyibbɔa nɛ fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan cinni kan tî ǹkimmɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin. Kɛ à si li, yɛn sɛ ɓyin ta tòn wɛ̌ ɓwum ɓɛ lìmmi kifɛʼ Yesù Kristò? Mɛ̀ lwuà ɓye ta shɛ̀ lɛ: «Ɓa wù sheli shɛ””, «Ɓa wù ji shi””, «Ɓa wù yìnndì shi ton si””, ɓyin ta yon ɗwon lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yɛn?
51002022	Mɛ̀ lwuà màzwùm yi kɛ nywi ywum yɛ ɓɛ ta ji lɛ̀ ye ɓɛ ta cì; hwæn li, à yi ywum yɛ ta mlɔ̀ʼ nùn. Ɓwum ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ lwuà màzwùm ghe lɛ̀ mwù yan.
51002023	À si lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ mɛ̀ lwuà màzwùm gwili lɛ, ɓɛshɛ mwum ɗwon yon à cinni kon, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ ta lɛʼ lɛ mwum lwinnzi ywum mèan kɛ nɗwon Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, à twɛʼ nun nɛʼ sɔ̀ɗin, à kònndì tì nun nɛʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi. Son, mùn kɛ̌n yɛn lɛ mɛ̀ lwuà màzwùm ɓi ɗin, ɓɛ tà ka mwum ndɔʼ kpea ɓǎ nun cinni ǹkimmɔʼ ye ǹyæmnzi ywum ɓyibbɔa yɛ kwæʼ nywi shon ta yili.
51003001	Ɓyin limmi lɛ, ɓyin yimnâ ywi lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò m̀ban, à ni jenɛ ǹtǒn kɛ fyaʼ ji Ce M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Kɛ à si li, kimnzênì nywi lɛ̀ ɓyin cinni ywum ye kɛ nlim kɛ cìcì sɛ nun tòn nun.
51003002	Ɓyin ɗyili mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ kwan hwæn lɛ̀ ywum ye kwe ɗɛb, ɓa ɓyin ɓakàʼ lɛ̀ ye fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun.
51003003	Ntwiʼ sɛ à si wɛ̌ ɓyin ywie nùn, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìmnzâ ɓyin ywi nun, à tǎ ɓyin ǹzison shin she nywæb ɓǒn kɛ fyaʼ Yesù Kristò.
51003004	Kɛ ǹzison shin si fyaʼ yon, kwan sɛ nun yɛ̌ tì kònndi ɓɛ̌n, ɓyin yɛ tì kuʼ ɓɛ lɛ̀ nun kɛ ntwu yon nun.
51003005	Kɛ ntwiʼ màzwùm, kwɛbsênì m̀bɔ̀kì tòn mɓyɛbbi nyin kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun. Ywum yɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓyin shɛ̌ jenɛ, yɛ ɓɛ cì shin wɛ̌ ywum yɛ leân nùn. Ywum màzwùm yi lɛ: ǹlon hwæ̌n, ǹzæ̀mmǐ, mwǔ ɓyɛbbi, kònndì lɛ̀ ǹɗyi yɛ mɛ̀ nlim nyin tǎ ɗyi kɛ mɛ mɓàkàʼ mɓyibbɔa nun. Ǹtimmaʼ yɛ ɓyin ta ywum timmea yi tì kuʼ nlim, ntwiʼ sɛ a ɓyin tæm ywum, lɛ̀ yon yɛ ɓyin yɛ kɛ̀ lɛ̀ m̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyin.
51003006	Ywum màzwùm hwæn pæʼ yɛ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹlim nyɛnnzi zwum lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye tà ka nun mwumnzi.
51003007	Kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî, lɛ̀ ɓyin kwɛbsi kifɛʼ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn mɓyɛbbi nyin, ɓyin ɓe kuʼ ywum màzwùm cǐ li.
51003008	Son jenɛ, ɗonnzênì tì paʼ ywum yɛ mùn ywìmɛ ɓyin tannzi yɛ. Ɓa ɓyin nyeni, shìkì ɓyin kɛ kuʼ mɛ̀ mkpì lɛ̀ ɓwùlu. Ɓa ɓyin ci ɓwùlu mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa, shìkì ɓyin swiʼ kuʼ kɛ ŋwum wɛ̌ mbyiʼ kɛ mɛ myin ɓwùlu nun. Ɓa ɓyin lɛʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ kwɛ̀nnjin,
51003009	shìkì ɓyin shɛ kuʼ ɓwùlu mɛ̀ mɓwɛ̀ʼ kɛ nywi, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin kwɛbsâ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyin, lɛ̀ ywum yɛ ɓyin ɓe cì mbyî nun hwæn,
51003010	m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyɛ̌ nywæb nɛ ɓyin ti jenɛ nlim. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɛ ɓyin m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nlwɛn màzwùm. À tà nun lwuli mɛ̀ ŋgyinŋgyin ɓǎ nun ɓɛ kuʼ wɛ̌ ǹyon, lɛ̀ ɓyin fɔsì nun nɛʼ lìmmi mbyimbyî.
51003011	Kɛ à si li, ǹkyììli ɓan kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, mɛ̀ Yudà ɓa kyi, paʼ ɓwum ɓyindɔʼ ɓɛ tì kuʼ kyi, shìkì ǹkyììli ɓɛ kuʼ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum ɓye ɗuân ǹdùn lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ɗun kan, kwo fɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum ɓye cinni kon, lɛ̀ ɓye njimmi nun, lɛ̀ kɛ nyinnìm mɛ̀ son lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye lɛ̀ mwù yan. Hwæn li, à ɓi m̀ban kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ntwiʼ sɛ Yesù Kristò nɛ cinni ywum hwæn, à ni kɛ mɛ nlim ɓwum ɓyon nun hwæn.
51003012	Ɓyin yɛ tòn, ɓyin ɓun lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̀nnâ ɓyin ɓǎ ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon, à tà ɓyin yili. Kɛ à si li, ɗwonnzênì ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ton yɛ: kwɛ̀nnzênì ǹlim lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, ɓyin ɓɛ lɛ̀ ǹlim lwɛn lɛ̀ ɓon. Twɛlênì ɓyin nɛʼ sisɔʼ, mɛ̀ nlim nyin ɓɛ m̀flɔkea, ɓyin njilì mɛ̀ lɛʼ.
51003013	Ɓyin fyimnzi mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ ɓwùlukwæ̌n ta ɓyin cǐ, a lwikwæ̌n cì wù lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi, swì nun mvub nywi. Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò zùsâ ɓyin ɓyɛbbi nyin, ɓyin kuʼ, a yili lɛ ɓyin ɗonnzi kuʼ ɓwùlu ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓon ta ɓyin cǐ.
51003014	Mwǔ lɛʼ yɛ mùn yili lɛ ɓyin ci, à yi lɛ: yilênì ɓwùlukwæ̌n kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ntwiʼ ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ci li, lɛ̀ ɓyin yɛ tòn m̀banmban lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ.
51003015	Yilênì flɔa nɛ Yesù Kristò tà ɓyin fɛ mɛ nlim nun, ɓǎ à ɗyili ɓyin mɛ̀ nlim kwan hwæn, ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili lɛ ɓyin cinni flɔa màzwùm ɓǎ ɓyin ɓɛ swum fɔʼ. Yilênì tì kuʼ nun osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ kwan hwæn.
51003016	Fɔ̀sênì ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Yesù Kristò ɓænni, ɓyin kɛ yon kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun. Lìseànì ywum lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, ɓyin lɛb tì ɓon ndɛb lɛ̀ kon she M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tà ɓyin fɛ. Sàkeànì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ mɛ nshib nyɛ̌ M̀pùn Nsanmi tà ɓyin ɓɛ̀nnzi mwu, ɓyin sakàʼ tì kuʼ nun kɛ mɛ nshib ndɔʼ nun, ɓyin shib nun lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, ɓyin yili tì kuʼ nun osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ kɛ nlim.
51003017	Ywum yɛ ɓyin ta shɛ̀, lɛ̀ ye ɓyin ta cì, cìênì yon kɛ mbyi Yesù Kristò nun, ɓyin yili tì kuʼ Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò.
51003018	Mɛ̀ yib, wɛn nɛ hwæn ywɔli ywon, ntwiʼ son sɛ ɗyi lwɛn kɛ swiʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò.
51003019	Ti kuʼ ɓyin mɛ̀ ɗwɛb, wɛn nɛ hwæn yili m̀myon, ɓa à pàn ǹlim lɛ̀ nun.
51003020	Ɓyin ɓwɛn, ywɔlênì mɛ̀ ce ɓyin lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mon ɓyin kɛ ywum hwæn nun, ntwiʼ sɛ li nɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò yili.
51003021	Ɓyin mɛ̀ ce ɓwɛn, ɓa ɓyin lwæb ɓwɛn ɓyin ǹlim nyɛnnzi zwum, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ci li, lɛ̀ ɓyin ta ɓon ɓwæʼ kwɛ̀nnzi.
51003022	Ti kuʼ kɛ mbyi mɛ̀ son nun, ɓyin mɛ̀ son, mwumnzênì mɛ̀ nyɛli ɓyin kɛ ywum hwæn nun. Ɓa ɓyin suʼ ɓon mwumnzi kwan sɛ ɓon ɓi ŋgyɔʼ, lɛ̀ ɓon yili ɓyin. Son, cìênì ɓon she lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓi ɓwum ɓɛ ta Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò mwumnzi.
51003023	She shin ɓɛ fɛʼ lɛ, cìênì son lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ she Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò sɛ ɓyin ta cì, a suʼ kan she ɓwum.
51003024	Lìmmênì lɛ nun nɛ yɛ ɓyin ɗɛ̀bbi, ɗɛ̀bbi màzwùm ni swum sɛ nun kɛ̀ kɛ ɗɛb lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓyon. Nyɛli ŋkæ̀mŋkæm nɛ ɓyin ta she shon cǐ ni Yesù Kristò.
51003025	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta ɓyɛbbi cǐ, à yɛ̌ ɓon vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓon ta cì. À si li ntwiʼ sɛ à tǎ mwum hwæn twɛli m̀banmban.
51004001	Mùn kònndì tì kuʼ lɛʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nyɛli mɛ son lɛ, cìênì ywum hwæn kɛ mbyi nun lɛ̀ mɛ̀ son ɓyin. Ɓyin limmì lɛ ɓyin cinni tì kuʼ Nyɛli ndɔʼ kɛ ɗɛb.
51004002	Kelênì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwan hwæn, ɓa ɓyin ɗye kɛ ŋkeli nun, ɓyin yili tì kuʼ nun osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ.
51004003	Ɓyin keli tì kuʼ nun lɛ̀ ntwiʼ yɛʼ, ɓǎ nun wô ɓwiʼ mbyi nlwɛn lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ shɛ ɓwum lɛʼ shon, ɓwiʼ sannzi tì kuʼ ɓon swum sɛ nun kwàseâ ɓwiʼ kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò. Ǹsannzi lɛʼ yɛ mùn tǎ sannzi yi, yon yɛ ci mùn ni nye njè.
51004004	Kelênì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ mùn shɛ lɛʼ shon seansean wɛ̌ tà shɛ sɛ yili lɛ mùn shɛ.
51004005	Cinnênì m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyɛ̌ ǹlwɛn kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum ɓye tà ka Yesù Kristò ɗwon. Ɓa ɓyin kwin lɛ̀ m̀kpaʼ yan.
51004006	Cinnênì ŋwum lwɛn, ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yin ɓɛ myimmea wɛ̌ kwìn, ɓyin limmì tì kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin yɛ fyònnzì kɛ mbyi nun lɛ̀ ɓwum, yì kwan hwæn yɛ ɓɛ ywimɛ ɓyin mɛ̀ lɛʼ cibbea.
51004007	Tìshîʼ nɛ ŋgyinni nyɛʼ kɛ mbyi Yesù Kristò nun tǎ she Yesù Kristò cǐ lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ. Ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun, ɓwiʼ ta she fɔʼ cǐ; she shɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. À yɛ̌ ɓyin mɛ̀ lɛʼ nyɛ̀m shɛ̌.
51004008	Li nɛ ci, mùn fyii ɓyin nun, ɓǎ nun shɛ ɓyin wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwiʼ ton, lɛ̀ nun tɛtì tì kuʼ ɓyin zwùm.
51004009	À yɛ̌ kìn ɓon lɛ̀ Ònèzîm nɛ ŋgyinni nyɛʼ nɛ mwum nyɛ̌ kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun. Nun Ònèzîm ni kuʼ mwum nyɛ̌ tǎ Yesù Kristò ɗwon lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ. Ɓɛ yɛ ɓyin ywum yɛ ta lànnzì fɛ shɛ̌ hwæn pæʼ.
51004010	Àrìstakù nɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi nye njè ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun hwæsi ɓyin. Markù, ŋgyinni Bàrnàbâ hwæsi tì kuʼ ɓyin. Ɓɛshɛ nun ɓìn nywɔʼ ndɔʼ cì shin, ɓyin yê nun lwɛn. Ɓe lɛ̀ mùn shɛ̀â ɓyin lɛʼ nyè yon mbyî nùn.
51004011	Yesù nyɛ̌ jin shon she fɔʼ si lɛ Jùsìtû hwæsi tì kuʼ ɓyin. Ɓon ɓɛ suʼ kuʼ ɓon lê kɛ nyinnìm mɛ Yudà nun, ɓwum ɓɛ ɓwiʼ ta she cǐ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓon, ɓǎ ɓwum hwæn limmì lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni m̀vɛ̀n ndwun. Ɓɛ ta mun zwùm tɛ̀ti ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ.
51004012	Èpàflâ nɛ tì kuʼ mwum nyɛ̌ kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun hwæsi ɓyin. À tà tî kuʼ she Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò cǐ. Kwan hwæn à tǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli kɛ jin shin nun lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ. À tǎ keli ɓǎ ɓyin ɓɛ kwùm zwum yili kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, lɛ̀ ɓyin ɗyi tì kuʼ kimmi, ɓyin ɗwon swum sɛ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹlim lwukea lɛ̀ ǹdùʼ nun.
51004013	Mùn nɛʼ, mùn yɛnnâ lɛ̀ zɛʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun tǎ ɓɔli kɛ she nun kɛ ntwiʼ yin, lɛ̀ kɛ ntwiʼ ɓwum ɓye Làòdìsê, lɛ̀ ɓye Èràpòlisì tì kuʼ.
51004014	Lukasì nɛ dotà nyɛʼ nɛ ɓwiʼ yili ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, ɓon lɛ̀ Demà hwæsi tì kuʼ ɓyin.
51004015	Hwæsênì mùn ɓwum Yesù Kristò ɓye kɛ Làòdìsê hwæn, ɓyin hwæsi tì kuʼ Nìmfâ lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò ye ta swɔlaʼ ɗwon nyon.
51004016	Kwan sɛ yɛ ɓɛ, ɓɛ nzanŋgeâ ɓyin ɗèwà ton sɛ, ɓyin fyiɔ̀ʼ son kɛ mbyî lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò ye kɛ Làòdìsê, ɓǎ ɓɛ nzanŋgaʼ tì kuʼ ɓon son. Ɓye kwe yɛ tì kuʼ ɓyin ɗèwà shɛ ɓon fyaʼ næ̀mnzi ɓǎ ɓɛ nzanŋgaʼ tì kuʼ ɓyin son.
51004017	Shɛ̀ênì Àrshîb lɛ à ɓɔli, à mlɔ̂ʼ she sɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò fɛ nun fyaʼ.
51004018	Mùn Pɔ̂l, mǔn nɛʼ nɛ kɔi mɛ̀ hwæsi yɛ ton yɛ lɛ̀ fyàʼ yɛ̂m. Mùn hwæsi ɓyin. Ɓa ǹlim fye ɓyin lɛ mùn ni nye njè. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgænnì ɓyin.
52001001	Mùn Pɔ̂l nɛ kɔi ɗèwà ton sɛ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ Sìlvɛ̂n lɛ̀ tì Tìmòtê. Ɓwiʼ kɔi son lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ye kɛ Tɛ̀sàlònikà, ɓyin ɓɛ kɛ fyaʼ Ce M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Ce M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgænnì ɓyin, à fɛ ɓyin flɔa.
52001002	Ɓwiʼ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili kwan hwæn kɛ nywi yin nun. Ɓwiʼ tà ka mwù ɓwæti lɛ̀ ǹkeli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ mɛ myin nyin nun.
52001003	Ɓwiʼ cinni m̀ɓùnŋgaʼ kwan hwæn kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ she sɛ ɓyin ta cì kɛ ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Ɓyin ta tî she kɛ̀nnzi ntwiʼ ɓyin ta ɓwùlukwæ̌n yili kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓyin konndì tì mɛ̀ nlim ɓænni ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta mɛʼ kɛ̌ kɛ nywi Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò nun.
52001004	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̀nnâ ɓyin ɓǎ ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon.
52001005	Kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ kien Ǹtwum Lwɛn shɛ̌ kɛ cì shin, ɓwiʼ ɓe kǎn suʼ lɛli lɛ̀ ŋwum. Ɓwiʼ ɓe tì kuʼ ywum cǐ lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Mpùn Nsanmi. Mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nyɛʼ lìsaʼ lɛ lɛʼ màzwùm si lɛŋkæ̀m. Ɓyin limmi m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, à ɓe ɓǎ nun kpaʼ ɓyin.
52001006	Ɓyin ɗunmi mɛ̀ kwǔ kɛ̀n ɓyɛʼ ɗwon ɓe lɛ̀ mɛ̀ kwǔ Nyɛli nyɛʼ. Kwo fɛʼ she ɓyin yɛnnâ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ǹzwɔʼ si, ɓyin yilâ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ǹdàli yɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi tà ɓyin fɛ kɛ mɛ nlim nun.
52001007	Li, ɓyin ti m̀bɔ̀kì ndɔʼ kɛ nyinnìm mɛ̀ ŋkwìn ɓwum Kristò ɓye kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Màsèdwân nun, kònndì lɛ̀ ɓye kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Àkàyî nun.
52001008	Ɓyin ɓɛ cie ɓɛ limmì lɛʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ, sɛ suʼ kan kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Màsèdwân nun lɛ̀ ŋgyɔʼ Àkàyî, son, ɓɛ ywɔâ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yì cìcì hwæn. Ɓwiʼ ɓa tî lɛʼ màzwùm lɛli ɓe,
52001009	ntwiʼ sɛ ɓon nɛʼ, ɓɛ ta ɓwiʼ ǹjè shɛ̌ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin yee ɓwiʼ kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓɛnne kɛ cì shin. Ɓɛ konndì tì ɓwiʼ shɛ̌ wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin ɗonnzâ ǹɗwon yì fɔ̀kì, ɓyin ɗunmi mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗwon, ɓǎ ɓyin ywɔli M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyɛ̌ ǹkæ̀mŋkæm nun kyishon.
52001010	Ɓyin ta tî Mwɛn nyon Yesù ɓònŋgea, nun nɛ yɛ̌ waì kɛ ɗɛb. Nun nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìmnze kɛ ywi nun, à nywæ̀sì ɓwiʼ ɓǎ nyeni nlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b læ̀kì ɓwiʼ ɓænni kwan ndɔʼ.
52002001	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓyin nɛʼ ɓyin limmi seansean lɛ ǹyòn ye ɗinɗin ndɔʼ yɛ ɓwiʼ kìen kǎn kɛ cì shin.
52002002	Ɓyin limmi tì kuʼ lɛ ɓɛ sɛte ɓwiʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi kɛ Fìlîb, ɓɛ simmɔ̀ʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kà ɓɛ̌n kɛ cì shin. Kwo fɛʼ she ɓwum ɓe ɓwiʼ ɓyìnnzi si, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kimnzi ɓwiʼ mɛ̀ nlim kɛ zwum, ɓwiʼ shɛ ɓyin Ǹtwum Lwɛn yon.
52002003	Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓyin shɛ̌ ɓe kǎn ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ. Ɓwiʼ shɛ̀ kan yon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ ndɔʼ kɛ mɛ nlim nyɛʼ nun, shìkì ɓwiʼ yili lɛ ɓwiʼ pɔkaʼ ɓyin.
52002004	Ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ ta shɛ̌, à yi kwan hwæn ye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, ntwiʼ sɛ nun yɛnne lɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi ɓwum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm kɛ mɛʼ yon, li, à fɛ ɓwiʼ she nshɛ̌ Ntwum Lwɛn yi kɛ fyaʼ. Ɓwiʼ tà ka kæb lɛ̀ ɓwum twɛʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum lwukea, son, ɓwiʼ yili lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywɔʼ lwɛn lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, nun nɛ limmi mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyɛʼ.
52002005	Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛʼ ɓe kǎn ye m̀mbɛ̀tì ɓwum, ɓyin limmi seansean li. Ɓwiʼ ɓe kǎn se ndɔʼ kæbbi kɛ nyě yin. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi shìtàkwù shɛʼ.
52002006	Ɓwiʼ ɓe kǎn ǹtwu yɛ ta kwan kɛ ŋwum ɓwum kæbbi, kwo fɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, kwo fɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwulu ndɔʼ nun.
52002007	Lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓwiʼ wole ɓwiʼ twɛʼ ɓwiʼ nɛʼ wɛ̌ ɓwum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm kɛ nyinnìm shin nun ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi mɛ̀ ci-ntwum Kristò. Son, ɓwiʼ ɓe tòn flɔa kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, wɛ̌ m̀lib ndɔʼ nɛ tǎ ɓwɛn ɓyon giti.
52002008	Kɛ ntwiʼ ǹyili yɛ ɓwiʼ yili ɓyin, ɓwiʼ yile lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ lɛ ɓwiʼ shɛ ɓyin Ǹtwum Lwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yi, ɓwiʼ konndi ɓyin ɓwiʼ nɛʼ fɛ kɛ she nun, ntwiʼ ɓe lɛ̀ ɓyin ti ɓwiʼ kɛ nzwon nlim.
52002009	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, ɓùnŋgeànì ɓe wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwiʼ ciâ she kɛ nyinnìm shin nun. Ɓwiʼ ɓe kǎn mwù ɓwæti kɛ she màzwùm nun. Kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓyin Ǹtwum Lwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b shɛ̌, ɓwiʼ ɓe tì kuʼ mɛ̀ she nyɛ̌ ɗin ndɔʼ cǐ kpòn lɛ̀ nywɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ læ̀kì ɓyin hwumnzi lɛ̀ ǹɗì yɛʼ.
52002010	Ɓyin nɛʼ, ɓyin ɓe yɛn lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mɛʼ nyin, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kònndì tì kuʼ yɛn lɛ kwǔ kɛ̀n shɛʼ ɓe lwɛn kɛ swiʼ shin. Kwǔ kɛ̌n màzwùm ɓe tì lwinni, shìkì mwum ndɔʼ cinni swum wɛ̀si kɛ nlim.
52002011	Ɓyin limmi ti lɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓyin ywum cǐ wɛ̌ ce mwɛn ndɔʼ nɛ ta cì lɛ̀ ɓwɛn ɓyon.
52002012	Ɓwiʼ lɛbbi ɓyin ndɛb, ɓwiʼ kimnzi ɓyin mɛ̀ nlim kɛ zwum, ɓwiʼ swulea ɓyin kwan hwæn lɛ kwǔ kɛ̀n shin ɓɛ lwɛn wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili. Nun nɛ ta ɓyin lon ɓǎ ɓyin ɗun kɛ ywɔʼ shon nun, ɓyin ton tì kuʼ kwe kɛ ntwu yon nun.
52002013	Ɓwiʼ yɛ tì swum fɔʼ ndɔʼ kònndi, she ɓwiʼ ta tî M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili nun kwan hwæn, à si lɛ kwan sɛ ɓyin ywɔe lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ mɛ ŋwum nyɛʼ, ɓyin kɛ̀e kǎn son kɛ mɛ nlim nun wɛ̌ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ɗin ye ɓwum ɓe shɛ̌, son, ɓyin twɛle yon lɛ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ. Lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m, ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ. Yon yɛ ta mɛ̀ nlim nyin kwɛbsi, ɓyin ɓɛ ta ŋwum Yesù Kristò ywo.
52002014	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, swum sɛ leân ɓyin nywi si, son sɛ leân tì kuʼ mbyî kɛ nywi ɓwum Yesù Kristò ɓye kɛ mɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgyɔʼ Jùdê nun. Ɓɛ yɛnnzâ ɓyin vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kɛ nsòn yin m̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ mɛ̀ Yudà yɛnnze kuʼ ɓwum Yesù vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Jùdê.
52002015	Mɛ̀ Yudǎ màzwǔm, ɓon ɓɛ wue mɛ̀ ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓɛ wu tì Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù. Ɓon kuʼ, ɓɛ zæbsi ɓwiʼ, ɓɛ ɓyɛbsi M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹlim kɛ zwum, ɓɛ ta ɓwum hwæn ɓyìnnzi.
52002016	Ɓɛ ta kæb lɛ ɓɛ twɔʼ ɓwiʼ mbyi nshɛ̌ lɛʼ-Nswæ̀b lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà, ɓon ɓi læ̀kì swæʼ. Kɛ ncǐ yi li, ɓɛ lwinnzâ ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓɛ ɗunme cì ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê. Jenɛ, nyeni nlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓɛnnâ ɓon nywi.
52002017	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, ǹlim ta ɓwiʼ kwɛ̀nni lɛ̀ ɓyin kɛ kwan kwæʼ sɛ ɓɛ kyili ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin. Kwæʼ nywi shɛʼ sɛ sukuʼ ɓwu kɛ mɛʼ yin, son, mɛ̀ nlim nyɛʼ ni ɓyin kɛ nywi. Li, ɓwiʼ kpæmmâ mɛʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kiìn ɓyin yɛnni,
52002018	ntwiʼ ǹlim ta ɓwiʼ suʼ ɗyi lɛ̀ ǹyɛn yin. Mùn Pɔ̂l, mùn sùkeà ŋkǐn nyɛn yin kæ̀mmì mèan, son, Satæ̀n ɓe mùn mbyi kænni.
52002019	Wɛn nɛ ta ɓwiʼ ǹdàli fɛ? Wɛn nɛ ci ɓwiʼ tɛʼ zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b? Ɓyin ɓɛ ɓan? Ɓyin ɓi swum sɛ lisaʼ lɛ she shɛʼ kwannzâ mwù. Son sɛ ci ɓwiʼ yɛ bæn pyǐ kɛ swiʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù kwan sɛ nun ywìmɛ fyòn.
52002020	À si li lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓyin ɓɛ ci ɓwiʼ shelaʼ nywi, ɓwiʼ konndì tì ǹdàli ywo.
52003001	Kɛ ɓwiʼ wòle kǎn tî ɓwiʼ ɓæn ǹlim kɛ mɓònŋgǎʼ ntwum yin nun, ɓwiʼ yɛn lɛ ǹdikàʼ ɓwiʼ ton ɓwiʼ ɓe fɛ Àtɛ̂nɛ̀ ɓwiʼ nɛʼ, ɓwiʼ nɛʼ,
52003002	ɓwiʼ fyiì ɓyin Tìmòtê, ŋgyinni nyɛʼ nɛ tǎ she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b cǐ, nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ta Ǹtwum Lwɛn Kristò shɛ̌ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓon m̀ban. Ɓwiʼ fyi nun ɓǎ nun kimnzi ɓyin kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, à cì lɛ ɓyin ɗyi kimmi,
52003003	mwum ndɔʼ læ̀kì nun nɛʼ ɓwuli kɛ ntwiʼ yi vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛ ɓɛ ta ɓyin yɛnnzi nun. Ɓyin nɛʼ, ɓyin limmi lwɛn lɛ yì vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ màzwùm, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yæn ɓwiʼ ɓǎ ɓwiʼ yɛn yon.
52003004	Kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe mbyî kɛ cì shin, ɓwiʼ shɛe ɓyin lɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni. Sɛ ciâ kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwiʼ lɛle, ɓyin limmi son seansean.
52003005	Kɛ ntwiʼ yì vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ màzwùm, mǔn wòli kan tî kim mùn ɓæn ǹlim kɛ mɓònŋgàʼ mɛ ntwum yin nun, li nɛ ci mùn fyiì ɓyin Tìmòtê ɓǎ mùn limmì ɓɛshɛ ɓyin kɛ mbyi nun. Kɛ̀ Satæ̀n ɓwɛbbâ ɓyin? She sɛ ɓwiʼ cie kɛ nyinnìm shin nun pyiâ ŋgyɔʼ ɗin?
52003006	Son, Tìmòtê wai jenɛ kɛ cì shin, à ɓɛ̌n, à shɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ǹtwum lwɛn wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin ta Yesù ɗwon lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, ɓyin yili tì kuʼ ɓwùlu kɛ nyinnìm shin nun. À shɛ̀ tì kuʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ ɓyin ta ɓwiʼ ɓùnŋgea kwan hwæn. Mɛ̀ nlim nyin tǎ suʼ ɗyi kɛ nywi yɛʼ m̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ǹyɛʼ tà kuʼ ɗyi kɛ nywi yin lɛ ɓwiʼ yili ɓwiʼ cinnênì tì ɓe m̀banmban.
52003007	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, kɛ nywɔʼ yɛ ɓwiʼ ywɔʼ ŋgwu yin lɛ̀ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin ɗwon Yesù lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, mɛ̀ nlim pyì ɓwiʼ zwum, kwo fɛʼ she ɓwiʼ ta vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ta fyonŋgaʼ si.
52003008	Jenɛ, ǹlim ta ɓwiʼ yèan ɓe zwum kɛ ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɗyi kimmi kɛ fyaʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ nun.
52003009	Kwo fɛʼ ɓwiʼ yili M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ kæ̀mmì nyi lɛ̀ mɛ̀ myin nyin, ntwiʼ ǹdàli yɛ ɓyin ci ɓwiʼ dàli kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à ɓa wòli.
52003010	Ɓwiʼ ta nun keli lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ kpòn lɛ̀ nywɔʼ ɓǎ ɓwiʼ cinnênì tì ɓe m̀banmban, ɓwiʼ konndì tì ɓyin ywum lìsea, swum ndɔʼ læ̀kì ɓyin shi kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
52003011	Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun nɛʼ, ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù, ɓɛ ci ɓwiʼ cinni mbyi nɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ ɓɛ̀n kɛ cì shin.
52003012	Nyɛli nyɛʼ ci tì kuʼ lɛ ǹyili yɛ ɓyin ta ɓwùlu yili kɛ nyinnìm shin nun kɛnnɔ̀ʼ mbyimbyî, ɓyin yili tì kuʼ ɓwum hwæn, m̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwiʼ yili ɓyin.
52003013	Li, à yɛ̌ mɛ̀ nlim nyin kimnzi, ɓyin yɛ ɓɛ sanmi, ɓyin ɓɛ tì lwinni kɛ swiʼ Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwan sɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù ywìmɛ fyònnì ɓe lɛ̀ ɓwum sanmea ɓyon.
52004001	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ mùn yili mùn kɛn mbyî lɛ̀ nun à ni lɛ: Kɛ nɗunmi, ɓe lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ lisea ɓyin m̀bɔ̀kì kwǔ kɛ̀n nɛ ɓyin yɛ kɛ̀n ɓǎ ǹlim lwu M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓyin ti m̀bɔ̀kì kwǔ kɛ̌n màzwùm ɗwon nun. Son jenɛ, ɓwiʼ ta ɓyin ɗɔa, ɓwiʼ konndì tì ɓyin swulea kɛ jin Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù nun lɛ, kɛ̀nnênì mbyî lɛ̀ son, a lan li.
52004002	Ɓyin limmì ndɛb yɛ ɓwiʼ lɛbbe ɓyin mbyî yi, yɛ wai kɛ ŋwum Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò.
52004003	Swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili à si lɛ ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwum sanmea, ɓyin yonnzi ǹyè lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ nzæ̀mmì,
52004004	mwum hwæn limmì m̀ɓæn mmyon wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, ɓɛ ɓɛ tì kuʼ kyìblea kɛ mɛʼ ɓwum.
52004005	Ɓa ɓyin suʼ lwæ̀b lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ mɓyibbɔa wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwum ɓye ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà ta cì ntwiʼ sɛ ɓon lìmmi kan M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
52004006	Kɛ lɛʼ mɛ yib nun, ɓa kì mwum ndɔʼ cì lwikwæ̌n ɓyɛbbi, shìkì à pɔkaʼ kuʼ nun. Ɓwiʼ shɛâ ɓyin son mbyî, ɓwiʼ konndì tì ɓyin mɛ̀ ywiʼ ɗwosi jenɛ lɛ: Nyɛli nyɛʼ ywìmɛ ɓwum ɓye ta ɓyɛbbi màzwùm cǐ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi.
52004007	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b lon kan ɓwiʼ ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ci ǹzæ̀mmì, son, à lon ɓwiʼ ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓwum sanmea.
52004008	Li nɛ ci mwum nɛ tǎ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ njìli, sɛ ɓa lɛ ǹnjìli yon yɛn mwum nɛ tǎ lɛʼ màzwùm lɛli, son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɛ ɓyin M̀pùn Nsanmi nyon nɛ nun tǎ njìlì.
52004009	Ti lɛ̀ ǹyili yɛ ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinni kɛ nyinnìm shan nun, sɛ yili kan lɛ mùn kɔì tì ɓyin swum ndɔʼ kɛ nlim. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin nɛʼ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìseâ ɓyin m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ sɛ yili lɛ ɓyin yili ɓwùlu kɛ nyinnìm shin nun.
52004010	Son, kɛ mbyî ma, li nɛ ɓyin ta ɓwùlu mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓye kɛ Màsèdwân hwæn yili. Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, ɓwiʼ ɗɔa ɓyin lɛ: cìênì tì, a lan li.
52004011	Kpæmmênì mɛʼ ɓǎ flɔa ton kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓa ɓyin ɗun kɛ lɛʼ sɛ yɛn kan ɓyin nun. Cìênì she lɛ̀ ɓyin nɛʼ, wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwiʼ shɛâ ɓyin son mbyî.
52004012	Ɓyin ci li, lɛ̀ ɓyin yɛ ɓɛ kyìbli kɛ mɛʼ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓa ɓwum Kristò. Li, ɓyin ɓa kɛ̌n ŋgun tònnzea kɛ nye mwum ndɔʼ.
