52004013	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, ɓwiʼ yili kan lɛ ɓyin ɓɛ kɛ njimmi nun kɛ lɛʼ sɛ yɛn ɓwum ɓɛ ywiâ nùn, ɓyin læ̀kì tòn lɛ̀ m̀fyonŋgaʼ wɛ̌ ɓwùlu ɓɛ tà ka zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ Yesù.
52004014	Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ Yesù ywie, à kònndì yìmne kɛ ywi nun. M̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ, ɓwum ɓye ywi lɛ̀ ɓɛ tɛlâ zwùm lɛ̀ Yesù, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ kuʼ ɓon yìmnzi kɛ ywi nun ɓǎ ɓɛ ton lɛ̀ Yesù m̀ban.
52004015	Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ ɓyin shɛ̌ jenɛ nɛ, Nyɛli nyɛʼ nɛ lisaʼ ɓwiʼ nun. Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm ni lɛ, nywɔʼ nɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù ywìmɛ fyònnǐ, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ywi kifɛʼ ɓɛ, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓa sɛti làn kɛ swiʼ ɓwum ɓɛ ywiâ nùn.
52004016	Nywɔʼ màzwǔm, ɓwiʼ yɛ ǹkwu mvɛ̀n mɛ̀ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye zwô ywo lɛ̀ yɛ ta pæm lɛ̀ kim, ɓwiʼ yɛ tì kuʼ ywɔʼ she ɓɛ ta ɓæ̌n Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lwon. Li, Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù yɛ̌ kyìlì ǹwaì yɛ kɛ ɗɛb. Ɓwum ɓye ywie lɛ̀ ɓɛ tɛlâ zwùm lɛ̀ Yesù, ɓɛ yɛ̌ sɛti yìmni kɛ ywi nun.
52004017	Kɛ nyě yi, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ kɛ lɛ̀ mɛʼ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ swɔsi ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓon m̀ban, à nànnzì ɓwiʼ kɛ ɓwɔʼ nun lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kà kɛ̌n Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù cinni zwô. Li, ɓwiʼ yɛ ɓɛ kwan hwæn ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù m̀banmban.
52004018	Kɛ à si li, ɓònnzeànì ɓwùlu kɛ nyinnìm shin nun lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ton yɛ.
52005001	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, sɛ yili kan lɛ mùn kɔì tì ɓyin swum ndɔʼ kɛ nywi ŋgyìn yɛ ywum màzwùm yɛ lànnzì nun.
52005002	Ntwiʼ ɓyin nɛʼ, ɓyin limmi seansean lɛ ǹgyìn nɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ yɛ̌ fyòn nun yɛ̌ ɓɛ wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ci-nywiʼ tǎ ɓɛ̀n kpon nun.
52005003	Kwan sɛ ɓwum yɛ lɛʼ lɛ: «Flɔa tà ɓwiʼ ɗwon, swum ndɔʼ ɓa ɓwiʼ hwumnzi””, kɛ kwan màzwùm nun sɛ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛ ɓon ɓɛ̀nni kɛ nywi wɛ̌ ǹɗunmi ŋkwɛ̌n ye. Ɓɛ ɓa mbyi nɛ ɓon yɛ nywæ̀li nun cinni.
52005004	Ti lɛ̀ ɓyin, mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, ɓyin ɓa kɛ njimmi nun. Li, ǹgyìn màzwùm ɓà ɓyin sɛmnzi wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ci-nywiʼ tǎ ɓwum sɛmnzi.
52005005	Ɓyin hwæn, ɓyin ɓi ɓwum ɓye ta kɛ̀n kɛ ŋwanni nun, ɓyin ɓɛ tì ɓwum ɓye ta ywum cǐ nywɔʼ mwum. Ɓwiʼ ɓa ɓwum ɓye ta tòn kɛ njimmi nun.
52005006	Kɛ à si li, ɓa ɓwiʼ suʼ ɗye ywitea wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwùlu ta ɗye. Ǹdikàʼ she ɓwiʼ ton kɛ mɓònŋgàʼ nun, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-mɓæn nlim.
52005007	Ɓwum ɓye ta ɗye ɗye, kpòn nɛ ɓon ta fɔ̀si ɗye lwɛn. Kpòn tà tî pyǐ, kwan nywi ŋkan wolì tì ɓon.
52005008	Son, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓye ta kɛ̀n kɛ ŋwanni nun, ɓwiʼ ɓɛènì mɛ̀ ci-mɓæn nlim, ɓwiʼ ɗwon Yesù, ɓwiʼ yili ɓwùlu. Kɛ ncì yɛ ɓwiʼ ta cì li, a si wɛ̌ ɓwiʼ kannzâ ɓwiʼ nɛʼ kɛ wì nun. Ɓwiʼ ta tì kuʼ mwù lùli kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ Yesù lɛ nun ni yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ swæti.
52005009	Ntwiʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b yæ̀nne kàn ɓwiʼ ɓǎ nun nyɛnndaʼ ɓwiʼ, son, ɓǎ nun swæti ɓwiʼ kɛ nyě Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò.
52005010	Nun nɛ ywie kɛ ntwiʼ mɛ mwù nyɛʼ ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ton lɛ̀ nun m̀ban, kwo fɛʼ ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ ywiâ nùn, kwo fɛʼ she ɓwiʼ ɓi ǹzison.
52005011	Li nɛ ci, ɓònnzeànì ɓwùlu kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓyin kimnzi ɓyin nɛʼ ǹlim wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin ti cì nùn.
52005012	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, ɓwiʼ ta ɓyin swulea lɛ mwumnzênì ɓwum ɓye ta she cǐ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓɛ kɛnnzì ɓyin kɛ mbyi Nyɛli nun, ɓɛ konndì ɓyin ndɛb lɛbbi.
52005013	Yilênì ɓon, ɓyin kyibsì tì ɓon ntwiʼ she sɛ ɓon ta cì. Ɓɛênì ŋwum fɔʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun.
52005014	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, ɓwiʼ ta ɓyin ɗɔa lɛ lɛbbênì mɛ̀ mɓwæʼ ndɛb, ɓyin kimnzi mɛ̀ ci-yi nlim kɛ zwum, ɓyin kpaʼ ɓwùlu ɓye ɗyi swublea. Ɓɛênì mɛ̀ ci-mɓæn nlim kɛ mɛʼ ɓwum hwæn.
52005015	Konnênì, ɓa kì mwum ndɔʼ fyɔ̀sì ɓyɛbbi lɛ̀ lwi ɓyɛbbi, son, kpæmmênì mɛʼ ɓǎ ɓyin ci lwɛn kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓyin ci tì kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum hwæn.
52005016	Ɓɛênì lɛ̀ ǹdàli kwan hwæn.
52005017	Ɓyin keli M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yì kwan hwæn.
52005018	Kwo fɛʼ yǎ swum sɛ ci fɛʼ ɓyin, yilênì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili lɛ ɓyin sukuʼ cì li, ɓyin ɓɛ ton kɛ fyaʼ Yesù Kristò nun.
52005019	Ɓa ɓyin ɗwɔʼ M̀pùn Nsanmi mbyi,
52005020	shìkì ɓyin njilì tì kuʼ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi tà ɓwum kɛ̌ kɛ ŋwum.
52005021	Cæsênì ywum kɛ kon nun, ɓyin ɓæn ye lwukea.
52005022	Ɓyin kɛsi nywi læ̀bbi lɛ̀ mɛ̀ paʼ ɓyɛbbi nɛ hwæn.
52005023	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun nɛʼ nɛ ta ɓwiʼ flɔa fɛ, à fyɔsì ɓyin sanmi ǹgyìnmbɔʼ, à ɓon ɓyin kɛ tǒn mwum shin nun hwæn, ɓǎ kwan sɛ ǹgyìn nɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ywìmɛ fyònnì nun, ɓɛ læ̀kì swum wɛ̀si ndɔʼ cinni kɛ tòn shin nun.
52005024	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ lon ɓyin yɛ̌ ywum màzwùm cǐ li, ntwiʼ sɛ à tǎ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ nun tǎ lɛʼ lwinnzi kwan hwæn wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun lɛʼ.
52005025	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, kelênì tì kuʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ mɛ̀ myin nyɛʼ,
52005026	ɓyin hwæsi mɛ̀ ŋgyinni hwæn lwɛn.
52005027	Kɛ jin Nyɛli nyɛʼ nun, mùn shɛ̀ ɓyin lɛ nzanŋgeànì ɗèwà sɛ kɛ swiʼ mɛ ŋgyinni hwæn.
52005028	Kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ɓɛ lɛ̀ ɓyin.
53001001	Mùn Pɔ̂l nɛ kɔi ɗèwà ton sɛ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ Sìlvɛ̂n lɛ̀ tì Tìmòtê. Ɓwiʼ kɔi son lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye kɛ Tɛ̀sàlònikà, ɓyin ɓɛ kɛ fyaʼ Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò.
53001002	Ce M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì ɓyin, ɓɛ fɛ ɓyin flɔa.
53001003	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, à si ɓwiʼ nywi dòlɛ̀ʼ lɛ ɓwiʼ yili M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yì kwan hwæn kɛ ntwiʼ yin. À si swum lwɛn kɛ ncì yɛ ɓwiʼ ta cì li yi nun ntwiʼ ɓyin ta kɛ̀n mbyî lɛ̀ ǹɗwon Yesù, ɓyin konndì ɓwùlu yili kɛ nyinnìm shin nun ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ.
53001004	Son sɛ ci, ɓwiʼ ta nywi shelea kɛ mɛ nyenswæ̀b nun kɛ ntwiʼ yin. Ɓwiʼ ta nywi shelea li kɛ ntwiʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin ɗyi kimmi kɛ mbyi nun, ɓyin konndì zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ Yesù, kwo fɛʼ she ɓyin ta mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni mèan si.
53001005	Ywum màzwùm hwæn li ta lìsàʼ lɛ kyìtæ̌ʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ ɓɛ kyìtæ̌ʼ she ǹkæ̀mŋkæm. Ntwiʼ m̀fyimnzi yɛ ɓyin ta fyimnzi yi yɛ cì ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwum ɓɛ woli kim ɓɛ ɗun kɛ ywɔʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Ɓyin ta vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni li kɛ ntwiʼ ywɔʼ màzwùm.
53001006	Lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yɛ ɓyɛbbi fyɔ̀si ɓe lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ ta ɓyin ɓyɛbbi cǐ, ntwiʼ sɛ nun tǎ ywum hwæn cǐ kɛ mbyi nun.
53001007	À yɛ̌ tì ɓwiʼ flɔa fɛ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin m̀ban, kwan sɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ywìmɛ kyìlì ǹwaì yɛ kɛ ɗɛb, à ɓɛ̀n lɛ̀ mɛ̀ cikpuʼ kimmɔa ɓyon kɛ nyè.
53001008	Win nyɛli ndɔʼ yɛ nun ɓɛ ke. Li, à yɛ̌ ǹjì wìnni kɛ nywi ɓwum ɓɛ lìmmi kan M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓye tà ka Ǹtwum Lwɛn Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò yili.
53001009	À yɛ̌ ɓon mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ lànnzi lɛ ɓɛ ɓwuâ ǹgyìnmbɔʼ, ɓɛ ɓa tî mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛnni ɓe, shìkì ɓɛ yɛn ǹkimmɔʼ ntwu yon.
53001010	Ywum màzwùm yɛ làn nywɔʼ nɛ Yesù Kristò ywìmɛ ɓɛ̀n lɛ̀ nun cinni ǹtwu kɛ fyaʼ ɓwum ɓyon. Ɓwum Yesù hwæn yɛ nun mɛ̀ kpaʼ nànnzea. Nywɔʼ màzwǔm, ɓyin yɛ kuʼ ɓɛ nlim, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin yilâ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛʼ.
53001011	Son sɛ ci ɓwiʼ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli kwan hwæn kɛ mɛ myin nyin nun, ɓǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyɔsì ɓyin wɛ̌ ɓwum ɓye woli kim ɓɛ cinni ǹzison she nun loen ɓyin nun. Ɓwiʼ ta tî nun swulea lɛ à kpaʼ ɓyin lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yon, à cì ɓyin lwinnzi lwɛn nɛ ɓyin ta ɓàkǎʼ ncì, kònndì lɛ̀ mɛ̀ she nɛ ɓyin tǎ cì ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta Yesù ɗwon.
53001012	Li, ɓɛ yɛ jin Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù twuli kɛ ntwiʼ yin, ɓyin cinni tì kuʼ ǹtwu fyaʼ yon. Ywum màzwùm yɛ lànnzì li ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyɛʼ ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ta kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim ywo lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ.
53002001	Kɛ lɛʼ sɛ yɛn m̀ɓɛ̌n Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù nun, lɛ̀ ǹswɔli yɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ swɔli kɛ mɛ kwù ɓyon nji, mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, ɓwiʼ swulaʼ ɓyin
53002002	lɛ ɓa kì ɓyin hwumnzi ɓyin nɛʼ kɛ paʼ tòn shin nun, shìkì yi kwɛn ɓyin lɛ̀ she ɓyindɔʼ ta shɛ̀ lɛ ǹgyìn mɓɛ̌n Nyɛli nyɛʼ wòlâ. Shindɔʼ ɓɛ shɛâ ɓyin lɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi kwàsâ ɓwiʼ ǹgyìn màzwùm, kɛ̀ shindɔʼ ɓɛ shɛâ ɓyin lɛ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ shɛe son lɛ̀ ŋwum, kɛ̀ shindɔʼ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ kɔe son kɛ ɗèwà nun.
53002003	Kwo fɛʼ kɛ yà mbyi nun, ɓa ɓyin ɗonnzi mwum ndɔʼ pɔkaʼ ɓyin. Ntwiʼ sɛ ǹgyìn màzwùm ɓǎ wòli han kwan sɛ ɓwum mèan yɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓyìnnzi, lɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnì Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ndwun yɛ̌ kwan kɛ pisean, nun nɛ ywìmɛ ɓwu kɛ win twun nun kwan mmlɔ̀kàʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun.
53002004	Mwum màzwùm ɓǎ yili lɛ ɓwum mwumnzi swum ndɔʼ, shìkì ɓɛ mwumnzi kuʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. À yɛ̌ nun nɛʼ twɛli wɛ̌ ci-zwiʼ ywum hwæn pæʼ. À ywìmɛ kɛ̌n ɗun kɛ nyenswæ̀b ndwun, à ɓæn cǐ tòn she zwimbyiʼ, à twɛʼ nun nɛʼ wɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
53002005	Ǹlim fyeâ ɓyin lɛ̀ she mùn shɛ̀e ɓyin ywum màzwùm kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe lɛ̀ ɓyin m̀ban?
53002006	Son, swum ndɔʼ si kwe she ta ywum màzwùm kænni lɛ ɓa yi lannzì jenɛ. Ɓyin nɛʼ, ɓyin limmi swum màzwùm. Son sɛ ci ci-ɓyìnnì Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ndwun ni yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n kɛ kwan sɛ ɓɛ tan nun.
53002007	Ɓwiʼ yɛnnâ lɛ ɓyɛbbi lùâ cìcì hwæn. Ɓwiʼ limmi son li ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ta ɓwiʼ son kwàsi. Son, ywum yɛ mùn sannzi ɓyin yi ɓa pwæ̀ti lànnzì. Sɛ yili lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b sɛti swum sɛ tǎ ci-ɓyìnnì ni mbyi kænni pæ̀li.
53002008	Kɛ nyě yi, ci-ɓyìnnì ni yɛ̌ kwan kɛ pisean. Nun nɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù yɛ̌ wu lɛ̀ m̀pùn lɛʼ yon, à mlɔ̀sì nun kwan sɛ nun yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n kɛ ŋwanni twun shon nun.
53002009	Kwan sɛ ci-ɓyìnnì Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Satæ̀n kɛ fyaʼ, à yɛ̌ mɛ̀ paʼ yì hìlea kyikyi cǐ, kònndì lɛ̀ yì kìkeàn mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ.
53002010	À yɛ̌ fyi nyè mɛ mbyi mèan kɛ ncǐ ɓyɛbbi nun ɓǎ nun pɔkaʼ ɓwum ɓye yɛ ɓwu. Ɓɛ yɛ ɓwu li ntwiʼ sɛ ɓon yili kan lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓɛ yè kan son kɛ mɛ nlim nun, ɓon læ̀kì swæʼ. Ɓɛ yilê son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b swætê ɓon.
53002011	Li nɛ ci M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyi ǹkimmɔʼ mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ ndɔʼ kɛ mɛ nlim nyan nun ɓǎ ɓɛ yili swum she ɓa zuʼ.
53002012	Li, ɓwum ɓye yile kǎn lɛŋkæ̀m, son, ɓɛ ta ɓyɛbbi ndwæli, kyìtæ̌ʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ ɓon ɓænni.
53002013	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, à si ɓwiʼ nywi dòlɛ̀ʼ lɛ ɓwiʼ yili M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yì kwan hwæn kɛ ntwiʼ yin, ɓyin ɓɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ yili. Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̀nne ɓyin kɛ nɗunmi nun lɛ̀ ɓyin swæʼ kɛ nyè yɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi kɛ̀â ɓyin kɛ fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓyin swæʼ kuʼ kɛ nyè yɛ ɓyin kɛ mwù kɛ mbyi lɛŋkæ̀m nun.
53002014	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lon ɓyin lɛ ɓyin cinni ǹswæti màzwùm kwan sɛ ɓyin yeâ Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓyin shɛ̌. À cìe li ɓǎ ɓyin cinni ǹtwu kɛ nywi Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò.
53002015	Li, mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, ɗyiênì kimmi, ɓyin ɓæn ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ lisea ɓyin kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun, ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓyin shɛ̌ zwozwô, kònndì lɛ̀ ye ɓwiʼ kɔe ɓyin kɛ ɗèwà nun.
53002016	-
53002017	Ŋ̀keli yɛʼ yi lɛ: Nun nɛʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ɓon lɛ̀ Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yili ɓwiʼ, ɓɛ kimnzì ɓyin mɛ̀ nlim kɛ zwum, ɓɛ fɛ tì ɓyin ǹkimmɔa yɛ ɓyin yɛ ywum lwukea cǐ kwan hwæn, ɓyin konndì mɛ̀ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ lwukea shɛ̌. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tà ɓwiʼ kimnzi mɛ nlim nun kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon nun, à cì ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun kwan hwæn.
53003001	Kɛ mmlɔ̀kàʼ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ nun, mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, kelênì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ntwiʼ yɛʼ, ɓǎ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ kɛn mbyimbyî lɛ̀ kim, ɓwum mwumnzi yon wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyin cie kuʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun.
53003002	Kelênì tì kuʼ ɓǎ ɓwiʼ nywælì tì kuʼ kɛ fyaʼ ɓwum nyenea, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwum hwæn ɓɛ ɗwon kan Yesù Kristò.
53003003	Son, Nyɛli nyɛʼ ni mwum nɛ tǎ swum sɛ nun lɛli lwinnzi. À yɛ̌ ɓyin cǐ ɓyin ɗyi kimmi, à kànnzì ɓyin lɛ̀ Satæ̌n cì kan ɓyin ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ.
53003004	Nyɛli nyɛʼ cì ɓwiʼ ǹlìmmì kɛ nywi yin lɛ ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ shɛâ ɓyin hwæn, ɓyin ta yon cǐ, ɓyin yɛ tì kònndi kɛ̀n mbyî lɛ̀ ǹcǐ màzwùm.
53003005	Nyɛli nyɛʼ ɗyili ɓyin mɛ̀ nlim ɓǎ ɓyin limmì m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ ɓwum yili, à cì ɓyin ɓæn tì kuʼ ǹlim wɛ̌ tà shɛ Kristò ɓænne.
53003006	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, kɛ jin Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò nun, ɓwiʼ shɛ ɓyin lɛ: Ɓa ɓyin kɛn ɓon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓye mɛ̀ ci-ɓwæʼ, ɓon ɓɛ tà ka swum sɛ ɓwiʼ lisaʼ ɓyin ywo.
53003007	Ɓyin nɛʼ, ɓyin limmi m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin yɛ cì ɓyin ɗwon mɛ̀ kwǔ kɛ̀n ɓyɛʼ. Ntwiʼ kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe kɛ cì shin, ɓwiʼ ɓe kǎn mɛ̀ ci-ɓwæʼ.
53003008	Ɓwiʼ ɓe kǎn yili lɛ mwum ndɔʼ fɛ ɓwiʼ ji ɗinɗin, son, ɓwiʼ ɓe she cǐ, han mɛ̀ ɗùsì kwan ɓwiʼ kɛ swiʼ. Kpòn lɛ̀ nywɔʼ ɓwiʼ ɓe hwum lɛ̀ ǹcǐ she lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ læ̀kì ɓyin hwumnzi lɛ̀ ǹɗì yɛʼ.
53003009	Ɓwiʼ ɓe kǎn cì li ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ cinne kǎn ǹkimmɔʼ nyě swum ndɔʼ kɛ fyaʼ yin ɗin, son, ɓwiʼ ɓe cì li ɓǎ ɓwiʼ lisàʼ ɓyin m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin yɛ ɗwon.
53003010	Kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe kɛ cì shin, ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓyin ndɛb ton yɛ lɛbbi lɛ: Mwum nɛ yili kan nun ci she, ɓa à ji ji fyaʼ yin.
53003011	Ɓwiʼ lɛʼ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yi li, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ywɔʼ lɛ ɓyindɔʼ ɓi kɛ nyinnìm shin nun ɓye ta suʼ yòn kɛ myi ɗin, shìkì ɓɛ cinni mwǔ she yɛ ɓon yɛ cì. Sukuʼ shɛ m̀kpæ̀m ɓa yon, à fyæ̀mmi yon kɛ mbɛʼ.
53003012	Kɛ jin Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò nun, ɓwiʼ shɛ lɛ̀ ɓwum màzwùm lɛ ɓɛ ci she lɛ̀ ǹlim pyǐ, ɓǎ ɓon cinni swum sɛ ɓon yɛ ɓon nɛʼ ɗǐ nun.
53003013	Ti lɛ̀ ɓyin mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ, ɓa ɓyin ɓwæti mwù lɛ̀ ǹcǐ lwɛn.
53003014	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ shì mwù kɛ̌ kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ɓwiʼ ta ɓyin shɛ̌ kɛ ɗèwà sɛ nun, cɛênì nun lwɛn, ɓa ɓyin ɓæti mɛ̀ kwǔ kɛ̀n lɛ̀ nun m̀ban. Li, kwɛ̀nnjin yɛ nun ɓænni.
53003015	Kɛ kwan màzwùm nun, ɓa ɓyin cɛ nun wɛ̌ ci-ɓyìnnì, son, lɛbbênì nun ndɛb wɛ̌ ŋgyinni nyin.
53003016	Nun nɛʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ nɛ tà ɓwiʼ flɔa fɛ, à fɛ ɓyin flɔa kɛ mɛ mbyi hwæn nun kwan hwæn. Nyɛli nyɛʼ ton lɛ̀ ɓyin, ɓyin hwæn.
53003017	Mùn Pɔ̂l, mùn nɛ kɔi ɓyin mɛ̀ hwæsi ɓɛ lɛ̀ fyàʼ yɛ̂m. M̀bɔ̀kì nɛ tǎ lìsàʼ lɛ yì ɗèwà yɛ̂m yɛ nɛ. Li nɛ fyàʼ ŋgɔʼ yɛ̂m ton.
53003018	Kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ɓɛ lɛ̀ ɓyin, ɓyin hwæn.
54001001	Mùn Pɔ̂l, ci-ntwum Yesù Kristò nɛ ta wu ɗèwà ton sɛ kɔi. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ swæti ɓwiʼ, nun ɓon lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò nɛ yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ swum sɛ ɓwiʼ ta ɓònŋgàʼ lwinnzi; ɓon ɓɛ kɛ mûn lɛ mùn ɓɛ ci-she nyan.
54001002	Mùn tà son kɔi lɛ̀ wù Tìmòtê, wù nɛ mwɛn nyɛ̀m nyɛ̌ ǹkæ̀mŋkæm ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ cinni kɛ̌ nlim fɔʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ wù. Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì wù, ɓɛ ywɔʼ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim lɛ̀ wù, ɓɛ fɛ wù flɔa.
54001003	Kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ mùn kɛ̀nmɛ kɛ Màsèdwân, mùn shɛ̀e wù lɛ wù ton kɛ Èfɛ̂zɛ̀, ɓǎ wù yæmnzi mɛ̀ ci-nlìsàʼ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ pwìnpwìn ɓye ta ɓwum pɔkea. Mùn kònndimɛ tì lɔʼ wù swum fɔʼ shɛ̌ jenɛ.
54001004	Shɛ̌ mɛ̀ ci-nlìsàʼ ɓi lɛ ɓa ɓɛ kɛ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ kɛ mɛ pwìn nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ kɛ nywi mɛ mbibea ɓyan lɛ̀ kɛ nywi mɛ̀ tan ɓɛ ɓe mbyî nun hwæn. Wù shɛ̀ ɓon lɛ ɓɛ ɗonnzi ywum màzwùm ntwiʼ sɛ yɛ ta cì ǹkwùm ŋgyi ɓɛ kɛ mɛ nyinnìm ɓwum nun, yɛ tà ka ɓwum kpea lɛ̀ ɓɛ limmì swum sɛ ǹlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ta ɗyi nlim. Swum màzwùm, ɓwiʼ woli ɓwiʼ limmi son ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ ta ǹlim ɗyili nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
54001005	Mwǔ lɛʼ ton sɛ yi lɛ, mwum yili lwikwæ̌n lɛ̀ seansean nyili yɛ ta waʼ kɛ nlim nun, à cinni ǹlìmmǐ ncì ywum lwukea lɛ̀ ǹɗyili nlim ŋkæ̀mŋkæm.
54001006	Kɛ nyònnzǐ nyè yɛ ɓyindɔʼ yonnzâ lɛ̀ mbyi nlwɛn màzwùm, ɓɛ ɓwuâ kɛ mɛ lɛʼ mpwìnpwìn nɛ ɓon ta lɛli nun.
54001007	Ɓɛ ta yili lɛ̀ ɓon lisàʼ mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ ta ɓæn lɛ̀ kim, son, ɓɛ tà ka ywɔti swum sɛ ɓɛ ta lìsàʼ.
54001008	Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓi swum lwɛn, ɓɛshɛ mwum ɓæn ɓon lwɛn.
54001009	Son, ɓwiʼ limmì lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b kɛ̀ kan lwuà lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ɓwum lwukea; à kɛ̀ nun lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ɓwum ɓye ta nun gwànnzi, ɓye ta nun ǹyè yònnzi, ɓɛ ɓyinnɔ̀ʼ lɛʼ shon, ɓwum ɓye tà ka nun mwumnzi, ɓye mɛ̀ nlim nyan ni nyenea, shìkì ɓɛ ɓɛ kuʼ sanmi kɛ swiʼ shon. À konndì tì lwuà kɛ̌ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-ŋwu ɓwum, ɓye ta mɛ̀ ce ɓyan wu, ɓɛ wu mɛ̀ mon ɓyan,
54001010	ɓwum ɓye ta ǹlàʼ ywi, ɓye shɛ ɓwùlu mɛ̀ ɗwɛb wɛ̌ mɛ̀ yib ɓyan, mɛ̀ ci-ŋkyì ɓwum, mɛ̀ ci-nshɛ̀ mɛ mɓwɛ̌ʼ, ɓye ta yì shìtàkwǔ gwætea ɗyi. Ywum ɓyibbɔa ndɔʼ yi kwe yɛ ta ǹlìsàʼ ywum yɛ ɗyi lwɛn gwànnzi, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ̀ tì kuʼ lwuà lɛ̀ yon.
54001011	Ywum yɛ mbyi nun yi kɛ Ntwum Lwɛn nun, ǹtwum yɛ cinni ǹtwu yɛ lan ɓwùlu mɛ̀ ntwum. Ǹtwum Lwɛn màzwùm yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b næ̀mnzi mùn fyaʼ yi, yɛ wai kɛ cǐ shon, nun nɛ cinni ǹtwu.
54001012	Mùn tǎ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili lɛ̀ kim sɛ nun fɛ mun nywi kɛ ncǐ she shon nun. Mùn kònndì tì kuʼ nun osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ nun twɛʼ mun lɛ̀ mwum nyɛ̌ wòli à cì she shon, à shɛâ mùn, à kɛ̀ mùn she shon nun.
54001013	Kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî, mùn ɓe jin shon ɓyɛbsi, mùn zæbsi tì ɓwum ɓyon, mùn kònndì tì nun sìmmɔa si. Kwo fɛʼ li, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinnâ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim lɛ̀ mùn, ntwiʼ sɛ nun lìmmi lɛ mùn ɓe cì li kɛ njimmi nun, ntwiʼ sɛ mǔn ɓe kǎn ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ nun, shìkì mùn lìmmì kuʼ swum sɛ mùn ɓe cì.
54001014	Nyɛli nyɛʼ lìseâ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon kɛ nywi yɛ̂m ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, à cìâ mùn kɛ̀ ǹlim kɛ nywi yon kwan hwæn, à cì tì mùn yili ɓwùlu kɛ mɓæti yɛ ɓwiʼ ti ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
54001015	Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ mùn yɛ̌ lɛʼ nɛ ni ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ ŋkæ̀mŋkæm; à ni ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ yili lɛ mwum hwæn yê nun lwɛn, à kɛ̀ ǹlim lɛ̀ nun. Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm ni lɛ, Yesù Kristò kìân ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan lɛ̀ nun swæti mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi hwæn kɛ ncǐ ɓyɛbbi nun. Mùn nɛ tǎ lɛʼ nɛ, mùn nɛ lan mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi hwæn lɛ̀ ǹcǐ ɓyɛbbi.
54001016	Son sɛ ci kuʼ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywɔâ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim lɛ̀ mùn. À cǐ li, ɓǎ nun lisàʼ ɓwum lɛ nun ni ci-mɓæn nlim; à ɓæn ǹlim lɛ̀ mùn, mùn nɛ lǎn ɓwùlu mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi hwæn. À cìe li, ɓǎ nun lisàʼ m̀bɔ̀kì lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye yɛ ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ nun, ɓɛ cinni ǹzison ɗwùmɗwùm.
54001017	Ǹtwu ɓɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗwùmɗwùm nɛ tà ka ywi, nun nɛ suʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b m̀bɔʼ, mwum tà ka nun yɛnni. Ǹtwu ɓɛ lɛ̀ nun ɗwùmɗwùm kwan hwæn. Àmɛ̀n.
54001018	Mwɛn nyɛ̀m Tìmòtê, mùn tà wu kònndi ndɛb fɔʼ yɛ lɛbbi kɛ ŋwum fɔʼ yɛ mɛ̀ ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛle ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê kɛ jin swû nun. Kyìbli kɛ ndɛb màzwùm nun, ɓǎ wù ɓɔli, wù ɗwi wì, wù kwan ǹkimmi.
54001019	Fɔ̀si ǹlim ywû ɗyili kɛ nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, wù cinni mwǔ mɓàkàʼ mɛ lɛʼ nlwukea. Ɓyindɔʼ ɓyinnɔâ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nlwukea nɛ tà ɓon kǐn mwu, li, ɓɛ ɓwuli kɛ̌ nlim shan nywi Yesù.
54001020	Ɓwum ɓî ndɔʼ Èmènê ɓon lɛ̀ Àlèzândrɛ̀ ɓi kwe nyinnìm ɓwum màzwùm nun. Mùn fɛâ ɓon kɛ fyaʼ Satæ̀n, ɓǎ ɓɛ limmì lɛ ǹgwànnzì jin Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓa lwɛn.
54002001	Swum zwimbyiʼ sɛ mùn yili lɛ mwum sɛti cì, à si lɛ, à keli M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ mɛ myin ɓwum hwæn nun, à swulaʼ nun kɛ mɛ mwù nyan nun, à yili nun osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ ntwiʼ yan.
54002002	À keli lɛ̀ jin mɛ̀ myin mɛ mvɛ̌n klwɔkea, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ myin ɓwum ɓye mbyî hwæn ɓye cinni ǹkimmɔʼ kɛ mɛ ŋgyɔʼ zwɛ̂m, ntwiʼ ɓwiʼ læ̀kì hwumni, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ toènnì flɔa, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ kwan hwæn m̀ban lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nɛ ɓwiʼ ta cì kwan hwæn ɓɛ nyɛ̌ ǹkæ̀mŋkæm.
54002003	Swum sɛ woli sɛ ɓɛ myimmi kɛ swiʼ Ci-nswæti nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b, à si.
54002004	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yili lɛ mwum hwæn swæʼ, à lìmmi lɛŋkæ̀m.
54002005	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b sukuʼ m̀bɔʼ, mwum nɛ ɓæti ti kuʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b suʼ tì kuʼ m̀bɔʼ, à ni Yesù Kristò.
54002006	Nun nɛ fɛ nun nɛʼ lɛ̀ nun swæti ɓwum hwæn. Li nɛ cie, kwan sɛ kwan wole, à lìsàʼ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni yili lɛ mwum hwæn swæʼ.
54002007	Son sɛ mwǔ swum sɛ ci mùn ɓɛ ci-ntwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. À yæ̀nnâ mùn ɓǎ mùn lisàʼ ywum ye kɛ lɛŋkæ̀m nun lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà, lɛ̀ ɓɛ kɛ ǹlim lɛ̀ nun. Lɛʼ sɛ mùn tǎ wù shɛ̀ sɛ, mɛ̀ mɓwɛ̌ʼ yɛ ɓan, lɛŋkæ̀m sɛ.
54002008	Li nɛ mùn yili lɛ kɛ cìcì hwæn, ɓwum hwæn keli M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓɛ yɛ nun keli, ɓɛ keli nun lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ. Ɓa ɓɛ nyenaʼ ǹlim, shìkì ɓɛ klwikaʼ kuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ ɓon lɛ̀ ɓwùlu.
54002009	Ti lɛ̀ mbyi mɛ̀ yib, mùn yili lɛ ɓɛ swi mɛ̀ plè wɛ̌ tà shɛ mwum tǎ plè swǐ kɛ ŋkyìblì zwɛ̂m, ɓa ɓɛ ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-nshelaʼ nywi. Mwù hwæn, ɓa ɓɛ twæʼ yon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mɛʼ ɓwum hwæn swi ɓon nywi, shìkì ɓɛ kɛ ywum nyànŋgaʼ ye lǒn mèan kɛ nywi, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ plè ɓye lǒn mèan.
54002010	Lwu sɛ yili lɛ ɓɛ lwu, à si she ncìkàʼ mɛ lɛʼ nlwukea. Son sɛ lwu mlib nɛ tǎ shɛ̀ lɛ nun tǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b mwumnzi.
54002011	Kwan sɛ mɛ̀ yib ta ywum yusea kɛ nyenswæ̌b, sɛ yili lɛ ɓɛ ton kàkaʼ, ɓɛ ywɔʼ ŋwum mwum nyɛ̌ tà ɓon ywum lìsea.
54002012	Mǔn yili kan lɛ mɛ̀ yib ɗyi kɛ swiʼ mɛ ɗwɛb, ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ ɗwɛb ywum lìsea. Ɓa ɓɛ lwum ǹkimmɔʼ cinni nywi mɛ ɗwɛb, ɓɛ ton kàkaʼ.
54002013	Ntwiʼ kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɔ̀e mwum, ǹɗwɛb nɛ nun sɛte fɔ̀ʼ, ǎ kà fɔ̌ʼ m̀lib ɓe.
54002014	Mbyi ndɔʼ kònndì tì kuʼ ɓɛ lɛ: Adæ̀m nɛ nywun pɔkae kǎn, son, m̀lib nɛ nun pɔkae. Li, m̀lib nɛ fyinnze ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
54002015	Kwo fɛʼ she m̀lib nɛ fyinnze ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b si, mɛ̀ yib yɛ ɓwɛn ye, li, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓon swæti, ɓɛshɛ ɓon ta mwù kɛ̌ kwan hwæn lɛ̀ nun, ɓɛ ɓɛ tì ɓwum ɓye ta ɓwùlu yili, ɓɛ konndì ɓɛ ɓwum sanmea kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓa ɓɛ ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-nshelaʼ nywi.
54003001	Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ ni nun nɛʼ ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ. À ni lɛ: Mwum nɛ yili lɛ nun ɓɛ mwumŋkæ̀m ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, she lwɛn sɛ nun ta kæb.
54003002	A yili kan lɛ mwumŋkæ̀m nɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun ɓɛ lɛ̀ lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ nywi. À ɓɛ mwum nɛ cinni m̀lib m̀bɔʼ, ɓa à kɛ̀ mwù kɛ lɛʼ ŋkan nun, à ɓɛ mwum nɛ tǎ ywum hwæn cǐ kɛ mbyi nun. Mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nyon ɓɛ nyɛ̌ ǹlwukea. À ɓɛ ci-nyè mɛ kyìn kɛ ɗwon nyon, à ɓɛ tì mwum nɛ wòli à lìsàʼ ɓwum ywum.
54003003	Ɓa à ɓɛ son ɓæ̀ʼ, shìkì à ɓɛ kuʼ ci-ŋkæb lɛʼ, son, à ɓɛ m̀flɔa. Ɓa à ɓɛ kuʼ ci-ŋklwìkàʼ mɛ lɛʼ, shìkì à ɓɛ mwum nɛ lòn shɛâ ǹlim.
54003004	Sɛ yili ti kuʼ lɛ à limmì m̀ɓæn ɓwum ɓyon, ɓwɛn ɓyon ɓɛ ywɔli, ɓɛ mwumnzi nun.
54003005	Ntwiʼ mwum shì m̀ɓæn ɓwum ɓyon lìmmi, ǎ wòli kan à ɓæn ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
54003006	Mwum nɛ kɛ nywæb kɛ lɛʼ-Nswæ̀b nun, sɛ yili kan lɛ à ɓɛ mwumŋkæ̀m ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ntwiʼ shindɔʼ, à yɛ̌ ɗunmi nywi shelea. Li, kyìtæ̀ʼ yɛ nun ɓænni wɛ̌ tà shɛ sɛ ɓænne Satæ̀n.
54003007	Sɛ yili ti kuʼ lɛ mwum nyɛ̌ wù yɛ̌ kɛ̀ cinni ǹkyìblì kɛ mɛ mɛʼ ɓwum hwæn. Li, ɓɛ ɓa swum sɛ ɓɛ yɛ nun shɔ̀lea nun cinni, à cinni tì kuʼ ǹkimmɔʼ nɗyi kimmi kɛ mɓwɛb yɛ Satæ̀n yɛ̌ nun ɓwɛbbi nun.
54003008	Ɓwum ɓye ta she cǐ kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, sɛ yili lɛ ɓɛ cinni kuʼ mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nlwukea wɛ̌ nyɛ̌ ɓwumŋkæ̀m ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓa ɓɛ cinni mɛ̀ ŋwum mɓì-mɓì. Ɓa ɓɛ nwi ǹkan ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, shìkì ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓye mɛ̀ ci-ŋkwɛ̀b kɛ mɛ lɛʼ lòn nun.
54003009	Ɓɛ kɛ ǹlim lɛ̀ swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwàsi ɓwiʼ, ɓɛ ɓæn son lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ.
54003010	Sɛ yili lɛ, lɛ̀ ɓyin kà kɛ̌ ci-she kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓyin sɛti fɛʼ nun kɛ̀nnzi kɛ mɛ kìkæ̀n nyon nun. Kwan sɛ ɓyin yɛnnâ lɛ ǎ cinni kan mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n mɓyibbɔa, lɛ̀ ɓyin kà kɛ̌ nun kɛ nyinnǐm ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, à cì she.
54003011	Sɛ yili ti kuʼ lɛ mɛ̀ yib ɓyan cinni m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyɛ̌ ǹlwɛn, ɓa ɓɛ hwæb ɓwùlu, shìkì ɓɛ kɛ kuʼ mwù kɛ lɛʼ ŋkan nun. Ɓɛ ɓɛ kwan hwæn lwinni kɛ mɛ lɛʼ nyan nun.
54003012	Mwum nɛ sukuʼ m̀lib m̀bɔʼ cinni nɛ woli à cì she kɛ nyinnǐm ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. À ɓɛ mwum nɛ tǎ ɓwɛn ɓyon ɓænni lwɛn, lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓyon nun hwæn.
54003013	Ci-she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ tǎ she cǐ kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lwɛn, à yɛ̌ ɓɛ mwum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm kɛ mɛʼ ŋkwìn ɓwum màzwùm nun. À yɛ̌ lɛli mwù zwô kɛ nywi ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ ta ɗwon kɛ mbyi Yesù Kristò nun kɛ mɓæti yɛ ɓwiʼ ti ɓæti lɛ̀ nun.
54003014	Mùn yili lwɛn lɛ mùn kiìn ǹgyìn ton yɛ kɛ cì swû, son, mùn tà wu ɗèwà ton sɛ kɔi,
54003015	mùn nɛ shi fɛʼ pwæ̀ti ɓɛ̌n, ɓǎ wù limmì wɛ̌ tà shɛ sɛ yili lɛ ɗwòn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ton. Ɗwòn màzwùm ni ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyɛ̌ tà ka ywi. Ŋ̀kwìn ɓwum màzwùm yɛ ta lɛŋkæ̀m ɓænni wɛ̌ tà shɛ ǹshimmbyiʼ ta nye ɗɔ̀a.
54003016	Swum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm sɛ ɓe gwùmni sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwàsâ ɓwiʼ kɛ nywi paʼ nɗwon sɛ mwum wòli à ɗwon nun, à si swum twun ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ. Swum màzwùm si kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò. A si lɛ: À fyònne mwum lɛ̀ ǹnywùn kɛ mwu wɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. M̀pùn Nsanmi tà ɓwiʼ lìsea lɛ à ni ǹsanmi, mɛ̀ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye ɗɛb yɛnnâ nun. Ɓwum sannzâ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yon yì cìcì hwæn. Ɓwum mèan ɗin ndɔʼ kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun ɗyilâ ǹlim kɛ nywi yon. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nànnzâ nun kɛ zwô kɛ cìcǐ twun shon.
54004001	M̀pùn Nsanmi shɛ̀ ɓwiʼ seansean lɛ: Kwan sɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan yɛ̌ kwɛmmi lɛ̀ m̀mlɔ̌ʼ, ɓyindɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum yɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗonnzi. Ɓɛ yɛ mɛ̀ mpùn mɓyibbɔa nɛ tà ɓon pɔkea mwumnzi. Ywum yɛ m̀pùn mɓyɛbbi tǎ lìsàʼ, yon yɛ ɓon yɛ ɗwon.
54004002	Mɛ̀ ci-mɛ ŋwum mɓì-mɓì ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ mɓwɛ̀ʼ shɛ̌, ɓon ɓɛ yɛ ɓon mbyi nlwɛn ɓwuli. Mɛ̀ ci-mɓwuli ɓwùlu ɓi tà ka tì ɓàkàʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ ɓon ta cì.
54004003	Paʼ ɓwum màzwùm, ɓon ɓɛ ta ndɛb lɛbbi lɛ ɓa ɓwum shɛ ɗæm. Ɓɛ konndì kuʼ paʼ ywum ji ndɔʼ sæ̀li nun, lɛ yindɔʼ ɓa lwukea lɛ mwum ji yon. Son, ti kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, kwan sɛ nun fɔ̀e ywum màzwǔm, à shɛ̀e lɛ ɓɛ ji yon. Ɓwum ɓye ta ǹlim ɗyili kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, ɓye limmi swum sɛ ɗyi lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓɛshɛ ɓɛ ji yon, ɓe ɓɛ yilâ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̌ʼ, lɛ̀ lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ ɓa kwe nlim.
54004004	À si li ntwiʼ ywum yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɔ̀ʼ hwæn yi lwukea. Swum ndɔʼ ɓa she mwum wòli à ɓyìnnɔ̌ʼ, ɓɛshɛ lɛ̀ wǔ kà ji son, wù tǎ sɛti M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili.
54004005	Swum ji ta lwu ntwiʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓɛshɛ mwum sɛti nun keli, lɛ̀ ǎ kà ji.
54004006	Ywum ton yɛ hwæn, wù yɛ̌ yon lìsea lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Li, wù yɛ̌ ɓɛ ci-she Yesù Kristò nyɛ̌ ǹlwɛn, wù kònndì ɓɛ ǹkimmi kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, kɛ ntwiʼ lɛʼ shon sɛ wù tǎ mwù kɛ̌ lɛ̀ son, lɛ̀ tì kuʼ ntwiʼ ǹlìsǎʼ lwɛn yɛ wù tǎ ɗwonnzi.
54004007	Ɓa wù ɗwonnzi mɛ̀ tan pwìnpwìn yɛ tà ka M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹlim lwukea. M̀bɔ̀kì tòn nywù fyǒn kònndɔ̀ʼ mbyimbyî wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili.
54004008	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ tǎ kwæʼ nywi shon mɛ̀nndi lɛ̀ ǹkimnzaʼ, sɛ woli sɛ kpaʼ nun kwækwæʼ. Son, ɓɛshɛ mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nyon ni wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, sɛ woli sɛ kpaʼ nun, sɛ lan li, ntwiʼ sɛ nun lìmmâ lɛ nun cinnâ ǹzison she nywæb jenɛ, ǹzison she yɛ ɓɛ kwe kwan hwæn shìkì sɛ ywi.
54004009	Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ tòn nɛ ni ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ ŋkæ̀mŋkæm, à si lwɛn lɛ mwum ɓæn nun lɛ̀ ǹlim yon nun hwæn.
54004010	Kɛ ntwiʼ màzwǔm, ɓwiʼ ta ɓɔli, kwo fɛʼ ywi, ɓwiʼ ywi, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ tà ka ywi. Nun nɛ ɗyi Ci-nswæti ɓwum hwæn, làn lwi ni ǹswæti yɛ mwum nɛ tǎ ǹlim ɗyili kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò.
54004011	Shɛ̌ lɛ̀ mwum hwæn lɛ à ci ywum yɛ mùn tannzi yi hwæn.
54004012	Ɓa wù cì mwum ndɔʼ njìlì wù ntwiʼ wù ni m̀bìpàn, fyǒn ɓon m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nlwɛn lìsea kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ wù tǎ lɛʼ nun, kɛ mɛ kìkæ̀n nywù nun, kɛ nyili yɛ wù yili ɓwùlu nun, kònndì kɛ nɗyili nlim yɛ wù tǎ ɗyili nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, lɛ̀ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nsanmi nywù.
54004013	Ɓa wù ɓwæti mwù lɛ̀ ǹnzanŋgaʼ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ swiʼ ɓwum, fannzi ɓon, wù lìsàʼ ɓon lɛʼ-Nswæ̀b, han a kɛn ɓɛ̀n nywɔʼ nɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n.
54004014	Ɓa wù njìlì ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛâ wû yi. À fɛe wù yon kɛ fyaʼ ɓwum ɓye ɓe mɛ̀ ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum yon nun, ɓon ɓɛ lɛle kɛ jin swû nun kwan sɛ ɓwumŋkæ̀m satae wù mɛ̀ fyàʼ mwu.
54004015	Ywum yɛ wù yɛ̌ cì hwæn, à yi. Wu ywìmɛ yon cǐ, wù cì yon lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, ɓǎ mwum hwæn yɛn wɛ̌ tà shɛ wù tǎ kɛ̀nnɔ̀ʼ mbyî kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lwɛn.
54004016	Konni lɛ̀ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nywù lwɛn, kònndì lɛ̀ ywum yɛ wù tǎ lìsàʼ nun, wù ɓɛ kɛ nlim ǹkimmi; ɓɛshɛ wu cì li, lɛ̀ wù yɛ̌ wǔ nɛʼ swæti, wù swæti tì kuʼ ɓwum ɓye yɛ lɛʼ swû ɗwonnzi.
54005001	Ɓa wù nyɛnndi ǹɗwɛbshì, lɛli lɛ̀ nun kɛ ŋkwu pɛn nun, wù twɛʼ nun wɛ̌ ce nywù. Wù cì tì kuʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mbìpàn mɛ ɗwɛb wɛ̌ swum sɛ wù wòli wù cì lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyû ɓye mɛ̀ ɗwɛb.
54005002	Wù twɛʼ mɛ̀ yibshì wɛ̌ ɓon ɓɛ ye wû, wù cì tì kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓye mɛ̀ mbìpàn mɛ yib wɛ̌ ɓon ɓi mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyû ɓye mɛ̀ yib. Ǹlim ywû ɓɛ zwum sanmi lɛ̀ ɓon.
54005003	Mɛ̀ kwɛb mɛ̀ yib ɓye ɓa lɛ̀ ɓwum nun, mwumnzi ɓon.
54005004	Ɓɛshɛ ǹkwɛb mlib ndɔʼ cinni mwɛn, shindɔʼ ǹdwì nɛ yon cinni, mwɛn màzwùm sɛti fɛʼ yon fyàʼ ɗwǐ nywi, wɛ̌ tà shɛ a yili lɛ ɓwɛn ci lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓyan. Sɛ lisaʼ lɛ ɓɛ giti ɓwum ɓyan ɓye ye ɓon, wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ gite kuʼ ɓon lɛ̀ ɓɛ kà klwɔkaʼ. Ywum màzwùm yɛ li yi, yon yɛ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹlim lwukea.
54005005	Ŋ̀kwɛb mlib yɛ fɔsi lɔʼ ghonni kyi, ye cinni kan mwum ndɔʼ nyɛ̌ wòli à giti yon, yon yɛ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, yɛ ta nun keli kwan hwæn, kpòn lɛ̀ nywɔʼ lɛ à kpaʼ yon.
54005006	Son, ti lɛ̀ ǹkwɛb mlib yɛ ta swum sɛ lwukaʼ ǹlim yon cǐ, kwo fɛʼ she à yi lɛ̀ mɛʼ si, yɛ ti wɛ̌ yɛ ywiâ nun.
54005007	Lìsaʼ ɓwum ywum ton yɛ, mwum ndɔʼ læ̀kì ɓon kwɛ̀m nyɛnndi cinni nywi.
54005008	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ shì ɓwum ɓyon nɛʼ giti, a lan lɔʼ ɗyě ɓye ta tòn ɗwon nyon, lɛ̀ à ɓyìnnɔâ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ǹdikàʼ tì fɛʼ mwum nɛ ǹlim yon ɓa nywi Yesù Kristò.
54005009	Wù yɛ̌ suʼ jin ŋkwɛb mlib kɔa kɛ ɗèwǎ mkpaʼ nun lɛ̀ à wòlâ ɗwùm mwum fyuru; li, ɓyin kpaʼ nun. Nyɛ̌ ɓyin yɛ jin shon kɔa li ni, sɛ yili lɛ à ɓɛ m̀lib nyɛ̌ sue kuʼ ǹɗwɛb cinni m̀bɔʼ kɛ wan nyon nun.
54005010	M̀lib màzwùm konndì tì kuʼ ɓɛ m̀lib nyɛ̌ mwum hwæn lìmmi mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nlwukea nyon, à ɓɛ m̀lib nyɛ̌ ɓe ɓwɛn ɓyon ndɛb lɛbbi lwɛn. À ɓɛ tì m̀lib nyɛ̌ yèâ mɛ̀ kyìn lwɛn kɛ ɗwon nyon, à ɓɔsâ ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b mɛ̀ kwù. À kònndì ɓɛ m̀lib nyɛ̌ kpeâ ɓwum ɓye ɓe vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni kɛ tòn shan nun, nyɛ̌ ǹlim yon hwæn ɓe kɛ̀n kɛ ncìkàʼ mɛ lɛʼ nlwukea nun. Paʼ ŋkwɛb màzwǔm, sɛ woli wù kɔʼ jin shon kɛ ɗèwǎ mkpaʼ nun.
54005011	Ti lɛ̀ ǹkwɛb mlib yɛ woli ti yɛ ye ɓwɛn, ɓa wù kɔʼ jin shon kɛ ɗèwǎ mkpaʼ mɛ ŋkwɛb nun. Wu kɔʼ jin shon m̀byìmmi li, ǹshɛ ɗæm yɛ tì nun kònndi ǹlim kwɛ̀nni ɓe, li, à yɛ̌ ǹyè yònnzi lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
54005012	Kwan sɛ ǹshɛ ɗæm yɛ tì nun kònndi ǹlim kwɛ̀nni ɓe lɛ̀ wù kɔâ jin shon kɛ ɗèwà mɛ ŋkwɛb nun, à yɛ̌ kyìtæ̌ʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b pyǐ, ntwiʼ sɛ nun gwànnzâ ǹkàli yɛ nun ɓe lɛ̀ à cìâ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ nun ɓà tî ǹɗwɛb shɛ.
54005013	Kwɛ̀m ndɔʼ ni tì lɛ, shindɔʼ wu kɔʼ jin shon lɛ̀ ǎ kɛ m̀bìpǎn, she shon ɓa ti ɓɛ mbyî, sɛ lan m̀kpèlǐ nyòn mɛ̀ nye mɛ̀ nye. A ɓa suʼ ɗin lɛ ǹyǒn, à yɛ̌ ɗunmi swi kɛ ŋwum wɛ̌ mbyiʼ kɛ mɛ myin ɓwùlu nun, lɛʼ ndɔʼ ɓa nun lèan, à shì son lɛli. Lɛʼ she ɓǎ she mwum lɛʼ son sɛ nun yɛ̌ ɗwô.
54005014	Son sɛ ci mùn lɛʼ lɛ, ǹkwɛb mlib ye kɛ m̀bìpǎn, ǹdikàʼ yɛ shɛ ǹɗwɛb ɓe ɓǎ yɛ ye tì ɓwɛn, yɛ konni lɛ̀ ɗwòn lwɛn, ntwiʼ sɛ nun ɓɛ ɓe li, mɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnzì ɓyɛʼ ɓa ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ mɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ cinni nywi yɛʼ.
54005015	Mùn tǎ son si lɛli ntwiʼ mɛ̀ kwɛb mɛ̀ yib ndɔʼ sɛtâ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwean, ɓɛ ɗwon nyɛ̌ Satæ̀n.
54005016	Ɓɛshɛ m̀lib ndɔʼ nɛ kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun cinni ǹkwɛb mlib ndɔʼ kɛ næm, à si lwɛn lɛ nun nɛ kpaʼ ǹkwɛb màzwùm. Ɓa à fɛ she màzwùm lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Li, ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b woli yɛ giti ǹkwɛb mlib ye yon kyishon, shìkì mwum.
54005017	Mwumnzênì ɓwumŋkæ̀m ɓye ta ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ̀nnzi lwɛn; ɓyin fɔsì ɓon mwumnzi, a lan lɔʼ ɗyě ɓwum ɓye ta nywi kimnzi lɛ̀ ɓon lisàʼ ɓyin lɛʼ-Nswæ̀b.
54005018	Ntwiʼ sɛ lɛʼ-Nswæ̀b lɛli lɛ: «Nje nɛ tà wu she cǐ hwæn, ɓa wù kpæm nun ŋwum kwan sɛ à ni she nun.» Lɛʼ fɔʼ si konndi ti lɛʼ lɛ: «Mwum nɛ tǎ she cǐ, sɛ yili lɛ à cinni ɗɛ̀bbi nyon.»
54005019	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ shɛ̀ lɛ mwumŋkæ̀m ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìâ lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ, ɓwum ɓî, shindɔʼ lê shi lɛʼ màzwùm yili, ɓa wù yili son.
54005020	Ɓwumŋkæ̀m ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye ta ɓyɛbbi cǐ hwæn, lɛsi ɓon kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum nun, ɓǎ yi ɗun ɓwùlu zwum lɛ̀ ǹcìkǎʼ paʼ mɛ lɛʼ màzwùm.
54005021	Mùn swulaʼ wû kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ kɛ swiʼ Yesù Kristò, kònndì lɛ̀ kɛ swiʼ mɛ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye kɛ ɗɛb lɛ, cì swum sɛ mùn shɛ̀ wù si, shìkì wù kɛ̀ ǹkyììli kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum nun; ɓa ɓyindɔʼ ɓɛ wù mɛʼ ɓye cinnâ ǹtwu, ɓyindɔʼ kuʼ ɓye cinni kan ǹtwu.
54005022	Ɓa wù sɛti mwum mɛ̀ fyàʼ sati mwu lɛ̀ nun ci she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b shìkì wù sɛti kuʼ nun ɓwɛbbi mbyî tin. Ɓa wù kɛ̀ fyàʼ ywû kɛ mɛ ɓyɛbbi ɓwùlu nun. Kɛ nywi ywû wǔ nɛʼ nun, ɓa wù cinni kìkæ̌n ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ nywi.
54005023	Wu yɛ̌ tì kuʼ tònkǐ, wù ɓwɛb ɓæ̀ʼ kwæʼ, ɓa wù suʼ mlǎʼ nwi ntwiʼ ŋkwɛ̀nnì zwum ywû.
54005024	Mɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi nyɛ̌ ɓyindɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ni kɛ pisean lwɛn, lɛ̀ ǎ kà kwan kɛ swiʼ kyìtæ̌ʼ, lɛ̀ mwum hwæn yɛnnâ nun. Ti kuʼ lɛ̀ nyɛ̌ ɓyindɔʼ, ɓɛ ta nun ywǐ lìmmi, lɛ̀ kyìtæ̀ʼ sɛ kwannzi nun.
54005025	Ti lɛ̀ mɛ̀ she nlwukea nɛ mwum tǎ cǐ, ǎ tà ka gwùmnì; nun shì fɛʼ lwɛn màzwùm cì kɛ mɛ mɛʼ ɓwum, ǎ tà ka tòn à shì kwàlì kɛ pisean.
54006001	Mwum nɛ son hwæn, à mwumnzi ci-nye nyon, ɓwum læ̀kì jin Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b gwànnzi, shìkì ɓɛ gwannzì kuʼ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ɓwiʼ ta lìsàʼ.
54006002	Ɓɛshɛ mɛ̀ ci-nye ɓyan ɓi ɓwum ɓye ta ǹlim ɗyili nywi Yesù Kristò, ɓa mɛ̀ son njilì kuʼ ɓon, shindɔʼ ntwiʼ ɓon ɓi mɛ̀ ŋgyinni kɛ jin Yesù Kristò nun. Sɛ yili lɛ ɓɛ ci she, sɛ lan she ɓon ɓe cì mbyî, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwum ɓye ɓon ta she cǐ ɓi, à ɓi ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tà ɓon yili. Lìsaʼ ywum ton yi lɛ̀ ɓwum hwæn, wù shɛ̀ ɓon lɛ ɓɛ ci yon.
54006003	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ ɗyi kuʼ lɛ̀ mwù yon, à ɗunmi yindɔʼ lɛ̀ ywum lìsea ye ta kwan kyi, à shɛ̀ lɛ nun ni ɓǎ lɛʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò yili, shìkì nun yili kuʼ swum sɛ ɓwiʼ ta lìsàʼ kɛ nywi mbɔ̀kì tòn nyɛ̌ nlwɛn kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̌b,
54006004	lìmmi lɛ mwum màzwùm ni ci-nshelaʼ nywi. Kwo swum fɔʼ, ǎ lìmmi kan. Swum sɛ nun lìmmi lwɛn à si m̀pyìsàʼ mɛ lɛʼ, à tǎ lɛʼ klwìkea kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ɗinɗin nun. Kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yon nun, ɓwum ɓye ta nun ywɔti ta fyònnì mɛ̀ ci-swùnnǐ, ɓɛ pyisàʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ, ɓɛ ɗunmi ɓon nɛʼ sɛ̀mni, ɓɛ kɛkàʼ mɛ̀ mkpì lɛ̀ ɓwùlu ɓwum.
54006005	Lɛʼ swɛm kan tî kɛ nyinnìm shan nun, ntwiʼ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyan ɓà tî nyɛ̌ ǹlwukea, a konndì tì ɓɛ, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓon ɓwuâ mbyi lɛŋkæ̀m. Ɓɛ ta ɓàkàʼ je lɛ ɓɛshɛ ɓon ɓi ɗwon mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ɓon ɓi yɛ lòn cinni.
54006006	A si lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓɛshɛ mwum ɗwon mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ à yɛ̌ se ndwun cinni kwe, ɓɛshɛ ǎ njìli kan swum sɛ nun cinni.
54006007	Nywɔʼ nɛ ɓwiʼ ɓɛnne ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ̀nne kǎn lɛ̀ swum ndɔʼ fyaʼ, li, ɓwiʼ yɛ tì kuʼ kònndi fyònnì ɓe fyàʼ pwìn, wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwiʼ ɓɛnne kuʼ nywɔʼ nɛ ni.
54006008	Kɛ à si li, ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ cinni ji nɛ ɓwiʼ ta ji, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ plè ɓɛ ɓwiʼ ta swì nywi, a si wòli.
54006009	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta yili lɛ ɓon twɔkàʼ ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, ɓɛ ta pyì kɛ mɛ mɓwɛb nun wɛ̌ ǹɗuʼ yɛ ɓon pyi. Paʼ ɓwum màzwùm yili ywum pwìnpwìn yɛ ta ɓwum gwànnzi. Ŋ̀gwànnzǐ màzwùm ɓa yàn, son, à yi ǹgwànnzì ye ta mwum ɓwuli ǹgyìnmbɔʼ.
54006010	Swùnnǐ lòn ta cì ywum ɓyibbɔa mèan yɛ ɓi kǎn lɛ̀ ǹkwan ɗunmi kwan. Kɛ ntwiʼ swùnnǐ lǒn, ɓyindɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum pælâ kwù kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓɛ ti vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni.
54006011	Ti lɛ̀ wǔ, wù ti mwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓa wù lwùm mwù kɛ̌ kɛ mɛ paʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa ni nun. Kimnzi nywi lɛ̀ wù ɓɛ kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹsanmi. Cinni mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, wù tɛ̀lì zwùm kwan hwæn lɛ̀ nun, wù fɔ̀sì ɓwùlu yili lwɛn, wù fyimni ywum hwæn, wù ɓɛ tì kuʼ m̀flɔa.
54006012	Ɗwǐ twùʼ nyɛ̌ ǹlwɛn kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, wù kwumndi ǹzison ɗwùmɗwǔm sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lon wû lɛ̀ son. Ǹlon màzwùm ɓe kwan sɛ wù kwàse swum sɛ wù tǎ ǹlim kɛ̌ kɛ nywi Yesù kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ wu lɛle kɛ nyinnǐm ŋkwìn ɓwum mèan nun.
54006013	She mùn yɛ̌ wù shɛ̀ sɛ, mùn tà wû shɛ̌ kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ tǎ ǹzison fɛ lɛ̀ ywum hwæn, lɛ̀ kɛ swiʼ Yesù Kristò nɛ ɗyie shìtàkwù kɛ nywi swum sɛ ɗyi lwɛn kɛ swiʼ gwɛmnà, Pônsɛ̀ Pìlatwù. Mùn shɛ̀ wù lɛ,
54006014	ɗwonnzi mɛ̀ lwuà ɓye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b shɛ̀e lɛ wù ɗwonnzi ɓi, wù ɗwonnzi ɓon lɛ̀ ǹdùʼ nun, ɓa wù limnzi ǹdɔʼ. Wu yɛ̌ tòn, ɓa ɗɛ̀m lɛʼ mɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ ɓɛ wù nywi, han a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kwan sɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò yɛ̌ fyònnì.
54006015	À yɛ̌ fyònnì kɛ kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili nun. Nun M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à cinni mɛ̀ ŋkimmɔʼ hwæn; nun nɛ suʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun kyishon, nun nɛ Ci-tǒn lwɛn nyɛ̌ ǹkæ̀mŋkæm, nun nɛ M̀vɛ̀n mɛ̀ mvɛ̀n, à kònndì ɓɛ Nyɛli mɛ̀ nyɛli.
54006016	Nun nɛ nun kyishon mwum nɛ tà ka ywi. À ni mwum nɛ tǎ tòn kwan hwæn kɛ ŋwanni nun. Ŋ̀wanni màzwǔm, mwum ndɔʼ wòli kan à kwɛmmi lɛ̀ son. Mwum ndɔʼ yɛn kifɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, mwum ndɔʼ wòli kan ma kuʼ, à yɛn nun. Sɛ yili lɛ ɓwum twuli nun, ywɔʼ shon ɓɛ li kwan hwæn. Àmɛ̀n.
54006017	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye mɛ̀ ci-lòn kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun, shɛ̀ ɓon lɛ ɓa ɓɛ shelaʼ nywi, shìkì ɓɛ kɛ kuʼ mwù yan hwæn kɛ njônndì nun, ǹjònndì nɛ yɛ̌ ɓɛ kwan kwæʼ lɛ̀ à ɓwuâ. Wù shɛ̀ ɓon lɛ swum sɛ ɓon yɛ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ son, à si lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ta ɓwiʼ ywum hwæn fɛ zæ̀b ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ɓɔʼ kɛ nlim, lɛ̀ ǹlim lwukaʼ ɓwiʼ zwum.
54006018	Shɛ̀ ɓon lɛ ɓɛ cikàʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea, ɓɛ ɓɛ twɔ̀kea kɛ mɛ lɛʼ nlwukea nun. Wù shɛ̀ ɓon lɛ ɓɛ ɓɛ fyàʼ næ̀nndi lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, mɛ̀ nlim nyan ɓɛ zwum ǹlwɛn.
54006019	Ɓɛshɛ ɓon ci li, lɛ̀ ɓɛ fɔseâ ǹjònndì nyɛ̌ ǹkæ̀mŋkæm, nyɛ̌ ɓon kà yèkàʼ kwan ndɔʼ; ǹjònndì màzwùm ni ǹzison ɗwùmɗwùm.
54006020	Mùn lɛʼ lɛ̀ wù Tìmòtê; swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ wû fyaʼ si, giti son lwɛn. Ɓa wù ɗunnaʼ mɛ̀ ŋklwìkàʼ lɛʼ mpwìnpwìn nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b tà ka yili, shìkì wù kɛ̀ kuʼ ŋwum kɛ nlìsàʼ ywum mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ nun yɛ ɓon ta lon lɛ ǹlìmmì ye ɗyi lɛŋkæ̀m.
54006021	Mùn lɛʼ li ntwiʼ ɓyindɔʼ ta fɔ̀kàʼ lɛ ɓon cinni ǹlìmmì màzwùm, son, ɓɛ ɓwuâ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ paʼ mɛ mɓàkàʼ nyan nun. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgænnì ɓyin.
55001001	Mùn Pɔ̂l nɛ ta wu ɗèwà ton sɛ kɔi. Mùn ni ci-ntwum Yesù Kristò ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̀nnâ mùn, à shɛ̀ mun lɛ mùn kɛn ɓwum ywum sannzi kɛ nywi nzison ŋkæ̀mŋkæm she nun cìe ǹkàli lɛ nun yɛ̌ fɛ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ɗyi ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
55001002	Mwɛn nyɛ̀m Tìmòtê, mùn hwæsâ wù. Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì wù, ɓɛ ywɔʼ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim lɛ̀ wù, ɓɛ fɛ tì kuʼ wù flɔa.
55001003	Mùn tǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ywû. Nun nɛ mùn tǎ mwumnzi lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ mɛ̀ mbibea ɓyɛ̂m ɓe kuʼ nun mwumnzi. Mùn tà nun keli kwan mèan hwæn, mùn ɗɔa tì nun lɛ̀ jin swû kpòn lɛ̀ nywɔʼ.
55001004	Mùn tǎ tòn, mùn ɓùn kwan sɛ wù kwee ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ nywɔʼ nɛ mùn wae kɛ̀n, li, ǹlim ta mun suʼ ɗyi lɛ mùn yɛn tì wù ɓe, ɓǎ ǹlim lwukaʼ mùn.
55001005	Mùn ɓùn tì kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ wù tǎ mwù kɛ̌ ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ kɛ mbyi Yesù nun. Ɓě nywù Lwùîzɛ̀ nɛ sɛte mwù kɛ̌ kɛ mbyi màzwùm nun, ɓon lɛ̀ mon nywù Yùnisì. Mùn lìmmi lwɛn lɛ wù tǎ cì m̀banmban wɛ̌ ɓon.
55001006	Son sɛ ci mùn shɛ̀ wu lɛ, ɓa ɓwæʼ kwɛn wù lɛ̀ ǹcǐ she lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛâ wù nywɔʼ nɛ mùn sati wù mɛ̀ fyàʼ nywi.
55001007	Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyie kǎn ɓwiʼ m̀pùn nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-yi, son, à fyi ɓwiʼ m̀pùn nyɛ̌ tà ɓwiʼ kim fɛ, à cì ɓwiʼ yili ɓwùlu, ɓwiʼ konndì tì ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-mɓæn nlim.
55001008	Kɛ à si li, ɓa kì kwɛ̀nnjin ɓæn wù lɛ̀ ǹɗyi shìtàkwù kɛ nywi Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò, shìkì a ɓæn kuʼ wù lɛ̀ mùn nɛ ɗyi ci-nye njè kɛ ntwiʼ yon. Son, yili lɛ wù yɛn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kɛ ntwiʼ Ntwum Lwɛn wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn tà kuʼ yɛn. Kɛ ncǐ yɛ li, wù yɛ̌ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tà wu fɛ.
55001009	Nun nɛ swæti ɓwiʼ, à lon ɓwiʼ lɛ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon. A lon kan ɓwiʼ ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ciâ swum lwɛn ndɔʼ, son, à lon ɓwiʼ ntwiʼ sɛ nun nɛʼ nɛ yili, à kònndì tì ɓwiʼ lwɛn cǐ kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon nun. Lwɛn màzwùm, à cìâ ɓwiʼ nun ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê kɛ nyè Yesù Kristò.
55001010	À kwàsâ ɓwiʼ lwɛn màzwùm jenɛ kɛ mɓɛ̀n yɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ɓɛ̀nni nun. Ǹtwum Lwɛn yon yɛ ta ɓwiʼ ǹlìmmì cǐ lɛ nun, Yesù Kristò, à lèân ywi lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ, à lìsàʼ ɓwiʼ mbyi nzison she tà ka mlɔ̀ʼ.
55001011	Kɛ ntwiʼ Ntwum Lwɛn màzwùm, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ̀ mun lɛ̀ mùn ɓɛ ci-ntwum Yesù, mùn shɛ lɛʼ shon, mùn kònndì tì ɓwum ywum lìsea kɛ mbyi nyon nun.
55001012	Kɛ ncǐ yɛ mùn tǎ cì li, son sɛ ci mùn tǎ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni nun. Son, ɓwæʼ tà ka mun kwɛ̀nni, ntwiʼ sɛ mùn lìmmi mwum nɛ mùn tǎ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun, mùn lìmmi lwɛn lɛ à cinni ǹkimmɔʼ, à ɓòn ywum yɛ nun fɛ mun fyaʼ, a kɛn wòlì kɛ ŋgyìn mmlɔ̀kàʼ nun.
55001013	Cɛ kwǔ kɛ̀n shɛ̂m kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ mùn ɓe wù shɛ̌ nun, wù ɗyi kimmi kɛ mbyi Yesù nun, wù yili tì ɓwùlu lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ wù cinni ntwiʼ sɛ wù ni m̀ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò.
55001014	Wù konni lɛ̀ Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ wu fyaʼ, wù ɓòn yon lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Mpùn Nsanmi nɛ tǎ tòn kɛ mɛ nlim nyɛʼ nun.
55001015	Wù lìmmi wɛ̌ tà shɛ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓye kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Àzî nun nzwonnzâ mùn hwæn. Fìjɛ̂l ɓon lɛ̀ Èrmòjɛ̂n ɓi kɛ læm shan nun.
55001016	Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lisàʼ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon lɛ̀ ɗwòn Ònɛ̀sìfô, ntwiʼ sɛ nun nɛ ɓe kìn kwan ndɔʼ, à flɔsi mùn ǹlim kɛ zwum. A ywɔʼ kan kwɛ̀nnjin lɛ̀ mùn nɛ kɛ nye njè.
55001017	Kwan sɛ nun ɓɛ̀nne fɛ Rɔ̂m, à kæbbe mùn ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ han à kìn mùn cinni.
55001018	Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywɔʼ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim lɛ̀ nun kɛ ŋgyin mmlɔ̀kàʼ nun. Wù lìmmi tì kuʼ m̀kpaʼ yɛ nun kpea mùn kɛ Èfɛ̂zɛ̀ seansean.
55002001	Ti lɛ̀ wù mwɛn nyɛ̀m, yili lɛ Yesù Kristò kimnzi wû lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ nun fɛ wù ntwiʼ sɛ wù ni m̀ɓæti lɛ̀ nun.
55002002	Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ̂m yɛ wù ywɔe, ye mùn ɓe shɛ̀ kɛ swiʼ ɓwum mèan, shɛ̀ tî kuʼ yon lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye wù tǎ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ ɓon, ɓye woli kim ɓɛ lisàʼ tì kuʼ yon lɛ̀ ɓwùlu ndɔʼ.
55002003	Yili lɛ wù yɛn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kɛ ntwiʼ Yesù Kristò, wù fyimnzi son wɛ̌ suzæ̀n nyɛ̌ ǹywɔli.
55002004	Mwum nɛ tǎ she suzæ̀n shon cǐ, à yili nun lwusi ci-zwiʼ nyon ǹlim kɛ zwum, li, ǎ wòli kan kim à ɗonnzi she shon, à ɗun kɛ mɛ lɛʼ ɓwum ɓye ɓa mɛ̀ suzæ̀n nun.
55002005	M̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ, mwum nɛ tǎ mɛ̀li yanni, ɓɛshɛ nun shì mɛ̀ lwuà mɛli màzwùm lwinnzi, ǎ wòli kan à yè ɗàsì.
55002006	Ci-ɗyìm nɛ tǎ hwum kɛ ndɛm nun lɛ̀ ɗyìm, kwan sɛ ji tǎ pàn, sɛ yili lɛ nun nɛ sɛti swum ɗyǐm màzwùm ji.
55002007	Kpasi mwù kɛ lɛʼ sɛ mùn tà wu shɛ̌ sɛ nun, ntwiʼ sɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù yɛ̌ cì wù ywɔti ywum hwæn.
55002008	Ɓa ǹlim fye wù lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, nun nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìmnze kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum ywi, à ɓɛ tì kuʼ kɛ mvu ɓwum mvɛ̀n Dàvîd nun. Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ mùn tǎ ɓwum shɛ̌ yi, yon yɛ.
55002009	Kɛ ntwiʼ Ntwum Lwɛn màzwǔm, mùn tǎ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni nun, ɓɛ kpimmaʼ mun lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nɗuʼ wɛ̌ mùn ni ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ. Son, lɛʼ-Nswæ̀b sɛ ɓɛ kpimmaʼ kan.
55002010	Li nɛ ci mùn tǎ ywum hwæn pæʼ fyimnzi kɛ ntwiʼ ɓwum ɓye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̀nnâ lɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon. Mùn yili lɛ ɓon kuʼ, ɓɛ cinni mbyi nɛ Yesù Kristò yɛ̌ ɓon swæti nun, ɓon ɗun tì kuʼ kɛ ntwu Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun ǹgyìnmbɔʼ.
55002011	Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ tòn nɛ ni ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ ŋkæ̀mŋkæm: Ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ ywi ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun m̀ban, ɓwiʼ yɛ tì kuʼ ǹzison cinni lɛ̀ nun m̀ban.
55002012	Ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ fyimnzi yì vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ta yon yɛnni, ɓwiʼ yɛ kuʼ lwun sea ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun. Ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ ɓyinnɔ̀ʼ nun, à yɛ̌ kuʼ ɓwiʼ ɓyìnnɔa.
55002013	Ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ shi fɛʼ nun ywɔli, nun, à tǎ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yon lwinnzi kwan hwæn, ntwiʼ sɛ nun wòli kan kim à kwɛbsi ŋwum kɛ swum sɛ nun lɛlâ nun.
55002014	Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ton yɛ, wù shɛ̀ yon kwan hwæn lɛ̀ ɓwum, wù kònndì tì ɓon shɛ̌ kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ ɓa ɓyi ɓi klwikàʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ kɛ ntwiʼ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ pwìnpwìn. Ŋ̀klwìkàʼ mɛ lɛʼ tà ka kpaʼ lɛ̀ swum ndɔʼ. A ta fyǒn ɓwum ɓye ta ywɔʼ mbyi ɓwuli.
55002015	Kpæm mɛʼ ɓǎ wù lisàʼ wù nɛʼ kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b wɛ̌ mwum nɛ nun yili, wù ɓɛ tì kuʼ ci-she nɛ tà ka kwɛ̀nnjin ywo lɛ̀ she shon, nyɛ̌ tǎ Ǹtwum lɛŋkæ̀m shɛ̌ wɛ̌ tà shɛ sɛ yili.
55002016	Kɛsi nywi lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta ǹjě ɓyibbɔa shɛ̌, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwum ɓye ta ǹjě màzwùm shɛ̌ yɛ yæ̀kì ɓon nɛʼ ɗunnzɔʼ mbyî kɛ ɓyɛbbi nun.
55002017	Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ta ɓon kwean ŋwum yɛ ɓɛ wɛ̌ fon ndɔʼ sɛ ta gbùʼ kɛ nywi mwum. Èmènê ɓon lɛ̀ Fìlɛ̂t ɓi kɛ læm ɓwum màzwùm nun.
55002018	Ɓɛ kɛsâ kwù lɛ̀ mbyi lɛŋkæ̀m, ɓɛ ta shɛ̀ lɛ mɛ̀ yìmnì ywi leân nùn. Li, ɓyindɔʼ ɗonnzâ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ntwiʼ nlɛli yan.
55002019	Son li, lɛŋkæ̌m Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b si kwe kwan hwæn wɛ̌ mɛ̀ kwù nye ɓɛ ɗyi cìcì fɔʼ kimmi. Kɛ mɛ kwù nye màzwùm nun, ɓɛ kɔʼ lɛ: «Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìmmi ɓwum ɓyon.» Ɓɛ konndì tì kɔʼ lɛ: «Mwum nɛ tǎ shɛ̀ lɛ nun ni mwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à kɛsi nywi lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi.»
55002020	A wù ɗun kɛ nye ci-njônndì, wù yɛ̌ mɛ̀ peàn cinni kyikyi. Ɓye ɓɛ ci lɛ̀ ǹwum lǒn mèan ɓi kwe, ɓye ɓɛ ɓwɛm tì kuʼ lɛ̀ fyòn ɓi tì kuʼ kwe. Kɛ nye m̀bɔʼ màzwùm nun, mɛ̀ peàn ɓye ɓɛ paʼ lɛ̀ ŋgæʼ ɓi tì kònndì kwe. Mɛ̀ peàn lwukea ta kwan nywɔʼ ŋgwìn ndwun ndɔʼ, ɓye fɔʼ, ɓɛ ta ji ji nun mɛ̀ nywɔʼ mèan hwæn.
55002021	Mwum nɛ tǎ nywi kɛsi lɛ̀ ǹcǐ ɓyɛbbi, à yɛ̌ ɓɛ wɛ̌ peàn nyɛ̌ ci-nye tǎ kwannzi nywɔʼ ŋgwìn, nyɛ̌ nun pæ̌ʼ, à kɛ̀ kyi ɓǎ nun kpaʼ nun kɛ mɛ she nlwukea nun.
55002022	Ɓa wù kwɛmmi lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi nɛ mɛ̀ mbìpàn yili. Kimnzi nywi lɛ̀ wù ɓɛ ǹsanmi kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, wù kɛ ǹlim kwan hwæn kɛ nywi yon, wù fɔ̀sì ɓwùlu yili lwɛn, wù tòn kɛ mlaʼ flɔa nun lɛ̀ ɓon. Wù yɛ̌ ywum ton yi cǐ hwæn li, ɓyin lɛ̀ ɓwùlu ɓye ta Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗɔa lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ m̀ban.
55002023	Ɓa wù ɗwì zwiʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ncibbi ɗyimi nɛ ɓwum ɓye ɓa lɛ̀ kon mwu ta cibbi. Ntwiʼ sɛ wù lìmmi lɛ mɛ̀ ncibbi màzwùm tǎ kɛ̌n mlɔ̀ʼ lɛ̀ ǹklwǐ lɛʼ.
55002024	Son, sɛ yili kan lɛ ci-she Nyɛli nyɛʼ klwikàʼ lɛʼ. Sɛ yili lɛ à ɓɛ m̀fyùfyu lɛ̀ ɓwum hwæn, à ɓɛ tì mwum nɛ wòli à lìsàʼ ɓwum ywum, à kònndì ɓɛ ci-mfyimnzi mɛ lɛʼ.
55002025	Kɛ ŋkwu pɛn nun, à lisàʼ lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta lɛʼ shon ɓyìnnɔa, shindɔʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ cì ɓɛ yonnzì mɛ̀ nlim nyan ɓǎ mɛʼ welì ɓon mwu, ɓɛ limmì mbyi lɛŋkæ̀m.
55002026	Ɓɛ yɛ fyòn ɓe ɓon nɛʼ nun, ɓɛ nywælì tì kuʼ gòn sɛ Satæ̀n ɓænne ɓon nlim ɓǎ ɓon ci swum sɛ nun yili.
55003001	Lìmmi lwɛn lɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan yɛ̌ ɓɛ ǹkyìbli kɛ mmlɔ̀kàʼ ŋgyin nun.
55003002	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwum yɛ ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-ŋgɛm, mɛ̀ nlim nyan yɛ suʼ kɛ̀n kɛ lòn nun. Ɓɛ yɛ ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-ntwuli mwu, ɓɛ ci tì ywum mwù zwô. Ɓɛ yɛ jin Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b gwànnzi, ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀ ce ɓyan ywɔli. Ɓɛ ɓa ɓwum osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili kwan sɛ ɓɛ ta ɓon kpea, shìkì ɓɛ yi kuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
55003003	Ɓɛ ɓa ɓwum ɓyan yili, shìkì ɓɛ kwɛnnzì kuʼ ǹlim lɛ̀ ɓwum. Ɓɛ yɛ ɓòɓo kɛ̀nnzi, ɓɛ ɓɛ tì mɛ̀ nlim zwum nyenea, à ɓɛ tì ǹŋæ̀li. Ɓɛ ɓa ǹcǐ lwɛn yili.
55003004	Ɓɛ yɛ ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-ŋkwàsì ɓwulu, ɓɛ konni kan lɛ̀ ywum yɛ ɓon ta cì, ɓɛ ɓɛ tì mɛ̀ ci-nshelaʼ nywi. Ywum ye ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan yɛ ɓon yon, a lan M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
55003005	Kɛ mɛʼ zwɛm, ɓɛ yɛ ɓɛ wɛ̌ ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son, kɛ mɛ nlim nyan nun, ɓɛ yɛ ɓyìnnɔʼ lɛ ǹkimmɔʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ci she kɛ mɛ nlim nyan nun. Kɛsi nywi lɛ̀ ɓǒn paʼ ɓwum màzwùm.
55003006	Ɓyindɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɗuân kɛ mɛ nye ndɔʼ nun lɛ̀ mɛ̀ bɛ̀b nyan, ɓɛ pɔkeâ yì ɗyimi mɛ yib ye ɓe kwe. Mɛ̀ yib màzwùm, ɓyɛbbi ni ɓon nywi ǹlwinni, ɓɛ ta suʼ mwù kɛ̌ lɛ̀ ǹcǐ ywum yɛ ta ɓon ǹlim lwukea.
55003007	Ɓɛ ta yili ɓɛ yusaʼ ywum kwan hwæn, son, ɓɛ tà ka mbyi nlìmmì lɛŋkæ̀m cinni.
55003008	Ti lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-mpɔkaʼ ɓyan, ɓɛ tà ka lɛŋkæ̌m Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, wɛ̌ tà shɛ Jànɛ̂sì ɓon lɛ̀ Jàmblɛ̂sì yile kǎn lɛʼ Mòîzɛ̀. Mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ sukuʼ ɓon mwu. M̀mwumnzi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yan cinni kan m̀kpaʼ.
55003009	Son, ɓɛ ɓa tî kɛ̀nni mbyî, ntwiʼ mgbɔ̀tàʼ yan yɛ kwan kɛ swiʼ ɓwum hwæn, wɛ̌ tà shɛ sɛ lean kɛ nywi Jànɛ̂sì ɓon lɛ̀ Jàmblɛ̂sì.
55003010	Ti lɛ̀ wù, wù ywɔtâ ǹlìsàʼ ywum yɛ̂m seansean lwɛn, wù lìmmì m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ kwǔ kɛ̀n shɛ̂m ton, wù lìmmì tì kuʼ mwǔ she yɛ̂m. Wù lìmmi wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn tǎ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗwon. Wù lìmmi tì kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn tǎ ǹlim ɓænni kɛ mɛ lɛʼ nun, mùn kònndì tì ɓwum yili. Wù lìmmi ti kuʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ mùn tǎ ɗyi kimmi kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
55003011	Wù lìmmi m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓwum yɛnnze mun vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ, lɛ̀ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ mùn ɓe vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni. Wù lìmmi vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ sɛ laen mùn nywi kɛ Àntìyɔ̂shì, lɛ̀ kɛ Ìkɔ̂nɛ̀, kònndì lɛ̀ she mùn yɛnne kɛ Lisitɛ̀. Ywum yɛ laen mùn kɛ nywi yi, Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nywæ̀sâ mùn kɛ nlim.
55003012	À si lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ ɓwum ɓye yili ɓɛ ɗwon mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili ntwiʼ sɛ à ɓi ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, ɓɛ yɛ ɓon vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi.
55003013	Son, ti lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓyibbɔa lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-mpɔkaʼ ɓwum, ɓɛ yɛ yæki ɗuɔ̀n mbyî kɛ ɓyɛbbi nun. Ɓɛ yɛ ɓwùlu pɔkea, ɓɛ pɔkaʼ tì kuʼ ɓon nɛʼ.
55003014	Son, ti lɛ̀ wù, ɗyi kimmi kɛ ywum ye wù yuseâ nun, yon yɛ wù tǎ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ yon, ntwiʼ sɛ wù lìmmi paʼ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓe wù ywum màzwùm lìsea.
55003015	Ǹdìkàʼ mwɔ̂ʼ swû, wù lìmme mɛ̀ ŋgɔʼ nsanmea. Mɛ̀ ŋgɔʼ màzwùm woli ɓɛ fɛ wù ǹlìmmì kɛ mbyi nyɛ̌ wù yɛ̌ ɗwon nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b swæti wù kɛ nyě yɛ wù ɗyilâ ǹlim kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò.
55003016	Ywum yɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun hwæn, M̀pùn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɛ ɓon ǹlìmmǐ ŋkɔʼ màzwùm. Ŋgɔʼ màzwùm ta kpaʼ lɛ̀ ǹlìsàʼ ywum lɛŋkæ̀m. Yɛ wɛsì ɓwiʼ kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ta ɓyɛbbi cǐ. Yɛ ɗyili ɓwiʼ kɛ mbyi nlwɛn nun, yɛ konndì ɓwiʼ m̀bɔ̀kì kwǔ kɛ̀n she lwɛn lìsea.
55003017	Ywum hwæn li, mɛ̀ ŋgɔʼ yɛ ta cì, ɓǎ mwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinni kon, à wòli kim à cì mɛ̀ paʼ mɛ̀ she nlwukea kyikyi.
55004001	Mùn swulaʼ wû kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ kɛ swiʼ Yesù Kristò, nun nɛ yɛ ɓwum ɓye kɛ lɛ̀ mɛʼ, lɛ̀ ɓye ywiâ nun mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ lànnzi, nun nɛ yɛ kuʼ kònndi ɓɛ̀n ɓǎ nun saʼ lwun. Mùn tà wu swulea kɛ swiʼ shan lɛ:
55004002	Kpæm mɛʼ lɛ̀ ǹshɛ̌ lɛʼ-Nswæ̀b, wù ŋæti ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm kwo fɛʼ yǎ kwan. Wù wɛ̀sì ɓwum ɓye ta ɓyɛbbi cǐ, wù lɛb ɓon ndɛb, wù kimnzi ɓon zwum, wù ɓɛ ci-mɓæn nlim kwan sɛ wù tǎ ɓwum ywum lìsea.
55004003	Ntwiʼ sɛ kwan ndɔʼ yɛ ɓɛ̀n, she ɓwum ɓa tî ǹlìsàʼ ywum ye ɗyi lɛŋkæ̀m ywɔti, son, ɓɛ yɛ fyǒn mɛ̀ nlìsàʼ mɛ ci-mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ kæbbi cìcì hwæn. Ǹlim yɛ ɓon suʼ ɗyi kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ myimmea ye ɓɛ yɛ ɓon shɛ̌ nun.
55004004	Ɓɛ ɓa tî mwù kɛ̌ kɛ lɛŋkæ̀m nun, son, ɓɛ yɛ suʼ mɛ̀ njè nyɛ̌ ɗinɗin ndɔʼ yili.
55004005	Son, ti lɛ̀ wù, ɓɛ ci-mɓæn nlim kɛ ywum hwæn nun, wù fyimnzi yì vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ, wù kpæm mɛʼ lɛ̀ ǹshɛ̌ Ntwum Lwɛn, wù lwinnzi mwǔ she ywû lwɛn.
55004006	Ti lɛ̀ mǔn, kwan ywi shɛ̂m ti kwukwâʼ. Mùn ti jenɛ wɛ̌ sàtìkæ̀ʼ she ɓɛ fɔsâ ɓǎ ɓɛ fɛ.
55004007	Mùn cìâ she wɛ̌ mwum nɛ tǎ twùʼ ɗwǐ kɛ nlìmmì nun, mùn mlɔ̀â mɛ̀li ɓyɛ̂m, mùn ɗyi tì kimmi kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
55004008	Ɓɛ lwæsâ mùn ɗàsì nyɛ̀m jenɛ kɛ ɗɛb, ɗàsì nyɛ̌ ɓɛ ta fɛ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta ywum cǐ kɛ mbyi nun. Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni ci-nlin mɛ kæ̀ʼ kɛ mbyi nun, nun nɛ yɛ mùn ɗàsì màzwùm fɛ kɛ ŋgyin mmlɔ̀kàʼ nun. À ɓǎ suʼ nun fɛ lɛ̀ mùn, mùn kyishɛ̂m, à yɛ̌ tì kuʼ nun fɛ lɛ̀ ɓwum hwæn ɓye ta ǹgyìn nɛ nun yɛ̌ fyònnì ɓònŋgea lɛ̀ ǹdàli.
55004009	Kpæmmì mɛʼ, wù kìn mùn cinni m̀byìmmi.
55004010	Demà nzwonnzâ mùn ntwiʼ sɛ ywum ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan ta nun yon. Li, à kɛ̀nnâ kɛ Tɛ̀sàlònikà. Krɛ̀sân, làn nyon, kɛ̀nnâ kɛ Gàlàsî, Tîtɛ̀ kuʼ kɛ̀n tì kuʼ kɛ Dàlmàsî.
55004011	Lukasì nɛ ɓwiʼ sukuʼ fɛ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun. Kwan sɛ wù ywìmɛ kǐn, twɛlì Markù fyaʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ à tǎ mûn kpea lɛ̀ she.
55004012	Mùn fyiâ Tìshîʼ kɛ Èfɛ̂zɛ̀.
55004013	Kwan sɛ wù yɛ̌ kìn, wù fyi kɛ Tròâsɛ̀, ɗwon Kàlìpusì, wù shî mùn plè mbɛb nyɛ̀m nɛ mùn ɗonnze kɛ fyaʼ yon. Wù shî tì kuʼ mùn yì ɗèwà, a lan lɔʼ ɗyě yɛ ɓɛ cie lɛ̀ kwæʼ mɛ nyæ̀m yi.
55004014	Kyìlea-ŋgwùb nɛ ɓɛ ta lon lɛ Àlèzândrɛ̀ cìâ mùn ɓyɛbbi ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, son, Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ nun ɗɛ̀bbi she nyon fɛɔʼ mbyî.
55004015	Wù kuʼ, konni lɛ̀ nun, ntwiʼ sɛ nun nyenâ ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ɓwiʼ ta shɛ̀ hwæn.
55004016	Kæ̀mmì zwimbyiʼ sɛ mùn sɛte ɗyi kɛ swiʼ mɛ kæ̀ʼ, kwo fɛʼ mwum m̀bɔʼ ndɔʼ kìen kǎn mun ǹgìm ɗyi. Ɓon hwæn, ɓɛ nzwonnze mùn. Ɓa kì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyeni lɛ̀ ɓon.
55004017	Son, Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun nɛʼ kìen mùn kpea, à kimnzi mùn ɓǎ mùn sannzi Ǹtwum Lwɛn seansean. Li, ɓwum ɓɛ ɓe kwe ɓye ɓa mɛ̀ Yudà ywɔe yon. Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nywæ̀sâ mùn kɛ ŋwum gbɛ̂m.
55004018	Mùn lìmmi tì kuʼ lwɛn lɛ à yɛ̌ mùn nywæ̀si kɛ ɓyɛbbi nyɛ̌ ɗin ndɔʼ nun, li, à yɛ̌ mùn swæti ɓǎ mùn ɗun kɛ ɗɛb kɛ ywɔʼ shon nun. Ɓwiʼ fɛènì nun ǹtwu kwan hwæn. Àmɛ̀n.
55004019	Hwæsi mùn Plìsìkâ ɓon lɛ̀ Àkyìlâ. Hwæsi tì kuʼ mùn ɓwum Ònɛ̀sìfô.
55004020	Èlàsità lwæ̀bbe ɓe kɛ Kòrɛ̂n. Ti lɛ̀ Tròfîm, mùn ɗonnzi nun ǹgwɛ̀nŋgwɛ̀n kɛ Mìlê.
55004021	Ɓɔli lɔʼ, wù kìn ɓɛ̀n fɛ lɛ̀ kwan mbɛb ɗunmi kifɛʼ. Mɛ̀ Èbùlû, Pùdɛ̂n, Lìnusì, lɛ̀ Klòdià ta wu hwæsi, kònndì lɛ̀ ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye fɔʼ.
55004022	Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù ɓon wù kwan hwæn. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgænnì ɓyin, ɓyin hwæn.
56001001	Mùn Pɔ̂l nɛ ta ɗèwà ton sɛ kɔi. Mùn ni ci-she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, mùn kònndì ɓɛ ci-ntwum Yesù Kristò. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyi mùn lɛ mùn kpaʼ ɓwum ɓye nun yæ̌n, mùn kpaʼ ɓon lɛ̀ ɓɛ ɗyili ǹlim nywi yon, mùn ci ɓɛ limmì ywum ye ɗyi lɛŋkæ̀m, ywum yɛ ta ɓwum m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nɛ nun yili lìsea.
56001002	Li, ɓǎ ɓon limmì lwɛn lɛ ɓon yɛ ǹzison ɗwùmɗwùm cinni. Ɓe lɛ̀ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan ɗunmi kifɛʼ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ɓwiʼ ǹkàli lɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ ǹzison cinni. Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ nun, ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yon tà ka pyì ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
56001003	Kwan kin wòlì, à kwàsâ ǹkàli yi kɛ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yon nun. À kwàsâ yon kɛ ntwum yɛ nun fyi mun fyaʼ lɛ mùn ni shɛ yi lɛ̀ ɓwum wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, Ci-nswæti nyɛʼ, nun yili.
56001004	Mùn tà wu ɗèwà ton sɛ kɔi, wù Tîtɛ̀ nɛ mwɛn nyɛ̀m nyɛ̌ ǹkæ̀mŋkæm ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ cinni ǹɗyili nlim fɔʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ wù. Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Ci-nswæti nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò, ɓɛ ŋgænnì wù, ɓɛ fɛ wù flɔa.
56001005	Ǹɗonnzi yɛ mùn ɗonnzi wu kɛ Krɛ̂ʼ yɛ, à yi ɓǎ wu fɔsì ywum yɛ ɓe lɛ̀ yɛ wòli kifɛʼ, ɓǎ wu konndì ɓwum yæ̀nni lɛ ɓwumŋkæ̀m ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò kɛ mɛ nsòn mɛ nsòn wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn lìsae wù.
56001006	Mwum nɛ ɓɛ ta yæ̀n lɛ̀ mwumŋkæ̀m ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò, a yili kan lɛ à ɓɛ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nywi, à ɓɛ mwum nɛ cinni m̀lib m̀bɔʼ. Sɛ yili lɛ ɓwɛn ɓyon ɗwon Yesù Kristò, paʼ tòn shan ɓɛ tì kuʼ lwɛn lɛ̀ ɓwum hwæn pæʼ yɛn lɛ ɓɛ tà ka mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa cǐ, shìkì ɓɛ fyinnzi kuʼ ŋwum bùba nyan.
56001007	Mwumŋkæ̀m ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò ni mwum nɛ tǎ she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b cǐ. Li nɛ sɛ yili lɛ ɓa à cinni lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ kɛ kwæʼ nywi shon nun; ɓa à ɓɛ ci-nshelaʼ nywi, shìkì à ɓɛ kuʼ ci-nyeni, shindɔʼ ci-nywikaʼ ywum nwi. Ɓa à ɓɛ ci-nɗwìkàʼ mɛ twùʼ, shìkì à kæb kuʼ mɛ̀ mbyi njikaʼ lòn fyàʼ flɔa.
56001008	À fyǒn ɓɛ mwum nɛ tǎ mɛ̀ kyìn yě lwɛn, à kònndì ɓɛ mwum nyɛ̌ yili ǹcìkàʼ ywum lwukea. À ɓɛ tì mwum nyɛ̌ cinni mwù. À ɓɛ ǹlwinni, à ɓɛ mwum nyɛ̌ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, à ɓɛ tì ci-mɓæn nlim.
56001009	Mwum màzwùm konndì tì kuʼ lɛʼ lɛŋkæ̀m sɛ ɓwiʼ ta lìsàʼ ɓænni mwu lwɛn. Nun ɓɛ li, à wòli à tɛ̀tì ɓwùlu zwùm lɛ̀ ǹlìsàʼ yɛ nun tǎ ywum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm màzwùm lìsea. Kwan màzwǔm, à wòli ti à lisàʼ pisean lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta lɛʼ màzwùm ɓyìnnɔa lɛ ɓyi ɓi ɓwuâ mbyi nlwɛn.
56001010	Paʼ ɓwum màzwùm ɓi mèan. Mwum nɛ ɓon ta ŋwum yon ywo à ɓǎn. Ɓɛ ta ɓwum pɔkea lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ pwìnpwìn yan. Ɓwum màzwùm fɔsi màn ǹzwɔʼ kɛ mɛ Yudà ɓye twɔ̌ʼ kwù kɛ lɛʼ nɗunnzi ndùn nun.
56001011	Ɓa wù ɗonnzi ɓon ɓɛ konndì lìseɔ̀ʼ mbyî, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ mvu ɓwum kyèa mèan ɗin. Ɓɛ ta ywum yɛ ɓa mbyi nun lìsea, mɛ̀ nlim nyan tǎ suʼ ɗyi lɛ̀ ǹyèkǎʼ lòn nyènye.
56001012	Mwum ndɔʼ nyɛ̌ tì kuʼ mwum Krɛ̂ʼ wɛ̌ ɓon lɛle lɛʼ màzwùm lɛ̀ ŋwum yon, mwum màzwùm ɓe ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum mɛ̀ swæ̀b ɓye kwe nlim Krɛ̂ʼ nun. À lɛli lɛ ɓwum ɓye Krɛ̂ʼ ɓi kwan hwæn mɛ̀ ci-mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ, à ɓi wɛ̌ nyæ̌m nyenea yɛ mbo nun, à ɓi mɛ̀ ci-ɓwæʼ, ɓɛ ta suʼ tǒn ji tǒn.
56001013	Swum sɛ nun lɛʼ kuʼ si, lɛʼ lɛŋkæ̀m sɛ. Li nɛ sɛ yili lɛ wù nyɛnndi ɓon ɓǎ ɓon fɔsì ǹɗyili nlim yon nɛʼ cinni nywi Yesù.
56001014	Wù ɗwosi ɓon mɛ̀ ywiʼ lɛ ɓa ɓɛ kɛ mwù lɛ̀ mɛ̀ tan mɛ Yudà, shìkì ɓɛ kɛ tì kuʼ mwù lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lwuà ɓye ɓwum ɓɛ ta lɛʼ lɛŋkæ̀m ɓyìnnɔa ta ɗwì lɛ̀ ɓon nɛʼ.
56001015	Ywum hwæn yi sanmi kɛ nywi mwum nɛ ɗyi sanmi kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ti lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye mɛ̀ nlim nyan ni m̀ɓyibbɔa, ɓɛ yonnzâ ǹyè lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, swum sanmi ɓa cì shan. Ɓɛ tà ka tî ɓàkàʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ ɓon ta cì, kon shan hwæn ti lwinni lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa.
56001016	Ɓɛ ta shɛ̀ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋwum nyan lɛ ɓon limmi M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son, mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nyan nɛ ɓon ta cì tǎ lìsàʼ lɛ ɓɛ lìmmi kan nun. Mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nyan nɛ ɓon ta cì ni nyɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓyìnnzi. Ɓɛ tà ka M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b mwumnzi, shìkì ɓɛ cinni kuʼ kim ncì swum lwɛn kwo fɔʼ.
56002001	Ti lɛ̀ wǔ, Tîtɛ̀, lìsaʼ ywum yɛ ɗyi zuʼ kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
56002002	Shɛ̌ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ɗwɛbshì lɛ ɓa ɓɛ ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-nywikaʼ ywum nwi, ɓɛ ci ywum hwæn kɛ mwum zwɛ̂m; ɓɛ ɓɛ tì ɓwum ɓye lɛ̀ mwù nun, ɓɛ fɔsì ǹlim ɗyili nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ kɛ ǹlim lɛ̀ ɓwùlu mbyimbyî, ɓɛ ɓɛ tì mɛ̀ ci-mfyimnzi mɛ lɛʼ.
56002003	Wù shɛ̀ ti kuʼ m̀banmbɔʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ yibshì lɛ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyan ɓɛ nyɛ̌ ɓwum ɓye ti M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗwon. Ɓa ɓɛ hwæb ɓwùlu, shìkì ɓɛ ɓɛ kuʼ mɛ̀ son ywum nwi. Ɓɛ lɛb ndɛb lwɛn lɛ̀ ɓwùlu.
56002004	Li, ɓǎ ɓɛ lisàʼ mɛ̀ yib ɓye ta waʼ ɓe m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ sɛ yili lɛ ɓɛ yili mɛ̀ ɗwɛb ɓyan lɛ̀ ɓwɛn ɓyan nun.
56002005	Wù kònndì ɓon shɛ̌ lɛ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓɛ cinni mɛ̀ mwù nlwinnea, shìkì ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ ɓɛ ɓon nywi, ɓɛ ɓɛ tì kuʼ mɛ̀ ci-ɗæm ŋkæ̀mŋkæm, ɓɛ ci mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea, ɓɛ ɓɛ mɛ̀ yib ɓye ta mɛ̀ ɗwɛb ɓyan mwumnzi. Ɓɛshɛ ɓon ɓɛ li, lɛ̀ mwum ndɔʼ ɓǎ lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi lɛli nywi nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
56002006	Wù kònndì tì kuʼ lɛʼ fɔʼ màzwùm lɛli lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mbìpàn mɛ ɗwɛb lɛ mɛ̀ mwù nyan ɓɛ ǹlwinnea.
56002007	Wǔ nɛʼ, kɛ ywum cǐ ywû nun hwæn, lìsaʼ m̀bɔ̀kì ncǐ lwɛn kɛ swiʼ shan. Wu yɛ̌ ywum lìsea, wù lìsàʼ kɛ mwum zwɛ̂m lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ.
56002008	Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ yɛ wù kwean ŋwum yɛ ɓɛ ye ɗyi zuʼ, ɓa yɛ ɓɛ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ɓɛ yɛ shɔ̀làʼ. Li, mɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnzì ɓyû yɛ lwin lɛ̀ kwɛ̀nnjin ɗin, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ ɓa swum sɛ ɓɛ yɛ ɓwiʼ shɔ̀lea nlim cinni.
56002009	Wù shɛ̀ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ son lɛ ɓɛ mwumnzi mɛ̀ ci-nye ɓyan, ɓɛ ci ywum hwæn yɛ ɓɛ ta ɓon shɛ̌ lɛ ɓɛ ci, ɓa ɓɛ fyinnzi mɛ̀ ŋwum nyan.
56002010	Ɓa ɓɛ lwum ɓon swum ndɔʼ yibbi næm. Ɓɛ fyon ɓɛ kwan hwæn ɓwum ɓye ta mɛ̀ kìkæ̀n nlwukea cǐ, ɓɛ ɓɛ she shan nun ywɔli. Ɓɛshɛ ɓon ci li, lɛ̀ ɓwum yɛ lɛʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ta shɛ̀ kɛ jin Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, Ci-nswæti nyɛʼ nun twuli.
56002011	À si lwɛn lɛ mwum hwæn lwinnzi ywum ton yi ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìsea kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon, ɓǎ nun swæti ɓwum hwæn.
56002012	Ŋ̀kwɛ̀nnzǐ yɛ nun kwɛ̀nnze ǹlim yi yi ta ɓwiʼ lìsea lɛ ɓwiʼ pæʼ fyàʼ lɛ̀ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn mɓyɛbbi, kònndì lɛ̀ ǹyili yɛ ɓwiʼ ta ywum ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan yɛ ta ɓwiʼ ǹlim kwɛ̀nni yili. Li, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun ɓwum ɓye cinni mwù, ɓye lwinnea, ɓye ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywɔli.
56002013	Sɛ cibbi lɛ ɓwiʼ cinni m̀bɔ̀kì tòn li, kwan sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi kɛ mɓònŋgǎʼ ŋgyìn nlwɛn nɛ ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun. Ŋ̀gyìn màzwùm ni ǹgyìn nɛ Ci-nswæti nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò yɛ̌ ɓwùmnì kɛ ntwu yon nun. Nun nɛ ɗyi M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ndwun nyɛʼ.
56002014	À ywie ntwiʼ yɛʼ, lɛ̀ nun pæʼ ɓwiʼ kɛ ɓyɛbbi nun, ɓwiʼ konndì tì kuʼ ɓɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum ye nun fyɔ̀sâ sanmi kɛ swiʼ shon, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon, nun kyishon; ǹkwìn ɓwum ye ywimɛ mwù kɛ̌ lɛ̀ ǹcìkàʼ mɛ lɛʼ nlwukea kwan mèan hwæn.
56002015	Ywum ton yi hwæn, yon yɛ wù yɛ̌ ɓwum lìsea. Lɛli wɛ̌ mwum nyɛ̌ tǎ saʼ sea, wù kimnzi ɓon mɛ̀ nlim, wù ɗwosi ɓwum ɓye tà ka ywɔʼ mɛ̀ ywiʼ. Ɓa wù cì ǹdɔʼ cinni wù kwɛ̀m ɓyìnnzì kɛ nywi.
56003001	Wù yɛ̌ ǹkwìn ɓwum Yesù Kristò shɛ̌ lɛ ɓɛ ywɔʼ ŋwum mɛ̀ ci-mɛ ŋgyɔʼ ɓɛ ywɔʼ ɓon, ɓɛ mwumnzi ɓon, ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓye yili ǹcìkàʼ mɛ lɛʼ nlwukea kwan hwæn.
56003002	Ɓa ɓɛ sean jin ɓyɛbbi ɓwulu, shìkì ɓɛ klwikàʼ kuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ. Ɓɛ fyôn ɓɛ flɔkea, ɓɛ ɓɛ tì kuʼ kwan hwæn sàsi lɛ̀ mwum hwæn.
56003003	Ɓwiʼ ɓe kuʼ làn nyɛʼ mbyî njimmi nun li. Ɓwiʼ ɓe kǎn mɛ̀ ci-mwumnzi ɓwum, ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓwum ɓɛ ɓe ɓɛ ɓwuâ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓwiʼ ɓe mɛ̀ son ywum lwukea yɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe tæm ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun. M̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyɛʼ ɓe ɓyɛbbi seansean, ɓwiʼ ɓe tì kuʼ ywum ɓwulu timmea. Ɓwum ɓe ɓwiʼ ɓyìnnzi, ɓwiʼ ɓyinnzì tì kuʼ ɓon.
56003004	Kwo fɛʼ li, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ Ci-nswæti nyɛʼ lìsaʼ ɓwiʼ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon lɛ̀ ǹyili yɛ nun yili ɓwum,
56003005	à swæti ɓwiʼ. Ǹswæti yɛ nun swæti ɓwiʼ ɓa ntwiʼ ɓwiʼ ɓe mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea cǐ, à swæti ɓwiʼ ntwiʼ nun cinni kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ. À sannzâ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Mpùn Nsanmi, li, ɓwiʼ ti ɓe yeli nywæb, ɓwiʼ cinnâ ǹzison she nywæb.
56003006	Kɛ fyaʼ Yesù Kristò nɛ Ci-nswæti nyɛʼ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ̀â ɓwiʼ M̀pùn Nsanmi mɛ nlim.
56003007	À cǐ li ɓǎ nun fyɔsì ɓwiʼ sanmi kɛ swiʼ shon, ɓwiʼ cinni tì ǹzison ɗwùmɗwùm sɛ ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ à yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ fɛ. À cì li kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon nun.
56003008	Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ ɓǎ nyɛ̌ ǹkwùm ŋgyi. Mùn yili lɛ wù ɗyi kɛ nzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm nun kimmi, ɓǎ ɓwum ɓye ta ǹlim ɗyili nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ fɔsì ywum lwukea cǐ kwan hwæn. Mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea nɛ wòli à kpaʼ ɓwum à ni.
56003009	Ɓa wù ɗunnaʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mpwìnpwìn. Wu ɓɛ̌n cì ndɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ tan ɓɛ ɓe mbyî tean, ɓa wù kwɛmmi kwe. Ɓa wù ɗunmi fyònnzàʼ mɛ lɛʼ ɓyin lɛ̀ ɓon, shìkì wù pyìsì kuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ kɛ nywi mɛ lwuà mɛ Yudà. Paʼ mɛ lɛʼ màzwǔm cinni kan mwù; sɛ tà ka mwum ndɔʼ kpea.
56003010	Mwum nɛ ci-gwànnzì kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun hwæn, yæm nun lɛʼ màzwùm kæ̀mmì ɓî, ɓɛshɛ nun kònndì tì ɓe, wù kyììlì lɛ̀ nun.
56003011	Paʼ mwum sɛ li si, wù lìmmi lɛ sɛ ɓwuâ mbyi ŋkæ̀mŋkæm. À ni ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi, li, ɓyɛbbi nyon yɛ̌ kwàlì lɛ̀ nun nɛʼ.
56003012	Mùn yɛ̌ cì mùn fyi Àrtèmasì, shindɔʼ Tìshîʼ cǐ swû. Wu yɛn lɛ ɓɛ ɓɛnmɛ, wù kpæm mɛʼ, wù kìn mùn cinni kɛ Nìkòpòlâ. Ntwiʼ sɛ mùn yilâ lɛ mùn lànnzì kwan mbɛb kwe hwæn.
56003013	Ɓa wù fyɔ̀ʼ zɛʼ lɛ̀ Zènâ, mwum nɛ ci-nlìmmì mɛ̀ lwuà, ɓon lɛ̀ Àpòlô. Kæb ɓon swum ndɔʼ kɛ kɛ̀n shan sɛ ɓon yɛ kɛ̀n nun, wù cì ɓa swum ndɔʼ shiʼ ɓon.
56003014	Sɛ yili kuʼ lɛ ɓwum ɓyɛʼ limmì ǹlwinnzi mɛ lɛʼ nlwukea wɛ̌ tà shɛ sɛ ta yili, ɓǎ ɓɛ kpaʼ ɓwum ɓye cinni kan swum ndɔʼ. Li, ɓɛ yɛ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓye lànnzi kan kwan shan kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan ɗin.
56003015	Ɓwum ɓye ɓwiʼ ɓi ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓon hwæsi wù. Hwæsi ɓwiʼ ɓwùlu ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓɛ yili ɓwiʼ. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgænnì ɓyin, ɓyin hwæn.
57001001	Mùn Pɔ̂l nɛ kɛ nye njè ntwiʼ sɛ mùn ni mwum Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò, mùn nɛ ta ɓyin ɗèwà ton sɛ kɔi, ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ŋgyinni nyɛʼ Tìmòtê. Ɓwiʼ ta son kɔi lɛ̀ wù Fìlèmôn, ŋwè nyɛʼ nɛ ɓwiʼ ta she fɔʼ cǐ lɛ̀ ɓyin.
57001002	Ɓwiʼ kɔʼ tì kuʼ son lɛ̀ ŋgyinni nyɛʼ nyɛ̌ m̀lib Àpeà, ɓon lɛ̀ Àrshîb nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ta ɓɔli lɛ̀ nun kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, kònndi lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye fɔʼ ɓye ta kǐn M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli ɗwon nywù.
57001003	Ce ndwun nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì ɓyin, ɓɛ fɛ ɓyin flɔa.
57001004	Kwan sɛ mùn tǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli lɛ̀ jin swû, mùn tà nun osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili kwan hwæn,
57001005	ntwiʼ sɛ mùn ywɔâ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ wù tǎ ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b hwæn yili, lɛ̀ ǹɗyili nlim yɛ wù tǎ ɗyili nywi Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù.
57001006	Mùn tǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli ɓǎ tǒn nlim fɔʼ yɛ ɓwiʼ ta tòn lɛ̀ ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ nɗyili nlim yɛ ɓwiʼ ta ɗyili nywi Yesù Kristò, yɛ kpaʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ fɔsì ywum lwukea yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓwiʼ fyaʼ Yesù Kristò ywo.
57001007	Ŋgyinni nyɛ̀m, ǹlim lwukeâ mùn ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, wù kònndì tì mùn ǹlim kimnzi m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ wù tǎ ɓwùlu ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, wù kònndì ɓon zwùm tɛ̀ti.
57001008	Li nɛ ci, mùn swulaʼ wu lɛ wù ci swum sɛ mùn yɛ̌ wù shɛ̌. Kɛ mùn ni ci-ntwum Yesù Kristǒ, mùn cinni ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ mùn wòli mùn shɛ̀ wù lɛ: «Cì swum she lwɛn.»
57001009	Son, mǔn tà ka wu son fɛ fyaʼ lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ, mùn pyìtàʼ wù mɛ kwù, ntwiʼ sɛ ǹyili yi kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ wù. Mùn Pɔ̂l, ǹɗwɛbshì nyɛ̌ kɛ nye njè lɛ̀ ntwiʼ Yesù Kristǒ,
57001010	mùn nɛ ta wu pyìtea mɛ kwù kɛ ntwiʼ Ònèzîm. À ni mwɛn nyɛ̀m ntwiʼ sɛ à ɗunmi ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyaʼ yɛ̂m. Mùn ti fɛ nye njè wɛ̌ ce nyon.
57001011	Kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî, ǎ ɓe kàn wu kpea ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, son jenɛ, à yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ kpea ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ wù.
57001012	Mùn fyimɛ wû nun ɓe. À ni m̀banmbɔʼ wɛ̌ ǹlim yɛ̂m.
57001013	Mǔn yilè lɛ ɓwiʼ ton fɛ lɛ̀ nun, ɓǎ nun kpaʼ mùn kɛ ɓàn swû nun kwan sɛ mùn ni fɛ nye njè kɛ ntwiʼ sɛ mùn tǎ Ǹtwum Yesù Kristò shɛ̌.
57001014	Son, mǔn yili kan mùn ci li kwan sɛ wu yili kifɛʼ. Mǔn yili kan mùn ci wù dòlɛ̀ʼ lɛ wù ci mùn lwɛn. Mùn yili lɛ wù kpaʼ mùn kɛ mkpaʼ ywû nun.
57001015	Shindɔʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yile kwan kwæʼ sɛ Ònèzîm kwan wû fyaʼ si à kɛ̀n pɛɗin, ɓǎ kwan sɛ nun yɛ̌ fyònnì, ɓyin ton m̀banmban kwan hwæn.
57001016	Jenɛ, ǎ suʼ kan ti son, à lwuâ fɛʼ à làn li, à ni ŋgyinni nyɛʼ. Mǔn, à ni mùn kɛ nlim nun. Ti lɛ̀ wǔ, mùn lìmmi lɛ wù yɛ̌ nun yili, sɛ lan ma li, ntwiʼ sɛ à ni cì swû mɛ̀ làn mɓì. À ni son nywù, à ɓɛ tì ŋgyinni nywù kɛ mbyi Yesù Kristò nun.
57001017	Ɓɛshɛ wu tà mun twɛli wɛ̌ mwum nywù, yè nun wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn nɛʼ nɛ wu yeè.
57001018	Swum sɛ nun gwànnzi wû, lɛ̀ ke swû sɛ nun kɛ nywi hwæn, kɛ̀ yon kɛ ntan yɛ̂m nun.
57001019	Mùn Pɔ̂l, mǔn nɛʼ nɛ kɔʼ cìcì sɛ ton sɛ lɛ̀ fyàʼ yɛ̂m lɛ: «Mùn nɛ yɛ wù ɗɛ̀bbi.» Lìmmi lɛ ɓwiʼ cinni ke ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ wù, ke màzwùm si ǹzison swû she nywæb she wu cinni kɛ mbyi Yesù Kristò nun.
57001020	Kɛ à si li, ŋgyinni nyɛ̀m, cì mun swum màzwùm lɛ̀ ntwiʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Lwuli mùn ǹlim zwum, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi ɓwum fɔʼ kɛ mbyi Yesù Kristò nun.
57001021	Mùn lìmmi lɛ ɗèwà sɛ mùn tà wu kɔa sɛ, wù yɛ̌ swum sɛ mùn tà wu cibbi cǐ. Mùn lìmmi lɛ wù yɛ̌ cì sɛ lan ma li.
57001022	Swum shindɔʼ she mun yili mùn shɛ wù, à si lɛ: «Fɔ̀si mùn cǐ nòn ntwiʼ sɛ mùn tǎ fɔ̀kàʼ lɛ kɛ ntwiʼ mɛ ŋkeli nyin, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ cì mùn ɓɛ̌n cì shin.»
57001023	Èpàflâ nɛ ɓwiʼ ɓi nye njè ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun kɛ ntwiʼ ɓwiʼ ɓi ɓwum Yesù Kristò, à hwæsi wù.
57001024	Ɓwùlukwæ̌n she ɓyɛ̂m, Markù, Àrìstakù, Demà lɛ̀ Lukasì, ɓɛ hwæsi tì kuʼ wù.
57001025	Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ŋgænnì ɓyin.
58001001	Kɛ næ̀m ɓwum, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓe lɛlakì lɛ̀ ɓon kɛ mɛ mbyi kyikyi nun kɛ mɛ ŋwum mɛ̀ ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum yon nun.
58001002	Son, sɛ kin kuʼ ɓɛ̀n ɗyě kɛ mmlɔ̀kàʼ ŋgyin yɛ ɓwiʼ ti jenɛ nun yɛ, à lɛlâ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kɛ ŋwum Mwɛn nyon. Mwɛn nyon ni nɛ nun fɛe ǹkimmɔʼ mfɔ̀ʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan fyaʼ, à kɛ̀ nun kɛ mɛ mwù ywum hwæn.
58001003	Nun nɛ lisaʼ ɓwiʼ ǹtwu Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ ta ɗwùmnàʼ kɛ nywi yon. À ni swum fɔʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, kwo ǹkyììli ɓa kɛ nyinnìm shan. Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yon cinni ǹkimmɔʼ, yon yɛ nun tǎ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan hwæn ɗɔ̀a nun. Kɛ nyě yɛ nun sannzi ɓwum ɓyɛbbi nyan, à kɛ̀n tòn kɛ ɗɛb kɛ fyaʼ ji Ce M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋkimmi.
58001004	Li, kɛ cìcǐ tòn shon si nun, ǹtwu yon yi twun, yɛ lan ye mɛ cikpuʼ ɓye ɗɛb hwæn, wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ̀ kuʼ nun jin shon she lan shan ɓon hwæn.
58001005	Ɓàkeànì fɛʼ, yà cikpuʼ nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɔ̀â fɛʼ shɛ̀ nywɔʼ ndɔʼ lɛ̀ nun lɛ: «Wù ni Mwɛn nyɛ̀m, mǔn, mùn cìâ ǹlìmmì ɗyě kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum nun lɛ mùn ni yee wû”” shɛ shi kuʼ ɓɛ Yesù? Shindɔʼ à shɛ̀ fɛʼ lɛ̀ nun lɛ, «nun yɛ̌ ɓɛ Ce nyǐ, nyǐ ni ɓɛ kuʼ Mwɛn nyon””?
58001006	Kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ Mwɛn m̀bɔʼ nyon fyi ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, à lɛe lɛ, «mɛ̀ cikpuʼ ɓyon hwæn, ɓyi ɓi mwumnzi nyǐ.»
58001007	Ti kuʼ kɛ nywi mɛ cikpuʼ ɓyon nun hwæn, à shɛ̀ kuʼ lɛ, «nun ni tǎ mɛ̀ cikpuʼ ɓyon fyɔ̀si wɛ̌ m̀pùn, nun ni fyɔ̀sì tì ɓyi wɛ̌ mɛ̀ mpè win.»
58001008	Son, kwan sɛ nun ɓɛ̀n kuʼ kɛ nywi Mwɛn nyon, à kònndì tì shɛ̀ lɛ: «Wù nɛ ti M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, wù yɛ̌ lwun sea ɗwùmɗwùm lɛ̀ ɗwùmɗwùm. Wù yɛ̌ ywɔʼ swû kɛ̀nnzi kɛ mbyi nun.
58001009	Wù tǎ swum sɛ ɗyi lwinni yili, wù ɓyìnnzì tì kuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa. Li nɛ ci, mùn nɛ ɗyi Ce nywù M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, mùn yæ̀nnâ wù, mùn kɛ̀ wù cìcǐ tòn she twun, she lan she ɓwùlu ɓye ɓyin ɓi lɛ̀ ɓon, lɛ̀ wù ton kwe lɛ̀ ǹlwukaʼ nlim.»
58001010	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kònndi tî lɛʼ kɛ jin Mwɛn nyon nun kɛ cìcì ndɔʼ kɛ ɗèwà shon nun lɛ: «Wù nɛ ɗyi Nyɛli ɓwum, kɛ nɗunmi, wù nɛ fɔe ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, wù kònndì tì kuʼ ɗɛb fǒ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ fyàʼ ɓyû nɛʼ.
58001011	Hwæn li, à yi ywum yɛ ywimɛ mlɔ̀ʼ nùn, son, wǔ, wù yɛ̌ ɓɛ ɗwùmɗwùm. Ɗɛb lɛ̀ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan yɛ ywìn wɛ̌ plè.
58001012	Li, wù yɛ̌ yon hwɛli wɛ̌ gân, wù kwɛbsi yon wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ plè kwɛbsi. Son, ti lɛ̀ wǔ, wù yɛ̌ ɓɛ kwan hwæn wɛ̌ tà shɛ wù tòn si, wù ɓǎ ywi.»
58001013	Yà cikpuʼ nyon nɛ nun shɛ̀â nywɔʼ ndɔʼ lɛ̀ nun lɛ: «Tǒn fyaʼ ji yɛ̂m, mùn yɛ̌ mɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnzì ɓyû kɛ̌ mɛ kwù ɓyû nji wɛ̌ cìcǐ nsataʼ mɛ kwù swû,» a shi kuʼ ɓɛ Mwɛn nyon?
58001014	Mɛ̀ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̌b màzwùm ɓi mɛ̀ mpùn ɓye ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kpea kɛ she shon nun. Ɓon ɓɛ nun tǎ fyi kɛ cɛ̌ ɓwum ɓye nun yɛ̌ swæti.
58002001	Li nɛ sɛ cibbi lɛ ɓwiʼ fɔsènì mwù kɛ̌ lɛ̀ ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ ywɔâ, ɓwiʼ læ̀kì mbyi nlwɛn ɓwu.
58002002	Mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓɛ mɛ̀ cikpuʼ ɓyon ɓe kǐn shɛ̌ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mbibea ɓyɛʼ ɓe kwankì lɛŋkæ̀m. Mwum nɛ ɓe kǎn mwù kɛ̌ nlim, shìkì à cì kuʼ swum sɛ ɓɛ lɛli, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓe mwum màzwùm vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi lɛ̀ ntwiʼ màzwùm.
58002003	Kɛ ɓwiʼ limmi li, ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ njilì ǹtwum nswæti yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyi ɓwiʼ jenɛ, ǹtwum ye lan pwìn lwuà, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ yɛ cì lɛ, ɓwiʼ kà nywæ̀li fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b? Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò sɛtâ Ǹtwum Lwɛn màzwùm shɛ̌. À shɛ̀e yon li, ɓwum ɓɛ ɓe nun ywɔti shɛâ kuʼ ɓwiʼ yon, lɛ à yi ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ye lɛŋkæ̀m.
58002004	Nun nɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗyie tì kuʼ ǹyè ɓwum màzwùm kɛ yi kìkeàn nun, lɛ̀ yì hìlea yɛ nun ɓe cì. À fɛ tì kuʼ ɓwum ɓyon ǹkimmɔʼ ncì ywum kyikyi lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Mpùn Nsanmi wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun yili.
58002005	À si lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b fɛe kǎn wan nyɛ̌ nywæb nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ta lɛʼ jenɛ ni kɛ fyaʼ mɛ cikpuʼ ɓyon ɓye ɗɛb.
58002006	Son, ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun kɛ cìcì ndɔʼ lɛ: «Yee, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b! Mwum ni kuʼ yɛn kɛ swiʼ swû lɛ̀ wù ɗwi zwiʼ lɛ̀ nun? À ni kuʼ wɛn kɛ ŋgiti yɛ wù tà nun giti nun?
58002007	Wù cìe ǹtwu yon ɓwu kwan kwæʼ kɛ swiʼ mɛ cikpuʼ ɓyû, kɛ nyě yi, wù fɛe nun ǹtwu ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ wɛ̌ m̀vɛ̀n.
58002008	Wù kɛ̀â nun ywum hwæn kɛ mɛ kwù nji.» Kɛ nshɛ̀ yɛ ɓɛ shɛ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ̀â ywum hwæn mɛ kwù mwum nji, sɛ lisaʼ lɛ ǎ sàn kan kwo swum fɔʼ. Son, a kiìn ɓɛ̀n ɗyě, ɓwiʼ yɛn kifɛʼ mwum kɛ mɛ mwù ywum hwæn.
58002009	Swum sɛ ɓwiʼ yɛn ɓe, à si lɛ Yesù ni kɛ mɛ mwù ywum hwæn. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b sɛte cì ǹtwu yon ɓwu kwan kwæʼ kɛ swiʼ mɛ cikpuʼ ɓyon. À cìe li kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon nun, ɓǎ nyǐ ni ywi kɛ ntwiʼ mɛ mwù ɓwum hwæn. Son, kɛ nyě yi, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe nun ǹtwu ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ wɛ̌ m̀vɛ̀n, kɛ ntwiʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nɛ nun yɛn, à kɛ̀n ywi.
58002010	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɔ̀e ywum hwæn ɓǎ yi ɓɛ yon, sɛ ɓe lwɛn kɛ mɛʼ yon lɛ à lannzì Yesù kɛ mɛ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nun ɓǎ nun fyonnì mwum ǹlwinni lɛ̀ ǹdùʼ nun, nun nɛ ɗyi Ci-nswæti nyɛʼ. Li nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yile, ɓǎ nun twɛʼ ɓwum mèan lɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓwɛn ɓyon, ɓɛ ɗun kɛ ntwu yon nun.
58002011	Yesù Kristò, nun nɛ ta ɓwum fyɔ̀si sanmi, à ni Ce m̀bɔʼ ɓon lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye nun sannzâ hwæn. Son sɛ ci, kwɛ̀nnjin tà ka nun ɓænni lɛ̀ ǹlon ɓwum màzwùm lɛ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyon.
58002012	À lɛʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ cì ndɔʼ lɛ: «Mùn yɛ̌ lɛʼ swû shɛ̌ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m. Mùn sàkàʼ tì jin swû kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum ɓyû nun.»
58002013	À kònndì tì shɛ̀ lɛ: «Mǔn, mùn yɛ̌ zwùm tɛ̀li kwan hwæn lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.» Kɛ cìcì ndɔʼ nun, à shɛ̀ lɛ: «Mùn ni fɛ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe mûn fyaʼ.»
58002014	Ɓwum ɓɛ nun lɛʼ fɛ, m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓon ɓi ɓwum ɓɛ lɛ̀ ǹnywùn kɛ mwu, Yesù nun nɛʼ fyònne kuʼ kɛ kwæʼ nywi ɓwum nun wɛ̌ ɓwiʼ. Ywum hwæn yɛ ta ɓwum lànnzi kɛ nywi, yɛ lannzâ kuʼ nun kɛ nywi. À fyònne li, ɓǎ nun mlɔʼ ǹkimmɔʼ Satæ̀n kɛ ywi nyon nɛ nun ywie nun. Ntwiʼ ǹkimmɔʼ ywi hwæn ɓe Satæ̀n fyaʼ.
58002015	Yesù cinne tì kuʼ kwæʼ nywi mwum ɓǎ nun libbaʼ ɓwum ɓɛ ɓe mbyî wɛ̌ mɛ̀ son kɛ ntwiʼ nyi ywi nɛ ɓon ɓe yi, mwù ɗonmi tì kuʼ ɓon.
58002016	À si seansean lɛ mɛ̀ cikpuʼ ɓye ɗɛb ɓɛ nun kìên kǎn kpaʼ, son, à kìên mvu ɓwum Abràhâm kpea.
58002017	Li nɛ sɛ yili lɛ à kiìn kɛ mwum nun, à gwili mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyon kɛ kwæʼ nywi nun hwæn, ɓǎ nun fyonnì mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ nyan nɛ tǎ ǹlim kwɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ ɓon. À ni ǹlwinni kɛ she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b zusì ɓwum ɓyɛbbi nyan.
58002018	Ntwiʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ nun yɛnne vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kɛ mɛ mɓwɛb nun, à wòli kim jenɛ, à kpaʼ ɓwum ɓye m̀ɓwɛb ɓɛnnâ nywi.
58003001	Kɛ à si li, ɓyin mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓwum Yesù Kristò, ɓyin ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b loen lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon, kɛ̀ênì mɛʼ lɛ̀ Yesù. Nun nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyie lɛ̀ nun ɓɛ mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ nyɛʼ nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun, ɓwiʼ konndì tì lɛŋkæ̀m shon shɛ̌.
58003002	Yesù ɓe ǹywɔli kɛ she sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe nun si nun, m̀banmbɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ Mòîzɛ̀ ɓe tì kuʼ ǹywɔli kɛ she sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe nun fyaʼ kɛ nyinnǐm ŋkwìn ɓwum ɓyon nun.
58003003	Son, kɛ nyinnìm Yesù ɓon lɛ̀ Mòîzɛ̀, à si lwɛn lɛ ɓwum twuli Yesù, a lan ǹtwuli yɛ ɓɛ yɛ Mòîzɛ̀ twuli, ntwiʼ mwum nɛ tǎ ǹkwìn ɓwum fǒ, à cinni ǹtwu, à làn ǹkwìn ɓwum yon nɛʼ.
58003004	Ŋ̀kwìn ɓwum ndɔʼ tà ka yon nɛʼ swɔsi ɗin, mwum ndɔʼ nɛ shi ɓɛ mwù. Son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi mwum nɛ fɔ̀e ywum hwæn.
58003005	Mòîzɛ̀ ɓe ǹywɔli kɛ she sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe nun fyaʼ kɛ nyinnìm ŋkwìn ɓwum ɓyon nun, son, à sue ɗin ci-she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. She shon ɓe ywum yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓwum shɛ̌ kwan ndɔʼ lìsea.
58003006	Ti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, à ni mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, nun nɛ ɗyi mwǔ ŋkwìn ɓwum bùba nyon, à ɓe tì ǹywɔli kɛ she sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe nun fyaʼ nun. Ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɗyi ǹkwìn ɓwum yi ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ kimnzi mɛ̀ nlim nyɛʼ, ɓwiʼ suʼ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ ywum yɛ nun shɛ̀e ɓwiʼ, shìkì ɓwæʼ kwɛn kuʼ ɓwiʼ.
58003007	Li nɛ sɛ yili lɛ ɓwiʼ nonnzì mɛ̀ ywiʼ kɛ nywi swum sɛ M̀pùn Nsanmi lɛli kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «A ɓyin ywɔʼ ǹlɛli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗyě,
58003008	ɓa ɓyin kim mwù wɛ̌ tà shɛ mɛ̀ mbibea ɓyin kimme lɛ̀ nun kwan sɛ ɓɛ wale lɛ̀ nun kɛ nlim kyɔʼ, ɓɛ ɗunmi nun kæbbi ŋwum.
58003009	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛe lɛ: “Swum yaʼ fɛʼ ywum yɛ mùn cìe lɛ̀ ɓon kɛ ɗwùm mwum nyî nun, mɛ̀ mbibea ɓyin ɓwɛbbe mùn ɓǎ ɓon cɛ swum sɛ mùn yɛ̌ cì.
58003010	Li nɛ ci, ǹlim nyenâ mùn zwum lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum yɛ ton yi, mùn shɛ̀ lɛ, mɛ̀ nlim nyan tǎ suʼ mbyi nyɛ̀m ɓwu kwan hwæn, ɓɛ tà ka mɛ̀ mbyi ɓyɛ̂m lìmmi.
58003011	Kɛ à si li, ǹlim nyenâ mùn lɛ̀ ɓon, mùn lɔ̀ʼ ǹdɔ̀ʼ lɛ, mùn yɛ̌ tì fɛʼ yɛn ɓɛshɛ ɓon yɛ ɗun kɛ cìcì mɛ yìnnì shɛ̂m nun.” »
58003012	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, konnênì lɛ̀ ɓyin nɛʼ. Ɓa mwum ndɔʼ kwan kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun nyɛ̌ cinni ǹlim ɓyɛbbi yɛ yɛ cì, à yònnzì ǹyè lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi ǹzison.
58003013	Son, tɛ̀tênì ɓwùlu zwùm mɛ̀ ŋgyinŋgyin mèan hwæn kɛ wan nyɛʼ nyɛ̌ jenɛ nun, mwum nyin ndɔʼ læ̀kì mwù kimmi ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyɛbbi tǎ nun pɔkea.
58003014	Ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ ɗyi kimmi kɛ nywi ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ sɛte ǹlim kɛ̌ kɛ nlim, a kɛn ɓɛ̌n kɛ mmlɔ̀kàʼ, ɓwiʼ yɛ ɓɛ mɛ̀ ŋwě ŋkæ̀mŋkæm Yesù.
58003015	Ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «A ɓyin ywɔʼ ǹlɛli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗyě, ɓa ɓyin kim mwù wɛ̌ tà shɛ mɛ̀ mbibea ɓyin kimme lɛ̀ nun kwan sɛ ɓɛ wale lɛ̀ nun kɛ nlim kyɔʼ.»
58003016	Mɛ̀ wɛn ɓɛ ywɔe ǹlɛli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ ɓe mwù kimmi lɛ̀ nun? À ɓi ɓwum ɓɛ Mòîzɛ̀ kwannzi kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Èjîb nun.
58003017	Mɛ̀ wɛn ɓɛ cie ǹlim nyeni M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ɓon kɛ ɗwùm mwum nyî nun? Ɓwum fɔʼ màzwùm ɓɛ ɓe ɓyɛbbi cǐ, yì ɗwon yan nonŋgàʼ kɛ nlim kyɔʼ.
58003018	Mɛ̀ wɛn ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɔ̀e ǹdɔ̀ʼ lɛ ɓyi ɓi ɓa ɗun cìcì mɛ yìnnì shon nun? Ŋ̀kwìn ɓwum fɔʼ màzwùm yɛ tì yɛ ɓe nun ŋwum fyinnzi.
58003019	Son sɛ ci ɓwiʼ yɛn lɛ, ɓɛ limme ǹɗun cìcì mɛ yìnnǐ màzwùm ntwiʼ sɛ ɓon ɓyinnɔâ lɛʼ shon.
58004001	Kɛ à si li, ɓwiʼ konnênì lwɛn lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ nɛʼ. Ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ǹkàli lɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ kuʼ ɗun kɛ cìcì mɛ yìnnì shon nun. Son, ɓwiʼ konnênì, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b læ̀kì yɛn lɛ mwum nyɛʼ ndɔʼ ɓwuâ mbyi nɗun kɛ cìcì mɛ yìnnǐ màzwùm nun.
58004002	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ywɔâ kuʼ Ǹtwum Lwɛn wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓye mbyî ywɔe kuʼ. Son, ǹywɔʼ yɛ ɓon ywɔe ǹtwum màzwǔm, yɛ kpea kàn ɓon ntwiʼ sɛ ɓon kɛ̀e kǎn mwù kɛ nlim.
58004003	Ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ta ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ Ǹtwum Lwɛn màzwǔm, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ yɛ ɗun kɛ cìcì mɛ yìnnǐ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. A si wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun lɛle kɛ nywi mɛ mbibea ɓi lɛ: «Mùn nyenâ lɛ̀ ɓon, mùn lɔ̀ʼ ǹdɔ̀ʼ lɛ, mùn yɛ̌ tì fɛʼ yɛn ɓɛshɛ ɓon yɛ ɗun kɛ cìcì mɛ yìnnì shɛ̂m nun.» M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛle li, kànmbɛʼ, à mlɔ̀â she shon ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê kwan sɛ nun fɔ̀e ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan.
58004004	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ cìcì ndɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun kɛ nywi ŋgyìn mɛ̀ nshanmɓì lɛ: «Kɛ ŋgyìn mɛ̀ nshanmɓì nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìnne kɛ she mfɔ̀ʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun.»
58004005	Ɓɛ kà fyònni tî ɓe, ɓɛ lɛʼ lɛ: «Mùn yɛ̌ tì fɛʼ yɛn ɓɛshɛ ɓon yɛ tì ɗun kɛ cìcì mɛ yìnnì shɛ̂m nun.»
58004006	Kɛ ɓwum zwimbyiʼ ɓɛ sɛte Ǹtwum Lwɛn ywo, ɓɛ ɗuen kǎn kɛ cìcì mɛ yìnnǐ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ ɓe ŋwum yon fyinnzi, à si seansean lɛ ɓwum ɓyindɔʼ yɛ mbyi nɗun cinni.
58004007	Li nɛ ci, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ̀ tî ǹgyìn nyɛ̌ ɗin ndɔʼ, à lon nun lɛ ǹgyìn nyɛ̌ ɗyě. À sean jin ŋgyìn màzwùm kɛ ŋwum mvɛ̀n Dàvîd, nun nɛ nòen lwun lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mbibea ɓi ywiâ ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê. Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm yɛ ɓwiʼ sɛte ywɔʼ mbyî yɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ lɛ: «A ɓyin ywɔʼ ǹlɛli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗyě, ɓa ɓyin kim mwù lɛ̀ nun.»
58004008	Kɛ næ̀m ɓwum, ɓɛshɛ Jòzwê kɛ̀nnze ɓon han ɓɛ kɛn ɓɛ̀n kɛ cìcì mɛ yìnnǐ ŋkæ̀mŋkæm Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b lɛle kǎn tî ɓe kɛ nywi ŋgyìn ndɔʼ nun.
58004009	Kɛ nun lɛle li, ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ mɛ̀ yìnnì ndɔʼ yi kwe ye ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ ɗun kɛ nlim, m̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìnne kɛ ŋgyìn mɛ̀ nshanmɓì nun.
58004010	Mwum nɛ tǎ ɗun kɛ cìcì mɛ yìnnǐ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun tǎ mɛ̀ yìnnǐ she ɓyon twɛli, m̀banmbɔʼ kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìnne kwan sɛ nun mlɔ̀e she shon.
58004011	Kɛ à si li, ɓwiʼ ɓɔlènì lɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ɗun kɛ cìcǐ màzwùm nun, mwum nyɛʼ ndɔʼ læ̀kì ɓwu, ntwiʼ sɛ nun fyinnzi ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, wɛ̌ tà shɛ mɛ̀ mbibea ɓyɛʼ cie.
58004012	Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinni ǹkimmɔʼ, yɛ ta tî ɓwiʼ ǹzison fɛ. A yi pwu, a lan fɛʼ ǹjìm wì nɛ mɛ̀ làn mɓì. Ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yi ta mwum ɗun kɛ nlim, han yɛ kɛn ɓɛ̌n cìcì sɛ m̀pùn mwum ni kwe ɓon lɛ̀ ǹzison shon. À yi wɛ̌ ǹjìm ŋkimmi ndɔʼ nɛ wòli à ɗwo nywi mwum, à kɛ̀n ɓɛ̀n kɛ yi wòn nun, shindɔʼ kɛ nlòn nun. Mɛ̀ lɛʼ nɛ mwum tǎ fɔ̀kàʼ hwæn, ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yi ta nun kwàsi pisean.
58004013	Swum gwùmni fɔʼ ndɔʼ ɓa kɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ywum yɛ nun fɔ̀e nun hwæn. À lìmmi yon lɛ̀ ǹdùʼ nun. Nun nɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ ɗyi swiʼ, ɓwiʼ shɛ ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ ciâ hwæn.
58004014	Yesù, Mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ nyɛʼ. Kɛ ɓwiʼ cinni mwum ndwun ni nɛ nèan kɛ nlim ɗɛb, ɓwiʼ fɔsènì ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ kɛâ ǹlim lɛ̀ yon ɓænni lwɛn.
58004015	Mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ nyɛʼ ni lìmmi mɛ̀ lɛʼ nɛ tà ɓwiʼ hwumnzi lɛ̀ ǹdùʼ nun. Nun, à yɛnne mɛ̀ paʼ mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nɛ ɓwiʼ ta yɛn nɛ hwæn, m̀ɓwɛb ɓɛn nun nywi, son, kwo lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ fɔʼ ǎ cì kan.
58004016	Kɛ à si li, ɓwiʼ sɛnndènì kɛ moan gbaʼ lwun Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ǹlim pyǐ, cìcì sɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon si kwe, ɓǎ nun ywɔʼ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, à ci ɓwiʼ lwɛn, à kpaʼ ɓwiʼ kwan sɛ sɛ yili nun.
58005001	Mwum nɛ mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ hwæn, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tà nun yæ̀nni kɛ nyinnìm ŋkwìn ɓwum nun. À tà nun yæ̀nni lɛ̀ nun ɗyi swiʼ shon kɛ jin ɓwulu ɓwum nun hwæn, ɓǎ nun fɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓwum ciâ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58005002	Mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ni tà ka pwæ̀tì nyeni lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta mbyi nlwɛn ɓwu ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ lìmmi kan swum ndɔʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ nun nɛʼ hwæn wòli tî kuʼ, à pyì kɛ ɓyɛbbi nun.
58005003	M̀bɔ̀kì nɛ nun nɛʼ ni ǹswublea li, a yili lɛ à fɛ tì kuʼ sàtìkæ̀ʼ she ɓyɛbbi nyon nɛʼ, sɛ suʼ kan she ɓyɛbbi nyɛ̌ ɓwùlu.
58005004	Mwum ndɔʼ wòli kan à ɗyi, à shɛ̀ lɛ nun ti ɗyě mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ. Sɛ yili lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ lon nun, à kɛ̀ nun jin màzwùm, wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun kɛ̀kàʼ jin màzwùm lɛ̀ Àrôn.
58005005	M̀banmbɔʼ nɛ kuʼ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Nun nɛʼ nɛ twule kǎn nun nɛʼ, à shɛ̀ lɛ nun ni ti mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yænne nun, à shɛ̀ lɛ̀ nun lɛ: «Wù ni Mwɛn nyɛ̀m, mǔn, mùn cìâ ǹlìmmì ɗyě kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum nun lɛ mùn ni yee wû.»
58005006	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kònndì tì lɛʼ cìcì ndɔʼ lɛ̀ Mwɛn nyon lɛ: «Wù yɛ̌ ɓɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɗwùmɗwùm lɛ̀ ɗwùmɗwùm wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ tòen.»
58005007	Kwan sɛ Yesù ɓe fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, à lìmme lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinni ǹkimmɔʼ lɛ̀ nun swæti nun kɛ ywi nun. Kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ ywi nyon ti kwukwâʼ, à ɓe M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keli, à ɗɔa nun han, lɛ̀ à tǎ kwe lɛ̀ ǹkwu kimmi. Li, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywɔe ǹkeli yon, à yìmnzì nun ɓe kɛ nyě ywi nɛ nun ywie kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛ̂m ntwiʼ sɛ nun lwinnzâ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yon.
58005008	Kwo fɛʼ she nun ɓe Mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b si, à yɛnne vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ɓǎ nun yusaʼ swum sɛ ɓɛ lon lɛ m̀mwumnzi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58005009	Kɛ mkpeli yɛ nun kpele mwǔ she yon wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, à ti Ci-nswæti ɓwum hwæn ɓye ta nun mwumnzi, ɓǎ ɓon cinni ǹzison ɗwùmɗwùm.
58005010	Nun nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tònnzì kɛ gbaʼ mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ zwɛ̂m wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ tòen.
58005011	Ɓwiʼ cinni ywum mèan yɛ ɓwiʼ yili ɓwiʼ sannzi ɓyin kɛ lɛʼ Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ si nun. Son, à si lɛ̀ ɓyin kyìbli kɛ nywɔʼ sù lɛʼ màzwùm, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓi mɛ̀ mwù nshimmea.
58005012	Sɛ yile lilɛ lwɛn lɛ ɓyin ɓɛ lisàʼ tì kuʼ ɓwùlu, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɗunme ywum yusea ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê kɛ nywi nzæʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Son, ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ màzwǔm ɗun kifɛʼ ɓyin mwu lwɛn. A yili lɛ ɓɛ konndì tì ɓyin ywum yɛ ɓɛ sɛtâ ɓyin lìsea mbyî lìsea ɓe. Ɓyin ɓi wɛ̌ ɓwɛn ɓye wòli kifɛʼ ǹji ji nyɛ̌ ɓwum ɓye ti swummɔa ta ji, ɓyin kɛ nywon nywon.
58005013	Mwɛn nɛ kɛ nywon nywon fyaʼ, à ni mwɛnnzea. Ǎ lìmmi kifɛʼ ǹkyììli kɛ nyinnìm swum lwɛn lɛ̀ swum ɓyɛbbi.
58005014	Paʼ ji ɓwum ɓye ti swummɔa si kyi. Ɓon ɓɛ ti swummɔa ɓi, ɓɛ cinnâ mɛ̀ mfɔ̀kàʼ, ɓɛ limmì ǹkɛ̌ ŋkyììli kɛ nyinnìm lwɛn lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi.
58006001	Kɛ à si li, kɛ̀nnênì mbyî lɛ̀ ǹyusaʼ ywum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ cinnènì ǹlìmmì ye ɓwum swummɔa. Ɓa ɓwiʼ lwæbbènì kɛ ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ sɛte nun yusea nywi nun. Ye ɓwiʼ sɛte nun yusea kɛ nywi yi ɓe wɛ̌ m̀fɔ̀ʼ mɛ kwù nye. Sɛ cibbi kan lɛ ɓwiʼ kɛn tì ɗyî ɓe ǹdùʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe ɓwum shɛ̌ lɛ, ɓɛ kwɛbsi m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyan, ɓa ɓɛ ci tì mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ tà ɓon ǹzison ɓwuli, lɛ ɓɛ konndì tì kuʼ ǹlim kɛ̌ kɛ nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58006002	Sɛ yili kan lɛ ɓwiʼ konndì tì kuʼ ɓyin swum sɛ ɓɛ lon lɛ ǹjimnzi ɓwum lìsea tî ɓe, shìkì ɓwiʼ lwæb tì kuʼ ɓyin lìsea wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ ta mwum mɛ̀ fyàʼ sati nywi kɛ jin Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Ɓwiʼ ɓa tî kuʼ ɓyin kònndì shɛ̌ wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ mwum hwæn yìmnzi kɛ ywi nun, lɛ̀ she nun yɛ̌ tì ɓwum mɛ̀ kæ̌ʼ mmlɔ̀kàʼ lànnzi.
58006003	Son, ɓwiʼ yɛ mɛʼ kpæmmi lɛ̀ ǹyusaʼ ywum màzwùm ye kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, ɓɛshɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili.
58006004	Shi ɓɛ li, ɓwum ɓye mɛʼ sanmâ kɛ mwu kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓye ɓwɛbbâ ywum yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ ɓwum ɓyon fɛ, ɓɛ yeâ tì kuʼ M̀pùn Nsanmi kɛ mɛ nlim nyan nun, ɓe nyě yi, ɓɛshɛ ɓon pæʼ kwù kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, mbyi ɓǎn nyɛ̌ mwum ndɔʼ wòli à tɛ̀lì ɓon ɓe mbyi nlwɛn nun.
58006005	Ɓwum màzwùm, ɓe lɛ̀ ɓɛ limmâ lɛ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yi swum lwɛn, ɓɛ limmì tì kuʼ ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ cinni kɛ wan nyɛ̌ nywæb nun.
58006006	Li, ɓɛshɛ ɓon pæʼ kwù kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, mbyi ɓǎn nyɛ̌ ɓɛ woli ɓɛ tɛli ɓon ɓe ɓǎ ɓon yonnzì tì m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyan ɓe. Ntwiʼ sɛ à si wɛ̌ ɓwum màzwùm ta tî Mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywummɔa tî ɓe ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛm, ɓɛ simmɔ̀ʼ tì nun ɓe kɛ ŋkwìn ɓwum nun.
58006007	Cɛênì fɛʼ ndɛm nɛ mvu tǎ nwi kwe yì kwan hwæn, ywum ɗyìm kwan tì kwe mèan yɛ yɛ ci-ndɛm ni kpea. Sɛ lisaʼ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgæ̀nnâ ndɛm màzwùm.
58006008	Son, ɓɛshɛ yì lwon lɛ̀ yì kæʼ ɓyibbɔa yɛ ta suʼ twæʼ kwe, lɛ̀ ndɛm lwɛn nɛ ɓan. Kwan læ̀bbi sɛ ɓa tî ɓɛ, lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b keâ nun. Sɛ ti kɛ̌n ɓɛ̌n mmlɔ̀kàʼ lɛ̀ à pyìâ mɛ̀ ɓwu.
58006009	Ti lɛ̀ ɓyin, mɛ̀ ŋwè ɓyɛ̂m, kwo yili ɓwiʼ lɛʼ fɛʼ li, ɓwiʼ limmi lwɛn lɛ ɓyin, làn nyin, ɓyin ta mbyi nlwɛn ɗwon, mbyi nyɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓyin swæti nlim.
58006010	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni ǹlwinni. Ǹlim ɓa nun fye lɛ̀ she sɛ ɓyin ɓe nun cǐ, kònndì lɛ̀ ǹyili yɛ ɓyin ɓe nun lìsea kɛ mkpaʼ yɛ ɓyin ta mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓwum Yesù Kristò kpea. M̀kpaʼ màzwùm, ɓyin ta kɛ̀n mbyî lɛ̀ yon fyaʼ.
58006011	Lɛʼ sɛ ǹlim ta ɓwiʼ ɗyi nlim, à si lɛ mwum nyin hwæn, à kpæm mɛʼ a kɛn ɓɛ̌n mmlɔ̀kàʼ, ɓǎ nun yê swum sɛ nun tǎ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ son lɛ̀ ǹdùʼ nun.
58006012	Ɓwiʼ tà ka yili lɛ ɓyin ɓwæti mwù. Son, swum sɛ ɓwiʼ yili à si lɛ ɓyin ɗwon mɛ̀ kwù ɓwum ɓye ta ǹlim kɛ̌ kɛ nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ ɓɛ tì mɛ̀ ci-mɓæn nlim. Li, ɓwum màzwùm ta swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ǹkàli lɛ nun yɛ̌ ɓon fɛ yě.
58006013	Kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìekàʼ ǹkàli lɛ̀ Abràhâm lɛ nun ywìmɛ nyǐ swum ndɔʼ fɛ, à lɔ̀e ǹdɔ̀ʼ lɛ̀ jin shon nɛʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ jin mwum ndɔʼ nyɛ̌ cinni ǹtwu à làn nun ɓe kǎn.
58006014	À shɛ̀e lɛ: «Lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m, mùn yɛ̌ wù ŋgæ̀nni. Mvu ɓwum ywû yɛ ɓɛ mèan ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ.»
58006015	Abràhâm ywɔʼ li, à fyimni kuʼ kɛ mɓònŋgàʼ nun li, han à cinni swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe nun ǹkàli lɛ̀ son.
58006016	Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ kwan sɛ ɓwum ta ǹdɔ̀ʼ lǒ, ɓɛ ta lɔ̀ʼ lɛ̀ jin swum sɛ cinni ǹtwu sɛ lan ɓon. Ǹdɔ̀ʼ nɛ ɓon ta lɔ̀ʼ ni ni swum sɛ ta dwìnni mlɔ̀si kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum nun.
58006017	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yile lɛ̀ nun lisàʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye nun cìe ǹkàli lɛ̀ jin shan seansean lɛ kwo yɛn sɛ ci fɛʼ, nun ɓà tî ŋwum kwɛbsi ɓe. Li nɛ ci, nun cìe ǹkàli, à kònndì tì ǹdɔ̀ʼ lǒ.
58006018	Ŋ̀kàli yɛ nun kàle, lɛ̀ ǹdɔ̀ʼ nɛ nun lɔ̀e, ywum ɓî màzwǔm wòli kan yɛ kwɛbsi, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b tà ka ɓwum pɔkea nlim. Son sɛ ci, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ konnâ mɛ̀ kwù, ɓwiʼ kɛn gwùmnì mɛ kwù ɓyon nji, ywum ɓî yi ta ɓwiʼ m̀ɓònnzàʼ fɛ ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ɗyi kimmi kɛ nywi swum sɛ ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ son.
58006019	Swum sɛ ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ son si, son sɛ ta cì ɓwiʼ ton mɛ̀ ywiʼ ɗɔ̀ʼ kwan hwæn, wɛ̌ tà shɛ m̀kpæ̌ʼ nɗuʼ ta cìʼ ɗyili moan kyɔʼ m̀kpæmmi. Jenɛ, mbyi ŋkɛ̌n ɗun cìcì sanmi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ti ɓwiʼ swiʼ ǹlwon.
58006020	Mbyi ni nɛ Yesù sɛte fyi zwimbyiʼ shɛʼ, à ɗun kwe ntwiʼ mɛ mwù nyɛʼ. À ti mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɗwùmɗwùm lɛ̀ ɗwùmɗwùm wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ tòen.
58007001	Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ nɛ ɓwiʼ ta lɛʼ nɛ, à ɓe m̀vɛ̀n nɛ kɛ Sàlɛ̂m, à ɓɛ tì ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ làn ywum hwæn lɛ̀ ǹtwu. Kwan sɛ Abràhâm ɓe mbyi wì fyònni, lɛ̀ à wuâ mɛ̀ mvɛ̀n mèan, Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ ni kɛ̀nne nun ɓònŋgea mbyi nun, à ŋgæ̀nnì nun.
58007002	Ywum yɛ Abràhâm cinne kwe wì nun hwæn, à kyììlea yon nyinnìm cìcǐ wûm, à pæ̀ʼ kì-wûm, à fɛ Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ. Jin Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ si, sù ni lɛ m̀vɛ̀n nlwinni. À kònnde ɓɛ m̀vɛ̀n flɔa, ntwiʼ sɛ ǹsòn yon ɓe Sàlɛ̂m, sù jin Sàlɛ̂m ni ni lɛ flɔa.
