58007003	M̀vɛ̀n màzwǔm, mwum ndɔʼ lìmmi kan mɛ̀ mbibea ɓyon, shìkì à lìmmì kuʼ ce nyon lɛ̀ mon nyon. Kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓɛ kɔʼ kan kwan ye shon, shìkì ɓɛ kɔʼ kuʼ kwan sɛ nun ywi nun. Kɛ ntwiʼ màzwùm, à si wɛ̌ nun tòen ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɗwùmɗwùm, li, à ni wɛ̌ Yesù, Mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58007004	Cɛênì lɛ fɛʼ ǹtwu yɛ mwum màzwùm cinne. Mwum wɛ̌ Abràhâm li, mbibea ndwun nyɛʼ nɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum Izràɛ̂l kwan kɛ nyè yon shele lwɛn nɛ nun cinne wì nun hwæn, à kyììlì nun nyinnìm cìcǐ wûm, à pæ̀ʼ kì-wûm, à fɛ nun.
58007005	Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ fyǎʼ mvu ɓwum Lèvî yi kwe yɛ ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ pæ̀li nlim, ɓon ɓɛ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ lwuà lɛli lɛ ɓɛ yê kì-wûm lwɛn nɛ ɓwum Izràɛ̂l cinni, kwo fɛʼ she ɓwum Izràɛ̂l ɓi, à ɓi ɓon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ Lèvî ǹŋgyinni, kɛ ɓon hwæn, ɓɛ cinni mbibea m̀bɔʼ Abràhâm.
58007006	Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ, làn nyon, ǎ cinni kan swum ndɔʼ kɛ mvu ɓwum mɛ Lèvî nun. Kwo fɛʼ she nun ɓe ǹkyìn kɛ mvu ɓwum mɛ Lèvî nun si, à yèe kì-wûm lwɛn kɛ fyaʼ Abràhâm, à kònndì Abràhâm ŋgæ̀nni, nun nɛ ɓe lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìâ ǹkàli mbyî lɛ̀ nun.
58007007	Mwum hwæn lìmmi lwɛn lɛ mwumŋkæ̀m nɛ ta mwɛsɔ̀ʼ ŋgæ̀nni.
58007008	Kɛ fyaʼ mvu ɓwum mɛ Lèvî yɛ ta kì-wûm lwɛn yě fyaʼ mɛ ŋgyinni ɓyan, nyɛ̌ tǎ shǐ lǎn ywi nun m̀bɔʼ, à ɓǎn. Ti lɛ̀ Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ nɛ yèe kì-wûm lwɛn Abràhâm, à ni kwan hwæn lɛ̀ mɛʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
58007009	Ɓwiʼ woli ɓwiʼ lɛʼ lɛ Lèvî nun nɛʼ, nun nɛ mvu ɓwum yon ta yì kì-wûm lwɛn ɓwulu yě, à fɛe tì kuʼ kì-wûm lwɛn shon lɛ̀ Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ kɛ mfɛ yɛ Abràhâm fɛe nun.
58007010	M̀fɛ yɛ ɓwiʼ lɛʼ lɛ à fɛâ, ɓwiʼ lɛʼ kan yon ɗin. Ɓwiʼ lɛʼ ntwiʼ kwan sɛ Abràhâm fɛe kì-wûm lwɛn shon lɛ̀ Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ, ɓe lɛ̀ ǎ ye kifɛʼ ɓwɛn. Sɛ lisaʼ lɛ Lèvî nɛ ɓe læm ɓwɛn ɓyon nun fɛâ kuʼ. Fɛ màzwùm cì ɓwiʼ ǹlìmmì lɛ Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ lǎn Lèvî lɛ̀ ǹtwu.
58007011	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe mɛ̀ lwuà lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓyon kɛ fyaʼ mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɓɛ ɓe ɓwum Lèvî. Son, she sɛ mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɓi ɓe cǐ, sɛ lwinnze kǎn ǹyili Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Sɛ lwinnzè ǹyili yon, lɛ̀ ǎ kwannzê kàn tî ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ndɔʼ nyɛ̌ paʼ tǒn Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ nun. Ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̌ʼ sue kuʼ kwan kɛ mvu ɓwum mɛ Lèvî nun wɛ̌ tà shɛ Àrôn kwean.
58007012	Kɛ kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ mvu ɓwum mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ kwɛbsi, sɛ yili lɛ à kwɛbsi tì kuʼ mɛ̀ lwuà.
58007013	-
58007014	Ŋ̀kwɛbsi màzwùm, ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ yɛ kwɛbsâ ntwiʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù nɛ ɓwiʼ ta lɛʼ shon lɛli nɛ, mvu ɓwum yon yi kyi lɛ̀ ye mɛ Lèvî. Ɓwum hwæn limmi lɔʼ lwɛn lɛ mvu ɓwum yon yi ye mɛ Judà. Kwan sɛ Mòîzɛ̀ lɛle kɛ nywi mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ, ǎ lɛle kì nun lɛʼ ndɔʼ kɛ nywi mvu ɓwum màzwùm. Kwo mwum nyan ndɔʼ m̀bɔʼ ɓǎ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ.
58007015	A si ɓwiʼ mɛʼ seansean lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwɛbsâ mvu ɓwum mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ ǹdɔʼ kweân kɛ paʼ tǒn Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ nun.
58007016	Ɓwum ɓɛ yæ̀n kan nun wɛ̌ tà shɛ mɛ̀ lwuà ɓyan lɛli. Son, à kwan ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ntwiʼ sɛ nun cinni ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ nun yɛ̌ tòn kwan hwæn ɗwùmɗwùm.
58007017	À si wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Wù yɛ̌ ɓɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɗwùmɗwùm lɛ̀ ɗwùmɗwùm wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ Mɛ̀lshìsɛ̀dɛ̂ʼ tòen.»
58007018	Mɛ̀ lwuà ɓye mbyî, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b twɔ̀ʼ ɓyon hwæn, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ cinne kǎn ǹkimmɔʼ, shìkì ɓɛ cinni kuʼ m̀kpaʼ.
58007019	Ntwiʼ sɛ mɛ̀ lwuà ɓi wòli kan ɓɛ fyɔsì ɓwum sanmea kɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Son jenɛ, ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ swum ndɔʼ sɛ lan mɛ̀ lwuà ɓi. Swum màzwùm sɛ ci ɓwiʼ cinni mbyi nɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ kwɛmmi lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58007020	A konndì ɓɛ, kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ Yesù gbaʼ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ fɛ, à lɔ̀e ǹdɔ̀ʼ. Kwan sɛ mɛ̀ Lèvî ɓe làn nyan gbaʼ mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ji, ǎ ɓe kǎn ǹdɔ̀ʼ lǒ.
58007021	Son, kɛ nywi Yesǔ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛle kɛ ndɔ̀ʼ nyon nun lɛ: «Mùn, Nyɛli ywum hwæn, mùn lɔ̀e ǹdɔ̀ʼ lɛ kwo yɛn sɛ ci fɛʼ mùn ɓǎ ŋwum kwɛbsi, wù yɛ̌ ɓɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɗwùmɗwùm lɛ̀ ɗwùmɗwùm.»
58007022	Ǹdɔ̀ʼ nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɔ̀e ni tǎ ɓwiʼ lìsea lɛ Yesù nɛ wɛ̌ ɓì ŋgæn njini ŋgwon kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ŋ̀gwòn màzwùm lèân nyɛ̌ nun sɛte jini mbyî lɛ̀ ɓwum.
58007023	Swum ndɔʼ konndì tì ɓɛ kɛ nywi mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɓye mbyî, à ɓi mèan. Ɓɛ màn kan ɗin, a ɓe ɓɛ, nyɛ̌ ɓɛ kɛmɛ, nun ywimɛ, ɓɛ kɛɔ̀ʼ nyɛ̌ ɗin ɓe ɓàn shon nun.
58007024	Kɛ mbyi Yesù nun, li nɛ ɓan, à ni ɗwùmɗwùm lɛ̀ mɛʼ, mwum ndɔʼ ɓǎ gbaʼ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ shon ji shim.
58007025	Li nɛ ci, à cinni ǹkimmɔʼ kwan hwæn lɛ̀ nun swæti ɓwum ɓye ta kìn kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ nyè yon, ntwiʼ sɛ nun ni kwan hwæn ǹzison, ɓǎ nun keli M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ mɛ mwù ɓwum ɓyon yì kwan mèan hwæn.
58007026	Nun nɛ ɗyi mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ nɛ wòli lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ. À ni ǹsanmi, ǎ tà ka ɓyɛbbi cǐ, kwo ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ m̀bɔʼ ɓà nun nywi, ǎ cinni kan ǹŋwè lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b wasi nun kwe nlim ɗɛb cì shon.
58007027	À ɓǎ wɛ̌ ɓwùlu ɓwumŋkæ̀m mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ a yili kan nun lɛ à fɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ mɛ̀ ŋgyinŋgyin mèan hwæn. Kwan sɛ ɓwùlu ɓwumŋkæ̀m mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɓe sàtìkæ̀ʼ fɛ mɛ mwù ɓwum nun, a ɓe sɛti ɓon yili lɛ ɓɛ fɛ fɛʼ shan nɛʼ. Ti lɛ̀ Yesǔ, mbyi nyon ɓǎ nyǐ. À suʼ sàtìkæ̀ʼ shon fɛ kæ̀mmì fɔʼ, sɛ wolì she nswæti ɓwum hwæn. Sàtìkæ̌ʼ màzwùm si kwæʼ nywi shon sɛ nun fɛe kɛ ywi nun.
58007028	Mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɓye ɓɛ kɛe kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ mɛ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀ nun ɓe ɓwum ɓye woli ɓɛ pyi kɛ ɓyɛbbi nun. Son, ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɔ̀e ǹdɔ̀ʼ lɛ̀ nun, ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm jiâ gbaʼ mɛ lwuǎ Mòîzɛ̀. Mwum nɛ nun kɛ̀e ɓe lɛ̀ mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ni Mwɛn nyon nɛ nun fyɔ̀sâ mwum nlwinni lɛ̀ ǹdùʼ nun. À yɛ̌ ɓɛ li ɗwùmɗwùm lɛ̀ ɗwùmɗwùm.
58008001	Kɛ ywum yɛ ɓwiʼ ta lɛʼ yɛ nun hwæn, mwǔ lɛʼ yi lɛ, paʼ mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ si sɛ ɓwiʼ cinni. À ni ǹtǒn kɛ ɗɛb kɛ fyaʼ ji Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ndwun nɛ kɛ gbaʼ lwun zwɛ̂m.
58008002	Swuʼ she shon si kɛ cìcǐ sanmi nun moan Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. À tǎ she mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ shon cǐ kɛ nye ŋkæ̀mŋkæm nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ gwe, ɓa nyɛ̌ ɓwum ɓɛ gwe lɛ̀ mɛ̀ fyàʼ.
58008003	Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ ɓwumŋkæ̀m mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ hwæn, ɓɛ ɓe ɓon kɛ̌ ɓǎ ɓon fɛ yì sàtìkæ̀ʼ kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Li nɛ yile kuʼ lɛ mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ nyɛʼ cinni kuʼ swum ndɔʼ she nun yɛ̌ fɛ.
58008004	A kièn ɓɛ̀n ɗyě lɛ̀ Yesǔ kɛ fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, ǎ ɓê kǎn ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ndɔʼ ɓi kwe, ɓye ta yì sàtìkæ̀ʼ fɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b wɛ̌ tà shɛ mɛ̀ lwuà mɛ Yudà ta shɛ̀.
58008005	She shɛ ɓon ta cì sukuʼ she shɛ ta lànnzì kɛ nlim ɗɛb gwili. Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ gwili sɛ, ntwiʼ kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ Mòîzɛ̀ yɛ̌ ɗwun gwe lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b shɛ̀e lɛ̀ nun lɛ: «Fɔ̀si mwù kɛ̌, wù kɛ̀n ɗwun si gwe wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn lìsai wù kɛ kpaʼ zwɛ̂m.»
58008006	Son jenɛ, ɓwiʼ yɛn lɛ she sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò lan she mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan ɓi ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun ni tì kuʼ ɓwiʼ swum njini ŋgwon nyinnìm shɛʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ŋgwòn nywæb nɛ lǎn nyɛ̌ ɓe mbyî nun, ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìâ ǹkàli kɛ ŋgwòn màzwùm nun lɛ̀ ywum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm ye lan ywum ye ɓe mbyî.
58008007	Ɓɛshɛ ǹgwòn nyɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b sɛte jini mbyî ɓê swum sɛ kɛnne mbyi nlwɛn nɛ nun yile nun, ǎ konndè kàn tî ǹdɔʼ jini ɓe ɓǎn nyɛ̌ mbyî nun.
58008008	M̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ǹgwòn màzwǔm kɛ̀nne kǎn mbyi nlwɛn nɛ nun yile nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinni swum wɛ̀si kɛ nywi ɓwum ɓyon, à shɛ̀ lɛ̀ ɓon lɛ: «Ywɔênì fɛʼ, ǹgyìn ɓa tî mèan yɛ mùn yɛ̌ ǹgwòn nywæb jini lɛ̀ ɓwum Izràɛ̂l, kònndì lɛ̀ ɓwum Judà.
58008009	Ŋ̀gwòn nyɛ̌ mùn yɛ̌ jini ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓon ɓǎ ɓɛ wɛ̌ nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ jine ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mbibea ɓyan kwan sɛ mùn ɓænne ɓon fyaʼ, mùn kwannzi ɓon kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Èjîb nun. Ɓe nyě yi, ɓɛ ɗon ɓon ǹɗwonnzi ŋgwon màzwùm. Mùn kuʼ, mùn pæ̀ʼ mùn fyàʼ lɛ̀ ɓon. Mǔn, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyan nɛ lɛli li.
58008010	Ŋ̀gwòn nɛ mùn yɛ̌ jini lɛ̀ ɓwum Izràɛ̂l kwan sɛ kwan màzwùm yɛ wòlǐ, à ni lɛ mùn yɛ̌ cì ɓɛ limmì mɛ̀ lwuà ɓyɛ̂m, mùn ɗyili tì kuʼ mɛ̀ nlim nyan kwan hwæn kɛ nlim. Mùn yɛ̌ ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyan, ɓɛ ɓɛ kuʼ ɓwum ɓyɛ̂m.
58008011	Mwum ndɔʼ ɓà tî ŋwum yon gwànnzi lɛ̀ ǹlìsàʼ ɓwulu mbyi nyɛ̀m, shìkì à shɛ̀ kuʼ lɛ̀ ŋgyinni nyon lɛ: “Lìmmi M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b”. Ntwiʼ sɛ a yɛ ɓɛ lɛ̀ mwum hwæn lìmmâ mùn, ǹwaʼ yɛ kɛ ɓwumŋkæ̀m nun, a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kɛ ɓwɛsɔʼ nun.
58008012	Mɛ̀ lɛʼ nɛ ɓon ɓe pyìtàʼ hwæn, mùn yɛ̌ ɓon nun zùsi, mùn fyeli tì kuʼ ǹlim lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓon ɓe cì.»
58008013	Ŋ̀gwòn nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lon lɛ ǹgwòn nywæb ni, sɛ lisaʼ lɛ nyɛ̌ m̀bɔʼ ti nun mɛʼ pwìn. Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ swum sɛ ti pwìn, she ɓa tî kpaʼ lɛ̀ swum ndɔʼ, sɛ nzwonmɛ kwæʼ, ɓɛ ɗwiɔ̀ʼ son twuʼ.
58009001	Kɛ ŋgwòn nyɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b sɛte jini lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓyon, à fɛe ɓon mbyi nɛ ɓon yɛ nun ɗɔa nun. Ɓɛ cinne tì cìcì sanmi ndɔʼ sɛ ɓon ɓe nun ɗɔa kwe.
58009002	Ɓɛ gwe ɗwun ndɔʼ, ɓɛ linndi son nyinnìm lɛ̀ mɛ̀ fyàʼ plê. Cìcì she kwɛmmi lɛ̀ ŋwum ɗwun, ɓɛ ɓe son lon lɛ cìcǐ sanmi. Ywum yɛ ɓe kwe ɓe lɛ lâm ndwun nɛ cinne mɛ̀ win nshanmɓì, lɛ̀ tâblɛ̀ nɛ ɓɛ ɓe brɛ̂ʼ kɛ̌ zwɛm lɛ̀ jin Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58009003	Fyàʼ fɔʼ yɛ ɓɛ ghɔe lɛ̀ mɛ̀ fyàʼ plê yi, ɓɛ ɓe yon lon lɛ cìcì she sanmi she lan yì cìcǐ sanmea hwæn.
58009004	Kɛ kwe cìcì she sanmi she lan yì cìcǐ sanmea hwæn si, ywum yɛ ɓe kwe ɓe lɛ: mɛ̀ kwìʼ ɓye ɓɛ ɓwɛmme lɛ̀ gɔ̂l, cìcǐ màzwùm sɛ ɓɛ ɓe mɛ̀ wɔ̀ʼ mɛ nwǔm lwɛn twɛ̀nni kwe; kònndì lɛ̀ kwìtì nɛ cinni ywum ŋgwon kɛ nlim. Kwìtì màzwùm hwæn, ɓɛ konndì nun ywɔsi lɛ̀ gɔ̂l. Ywum yɛ ɓe kɛ kwitì màzwùm nun ɓe lɛ: nywon nɛ ɓɛ cie lɛ̀ gɔ̂l nyɛ̌ ɓe lɛ̀ mânɛ̀ kɛ nlim; kɛ mbɛti, ǹtwɔ̌ʼ Àrôn yɛ twæbbe man; kònndì lɛ̀ yì ɓlon yɛ ɓɛ pae lɛ̀ ǹgwɔ̀ʼ, ye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɔe mɛ̀ lwuà kɛ zwɛ̂m lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ŋgwon nun.
58009005	Kɛ kwitì màzwùm zwɛ̂m, ɓɛ cie yì fɔ̀kì mɛ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓî. Yì fɔ̀kì ɓî yi ɓe lìsàʼ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni kwe. Mɛ̀ kwɛb ɓyan ɓe ndæ̀ti, ɓɛ kannzi cìcì sɛ ɓɛ ɓe sàtìkæ̀ʼ fɛ ɓǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b zusì ɓwum ɓyɛbbi nyan. Ywum yɛ mùn tannzi yi, mǔn wòli kan mùn sannzi yon jenɛ hwæn.
58009006	Kɛ mfɔ̀sì yɛ ɓon fɔse ywum yi, mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɓe ɗun kwe nlim ɗwun màzwùm mɛ̀ ŋgyinŋgyin mèan hwæn ɓǎ ɓon ci she shan.
58009007	Ti lɛ̀ fyǎʼ fɔʼ yɛ ɓɛ ghɔe lɛ̀ plè, mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ nɛ ɓe suʼ ɗun kwe. Kɛ nɗun màzwùm nun, à ɓe suʼ ɗun kwe kɛ ɗwǔm fɔʼ nun kæ̀mmì fɔʼ kuʼ. À ɓe ywǐ ɗun, ǎ shi kàn lɛ̀ mvæb fyaʼ yɛ nun yɛ̌ sàtìkæ̀ʼ fɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ntwiʼ ɓyɛbbi nɛ nun cìâ, lɛ̀ tì kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi nyɛ̌ ɓwùlu ɓwum ciâ.
58009008	M̀pùn Nsanmi tà ɓwiʼ lìsea kɛ ywum màzwùm nun lɛ, kwan sɛ pwìn ɗwun kɛ kwe, mbyi nyɛ̌ ɓwum yɛ ɗun kwe cìcǐ sanmi she ǹkæ̀mŋkæm ɓǎn.
58009009	Ywum màzwùm ɓe li, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ cinni m̀bɔ̀kì kɛ nywi ywum yɛ ɓɛnnâ jenɛ. Yɛ ta ɓwiʼ lìsea lɛ, ɓwum ɓye ɓe M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗwon kɛ mbyi màzwùm nun, yì sàtìkæ̀ʼ yɛ ɓon ta nun fɛ hwæn, yɛ wòli kan yɛ ci mɛ̀ nlim nyan ɓɛ zwum ǹsanmea kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58009010	Ntwiʼ sɛ mɛ̀ lwuà màzwùm hwæn ta suʼ kɛ nywi ywum ji, ywum nwi, kònndì lɛ̀ kɛ nywi yi ɓɛ̌ʼ mpɔ̀sàʼ ywum. Yì ɓɛ̌ʼ màzwùm suʼ ɗin lɛ ye mɛʼ zwɛ̂m. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe yon kwan kwæʼ li, han a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kwan sɛ nun yɛ̌ ye nywæb kwannzi.
58009011	Jenɛ, Yesù Kristò ɓɛ̀nnâ, nun nɛ mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ nɛ ɓɛ̀n ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ywum lwukea yɛ ti ɓwiʼ fyaʼ. Swuʼ she sɛ nun tǎ she shon cì kɛ nlim cinni ǹtwu, sɛ ɓɛ tì lwɛn, sɛ lan ɗwun sɛ ɓɛ gwee lɛ̀ mɛ̀ fyàʼ. Swuʼ she shon si ɓa she ɓwum ɓɛ gwe lɛ̀ mɛ̀ fyàʼ, shìkì sɛ ɓɛ kuʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun.
58009012	Kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ Yesù yɛ̌ ɗun cìcì she sanmi she lan yì cìcǐ sanmea hwæn si, ǎ ɗuen kǎn lɛ̀ mvæb mɛ mgbæm pɔʼ fyaʼ, kònndì lɛ̀ ye ɓwɛn mɛ nje. Son, mvæb yon nɛʼ yɛ nun swǐ kɛ nɗun yɛ nun sue ɗun kwe kæ̀mmì fɔʼ. Li, à nywæ̀sâ ɓwiʼ kɛ ɓyɛbbi nyɛʼ nun ǹgyìnmbɔʼ.
58009013	Kɛ kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî nun, mvæb mɛ ɗyim nje lɛ̀ ye mɛ mgbæm pɔʼ ye ɓɛ ɓe ɓwum gwìli nywi wole yɛ sannzi ɓwum ɓye pyie mɛ̀ lwuà, ɓǎ ɓɛ fyonnì sanmea wɛ̌ tà she mɛ̀ lwuà yili, shindɔʼ mɛ̀ ɓwu mɛ nje ɓɛ ɓon ɓe twɛ̀n lɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓwum nywæsi nywi.
58009014	Ɓɛshɛ ywum màzwùm cinni ǹkimmɔʼ nsannzi ɓwum li, kpɛ̀m nyi nɛ lɛ̀ mvæb Yesù? Yesù Kristò, ɓyɛbbi m̀bɔʼ ndɔʼ ɓe kǎn nun nywi, li, à fɛe sàtìkæ̀ʼ lɛ̀ kwæʼ nywi shon lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ Mpùn Nsanmi nun nɛ yɛ̌ tòn ɗwùmɗwùm lɛ̀ ɗwùmɗwùm. Mvæb yon yɛ nun fɛe yi ta mɛ̀ nlim nyɛʼ sannzi, ɓwiʼ læ̀kì tì mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ tà ɓwiʼ ǹzison ɓwuli cǐ. Mvæb fɔʼ yi ta cì ɓwiʼ ci she lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ cinni ǹzison kwan hwæn.
58009015	Li nɛ ci, Yesù Kristò nɛ mwum nɛ jine ǹgwòn kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓwum ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ lon lɛ ɓyi ɓi ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon hwæn, ɓɛ yɛ ywum lwukea yɛ nun cìe ǹkàli lɛ nun yɛ̌ kɛ̀ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ myin nyan yě, ɓɛ cinni yon ǹgyìnmbɔʼ. Ɓɛ yɛ ywum màzwùm cinni li, ntwiʼ sɛ Yesù Kristò ywiâ ɓǎ nun libbaʼ ɓwum kɛ ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓon ɓe cì mbyî nun kwan sɛ ɓɛ ɓe tòn kɛ pwìn ŋgwòn nun.
58009016	Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ kɛ ŋkwannzi yɛ ɓɛ ta ywǐ ɗèwà mɛ kwiʼ kwannzi, sɛ yili lɛ ɓɛ limmì seansean lɛ mwum nɛ kɔe ɗèwǎ màzwùm ywiâ.
58009017	Ntwiʼ ɓɛshɛ mwum màzwǔm kɛ lɛ̀ mɛʼ, ɓɛ wòli kan ɓɛ kwannzi son, ɓɛ ɗunmi ywum kyììlea. Son, kwan sɛ nun ywiâ, ɓɛ woli ɓɛ kwannzi son pisean, ɓɛ ci swum sɛ ɗèwǎ màzwùm lɛli lɛ ɓɛ ci lɛ̀ mɛ̀ kwiʼ.
58009018	Son sɛ ci, kwo fɛʼ pwìn ŋgwòn nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b jine lɛ̀ ɓwum, ǎ ɓe kǎn jini shìkì swum ndɔʼ ywi.
58009019	Mòîzɛ̀ sɛte ɓwum mɛ̀ lwuà ɓye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fi nun fyaʼ shɛ̌, ɓe nyě yi, à sheli mvæb ɓwɛn mɛ nje, lɛ̀ ye mɛ mgbæm, kònndì lɛ̀ mlǎʼ nun, à jib tì ŋgæʼ nɛ ɓɛ ta lon lɛ ìsɔ̂b lɛ̀ ǹnywùn nzwumŋgan yɛ nun pɛnnze lɛ̀ mlǎʼ pèan. À ɗunmi ɓwum mvæb gwìli nywi lɛ̀ nun, à kònndì tì gwìsì kɛ ɗèwà mɛ lwuà nun.
58009020	À tǎ shɛ̀ lɛ: «Mvæb ŋgwon yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b jini lɛ̀ ɓyin lɛ ɓyin ɗwon mɛ̀ lwuà ɓyon, à yɛ.»
58009021	À kònndì tì kuʼ ɗwun Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b gwìsi lɛ̀ mvæb, lɛ̀ ywum yɛ ɓe kwe nlim hwæn.
58009022	Ntwiʼ kɛ mɛ lwuà nun, mvæb yɛ ɗyi swum sɛ ɓɛ ta màn ywum hwæn sannzi nun. Mvæb shi kyì, mbyi nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ mwum ɓyɛbbi zùsi nun ɓǎn.
58009023	Li, ywum yɛ ɓɛ fɔe mbyî kɛ nɗwon Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, yɛ gwili ywum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm yɛ kɛ nlim ɗɛb, a ɓe yili lɛ ɓɛ sannzi ywum ton yi lɛ̀ sàtìkæ̀ʼ. Son, ti lɛ̀ ywum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm ye nlim ɗɛb yon nɛʼ, a yili sàtìkæ̀ʼ she lwɛn she lan ye ɓɛ ɓe fɛ mbyî. Sàtìkæ̌ʼ màzwùm ɓe she Yesù.
58009024	Kwan sɛ Yesù Kristò fɛe sàtìkæ̀ʼ shon, ǎ ɗuen kǎn cìcì sanmi she ɓwum ɓɛ gwe lɛ̀ mɛ̀ fyàʼ, she gwili she ǹkæ̀mŋkæm kɛ nlim ɗɛb. Son, à ɗuɔn kɛ nlim ɗɛb, jenɛ, à ni swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à tà ɓwiʼ ǹgìm ɗyi.
58009025	Kwan sɛ nun ɗuen kwe, ǎ ɓe kǎn kwæʼ nywi shon fɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kæ̀mmì mèan wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwumŋkæ̀m mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɓe yì sàtìkæ̀ʼ yan fɛ. Ɓɛ ɓe ɗun kɛ cìcì she sanmi she lan yì cìcǐ sanmea hwæn yì ɗwùm hwæn lɛ̀ mvæb mɛ nyæ̀m fyaʼ, ɓa yan nɛʼ.
58009026	A Yesù ciè wɛ̌ ɓon, ǎ yɛnnè vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kæ̀mmì mèan ǹdìkǎʼ nɗunmi ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. Son, à sue ɓɛ̀n kæ̀mmì fɔʼ kɛ mmlɔ̀kàʼ ŋgyìn nun, à fɛ kwæʼ nywi shon lɛ̀ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɓǎ nun mlɔsì ɓyɛbbi kɛ nywi ɓwum ǹgyìnmbɔʼ.
58009027	Mwum hwæn yɛ̌ ywi kæ̀mmì fɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b shɛ̀e. Kɛ nyě ywi, à yɛ̌ làn kɛ kyìtæ̀ʼ nun.
58009028	Li nɛ kuʼ kɛ nywi Yesù, à sɛte kwæʼ nywi shon fɛ lɛ̀ sàtìkæ̀ʼ kæ̀mmì fɔʼ, ɓǎ nun zusì ɓwum ɓyɛbbi nyan ǹgyìnmbɔʼ. À yɛ̌ tì kònndi ɓɛ̀n ɓe. M̀ɓɛ̌n màzwùm ɓa ɓɛ ye ǹzùsǐ ɓyɛbbi, son, yɛ yɛ ɓɛ ye ǹnywæ̀sì ɓwum ɓye ta nun ɓònŋgea.
58010001	Mɛ̀ lwuà ɓye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe Mòîzɛ̀ fyaʼ ɓe gwili ywum lwukea yɛ yɛ ɓɛ̀n. Ɓɛ ɓe kǎn ywum lwukea màzwùm yôn nɛʼ. Son sɛ ci, kɛ yi sàtìkæ̀ʼ yɛ ɓɛ ta fɛkaʼ yì ɗwǔm mèan hwæn nun, mɛ̀ lwuà màzwǔm wòli kan ɓɛ fyɔsì ɓwum ɓye ta kwɛmmi lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b sanmea.
58010002	A ɓê lɛ mɛ̀ lwuà màzwùm ta ɓwum fyɔ̀si sanmea, ɓɛ ɗonnzè kǎ m̀fɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ? Ɓê lilɛ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nlim ɓwum ɓɛ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗɔa ti ǹsanmi, ɓɛ limmè kǎn lɛ ɓon ɓi ta ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ cǐ.
58010003	Son, yì sàtìkæ̀ʼ yɛ ɓon ta fɛ yi ta ɓwum ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓon ta cì ɓùnnzi yì ɗwǔm mèan hwæn.
58010004	Ntwiʼ sɛ mvæb mɛ ɗyim nje lɛ̀ ye mɛ mgbæm pɔʼ cinni kan ǹkimmɔʼ nzùsì ɓwum ɓyɛbbi.
58010005	Li nɛ ci, kwan sɛ Yesù ɓe lɛ̀ à yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, à shɛ̀ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ: «Yì sàtìkæ̀ʼ yɛ ɓwum ta wû fɛ hwæn tà ka wû ǹlim lwukea. Son, wù fɔ̀ʼ mûn kwæʼ nywi ɓǎ mùn fɛ wù son ɓe.
58010006	Mɛ̀ nyæ̀m ɓɛ ɓɛ ta twìnnɔ̀ʼ lɛ̀ sàtìkæ̀ʼ, kònndì lɛ̀ ɓye ɓɛ fɛ kɛ ntwiʼ nzùsǐ ɓyɛbbi, ɓon ɓɛ tà ka wû ǹlim lwukea.
58010007	Li nɛ ci, mùn shɛ̀ lɛ: “Yee M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, mùn ni ti nɛ. Mùn kǐn ɓǎ mùn ci swum sɛ wù yili, wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ jin shɛ̂m nun kɛ ɗèwà mɛ lwuà swû nun.” »
58010008	Kɛ cì ton sɛ, Yesù sɛte lɛʼ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni yili kan yì sàtìkæ̀ʼ yɛ ɓyi ɓi ta fɛ, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nyæ̀m ɓye ɓyi ɓi ta twìnnɔ̀ʼ lɛ̀ sàtìkæ̀ʼ, kònndì lɛ̀ ɓye ɓyi ɓi ta fɛ lɛ̀ ntwiʼ nzùsǐ ɓyɛbbi. Son, ɓwiʼ limmi lɔʼ lwɛn lɛ ywum màzwùm hwæn li, mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili lɛ ɓwum ci li.
58010009	Kɛ nyě yɛ nun lɛli ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ton yi, à shɛ̀ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ: Yee M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, nun ni ti nɛ. Nun ni kǐn ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun ɓǎ nun ni ci swum sɛ nyǐ ni tǎ yili. Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ nun lɛli li ni lìsaʼ ɓwiʼ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b twɔ̀â mɛ̀ pwǐn sàtìkæ̀ʼ, à kɛ̀ she Yesù ɓe ɓǎn màzwùm nun.
58010010	Li, Yesù lwinnzâ swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, son sɛ ci, ɓwiʼ ti jenɛ kɛ swiʼ shon sanmea, ntwiʼ sɛ Yesù Kristò fɛe kwæʼ nywi shon wɛ̌ sàtìkæ̀ʼ. Ywi nɛ nun ywi kæ̀mmì fɔʼ ni wòlâ ǹswæti ɓwum ǹgyìnmbɔʼ.
58010011	Mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̌ʼ ɓe kǎn làn nyan yìnnì lɛ̀ m̀fɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ. Ɓɛ ɓe suʼ lwæ̀b ǹɗyimi lɛ̀ she mɛ̀ ŋgyinŋgyin. Ɓɛ ɓe sàtìkæ̀ʼ fɛɔʼ mbyî, ɓɛ fɛɔ̀ʼ ɓe. Son, yì sàtìkæ̀ʼ yɛ ɓon ɓe fɛ mbyî yì kwan hwæn yi, yɛ wòle kǎn yɛ zusì ɓwum ɓyɛbbi nyan.
58010012	Son, Yesù Kristò fɛe làn nyon kæ̀mmì fɔʼ, she cinni ǹkimmɔʼ nzùsì ɓwum ɓyɛbbi ǹgyìnmbɔʼ. À fɛe son li, à kɛ̀n tòn njiʼ fyaʼ ji Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58010013	Jenɛ, à ti ɓònŋgàʼ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ nun mɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnzì ɓyon kɛ mɛ kwù nji.
58010014	Li, kɛ sàtìkæ̌ʼ fɔʼ shon sɛ nun fɛe nun, à sannzâ ɓwum ɓyon kɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à fyɔ̀si ɓon ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓwum lwukea ǹgyìnmbɔʼ.
58010015	Ywum yɛ ton yɛ hwæn, M̀pùn Nsanmi tà ti kuʼ ɓwiʼ lìsea lɛ a yi lɛŋkæ̀m. Ntwiʼ kwan sɛ nun sɛti lɛʼ lɛ:
58010016	«Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛʼ lɛ: “Ŋ̀gwòn nɛ mùn yɛ̌ jini lɛ̀ ɓwum kwan sɛ kwan màzwùm yɛ wòlǐ, à ni lɛ: Mùn yɛ̌ mɛ̀ nlim nyan ɗyili kwan hwæn kɛ mɛ lwuà ɓyɛ̂m nun, mùn cì ɓɛ limmì ɓon.” »
58010017	À kònndì lɛʼ lɛ: «Mùn yɛ̌ ǹlim fyeli lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ ɓon ciâ.»
58010018	Kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b zùsâ ɓwum ɓyɛbbi nyan hwæn, yì sàtìkæ̀ʼ yɛ ɓɛ ta fɛ ntwiʼ nzùsǐ ɓyɛbbi cinni kan tî kpaʼ.
58010019	Kɛ à si li, mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, mbyi ti ɓwiʼ swiʼ ǹlwon nyɛ̌ ɓwiʼ yɛ ɗun kɛ cìcǐ sanmi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun kɛ ntwiʼ mvæb yɛ Yesù Kristò swìe kɛ mɛ mwù nyɛʼ.
58010020	Yesù nɛ ɗwo ɓwiʼ mbyi nywæb màzwùm kɛ nyæ̀tì plê nɛ ɓe ɓwiʼ cìcǐ sanmi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b gho nun. Ɓwiʼ ti ǹzison cinni kɛ mfyi mbyi màzwùm nun. Plè nɛ ɓe ɓwiʼ mbyi gho nɛ nun ɗwo ni lìsaʼ kwæʼ nywi shon nɛʼ.
58010021	Kɛ ɓwiʼ cinni mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ nyɛʼ nyɛ̌ ɗyi jenɛ mwǔ ŋkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b hwæn,
58010022	kìênnì lɛ, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kwɛmmi kɛ ke Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, kwo wɛn nɛ hwæn lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, shìkì à ɓɛ lɛ̀ ǹkwùm ŋgyi zwum. Ntwiʼ sɛ mvæb Yesù sannzâ ɓwiʼ mɛ̀ nlim zwum. À si wɛ̌ nun pɔ̀si ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ mlǎʼ sanmi.
58010023	Ɓwiʼ kpæmmènì mɛʼ lɛ̀ ǹshɛ̀ ɓwulu Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ yon. Ɓa ɓwiʼ ɓwætènì mwù, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ cìe ɓwiʼ ǹkàli, ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yon tà ka pyì ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
58010024	Ɓwiʼ kɛènì mwù lɛ̀ ǹkimnzi nywi ɓwùlu kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ nun, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ fɔsì ɓwùlu yili mbyî, ɓwiʼ konndì tì kuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea cǐ mbyimbyî.
58010025	Ɓa ɓwiʼ kwin kɛ mɓwɔki ɓwum Yesù nun, wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓyindɔʼ ta kwinnɔʼ. Son, ɓwiʼ kimnzènì ɓwùlu mɛ̀ nlim kɛ zwum. Ɓwiʼ kimnzènì nun lwɛn, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ kwan mɓɛ̌n Yesù Kristò ti kwukwâʼ.
58010026	A ɓwiʼ ɗunmi tì ɓyɛbbi cǐ ɓe lɛ̀ ǹyili nlim yɛʼ, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ limmâ mbyi lɛŋkæ̀m, sàtìkæ̀ʼ ndɔʼ ɓan she yɛ ɓwiʼ ɓyɛbbi màzwùm zùsi.
58010027	Son, ɓwiʼ yɛ suʼ tòn lɛ̀ ǹgwɛnnzi nywi, ɓwiʼ ɓonŋgàʼ kyìtæ̌ʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, lɛ̀ win yɛ yɛ mɛ̀ ci-ɓyìnnzì ɓyon ɓusi.
58010028	Mwum nɛ ɓe lwuà Mòîzɛ̀ lèan kɛ mɛ mɛʼ ɓwum ɓî, shindɔʼ ɓwum lê, kwan sɛ ɓon ɓi yɛ shìtàkwù ɗyi kɛ nywi yon, ɓɛ ɓe kǎ mwum màzwùm wu, shìkì ɓɛ kwɛnnzì kuʼ ǹlim lɛ̀ nun?
58010029	Ti sɛ yɛ ɓɛ ɗyě lɛ lɛ̀ mwum nyɛ̌ tǎ Mwɛn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b njìli, à twɛʼ tì mvæb yon yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b jini ǹgwòn lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ swum ɗin? Mvæb màzwùm yɛ sannze mwum tòn ni kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. A mwum ni konndì tì M̀pùn Nsanmi nɛ tà ɓwiʼ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìsea sìmmɔa, à yɛ̌ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nyɛ̌ lǎn ɓwùlu yì vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni.
58010030	Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ lɛle lɛ: «Mùn nɛ sukuʼ ci-ŋwǐn njì. Mùn nɛ yɛ ɓwum ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓon ta cì fyɔ̀si.» Ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ tòn nɛ ɓǎ pyì ŋgyɔʼ ɗin. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kònndì tì kuʼ lɛʼ lɛ: «Mùn Nyɛli nyin M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, mùn yɛ̌ ɓwum ɓyɛ̂m lànnzi kɛ kyìtæ̀ʼ nun.»
58010031	Kɛ à si li, yǎ paʼ swiʼ ɓyɛbbi sɛ kà ɓɛ lɛ̀ mwum nɛ tǎ kyìtæ̌ʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi ǹzison pyǐ.
58010032	Ɓakeànì fɛʼ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nɛ ɓyin ɓe nlim kwan sɛ ɓyin sɛte lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywo ɗin, kɛ nyě yi, ɓyin ɓe ɓwum vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni fyaʼ ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ. Kwo fɛʼ li, ɓyin fyimne kuʼ li.
58010033	Ɓɛ ɓe ɓyin sìmmɔa kwan ndɔʼ kɛ mɛ mɛʼ ɓwum mèan, ɓɛ yɛnnzi tì ɓyin vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ. Kɛ yi kwan ndɔʼ nun, ɓyin ɓe ɓwùlu kpea kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun kwan sɛ ɓon ɓe vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni.
58010034	Ǹlim ɓe ɓyin kwɛ̀nni lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ɓɛ kɛe nye njè ntwiʼ Yesù. A konndì ɓɛ, kwan sɛ ɓɛ kien ɓyin ywum fyǒn fyaʼ, ɓyin ɗonnze lɛ̀ ǹlim lwɛn lɛ ɓɛ kɛn lɛ̀ yon, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin limme lɛ ɓyin cinni ywum lwukea ndɔʼ ye lan ye ɓɛ yeâ ɓyin fyaʼ. Ywum màzwùm yɛ ɓyin ɓɛ fyaʼ kwan hwæn.
58010035	Kɛ à si li, ɓa ɓyin pæʼ tì ǹlim jenɛ pɛɗin. Ɓɛshɛ ɓyin shi ǹlim pæ̀li, ɓyin yɛ ɗàsì ndwun cinni fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58010036	À si lɔʼ lwɛn ɓɛshɛ ɓyin fyimnzi vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ, ɓǎ kwan sɛ ɓyin lwinnzâ swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, ɓyin yɛ ywum yɛ nun cìe ɓyin ǹkàli yě.
58010037	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛʼ lɛ: “Kwan nzwonmɛ kwæʼ ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, mwum nyɛ̌ tǎ kìn yɛ̌ ɓɛ̀n. M̀mgbæ̀nnì ɓa tî ɓɛ, lɛ̀ à ɓɛ̀nnâ.
58010038	Mwum nyɛ̀m nyɛ̌ ǹlwinni, à yɛ̌ ǹzison cinni ɓɛshɛ nun tǎ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ mùn. Son, ɓɛshɛ nun kɛʼ kwù ɓe ǹyě, ǹlim ɓa tî mùn lwukea lɛ̀ nun.” »
58010039	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, ɓwiʼ ɓa ɓwum ɓye yɛ kwù kɛli ɓe ǹyè ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ɓwu. Ɓwiʼ ɓi làn nyɛʼ ɓwum ɓye ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, li, ɓwiʼ yɛ swæʼ.
58011001	Kwan sɛ mwum tǎ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b, sɛ lisaʼ lɛ à lìmmâ lwɛn lɛ swum sɛ nun tǎ ɓònŋgàʼ fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à yɛ̌ son yě. Swum sɛ nun yɛn kifɛʼ lɛ̀ zɛʼ, à lìmmì lɛ sɛ yɛ mwù kpeli.
58011002	Li nɛ mɛ̀ mbibea ɓye mbyî ɓe zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, li M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yile ɓon ǹgwòn.
58011003	Ɓwiʼ kuʼ, ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ ci ɓwiʼ limmi lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɔ̀e ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan hwæn lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ ɓe nun kwean ŋwum. Ywum hwæn yɛ ɓwiʼ ta yɛn yɛ, à kwannzi yon lɛ̀ swum sɛ ɓɛ tà ka yɛn lɛ̀ zɛʼ.
58011004	Abè tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ ci, à fɛe sàtìkæ̀ʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b she kwan lwɛn, she lan she Kaìn. Kɛ ncì yɛ nun cìe li, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yile nun ǹgwòn lɛ à ni mwum ǹlwinni. Ɓwiʼ limmi li, ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun nɛʼ yile sàtìkæ̀ʼ shon. Kwo fɛʼ she Abè ywiâ nùn si, kɛ nun ɓe zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à tǎ lɛli lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ fyaʼ a kiìn ɓɛ̀n ɗyě.
58011005	Yinɔ̀ʼ tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, ǎ ywi kan, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b twɛle nun kɛ ɗɛb, ɓwum yɛn kan tî nun ɓe cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b twɛle nun cì shon. Ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ, lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b kà twɛʼ Yinɔ̀ʼ kɛ ɗɛb, à ɓe M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹlim lwukea kɛ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyon nun.
58011006	A si seansean lɛ mwum ndɔʼ wòli kan à lwu M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹlim ɗin, shìkì à tɛ̀ʼ zwùm lɛ̀ nun. Li nɛ ci, mwum nyɛ̌ yili nun kwɛmmi lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à limmì lwɛn lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni kwe, à tǎ lwɛn cǐ lɛ̀ mwum nyɛ̌ tà nun kæbbi lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ.
58011007	Nòê tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b shɛ̀ nun ywum yɛ ywimɛ lànnzì kɛ nywi ɓwum ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, ye ɓwum yɛn kifɛʼ mbyî, à ywɔʼ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à pàʼ cìʼ ndwun ndɔʼ, à ɗun nlim lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓyon, ɓɛ nywælì ywi. Kɛ ncì yɛ nun cìe li yi, à lìsàʼ lɛ ɓwum ɓye fɔʼ hwæn ɓe pyǐ kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Nòê nun nɛʼ fyònne mwum ǹlwinni kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ntwiʼ sɛ nun tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ nun.
58011008	Abràhâm tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, à ywɔti ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b loen nun, à yèe mbyi cìcì sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛle lɛ nun yɛ̌ nyǐ ŋgyɔʼ fɛ. À wae ǹdǔʼ nsòn shon, à sukuʼ kɛ̀n lɛ̀ mwù.
58011009	À tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, à ɓe tòn wɛ̌ ǹkyìn kɛ ŋgyɔʼ nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe nun ǹkàli nun. À ɓe suʼ tòn kwe kɛ yi ɗwun nun. M̀banmbɔʼ nɛ ɓe tì kuʼ ɓe lɛ̀ Izàʼ kònndì lɛ̀ Yàkɔ̂b, ɓon ɓɛ ǹkàli fɔʼ màzwùm ɓe tì kuʼ kɛ nywi.
58011010	Abràhâm ɓe kǎn tòn li ɗin, à ɓe tòn ntwiʼ sɛ nun ɓe mɛʼ kɛ̌ lɛ̀ ǹsòn ye ǹkæ̀mŋkæm ye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɔkaʼ lɛ̀ fyàʼ yon, à gwe.
58011011	Sarà tì kuʼ, à tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, kwo fɛʼ she ɓe lɛ̀ à ywìnnâ hwæn si, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe nun ǹkimmɔʼ nye mwɛn, ntwiʼ sɛ nun lìmme lɛ ǹkàli yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ɓon ɓa pyì ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
58011012	Li nɛ cie, kɛ nyè mwum m̀bɔʼ, kwo fɛʼ she ɓe lɛ̀ à ti wɛ̌ ɗwon si, mvu ɓwum kwan mèan wɛ̌ mɛ̀ nywæʼ ɓɛ ɓwiʼ ta yɛn zwô, ɓɛ man wɛ̌ kyɛʼ yɛ kɛ mɛ mbɛti ɗuʼ ndwun, yɛ mwum wòli kan à tan.
58011013	Ɓwum ɓi ton ɓi hwæn li, ɓɛ ɓe zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b han ywi kìn ɓon twɛli, shìkì ɓɛ yɛn mwǔ ŋkàli yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìe ɓon. Son, ɓe lɛ̀ ɓɛ limmâ lɛ ywum màzwùm yɛ cì, li, ɓɛ ɓe lɛ̀ ǹdàli. Ɓɛ ɓe suʼ shɛ̀ lɛ, ɓon ɓi ɓi mɛ̀ kyìn, ɓon ɓi kin ǹyòn kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun ɗin.
58011014	Paʼ ɓwum sɛ ta lɛli li si ta lìsàʼ lɛ ɓon ta ǹdǔʼ nsǒn ŋkæ̀mŋkæm shan kæbbi.
58011015	Ɓɛ ɓe kǎn tî kæb lɛ̀ ɓon fyôn ɓe cìcì sɛ ɓon wae nun. Ɓɛshɛ ɓon yilè m̀fyòn ɓe, ɓɛ cinne mbyi m̀fyòn lwɛn ɗin.
58011016	Son, cìcì sɛ ɓon ɓe kæb si lwɛn, sɛ lan she ɓon ɓe mbyî nlim. Sɛ lisaʼ lɛ cìcì she kɛ ɗɛb. Li nɛ ci, ǹlim tà ka M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓyɛbbi lɛ̀ ǹlon yɛ ɓwum màzwùm ta nun lon lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyan. Ntwiʼ sɛ à fɔ̀sâ ɓon ǹsòn ndɔʼ kɛ ɗɛb.
58011017	-
58011018	Abràhâm tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓwɛbbe nun lɛ nyǐ ni fɛ mwɛn nyǐ Izàʼ lɛ̀ sàtìkæ̌ʼ, Abràhâm yile. Ɓe lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cìâ nun ǹkàli, à shɛ̀ lɛ: «Izàʼ nɛ yɛ cì mvu ɓwum ywû man.» Abràhâm ywɔe li, son, à yile lɔʼ lɛ nun yɛ̌ mwɛn m̀bɔʼ ti kuʼ mbɔʼ nyon fɛ lɛ̀ sàtìkæ̀ʼ.
58011019	Ntwiʼ sɛ à lìmme seansean lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni cinni ǹkimmɔʼ nyìmnzǐ mwum nɛ ywiâ nùn. Li, sɛ ɓe nun nywi wɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìmnzâ nun mwɛn nyon Izàʼ ɓe.
58011020	Izàʼ tɛ̀le tì kuʼ zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ŋŋgæ̀nni yɛ nun ŋgæ̀nne Yàkɔ̂b ɓon lɛ̀ Esò kɛ nywi ywum yɛ ywimɛ ɓon ɓɛ̀nni nywi nun.
58011021	Yàkɔ̂b tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, kwan sɛ ɓe lɛ̀ à yɛ̌ ywi, à ŋgæ̀nnì ɓwɛn Jòsɛ̂ʼ, à swɔ̀mǐ ǹtwɔ̀ʼ zwɛ̂m, à ɗɔa M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58011022	Jòsɛ̂ʼ tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, kwan sɛ kwan ywi shon ɗunmi kwɛmmi, à lɛʼ lɛʼ ŋkwannzi ɓwum Izràɛ̂l kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Èjîb, à shɛ̀ tì kuʼ ɓon swum sɛ ɓɛ yɛ cì ɓe lɛ̀ yì wɛb yon.
58011023	Ti ɓwum ɓye yee Mòîzɛ̀, ɓɛ tɛle zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Son sɛ cie, ǹdìkǎʼ nye yon ɗin, ɓɛ gwum Mòîzɛ̀ næm mɛ̀ nywiʼ lê, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ yɛnne lɛ mwɛn màzwùm ɓe ǹlwɛn. Li, yi kwɛ̀nne kǎn ɓon lɛ̀ ǹlǎn lwuà mvɛ̀n.
58011024	Mòîzɛ̀ tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, à ɓyìnnɔ̀ʼ ǹlon yɛ ɓɛ ɓe nun lon lɛ ǹjì nɛ kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Èjîb nun.
58011025	À fyòen yɛn lɛ ǹdikàʼ ǹyɛn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b m̀ban, lɛ̀ she nun yɛ wan ji kwan kwæʼ kɛ ɓyɛbbi nun.
58011026	Mòîzɛ̀ kònnde yɛn lɛ ǹyɛn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ fyaʼ ɓwulu wɛ̌ tà shɛ Kristò, mwum nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ fyiì yɛ̌ yɛn ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun yi swum twun, a lan ǹjònndì nɛ kɛ ŋgyɔʼ Èjîb nun hwæn. Ǎ ɓe kǎn cì li ɗin, à ɓe cì li ntwiʼ sɛ nun ɓe zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ ɗàsì nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ nun fɛ.
58011027	À tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, à kwan ŋgyɔʼ Èjîb, shìkì à yi kuʼ nyeni nlim mvɛ̀n. À ɓe ǹlim ɓænni kwan hwæn wɛ̌ nun yɛnnâ làn nyon M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɓwum tà ka yɛn.
58011028	À tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, à ywɔti ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à ɓàn Ŋ̀gwìn-ŋkwan-Èjîb, à cì ɓɛ gwisì mvæb mɛ nyæ̀m kɛ mɛ ŋwum nye, ɓǎ kwan sɛ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyɛ̌ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ ŋwu ɓwɛn zwimbyiʼ fyaʼ yɛ̌ ɓɛ̌n, ǎ cì kan ɓon swum ndɔʼ.
58011029	Ɓwum Izràɛ̂l tɛle tì kuʼ zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, ɓɛ shê ɗuʼ ndwun nɛ ɓɛ ɓe lon lɛ ɗuʼ mpèan. Ɓɛ shê nun ǹwummi wɛ̌ ɓon ta làn kɛ nlim kyɔʼ. Son, kwan sɛ ɓwum Èjîb kiên làn nyan ɓɛ̀nni ɓe ɓǎ ɓon shê kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓwum Izràɛ̂l shee, mlǎʼ shɛ ɓon hwæn.
58011030	Ɓwum Izràɛ̂l ɓe tì kuʼ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ she ɓɛ kanndi kwùmkwùm nye Jèrikò ǹgyìn shanmɓì, kwùmkwùm nye switàʼ.
58011031	Ràhâb nɛ ɓe ǹsìbɔʼ tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ cie, ǎ ywie kǎn lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye fyinnzi ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b m̀ban, ntwiʼ sɛ nun yèe mɛ̀ ci-swǒn wì lwɛn kɛ ɗwon nyon.
58011032	Mùn yɛ̌ kònndi ɓwum tannzi mùn kɛ̀n ɓɛ̀n fɛn? Kwan wòli kan mûn fyaʼ she mùn yɛ̌ ɓyin mɛ̀ njě ɓwum ɓyindɔʼ shɛ̌: ye Jèdèôn, ye Bàrâʼ, ye Sæ̀msôn, ye Jɛ̀tê, ye Dàvîd, ye Sàmwɛ̂l, lɛ̀ tì ye mɛ ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun.
58011033	Ɓwum màzwùm hwæn li, ɓɛ ɓe zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ ci, ɓɛ lean ɓwùlu mɛ̀ mvɛ̀n kɛ wì nun, ɓɛ linne mɛ̀ lɛʼ kɛ mbyi nun, ɓɛ cinne tì ywum ŋkàli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ ɗwɔkae mɛ̀ ŋwum mɛ̀ gbɛ̂m.
58011034	Ɓɛ jimmaʼ yì win yɛ ɓe nyæ̀nnì ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, ɓɛ nywælàʼ mɛ̀ njǐm wì ŋwum, ɓɛ fyonne ǹkimmɔa, kwo fɛʼ she ɓon ɓe swublea si. Ɓɛ fyonne mɛ̀ gbân kim kɛ wì nun, ɓɛ fyinni mɛ̀ kyìn ɓwum ɓye kiên ɓon wì tean.
58011035	Mɛ̀ yib ndɔʼ ɓe tì kuʼ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b, son sɛ cie, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìmnze ɓon ɓwum ɓyan ɓe kɛ ywi nun. Ɓyindɔʼ kuʼ, ɓɛ ɓe kǎn yili lɛ ɓɛ fyi mbyi nɛ ɓon yɛ nywæ̀lì kɛ fyaʼ ɓwum. Son, ɓɛ yɛnne vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ fyaʼ ɓwum han ɓɛ kɛn ywi, ɓǎ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yimnzì ɓon ɓe, à fɛ ɓon ǹzison nywæb she lan she ɓe mbyî.
58011036	Cìcǐ nsɛ̀m ndɔʼ ɓe kǎn ɓyindɔʼ limnzi nywi lɛ̀ twùʼ nun hwæn. Ɓɛ kɛn ɓyindɔʼ ɗwɔkea nye njè mɛ̀ kwù lɛ̀ mɛ̀ fyàʼ nun kpimmea.
58011037	Ɓɛ ywummɔʼ ɓyindɔʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋgwɔ̀ʼ. Ɓɛ ɓe ɓyindɔʼ suʼ ghɔ̌ʼ nyinnìm cìcì ɓî. Ɓyindɔʼ, ɓɛ kwie ɓon lɛ̀ ǹjìm. Ɓyindɔʼ kuʼ, ɓɛ ɓe yòn yì cìcǐ yì cìcì, mɛ̀ plè ɓye ɓɛ ɓe swì kɛ nywi ɓe lɛ̀ kwæʼ mɛ pɔʼ. Ɓɛ ɓe mɛ̀ ci-nzæmnzæm. Ɓwum ɓe ɓon ɓyìnnzi, ɓɛ zæbsi tì kuʼ ɓon.
58011038	Ɓɛ ɓe nzanni kɛ nlim kyɔʼ, lɛ̀ ɓɛ ta mɛ̀ mwù kpaʼ ɗwonɗwon. Yì cǐ nòn yan ɓe yì mvù, lɛ̀ tì mɛ̀ twɔbæ̀n. Ɓwum màzwùm wòle kǎn ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ntwu yan.
58011039	Ɓwum màzwùm hwæn li, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yile ɓon ǹgwòn ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ tɛle zwùm lɛ̀ nun. Kwo fɛʼ li, ɓɛ yɛnne kǎn ǹkàli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58011040	Sɛ lean ɓon nywi li, ntwiʼ sɛ lwɛn nyɛʼ nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, son sɛ ci, ǎ yile kǎn nun sɛte ɓwum ton ɓi fyɔ̀si ɓwum lwukea ǹgyìnmbɔʼ, ɓwiʼ shi ɓɛ kwe.
58012001	Ti lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, kɛ ɓwiʼ ta ɓɔʼ nyinnìm yi shìtàkwù yɛ ta ɓwiʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓwiʼ woli ɓwiʼ tɛʼ zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lìsea li, sɛ yili lɛ ɓwiʼ kɛsi nywi lɛ̀ ywum yɛ ta ɓwiʼ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kænni, lɛ̀ tì kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓwiʼ ta cì kwan hwæn. Ɓwiʼ yannènì mɛ̀li ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b shɛ̀ lɛ ɓwiʼ yanni kɛ mbyi nyon nun, ɓwiʼ kpæmmènì mɛʼ han ɓwiʼ kɛn ɓɛ̌n mmlɔ̀kàʼ.
58012002	Ɓwiʼ kɛènì mɛʼ lɛ̀ Yesù kwan hwæn, nun nɛ cìe ɓwiʼ ɗunmi zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun, à yɛ̌ tì kuʼ cì ɓwiʼ konndì tì zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun a kɛn ɓɛ̌n mmlɔ̀kàʼ. Yesù ɗonnze nun nɛʼ, ɓɛ ywummɔʼ nun kɛ ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛ̂m. Kwo fɛʼ she ywi màzwùm ɓe nyɛ̌ kwɛ̀nnjin si, kwɛ̀nnjin ɓænne kǎn nun ntwiʼ sɛ nun lìmme lɛ kɛ nyě ywi, ǹdàli ta nun ɓònŋgea. Jenɛ, à ni fyaʼ ji Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹtǒn.
58012003	Ɓyin nɛʼ, fɔ̀keànì kuʼ fɛʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ nun ɓe ɓyìnnzì sɛ mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi ɓe nun ɓyìnnzi fyimnzi. Ɓyin twɛʼ m̀bɔ̀kì nyon, ɓǎ ɓyin læ̀kì hwum, shìkì ɓyin won kuʼ kɛ nɗwon mbyi nyon.
58012004	Cɛênì fɛʼ, kɛ twùʼ nɛ ɓyin ta ɗwì lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓyibbɔa, ǹdɔʼ swili kifɛʼ mvæb.
58012005	Ǹlim fyeâ ɓyin lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ŋkimnzi nlim yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tà ɓyin shɛ̌, cìcì sɛ nun tà ɓyin lon lɛ ɓwɛn ɓyon? À shɛ̀ lɛ: «Mwɛn nyɛ̀m, vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ sɛ Nyɛli nywù tà wu yɛnnzi lɛ̀ nun swɛmnzi wǔ, ɓa wù twɛʼ son lɛ̀ swum ɗin. Ɓa ɓwæʼ kwɛn kuʼ wù kwan sɛ nun tà wu lɛsi.
58012006	Ntwiʼ mwum nɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ tǎ swɛmnzi lɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ni mwum nɛ nun yili. Mwum nɛ nun tǎ twɛʼ wɛ̌ mwɛn nyon hwæn, ǎ tà ka fyàʼ ghɔ̀si lɛ̀ nun.»
58012007	Sɛ yili lɛ ɓyin fyimnzi yì vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ɓǎ ɓyin swɛm. Yì vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yi yɛ ta lìsàʼ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tà ɓyin twɛli lɛ̀ ɓwɛn ɓyon. Yà mwɛn nɛ ta tòn ɗin, ce nyon shì nun swɛmnzi lɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ?
58012008	A M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b shì ɓyin swɛmnzi wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun tǎ ɓwùlu swɛmnzi, lìmmênì lwɛn lɛ ɓyin ɓa seansean ɓwɛn ɓyon. Ɓyin ɓi wɛ̌ ɓwɛn ɓye ɓɛ ye wan.
58012009	Ɓwiʼ teànnì fɛʼ ǹdàʼ kɛ nywi mɛ ce ɓyɛʼ ɓye fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. Ɓɛ ɓe ɓwiʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi, kɛ nyě yi, ɓwiʼ mwumnzi ɓon. Lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kà lìmmi m̀bɔ̀kì tǒn, sɛ cibbi kuʼ lɛ ɓwiʼ mwumnzi Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ cinni ǹzison shɛʼ, a lan m̀mwumnzi yɛ ɓwiʼ ɓe mɛ̀ ce ɓyɛʼ ɓye ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan mwumnzi.
58012010	Mɛ̀ ce ɓyɛʼ ɓe ɓwiʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi kwan kwæʼ kɛ nywi swum sɛ ɓe ɓon mɛʼ lwɛn nun. Ti lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b, à tà ɓwiʼ swɛmnzi ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ton lwɛn. À tà ɓwiʼ swɛmnzi lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ kuʼ sanmi wɛ̌ nun.
58012011	A ta ɓɛ làn nyɛʼ, kwan sɛ nun tà ɓwiʼ swɛmnzi, a ɓa ɓwiʼ mɛʼ lɛ̀ swum ǹdàli, sɛ ta ɓɛ, sɛ fyôn tì swum nywætaʼ nywi. Son, kɛ nyě nswɛmnzi yi, ɓwum ɓye lean kɛ nswɛmnzi màzwùm nun, ɓɛ yɛ ɓɛ ɓwum lwinnɔa, ɓɛ ton tì kɛ mlaʼ flɔa nun.
58012012	Kɛ à si li, ɗyileànì lɛ mɛ̀ ŋkèà nyin nɛ tǎ mgbɔkaʼ ni. Ɓyin kimnzi tì kuʼ mɛ̀ ɗwi ɓyin ɓɛ ta ɓwilɔʼ ɓi.
58012013	Ɓyin ɗyilaʼ mɛ̀ mbyi ɓyin zuʼzuʼ, ɓǎ kwù sɛ ɗyɛmɗyɛm læ̀kì pwònŋgì ǹgyìnmbɔʼ, son, ɓǎ sɛ kimmɔʼ nùn.
58012014	Fɔ̀sênì mɛʼ kpæmmi lɛ̀ ɓyin ton mɛ̀ ywiʼ ɗɔ̀ʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun. M̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyin ɓɛ nyɛ̌ ǹsanmi, ntwiʼ sɛ shi ɓɛ lɛ̀ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn ǹsanmi, mwum ndɔʼ wòli kan à yɛn Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58012015	Ɓyin konni lɛ̀ ɓwùlu kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun, ɓǎ mwum ndɔʼ læ̀kì ǹyè yònnzi lɛ̀ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, shìkì mwum ndɔʼ fyonnì kuʼ wɛ̌ kæʼ ɗwìkea ndɔʼ, sɛ ta twæb, sɛ ɓɛ lɛ̀ ɗun nɛ wòli à cì ɓyɛbbi lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
58012016	Ɓa ɓyin yili mwum ndɔʼ cikàʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ kwɛ̀nnjin, shindɔʼ à njìlì ywum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b wɛ̌ tà shɛ Esò cìe. Nun nɛ ɗonnze m̀mwumŋkæ̀m shon lɛ̀ ŋgyinni nyon nyɛ̌ sɔ̀ʼ, ntwiʼ peàn ji m̀bɔʼ.
58012017	Ɓyin nɛʼ, ɓyin limmi lwɛn lɛ, kwan sɛ sɛ kiên ɓɛ̀n ɓe, nun yile lɛ ce nyon ŋgænnì nun, à ɓyìnnɔe nun, kwo she nun ɓe fɛʼ yon cibbi lɛ̀ ǹkwe si. Ntwiʼ mbyi nɛ nun wòle à kwɛbsi tì swum sɛ nun cìe ɓe kǎn.
58012018	Ŋ̀kwɛmmi yɛ ɓyin ta kwɛmmi lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓa wɛ̌ ye ɓwum Izràɛ̂l ɓe kwɛmmi lɛ̀ kpaʼ nɛ ɓɛ ɓe yɛn lɛ̀ zɛʼ. Kɛ kwan màzwùm nun, kpaʼ fyonnì win seansean, njimmi pyi ǹlo lɛ̀ fyìiì, m̀pùn konndì ti kuʼ sænni.
58012019	Ɓɛ ywɔʼ tì kuʼ ǹlwon ɓæ̀n, lɛ̀ ǹkwu Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Kwan sɛ ɓon ywɔe ǹkwu yi, ɓɛ ɗunmi mɛ̀ swulaʼ pyìtea lɛ shi si wolâ ɓon li.
58012020	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ wòle kǎn ɓɛ fyimni paʼ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yi, ye nun shɛ̀e ɓon lɛ: «Mwum nyɛ̌ yɛ̌ kpaʼ twuti hwæn, kwo fɛʼ nyæ̀m, ɓɛ wu nun lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋgwɔ̀ʼ.»
58012021	Ǹyɛn yɛ ɓɛ ɓe ywum màzwùm yɛnni ɓe swum kwɛ̌n yi, han Mòîzɛ̀ shɛ̀ lɛ: «Yi ɗuân mùn zwum, nywi ta mûn gwɛnnzi ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ.»
58012022	Son, ti lɛ̀ ɓyin, kpaʼ nɛ ɓyin kwɛmme lɛ̀ nun ni kyi, à ni nyɛ̌ ɓɛ ta lon lɛ Sìôn. Ɓyin kwɛmme tì kuʼ lɛ̀ Yèrusàlɛ̀m she ɗɛb. Ǹsǒn màzwùm yi ye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi ǹzison. Ɓyin kwɛmmi tì kuʼ lɛ̀ ǹkwìn mɛ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b mèan ɓye mwum wòli kan à tan, ɓye ta ǹdàli cǐ cìcì fɔʼ.
58012023	Ɓyin konndâ kwɛmmi lɛ̀ ǹkwìn ɓwɛn zwimbyiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ mɛ̀ myin nyan ti ǹkɔa kɛ ɗɛb. Ɓyin kwɛmmi tì kuʼ ke Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, nun nɛ ɗyi ci-nlin kyìtæ̀ʼ kɛ nywi ɓwum hwæn. Ɓyin konndì kwɛmmi lɛ̀ ɓwum lwinnɔa ɓye ywiâ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyɔ̀si ɓon ɓwum lwukea ǹgyìnmbɔʼ.
58012024	Ɓyin kwɛmmâ tì kuʼ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, nun nɛ ɗyi swum jini ŋgwon nywæb kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓyin konndì kwɛmmi lɛ̀ mvæb yon yɛ nun swìe ɓǎ nun sannzi ɓwum ɓyon. Mvæb màzwùm ta ɓwiʼ swum lwɛn ndɔʼ lìsea a lan fɛʼ she mvæb Abè lìsea ɓwiʼ mbyî.
58012025	Konnênì lɛ̀ ɓyin nɛʼ, ɓa ɓyin sætì mɛ̀ ywiʼ lɛ̀ mwum nɛ tǎ lɛli lɛ̀ ɓyin. Ɓwum ɓye ɓe mbyî ɓye ɓyinnɔe ǹywɔʼ ndɛb mwum nɛ ɓe ɓon yon lɛbbi ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun, ɓɛ nywæ̀le kǎn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ. Kɛ ɓɛ nywæ̀le kǎn li, kpɛ̀m nyi nɛ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ, ɓɛshɛ ɓwiʼ sætì mɛ̀ ywiʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ tà ɓwiʼ lɛʼ shǐ ǹwaì ye kɛ ɗɛb?
58012026	Nun nɛ ɓe ŋgyɔʼ funnzaki lɛ̀ ǹkwu yon kwan sɛ nun ɓe lɛli. Jenɛ, à shɛ̀ ɓwiʼ kɛ ŋkàli nun lɛ: «Mùn yɛ̌ tì kònndi ŋgyɔʼ funnzi ɓe kæ̀mmì fɔʼ. Kæ̀mmǐ màzwǔm, mùn yɛ̌ tì kuʼ funnzi lɛ̀ ɗɛb nun m̀ban.»
58012027	Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nyɛ̌ lɛ: «ɓe kæ̀mmì fɔʼ”” ni lìsaʼ lɛ ywum yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɔ̀e hwæn ywimɛ funnzi, yɛ nywukaʼ. Sɛ yɛ cì li, ɓǎ ywum yɛ ɓa funnzi, yɛ lwæb ɓe.
58012028	Ɓwiʼ yilènì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ nun fɛâ ɓwiʼ ǹsòn ndɔʼ yɛ ɓa funnzi. Kɛ à si li, ɓwiʼ sakeànì nun kɛ mbyi nyɛ̌ yɛ̌ nun ǹlim lwukea nun. Ɓwiʼ konndì nun mwumnzi kɛ kwɛ̌n yi nun.
58012029	Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyɛʼ ni tì kuʼ wɛ̌ win yɛ ta ywum ɓusi.
58013001	Ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓa m̀bɔ̀kì nyili nyin sɛ̀nnì kɛ nywi ɓwulu kɛ nyinnìm shin nun.
58013002	Ɓa ɓyin ɓwæti tì kuʼ mwù lɛ̀ ǹyè mɛ kyìn. Ntwiʼ sɛ ǹyè mɛ kyǐn màzwùm ciâ ɓyindɔʼ yê mɛ̀ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye ɗɛb, lɛ̀ ɓɛ lìmmi kan.
58013003	Ɓyin limmì kwɛ̀nnì nywi mɛ̀ ci-nye njè, wɛ̌ vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ fɔʼ sɛ ɓyin ta yɛn lɛ̀ ɓon. M̀banmbɔʼ kɛ nywi ɓwum ɓye ɓɛ ta vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin cinni kuʼ kwæʼ nywi fɔʼ wɛ̌ ɓon.
58013004	Sɛ yili lɛ mwum hwæn kyibsì ɗæm. M̀lib lɛ̀ ǹɗwɛb, wɛn nɛ hwæn ɓɛ ǹlwinni kɛ swiʼ lwikwæ̌n. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwum ɓye ta ǹlàʼ ywi, kwo fɛʼ kɛ wan lɛ̀ ɓɛ shɛ kifɛʼ ɗæm, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓon lànnzi kɛ kyìtæ̀ʼ nun.
58013005	Ɓa ɓyin ɗonnzi lòn yon ɓyin kɛ tòn shin nun. Son, ndwælênì lɛ̀ ywum yɛ ɓyin fyaʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛle lɛ: «Kwo nywɔʼ m̀bɔʼ ndɔʼ, mùn ɓà wû nzwonnzi, shìkì mùn ghɔ̀sì kuʼ fyàʼ lɛ̀ wù.»
58013006	Li nɛ ci, ɓwiʼ woli ɓwiʼ lɛʼ lɛ̀ ǹlim kimmi lɛ: «Nyɛli nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi ci-mkpaʼ nyɛ̀m. Swum sɛ mùn wòli mùn yi sɛ ɓan. Mwum wan wòli à cì mùn yɛn?»
58013007	Ɓa ǹlim fye ɓyin lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-zwiʼ ɓyin ɓɛ sɛte ɓyin lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b shɛ̌. Cɛênì fɛʼ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyan nɛ ɓon ɓe tòn han ɓɛ kɛn ywi, ɓyin konnzì m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓon ɓe zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwan hwæn.
58013008	Yesǔ tà ka kwɛbsi. M̀bɔ̀kì nɛ nun ɓe ɗǔn, à ni tì kuʼ ɗyě li, à yɛ̌ tì kònndi ɓɛ li yì kwan mèan hwæn.
58013009	Ɓa ɓyin ɗonnzi ɓwum ɓwuli ɓyin lɛ̀ mɛ̀ paʼ nlìsàʼ ywum mèan nɛ tǎ kweɔ̀n mbyî nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. À si lwɛn lɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kimnzi ɓwiʼ mɛ̀ nlim kɛ zwum, ɓa mɛ̀ lwuà ɓye kɛ nywi ywum ji. Ɓwum ɓye ta mɛ̀ lwuà ɓi ɗwonnzi hwæn, ɓɛ yɛn kan se nɛ tà ɓon kwan nlim.
58013010	Ɓwiʼ cinni cìcǐ mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ndɔʼ, she mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ ɓye ta she cǐ kɛ nyenswæ̀b mɛ̀ Yudà nun wòli kan ɓɛ ji sàtìkæ̀ʼ kwe.
58013011	Mɛ̀ nyæ̀m ɓye ɓɛ wue, mwumŋkæ̀m mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ tǎ mvæb yan shɛ, à ɗun nyenswæ̀b ɓǎ nun fɛ sàtìkæ̌ʼ nzùsì mɛ ɓyɛbbi lɛ̀ yon. Son, ɓɛ ta ɗwon mɛ nyæ̀m ɓi twɛ̀nnɔʼ pɛɗin, ɓa kɛ nlim pænndè.
58013012	Son sɛ cie, Yesù Kristò làn nyon, à yɛnne vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ kɛ mbɛti nsòn, à ywi ɓǎ nun sannzi ɓwum ɓyon lɛ̀ mvæb yôn nɛʼ.
58013013	Kɛ à si li, ɓwiʼ kweànnì pæ̀nndè, ɓwiʼ kɛn Yesù cinni, ɓwiʼ yili tì kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓɛ simmɔ̀ʼ ɓwiʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ simmɔe kuʼ nun.
58013014	Ntwiʼ kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nɛ nun, ɓwiʼ cinni kan ǹsǒn ŋkæ̀mŋkæm yɛʼ. Son, ɓwiʼ suʼ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ ǹsǒn ŋkæ̀mŋkæm ye mbyî.
58013015	Ɓwiʼ fɛênì lɛ ǹtwu kwan hwæn lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ jin Yesù nun. M̀fɛ ntwu li yi wɛ̌ sàtìkæ̀ʼ, sɛ lisaʼ lɛ ǹsàkàʼ yɛ ɓwiʼ ta nun sàkea lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋwum nyɛʼ.
58013016	Ɓa ǹlim fye ɓyin lɛ̀ ǹcǐ lwɛn, shìkì ɓyin shi ɓwùlu kpea kɛ nyinnìm shin nun. Ntwiʼ sɛ paʼ yi sàtìkæ̌ʼ màzwùm yɛ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹlim lwukea.
58013017	Ywɔlênì mɛ̀ ŋwum mɛ ci-zwiʼ ɓyin, ɓyin mwumnzi ɓon. Ɓon ɓɛ ta ǹzison shin ɓǒn, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ limmi lɛ ɓon yɛ ywum yɛ ɓon ta cì hwæn shɛ̌ kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. A ɓyin ywɔli mɛ ŋwum nyan wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn lɛʼ si, ɓɛ yɛ she shan cǐ lɛ̀ ǹdàli. Shi ɓɛ li, ɓɛ yɛ son cǐ lɛ̀ ǹlim ɓyɛbbi. Li, sɛ ɓa ɓyin kpea lɛ̀ swum ndɔʼ.
58013018	Kelênì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwan hwæn lɛ̀ mɛ̀ myin nyɛʼ. Ǹlim yi ɓwiʼ zwum pyǐ lɛ̀ she ɓwiʼ lìmmi kan lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ciâ, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ yili lɛ m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyɛʼ ɓɛ ǹlwɛn mɛ̀ mbyi hwæn.
58013019	Swum sɛ mùn tà ɓyin fɔ̀si cibbi, à si lɛ ɓyin keli M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ nun fɛ mun mbyi mfyòn ɓe cì shin m̀byìmmi.
58013020	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi ci-mfɛ flɔa kɛ mɛ nlim ɓwum nun, à yìmnzâ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù kɛ ywi nun. Nun Yesù nɛ ti ci-mɓòn mɛ pɔʼ ndwun nyɛʼ ntwiʼ mvæb yon yɛ nun swìe lɛ̀ nun jini ǹgwòn kɛ nyinnìm shɛʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹgyìnmbɔʼ.
58013021	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓyin ǹkimmɔʼ ncǐ ywum lwukea lɛ̀ ɓyin lwinnzi ǹyili yon. À cì tì kuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ nɛ tà nun ǹlim lwukea kɛ mɛ nlim nyɛʼ nun kɛ nyě Yesù Kristò. Ǹtwu ɓɛ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò kwan hwæn. Àmɛ̀n.
58013022	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni, mùn swulaʼ ɓyin lɛ, kɛ̀ênì mɛ̀ nlim ŋgyɔʼ, ɓyin ywɔʼ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ŋkimnzi nlim yɛ mùn kɔe ɓyin yi, ntwiʼ yɛ ɓa mèan.
58013023	Mùn yili lɛ ɓyin limmì tì kuʼ lɛ ɓɛ kwannzâ ŋgyinni nyɛʼ Tìmòtê nye njè. A nun pwæ̀tì ɓɛ̌n, lɛ̀ mùn yɛ̌ nun twɛli, ɓwiʼ kiìn ɓyin yɛnni ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ nun.
58013024	Hwæsênì mɛ̀ ci-zwiʼ ɓyin hwæn, kònndì lɛ̀ ɓwùlu ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b tì kuʼ. Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛʼ ɓye kɛ Ìtàlî ta ɓyin hwæsi.
58013025	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgænnì ɓyin, ɓyin hwæn. Àmɛ̀n.
59001001	Mùn Jâʼ nɛ ta ɓyin ɗèwà ton sɛ kɔi. Mùn ni ci-she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, mùn kònndì ɓɛ ci-she Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Mùn hwæsi ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye nywælaʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan hwæn.
59001002	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, kwan sɛ mɛ̀ paʼ mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ tà ɓyin kǐn nywi, twɛlênì ɓyin nɛʼ wɛ̌ ɓwum ɓɛ ton tǒn lwɛn, ɓyin ton lɛ̀ ǹdàli.
59001003	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin limmi lɛ m̀ɓwɛb ta ɗun kɛ nlim nun, ɓɛshɛ ǹɗyili nlim yɛ ɓyin ta ɗyili kɛ mbyi Yesù Kristò nun ɓɛ kimmi sɛ lan m̀ɓwɛb màzwùm, ɓyin yɛ fɔ̀si ɓɛ kimmi.
59001004	Ɓa ɓwæʼ ci ɓyin. Li, ɓyin yɛ fɔ̀si ɓɛ lwinnɔa, swum lwɛn ndɔʼ shiʼ kan ɓyin kɛ mɛ kìkæ̀n nyin nun.
59001005	Ɓɛshɛ mwum nyin ndɔʼ tǎ mbyi lɛʼ ndɔʼ kæbbi mwu yon nun shě, à cibbi M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à yɛ̌ nun nun fɛ. Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ fɛ fyaʼ flɔa lɛ̀ mwum hwæn shìkì à nyɛnndi nun.
59001006	Son, mwum nyɛ̌ tà kuʼ ɗɔa lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ nun swum ndɔʼ, à limmì zwum shon nun lɛŋkæ̀m lɛ à yɛ̌ nun son fɛ. Ɓa à cinni mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ mɓì; ntwiʼ mwum nɛ cinni mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ mɓì ni wɛ̌ mlǎʼ yɛ ta pònndàʼ nùn.
59001007	-
59001008	Kɛ ncinni yɛ nun cinni mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ mɓì lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b li, ǎ tà ka swum ndɔʼ cǐ lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ. Li, nun cibbi swum ndɔʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b, ɓa à tòn lɛ̀ m̀ɓònŋgàʼ lɛ nyǐ ni yɛ̌ nun swum màzwùm fɛ.
59001009	Mwum ci-nzæmnzæm nyɛ̌ tǎ Yesù Kristò ɗwon dalì, ntwiʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b twulâ nun.
59001010	Ti lɛ̀ ci-njônndì nyɛ̌ tǎ Yesù Kristò ɗwon, ɓa à fyon m̀ɓwu yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓwulâ ǹtwu yon ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, à dalì kɛ mɓwu màzwùm nun, ntwiʼ sɛ à lìmmi lɛ à ni wɛ̌ vǐʼ kæʼ sɛ ta vìʼ.
59001011	Nywɔʼ tǎ ɗwùm, à wumnzi vǐʼ kæʼ, lwu màzwùm mlɔʼ; a pyi. M̀banmbɔʼ nɛ kuʼ, ci-njônndì yɛ̌ ywi lɛ̀ mɛ̀ she nyɛ̌ nun fɔ̀e mlɔ̀ʼ kifɛʼ.
59001012	Tǒn lwɛn si lɛ̀ mwum nyɛ̌ tǎ fyimni kwan sɛ mɛ̀ mɓwɛb tà nun ɓɛ̀nni nywi. Kɛ mfyimni yɛ nun yɛ̌ fyimni li, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ nun ǹzison ɗwùmɗwùm fɛ. Son sɛ ɗyi ɗàsì ndwun nɛ nun cìe ǹkàli lɛ nun yɛ̌ fɛ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓɛ yili nun.
59001013	Kwan sɛ m̀ɓwɛb ta wu ɓɛ̀nni nywi lɛ̀ wù ci ɓyɛbbi, ɓa wù fɔ̀kàʼ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɓwɛb wû, ntwiʼ swum ndɔʼ wòli kan sɛ pɔkaʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à cì ɓyɛbbi. A tà ka kuʼ mwum ndɔʼ ɓwɛbbi lɛ̀ nyǐ ni ci ɓyɛbbi.
59001014	Mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ kɛ nlim mwum nɛ ta mwum twɔti à cì ɓyɛbbi.
59001015	A ta ɓɛ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ mɓyibbɔa ni lwinmɛ wù kɛ nlim nun, à kwàlì. Nun ti shɛ̌ nun wolì wù nywi lwɛn, à kɛ̀nnzɔ̀ʼ wù kɛ ywi nun.
59001016	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓa mwum ndɔʼ pɔkaʼ ɓyin.
59001017	Lìmmênì seansean lɛ, kɛ ywum ɓyibbɔa nun hwæn, she ta waì fyaʼ Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwo fɔʼ sɛ ɓan, sɛ shi kuʼ ɓɛ ywum yɛ ɗyi lɔʼ lwukea. Ywum lwukea màzwùm ta waì fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɔ̀e nywɔʼ, nywiʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nywæʼ. Nun, ǎ tà ka kwɛbsi. À ɓǎ wɛ̌ nywɔʼ nɛ tǎ ɓɛ nun yònnimɛ fyaʼ ndɔʼ, njimmi pyì kuʼ fyaʼ ndɔʼ nun.
59001018	Ǹzison ɗwùmɗwùm sɛ nun fɛ ɓwiʼ sɛ, à fɛ ɓwiʼ son kɛ nyè nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ŋkæ̀mŋkæm yon nun. À cìi li kɛ nyili yon nun, ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ɓɛ ɓwum ɓye kɛ swiswiʼ kɛ nyinnìm ywum yɛ nun fɔ̀e.
59001019	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓàkeànì lɛ̀ swum sɛ mùn yɛ̌ ɓyin shɛ̌ sɛ. Tòênnì, ɓyin fɔli ywum yɛ ɓwùlu ta ɓyin shɛ̌, ɓa mɛ̀ ŋwum nyin ɓɛ fɛfɛʼ kɛ nzæʼ lɛʼ nun, shìkì ɓyin ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-nyeni nlim,
59001020	ntwiʼ sɛ mwum nyɛ̌ kɛ nyeni nlim nun, ǎ wòli kan à cì ywum yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili.
59001021	Li nɛ sɛ yili lɛ ɓyin kyiilì lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun. Ɓa ɓyin ci tì ɓyɛbbi. Swummênì kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓyin fɔli ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ nun lìsea ɓyin, ntwiʼ sɛ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm woli yɛ swæti ɓyin.
59001022	Ɓa ɓyin suʼ lwùmnì lɛ̀ ǹywɔʼ, shìkì ɓyin ci kuʼ swum sɛ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ta lɛʼ. Ntwiʼ mwum nɛ tǎ ywɔʼ ɗin, shìkì à cì kuʼ swum sɛ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm ta lɛʼ tà nun nɛʼ pɔkea.
59001023	Mwum nyɛ̌ tǎ lwùmnì lɛ̀ ǹywɔʼ ɗin ni wɛ̌ mwum nɛ tǎ fli mɛʼ shon cɛ kɛ dæ̀nŋglæ̀ʼ nun,
59001024	nun ti shɛ̀ nun waʼ, ǹlim fye nun lɛ̀ fli mɛʼ shon.
59001025	Son, ti lɛ̀ mwum nyɛ̌ ywɔʼ mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye woli ɓɛ nywæsì nun ɓyɛbbi nun, à ɓæn ɓon kɛ nlim, ǎ suʼ kan ywɔʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ywiʼ ɗin, shìkì à fyeli ǹlim lɛ̀ nun, son, à kimnzi nlim yon lɛ̀ ǹɗwonnzi yan, mwum màzwùm, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ nun ŋgæ̀nni.
59001026	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ tǎ ɓàkàʼ lɛ nun ni ci-nɗwon Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son, nun shì kyììlì lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ɓyibbɔa kɛ ŋwum yon, lɛ̀ à tà nun nɛʼ pɔkea ɗin. Paʼ nɗwon Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b shon si ɗin.
59001027	Paʼ nɗwon lwɛn sɛ ta Ce M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹlim lwukea si lɛ: ɓwiʼ ciènì lwɛn lɛ̀ mɛ̀ nduʼ, ɓwiʼ kpaʼ tì mɛ̀ kwɛb mɛ yib ɓye ta vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni. Ɓwiʼ konnènì kuʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa nɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, ǎ læ̀kì ɓwiʼ cǐ ɓwiʼ ɗun ɓyɛbbi nun.
59002001	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓyin ɓɛ ta ǹlim kɛ̌ kɛ nywi Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò nɛ cinni ǹtwu à làn ywum hwæn, ɓa ɓyin kɛ ǹkyììli kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum.
59002002	Shindɔʼ ɓwum ɓî ndɔʼ ɗun kɛ nye mɓwɔki nyin, nyɛ̌ m̀bɔʼ ni lɛ̀ mɛ̀ plě lwukea nywi, swònŋgwu lòn tà nun ɗwùmnea fyaʼ. Nyɛ̌ m̀bɔʼ kuʼ, à ni lɛ̀ mɛ̀ plě yæ̀tea nywi.
59002003	A wù hwæsi ci-mɛ plě lwukea lwɛn, wù shɛ̀ lɛ̀ nun lɛ: «Mwumŋkæ̀m, kìîn wù tǒn cǐ tǒn lwɛn sɛ nun.» Shindɔʼ wù shɛ̀ kuʼ lɛ̀ ci-nzæmnzæm lɛ: «Wù kuʼ, ɗyi cǐ.» Kɛ̀ shindɔʼ wù shɛ̀ lɛ̀ nun lɛ: «Tòn fɛ ŋgyɔʼ mɛ kwù ɓyɛ̂m.»
59002004	Ɓɛshɛ wu cì li, lɛ̀ wù tǎ ǹkyììli kɛ̌ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum nun. Wù tǎ ɓwum ɓyindɔʼ sæ̀li lɛ ɓye ǹkæ̀mŋkæm, wù sæ̀ʼ kuʼ ɓyindɔʼ lɛ̀ ɓye ɗinɗin. Paʼ nsæ̌ʼ màzwùm, wù sæ̀ʼ son kɛ mbyi mɓyɛbbi nun.
59002005	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, nònnzênì mɛ̀ ywiʼ, ɓyin ywɔʼ lwɛn. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̌n mɛ̀ ci-nzæmnzæm ɓɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun ɓǎ ɓon cinni ǹjònndì ŋkæ̀mŋkæm kɛ kɛ̌ nlim she ɓon kɛ kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, lɛ̀ ɓɛ ɗun tì kuʼ kɛ ywɔʼ shon nun. Ywɔʼ si si ǹkàli yɛ nun cìe lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye yili nun.
59002006	Son ɓyin, ɓyin ta mɛ̀ ci-nzæmnzæm njìli nùn. Jijiênì fɛʼ mwu nun, mɛ̀ wɛn ɓɛ ta ɓyin vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi? Mɛ̀ wɛn ɓɛ ta ɓyin tɛ̀li mɛ nye mɛ kyìtæ̀ʼ? Mɛ̀ ci-lòn ɓɛ ɓan?
59002007	Ɓon ɓɛ ta jin lwɛn Yesù Kristò sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lon ɓyin nun si ɓyɛbsi.
59002008	Lwuà ndwun M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ndɔʼ nyɛ̌ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwà shon nun lɛʼ lɛ: «Yili lwikwæ̌n wɛ̌ tà shɛ wù yili wǔ nɛʼ.» Wu ɗwon lwuà màzwùm, lɛ̀ wù tǎ cì lwɛn.
59002009	Son, ɓɛshɛ wu tǎ ǹkyììli kɛ̌ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum nun, lɛ̀ wù tǎ cì ɓyɛbbi, lɛ̀ wù pyìâ lwuà.
59002010	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ tǎ mɛ̀ lwuǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗwon hwæn, son, à kɛ̀n nyɛ̌ m̀bɔʼ pyǐ, lɛ̀ a si wɛ̌ nun pyìâ mɛ̀ lwuà hwæn kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
59002011	Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ shɛ̀e lɛ ɓa wù ywi ǹlàʼ, nun nɛ konndi tî kuʼ shɛ̀ lɛ ɓa wù wu mwum. Wu shì fɛʼ ǹlàʼ ywi, son, wù wu mwum ndɔʼ, lɛ̀ wù pyìâ lɔʼ lwuà Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
59002012	Li nɛ mùn shɛ̀ ɓyin lɛ ywum yɛ ɓyin ta lɛli lɛ̀ ye ɓyin ta cǐ hwæn, cìênì yon ɓyin limmì lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓyin mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ lànnzi, à yɛn ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ɗwonnze lwuà nyon nɛ wòli à nywæsì ɓwiʼ.
59002013	Wù nɛ tà ka ǹlim kwɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ wù mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ lànnzi, à ɓà kuʼ ǹlim kwɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ wù. Son, ɓɛshɛ wu tǎ ǹlim kwɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, mɛ̀ kæ̌ʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓa wu ɓænni.
59002014	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ tǎ suʼ shɛ̀ lɛ̀ ŋwum lɛ: «Mùn tǎ ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò””, lɛ̀ ǎ tà ka mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea cǐ, kɛ̌ nlim màzwùm si ɗin, sɛ ɓa nun nywæ̀si shim.
59002015	Shindɔʼ ɓwum Yesù Kristò ndɔʼ ɓi kwe mɛ̀ plè yæ̀tea ɓon nywi hwæn, ɓɛ ɓɛ tì lɛ̀ ǹjè.
59002016	Ɓɛ kinmɛ̀ wù yɛnni, kwan kɛ̌n, wǔ kà shɛ̀ lɛ̀ ɓon lɛ: Kɛ̀nnênì lwɛn, ɓa mbɛb kwɛ̀n ɓyin mbyî, shìkì ǹjè kwɛ̀n tì kuʼ ɓyin. Wu suʼ ɓon shɛ̌ lɛ̀ ŋwum li, wǔ fɛ kan ɓon ywum yɛ ta ɓon shi, sɛ kpaʼ ɓon lɛ̀ yɛn kɛ tòn shan nun?
59002017	Kɛ̌ nlim kɛ nywi Yesù si wɛ̌ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ mun twɛʼ ɓyin ni. Wu shɛ̀ lɛ wù tǎ ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ Yesù, son, wǔ cì kan mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea, lɛ̀ kɛ̌ nlim si si ŋgyɔʼ ɗin.
59002018	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ swum lɛ̀ mùn lɛ nun tǎ ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ Yesù, ti lɛ̀ mǔn, mùn ni sukuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea cǐ, mùn ywìmɛ mwum màzwùm fyònnzi lɛ: «Cì swum sɛ lisaʼ lɛ wù tǎ ǹlim kɛ̌ lɛ̀ Yesù shìkì wù cì kuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea. Mùn yɛ̌ kuʼ wù kɛ̌ nlim shɛ̂m lìsea kɛ ncì mɛ lɛʼ nlwukea nun.»
59002019	Wù shɛ̌ lwɛn lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni m̀bɔʼ. Kwo fɛʼ mɛ̀ cikpuʼ Satæ̀n limmi li. Kwan sɛ ɓɛ ta nun ɓǔn, ɓɛ suʼ gwɛn nywi lɛ̀ yi ɗin.
59002020	Wù, ci-tænnì mwum, wǔ lìmmi kan lɛ wu kɛ̀ ǹlim lɛ̀ Yesù, shìkì wù cì kuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea, lɛ̀ kɛ̌ nlim màzwùm si ɗin?
59002021	Mùn twɛʼ fɛʼ m̀bɔ̀kì kɛ nywi mbibea nyɛʼ Abràhâm nun: M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyɔ̀se nun sanmi kɛ swiʼ shon kɛ ya mbyi nun? A ɓe kan kɛ lɛʼ lwɛn sɛ nun cìe kɛ nsheli yɛ nun shele mwɛn nyon Izàʼ, ɓǎ nun wu nun swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b?
59002022	Wù yɛn kan lɛ Abràhâm kɛ̀e ǹlim yon lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à kònndì tì kuʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea cǐ? Li, à kɛ̀e lɔʼ ǹlim nyon hwæn kɛ nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
59002023	Li nɛ ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ ɓɛ kɔe kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lwinne, nyɛ̌ lɛʼ lɛ: «Abràhâm tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, son sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyɔ̀se nun ǹsanmi kɛ swiʼ shon.» Ɓe nyě yi, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓæn nun ŋwè.
59002024	Wù lìmmâ jenɛ lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ mwum sannzi kɛ nyě ncì mɛ lɛʼ nlwukea nyon, a suʼ kan lɛ̀ kɛ̌ nlim sɛ nun kɛ̀ lɛ̀ nun.
59002025	Cɛênì tì kuʼ fɛʼ Ràhâb nɛ ɓe m̀lib ci-sìbɔʼ. Kwan sɛ mɛ̀ ci-mfyi mɛ Yudà ɓɛnne nye nyon, à kpeâ ɓon; kɛ̀n shan kin wòlǐ, à lɛb ɓon mbyi nyɛ̌ ɗin nɛ ɓon yɛ fyi nlim, ɓɛ yean. Kɛ lɛʼ lwɛn sɛ nun cìe li si, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyɔ̀se nun sanmi kɛ swiʼ shon.
59002026	Ɓwiʼ woli ɓwiʼ shɛ lɛ: ɓɛshɛ m̀pùn mɛ̀ yìnnì mwum ndɔʼ kwean, lɛ̀ mwum màzwùm ywiâ. Kɛ̌ nlim lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b si kuʼ m̀banmbɔʼ li. Ɓɛshɛ mwum tà ka mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea cǐ, lɛ̀ kɛ̌ nlim shon lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b si ɗin.
59003001	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓa ɓyin kpitì ɓyin nɛʼ kɛ nlìsǎʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun ǹzwɔʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin limmì lɛ mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ ɓye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ lànnzi, ɓwiʼ ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-nlìsǎʼ lɛʼ shon, ɓɛ yɛ ɓɛ kimmi ɓɛ lan ɓye ɓwulu.
59003002	Ɓwiʼ hwæn, ɓwiʼ ta pyì kɛ nzæʼ lɛʼ yɛʼ nun kæ̀mmì mèan ɗin. Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ tà ka pyì kɛ nzæʼ lɛʼ yon yɛ nun tǎ lɛʼ nun, lɛ̀ mwum màzwùm ni m̀ɓyi, à lìmmi m̀ɓæn nun nɛʼ.
59003003	Mùn wòli mùn twɛʼ m̀bɔ̀kì lɛ̀ nyæ̀mɓàlì. Ɓwiʼ ta nun kpan kɛ̌ kɛ ŋwum, ɓǎ nun ɗwon mbyi nɛ ɓwiʼ ta yili lɛ à fyi.
59003004	Cɛênì tì fɛʼ mɛ̀ cǐʼ klwɔkea ɓɛ ɓwum ta kɛ̌n nlim mlaʼ lɛ̀ ɓon; ɓlon sɛ ta ɓon kɛ̀nnzi, à si kwæʼ lɛ, a yili m̀byìbì twɔti fɛʼ nun lɛ, cìʼ tǎ kɛ̌n cìcì sɛ gea-cìʼ tà nun kɛ̀nnzi nun.
59003005	Ɗimɔʼ mwum si kuʼ m̀banmbɔʼ li. Sɛ ɓa twun, à si kwæʼ lɛ, son sɛ woli kim sɛ kaʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ ŋglwɔkea. Cɛênì tì kuʼ fɛʼ nzisaʼ win. Ǎ tà ka kyɔʼ twɛ̀nni gwùm?
59003006	Ɗimɔʼ mwum si kuʼ wɛ̌ win. Mɛ̀ paʼ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa mèan nɛ hwæn tǎ waì kɛ ɗimɔʼ nun, à gwànnzì kwæʼ nywi hwæn. Sɛ ta cì wɛ̌ win yɛ ta yæ̀nnì, sɛ gwannzì m̀bɔ̀kì tòn nyɛʼ hwæn. Ǹdǔʼ win màzwùm si Satæ̀n.
59003007	Ɓwum woli ɓɛ wubsi ywum mèan yɛ hwæn. Mɛ̀ nyæ̀m ɓye ta tòn kɛ mbo nun hwæn, ɓwum wubsi ɓon, mɛ̀ kyě, mɛ̀ nywun lɛ̀ ywum yɛ kɛ ɗuʼ nun hwæn.
59003008	Son kɛ wan nun hwæn, mwum nɛ shɛ̌ lɛ nun ɓænnâ ɗimɔʼ shon, à ɓǎn. Ɗimɔʼ si swum ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ sɛ mwum wòli kan à ɓæn. À si lwinni lɛ̀ ɗun nɛ tǎ ɓwum wu.
59003009	Ɗimɔʼ sɛ ɓwiʼ ta Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b twuli nun, son sɛ ɓwiʼ ta tî kuʼ ɓwum ɓɛ nun fɔ̌ lɛ ɓyi ɓi gwili nun hwæbbi nun.
59003010	Ǹtwuli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ǹhwibbɔʼ ɓwulu, hwæn li, yɛ ta kwan ŋwum fɔʼ nun. Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ǹcìkàʼ yɛ li yi ɓa lwɛn.
59003011	Mlǎʼ ŋgea lɛ̀ ye seansean wòli kan yɛ kwan kɛ kwan fɔʼ kɛ mwù ɗuʼ fɔʼ nun.
59003012	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni, cɛ̌ ǹjì kwùmmvu won nun hwæn, ǎ wòli kan à san mɛ̀ ɗwilim, ǹjì ɗwilim kuʼ, ǎ wòli kan à san mɛ̀ kwùmmvu. M̀banmbɔʼ màzwǔm, mlǎʼ ŋgæ̀lǐ wòli kan yɛ kwannzi mlǎʼ yɛ lwɛn.
59003013	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ ni ci-nlìmmì kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, à ci mɛ̀ lɛʼ nlwukea, à twɛʼ nun nɛʼ wɛ̌ lwæ̀b ɓe ɓwulu; son sɛ ywimɛ lìsàʼ lɛ à ni ci-nlìmmì ŋkæ̀mŋkæm.
59003014	Son, ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ta suʼ ɓàkàʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin nɛʼ, ɓyin ǹzwòn cǐ lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, ɓyin ɓɛ tì mɛ̀ ci-mkpi, ɓa ɓyin twuli mwù lɛ ɓyin cinni ǹlìmmì, shìkì ɓyin yonnzì tì kuʼ ǹyè lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m.
59003015	Ntwiʼ paʼ nlìmmǐ màzwǔm tà ka waì kɛ fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à yi ye ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan. M̀pùn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓà kɛ paʼ nlìmmǐ màzwùm nun. Ǹlìmmǐ màzwùm ta waì kɛ fyaʼ Satæ̀n.
59003016	Cìcì sɛ ɓwum ta m̀bànni cǐ nun, ɓɛ tà ka tǒn lwɛn ɓwulu yili, shi kuʼ ɓɛ lwɛn nyan nɛʼ, ŋwum fɔʼ tà ka ɓɛ kɛ nyinnìm shan nun. Li, mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa mèan nɛ cinni kan mwù hwæn yɛ̌ kuʼ ɗun kwe.
59003017	Son, ǹlìmmì yɛ ta waì fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓa lɛ̀ ye ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan m̀ban. Mwum nɛ cinni ǹlìmmì yɛ ta waì fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ni ǹsanmi, à tǎ flɔa fɛ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum ɓyon nun, nun nɛʼ ni m̀flɔa, à ɓǎ ci-kim mwù, à ni ci-kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim lɛ̀ ɓwùlu, à ɓɛ tì ǹtwɔkea kɛ mɛ lɛʼ nlwukea nun. Ǎ tà ka ǹkyììli kɛ̌ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum nun, shìkì à pɔkaʼ mwum.
59003018	Ɓwum ɓye lwinni lɛ̀ flɔa ɓɛ ta cì ɓwùlu cinni flɔa, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓon cǐ, she shan kwannzi mwù.
59004001	Yɛn sɛ mwǔ mpyìsàʼ mɛ lɛʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ twùʼ kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun? Ɓyin ta ka cì li ntwiʼ sɛ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyin tǎ suʼ ɓɔli kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun lɛ̀ ǹcǐ ɓyɛbbi?
59004002	Wù tǎ swum ndɔʼ tæmmi fyaʼ lwikwæ̌n, son, wǔ wòli kan wù cinni son, li, wù ni kwukwâʼ lɛ̀ ǹwu yon. Shindɔʼ wù ni lɛ̀ ǹlim ɓyɛbbi lɛ lwikwæ̌n cinni swum ndɔʼ, wǔ, wǔ cinni kan son, li, ɓyin ta lɛʼ pyìsi, ɓyin ɗwi twùʼ kɛ nyinnìm ɓyin nɛʼ nun. Swum sɛ wù yili si, wǔ cinni kan son ntwiʼ wǔ ɗɔe kǎn son lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ à fɛ wù.
59004003	Wu cibbi fɛʼ lɛ à fɛ wǔ, ǎ tà ka wu fɛ ntwiʼ sɛ wǔ ɗɔâ kan kɛ mbyi nlwɛn nun. Wù tǎ ɗɔa ɓǎ wu sukuʼ ywum yɛ ta wu ǹlim lwu cinni.
59004004	Ɓyin ɓi wɛ̌ mɛ̀ ci-màn mɛʼ, ɓyin lìmmi kan lɛ ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ yili mɛ̀ lɛʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan lɛ̀ à ti ci-ɓyìnnzì Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b? Mwum nɛ wòsâ mɛʼ lɛ̀ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, à limmì lɛ à ti ci-ɓyìnnzì Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
59004005	Ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinni ŋwɛnŋgyî ntwiʼ m̀pùn mɛ̀ yìnnì nɛ nun kɛ ɓwiʼ nywi.» Ɓa ɓyin fɔkàʼ lɛ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ màzwùm yi ɗin.
59004006	À kònndi tì ɓwiʼ ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ lan ywum hwæn fɛ ɓǎ ɓwiʼ ɗyi kimmi. À si wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwà shon nun, she ɓɛ lɛʼ lɛ: «M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b yili kan mɛ̀ ci-nshelaʼ nywi, ɓwum ɓɛ nun tǎ ǹlim kwɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ ɓon, à ɓi ɓwum ɓye ta ɓon nɛʼ twɛli lɛ̀ yì lwæ̀b ɓe ɓwulu.»
59004007	Kɛ à si li, ywɔênì ywum hwæn kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓyin ɓyinnɔ̀ʼ Satæ̀n; li, à yɛ̌ ɓyin yean læ̀bbi.
59004008	Kwɛmmênì kɛ moan Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, li, à ywìmɛ kuʼ kwɛmmi lɛ̀ ɓyin. Ɓyin ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi, kyììlênì lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi. Ɓyin ɓɛ kuʼ mɛ̀ ci-mɛ ŋwum mɓì-mɓì, ɓyin pæʼ ɓyɛbbi nɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun hwæn.
59004009	Ɓyin ton lɛ̀ mɛ̀ yiye, ɓyin fyonŋgaʼ, ɓa ɓyin fyû, son, kweênì nùn. Ɓa ɓyin dalì tì kuʼ, son, tòênnì lɛ̀ mɛ̀ yiye lɛ̀ ntwiʼ ɓyɛbbi nyin.
59004010	Fyɔ̀sênì ɓyin nɛʼ ŋgyɔʼ kɛ swiʼ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à ywìmɛ ɓyin wasi zwô.
59004011	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓa ɓyin shɛ mɛ̀ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa kɛ nywi ɓwulu. Mwum nɛ tǎ lɛʼ ɓyɛbbi shɛ̌ kɛ nywi lwikwæ̌n, shindɔʼ à ɓælâ nun, lɛ̀ à tà kuʼ lwuà Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓyɛbsi. Wu ɓyɛbsi lwuà lɛ̀ wù ɓà tî mwum nɛ tà nun ɗwonnzi, wù ti mwum nɛ tà nun wɛ̀si.
59004012	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun kyishon nɛ ta ɓwum mɛ̀ lwuà fɛ, nun nɛ Ci-nlin kyìtæ̀ʼ nun kyishon, nun nɛ woli à nywæ̀sì ɓwum, à wòli tì kuʼ à ɓwuli ɓon. Ti kuʼ wù nɛ tǎ lwikwæ̌n ɓyɛbsi, wù tǎ fɔ̀kàʼ lɛ wù ni kuʼ làn nywù wɛn?
59004013	Nònnzênì mɛ̀ ywiʼ, ɓyin ywɔʼ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ mùn ywìmɛ ɓyin shɛ̌. Ɓyin ɓɛ ta shɛ̀ lɛ: «Ɗyě, shindɔʼ shim, ɓwiʼ kɛnmɛ nsòn ndɔʼ, ɓwiʼ yɛ nòn kwe ɗwùm fɔʼ, ɓwiʼ kɛnnzì sɛ̀m lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ cinni lǒn mèan.»
59004014	Ɓyin ɓɛ ta lilɔʼ li ɓi, ɓyin lìmmi kan swum sɛ ywimɛ ɓyin cǐ shim. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓi wɛ̌ pwɛʼ sɛ ta shìmndì shikpon, kwan kwæʼ sɛ nywælaʼ.
59004015	Son, sɛ yili kwan sɛ ɓyin yɛ lɛʼ, ɓyin shɛ lɛ: «A M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, ɓwiʼ yɛ tòn lɛ̀ mɛʼ, ɓwiʼ ci shɛ, ɓwiʼ ci shi.»
59004016	Son, ɓyin ɗonnzi ǹshɛ̀ yɛ li, ɓyin ɓi mɛ̀ ci-nlìsàʼ nywi, ɓyin ta ɓyin nɛʼ twuli kɛ nzæʼ lɛʼ nun. Ǹcìkàʼ yɛ li yi ɓa lwɛn.
59004017	Lìmmênì lɛ ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ lìmmi lɛʼ lwɛn ndɔʼ sɛ nun wolè à cì, son, ǎ cì kan, lɛ̀ à shɛâ ɓyɛbbi màzwùm mwu.
59005001	Ɓyin ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-njônndì, nònnzênì mɛ̀ ywiʼ, ɓyin ywɔʼ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ̂m. Kuênnì ǹkwe, ɓyin wasi ǹkwu, ntwiʼ ɓyin yɛ mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni mèan.
59005002	A yɛ ɓɛ lɛ̀ lwɛn nyin fùlâ, ǹzɔʼ jiâ ɓyin mɛ̀ plě,
59005003	ǹzwòn ɓænnâ lòn yin. Ǹzwòn màzwùm tǎ lìsàʼ lɛ ɓyin hwæn, ɓyin yɛ kuʼ gwàn m̀banmbɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ win yɛ fyasi ɓyin. Ɓyin lìmmi kan lɛ ɓyin kin lwɛn nyin swɔsea ɓe kɛ mmlɔ̀kàʼ kwan nun.
59005004	Ɓyin ɗɛ̀b kan ɓwum ɓɛ cie ɓyin she mɛ ndɛm. Ywɔênì fɛʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓon ɓɛ fɔse ɓyin ywum ji ta kwe lɛ̀ ɓɛ fyon. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ndwun nɛ làn ywum hwæn lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ ywɔâ mɛ̀ ŋkwu nyan.
59005005	Ɓyin ta tǒn lwɛn tǒn ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun, ɓyin ci ywum yɛ ɓyin yili, ɓyin ji lwɛn, lɛ̀ ɓyin ta klwɔkaʼ wɛ̌ mɛ̀ nàʼ ɓye ta nywɔʼ nɛ ɓɛ yɛ ɓon linni ɓǒn.
59005006	Ɓyin ɓyɛbsi kyìtæ̀ʼ ɓwum ɓɛ cì kan swum ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ, ɓyin wu ɓon shìkì ɓɛ yê ŋwum.
59005007	Li, mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓænnênì ǹlim a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kwan sɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò ywìmɛ fyònnì ɓe fɛ. Twɛlênì fɛʼ m̀bɔ̀kì lɛ̀ ci-ɗyìm. Mvu mɓɔʼ tǎ pyì, à ɓæn ǹlim lɛ̀ ywum ɓǐ yon han, à ɓònŋgàʼ kwan mfyæ̌b lwɛn sɛ nun wòli à fyæ̀b ji nyon nun lwɛn.
59005008	Ɓyin kuʼ, ɓænnênì ǹlim m̀banmbɔʼ li. Ɓyin kimnzi ǹlim ntwiʼ ǹgyìn nɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ yɛ̌ fyòn ti kwɛmmi nûn.
59005009	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓa ɓyin fyon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ myin ɓwùlu, mɛ̀ kæ̌ʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b læ̀kì ɓyin ɓænni. Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò nɛ ywìmɛ ɓwiʼ mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ lànnzi ti kwukwâʼ lɛ̀ m̀ɓɛ̀n.
59005010	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, twɛlênì tì fɛʼ m̀bɔ̀kì mɓæn nlim kɛ nywi mɛ ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Cɛênì wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓon ɓe mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni, ɓɛ pæ̀le kǎn kwù.
59005011	Ɓwiʼ ta ɓon twɛli lɛ̀ ɓwum ndɔʼ ɓɛ ta tòn lwɛn kɛ mfyimnzi yɛ ɓon fyimnze mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ. Ti kuʼ mbyi nyɛ̌ Jɔ̂b nun, ɓyin limmi wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun yìke mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ. Ɓyin ywɔâ tì kuʼ ywum yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe nun nyè mɛ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nyon. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ ma ǹlim kwɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ ɓwum, lɛŋkæ̀m. À tǎ lwɛn cǐ lɛ̀ ɓon.
59005012	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ŋgyi lɛʼ nɛ mùn ywìmɛ tì ɓyin shɛ̌, à ni lɛ, kwan sɛ ɓyin ta lɛʼ ndɔʼ lɛli, ɓa ǹdɔ̀ʼ kwan ɓyin ŋwum, kwo fɛʼ lɛ̀ jin Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, lɛ̀ jin mɛ swæ̀b ɓɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, shìkì à ɓɛ kuʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ myin ywum hwæn. Kwan sɛ ɓyin yilâ lɛ hɛ̀n, lɛ̀ hɛ̀n nɛ kuʼ. Kwan sɛ ɓyin ɓyinnɔʼ kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓyinnɔâ. Ɓyin shi ci li lɛ̀ mɛ̀ kæ̌ʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ ɓyin ɓænni.
59005013	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ ni kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun nyɛ̌ tǎ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni, à keli M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓǎ nun kpaʼ nun. Ɓɛshɛ ǹdɔʼ ni lɛ̀ ǹdàli, à shib mɛ̀ nshib lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à twuli nun.
59005014	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ ni lɛ̀ ǹgwɛ̀nŋgwɛ̀n ndɔʼ nywi kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun, à lon ɓwumŋkæ̀m ŋkwìn ɓwum Yesù, ɓǎ ɓɛ kiìn nun mɛ̀ wu tɛ̀mmi swiʼ kɛ jin Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò nun, ɓɛ keli nun M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b mwu.
59005015	Ɓon keli lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywìmɛ cì ǹgwɛ̀nŋgwɛ̀n kimmɔʼ, à wasi nun ɓe zwô. Ɓɛshɛ ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ ɓi ci-ŋgwɛ̀nŋgwɛ̀n ni nywi, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ kuʼ nun nun zùsi.
59005016	Li nɛ mùn shɛ̀ ɓyin lɛ kwàseànì mɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi nyin kɛ swiʼ ɓwùlu, ɓyin keli tì kuʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ mɛ̀ myin ɓwùlu, ɓǎ nun kimnzi ɓyin. Ŋ̀keli mwum nyɛ̌ ǹsanmi kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinni kim ncì ywum klwɔkea.
59005017	Twɛlênì m̀bɔ̀kì nywi Èlî, mwum nɛ ɓe kuʼ wɛ̌ ɓwiʼ. À kele M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ lɛ ɓa mvu ni nwi. Li, kɛ nɗunmi kwan màzwùm nun, han a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kɛ nyě ɗwùm lê lɛ̀ kìtɔ̌ʼ, kwo mvu nwi kan kɛ kpìnnzɔ̀ʼ ŋgyɔʼ màzwùm nun.
59005018	Ɓe, à keli tì lɛ mvu ni ɗunmi nwi. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b kà fyi tì mvu, ywum ɓǐ lɛ̀ mvub kæʼ kà ɗunmi ti twæb ɓe.
59005019	Mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyɛ̂m, ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ ɓwu mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ŋkwìn yin nun, ɓe nyě yi, lwikwæ̌n ndɔʼ fyɔ̀sì nun ɓe mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun,
59005020	lìmmênì lɛ mwum nɛ tǎ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi fyɔ̀si ɓe mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun ywìmɛ mwum màzwùm swæti kɛ ywi nun. Ɓɛ fɛʼ shɛ ci-mɓwu mbyi ni cinne mɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi nnyi, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ nun nun zùsi.
60001001	Mùn Pìɛ̂r, ci-ntwum Yesù Kristò nɛ ta ɗèwà ton sɛ kɔi lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̀nnâ, ɓyin ɓɛ ton wɛ̌ mɛ̀ kyìn ɓwum kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, ɓyin nywæleâ kɛ mɛ ŋgyɔʼ kyikyi nun, ɓye lɛ: Pôn, Gàlàsî, Kàpàdosì, Àzî, lɛ̀ Bìtìnî.
60001002	Ɓe lɛ̀ Ce nyɛʼ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yilâ lɛ à yæn ɓyin, ɓǎ ɓyin ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyon kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ Mpùn Nsanmi nun, ɓyin ɓɛ tì kuʼ ywɔli lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, ɓɛ konndì ɓyin sannzi lɛ̀ mvæb yon. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b sukuʼ ɓyin ŋgæ̀nni li, à fɛ ɓyin flɔa kwan hwæn.
60001003	Ɓwiʼ fɛênì ǹtwu lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ɗyi Ce Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò. Kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon nun, à fɛâ ɓwiʼ ǹzison she nywæb kɛ nyě Yesù Kristò nɛ nun yìmnze kɛ ywi nun. Li nɛ ci ɓwiʼ ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun lɛ ɓwiʼ yɛ ǹzison she nywæb màzwùm cinni fyaʼ yon.
60001004	Ɓwiʼ ta tì kuʼ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ lwɛn nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lwæ̀si kɛ ɗɛb lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓyon. Lwɛn màzwùm ɓǎ nyɛ̌ yɛ̌ mlɔ̀ʼ nun, shìkì à gwàn, shìkì à ɓwusi kuʼ lwu shon. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lwæ̀si nun lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ ta ǹlim kɛ̌ kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò,
60001005	à tà ɓyin ɓǒn lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yon ɓǎ kwan sɛ m̀mlɔ̀kàʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan yɛ wòlǐ, à yɛ̌ mbyi nɛ nun fɔ̀si ɓǎ nun swæti ɓyin nun lìsea.
60001006	Kɛ ntwiʼ ywum màzwùm, kwo fɛʼ she ɓyin ta mɛ̀ paʼ mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni mèan kɛ kwan kwæʼ si nun, dàlênì.
60001007	Mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ màzwùm tǎ ɓyin ɓɛ̀nni nywi ɓǎ ɓɛ limmì ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ lɛŋkæ̀m. À si wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ ta gɔ̂l twɛli, ɓɛ sɛti nun twɛ̀nni kɛ win lɛ̀ ɓɛ yɛn ɓɛshɛ nun nɛʼ gɔ̂l nɛ. Gɔ̂l màzwùm ni swum sɛ yɛ mlɔ̀ʼ kwan ndɔʼ, son, ǹtɛ̀ʼ zwum lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yi swum twun, a lan gɔ̂l. À si swum sɛ yɛ ɓyin ǹtwu fɛ ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ nun hwæn kwan sɛ Yesù Kristò yɛ̌ fyònnì ɓe.
60001008	Kwo fɛʼ she ɓyin yɛn kifɛʼ Yesù si, ɓyin ta nun yili. Kwo fɛʼ she ɓyin yɛn kan nun jenɛ, ɓyin ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ nun. Li nɛ ci ɓyin ta dàlì ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, han ǹdàli twun màzwùm fɛ ɓyin tæʼ ŋwum.
60001009	Ɓyin ta dàlì ntwiʼ swum sɛ ɓyin ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ son, ɓyin yɛ son cinni. Swum màzwùm si lɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓyin swæti.
60001010	Kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî, mɛ̀ ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun ɓe mbyi kæbbi lɛ̀ ɓon limmì mbyi nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ fyi ɓǎ nun swæti ɓwum nun. Ɓon ɓɛ lɛle mbyî mbɔ̀ʼ tin kɛ nywi lwɛn nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓyin cǐ kɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim shon nun.
60001011	Mɛ̀ ci-nlɛli kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun ɓi ɓe tì kuʼ ɓɔli lɛ̀ ɓon limmì kwan sɛ ywum màzwùm yɛ lànnzì, lɛ̀ m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ yɛ yɛ tì kuʼ ɓɛ. Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀pùn Yesù Kristò ɓe ɓon kɛ nywi, à shɛ̀ ɓon lɛ Yesù Kristǒ kà yɛnkàʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ. Kɛ nyě vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ màzwùm, à yɛ̌ ǹtwu cinni.
60001012	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kònnde ɓon kwàsi lɛ ywum màzwùm ɓa lànnzi kɛ kwan shan nun, son, a yɛ ɓɛ̀n kɛ kwan shin nun. Jenɛ ɓwum ɓye ta ɓyin Ǹtwum Lwɛn sannzi shɛâ ɓyin ywum màzwùm. Ɓɛ ta ɓyin yon shɛ̌ lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ Mpùn Nsanmi, nun nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fyie ǹwaì ye kɛ ɗɛb. Ywum màzwùm hwæn li, kwo fɛʼ mɛ̀ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓye ɗɛb yili ti kuʼ ɓon limmì yon.
60001013	Li nɛ ci, ɗyilênì mwù kɛ she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, ɓyin ton lɛ̀ mɛʼ, ɓa ɓyin kɛ mɛ̀ mɓàkàʼ nyin kɛ swum ɗin ndɔʼ nun. Kɛ̀ênì mɛ̀ nlim nyin lɛ̀ lwɛn nɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywìmɛ ɓyin cǐ kwan sɛ Yesù Kristò yɛ̌ fyònnì ɓe.
60001014	Ɓyin ɓɛ ywɔli lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b wɛ̌ ɓwɛn ɓye ta ce nyan ywɔli. Ɓa ɓyin kɛ tì mɛ̀ nlim nyin kɛ nywi ywum yɛ ɓyin ɓe tæm mbyî, lɛ̀ ɓyin kɛ kɛ njimmi nun.
60001015	Son, kwǔ kɛ̀n shin ɓɛ sanmi, m̀banmbɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ lon ɓyin ni ǹsanmi.
60001016	Ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛʼ lɛ: “Ɓɛênì ǹsanmi ntwiʼ sɛ mùn ni kuʼ ǹsanmi.” »
60001017	Kɛ mɛ ŋkeli nyin nun, ɓyin ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lon lɛ Ce. Kɛ à si li, sɛ yili lɛ ɓyin yi nun, ɓyin ɗwon mɛ̀ kwǔ kɛ̀n lwukea kɛ kwan kwæʼ sɛ ɓyin kɛ tòn fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun. Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b tà ka ǹkyììli kɛ̌ kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum nun. À tǎ she sɛ mwum tǎ cì cɛ, ǎ kà lin mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ.
60001018	Ɓyin limmi seansean lɛ Yesù Kristò libbaʼ ɓyin kɛ yi ɓɛ̀ʼ mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ yɛ mɛ̀ mbibea ɓyin lisae ɓyin nun. A libbaʼ kan mɛ̀ mwù nyin lɛ̀ lòn, shìkì à libbaʼ nun lɛ̀ gɔ̂l nɛ kà mlɔ̀kàʼ.
60001019	Son, à libbaʼ mɛ̀ mwù nyin lɛ̀ mvæb sanmi yon. À ni wɛ̌ mwɛn nzwùmŋgan nɛ ɓon linne wɛ̌ sàtìkæ̀ʼ, shìkì à ɓɛ kuʼ lɛ̀ ɗɛ̀m ndɔʼ kɛ nywi.
60001020	Lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b kà fɔ̌ʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, ɓe lɛ̀ à yæ̀nnâ Yesù Kristò lɛ à kiìn she màzwùm cǐ. Ti jenɛ kɛ mmlɔ̀kàʼ kwan nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwàsâ nun kɛ pisean ɓǎ nun swæti ɓyin.
60001021	Kɛ ntwiʼ yon, ɓyin ta ǹlim kɛ̌ kɛ nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, nun nɛ yìmnze Yesù kɛ ywi nun, à fɛ nun ǹtwu. Li, ɓyin ta ǹlim kɛ̌ kɛ nywi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓyin tɛʼ tì kuʼ zwùm lɛ̀ nun lɛ à yɛ̌ ɓyin swæti.
60001022	Jenɛ, à si wɛ̌ ɓyin pɔsâ mɛ̀ nlim nyin, ɓyin fyonnâ sanmi ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta ywum ŋkæ̀mŋkæm yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b tǎ lìsàʼ mwumnzi. Li, ɓyin ta mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyin yili lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ. Kɛ à si li, kɛ̀nnênì mbyî lɛ̀ ǹyili ɓyin nɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun.
60001023	Ɓyin ti ɓwum ɓye ɓɛ yeâ ye nyɛ̌ nywæb kɛ ntwiʼ ŋkimmɔʼ yɛ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b cinni. Lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ta ɓwum ǹzison fɛ, sɛ ɓɛ tì kuʼ ɗwùmɗwùm. Ǹzison nywæb she ɓyin cinni ɓa lɛ mwum nɛ yɛ̌ ɓɛ shim lɛ̀ à ywiâ nɛ fɛ ɓyin son. Son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɛ ɓyin, nun nɛ ɓǎ ywi.
60001024	A si wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔe kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, she ɓɛ lɛʼ lɛ: «Mwum hwæn ni wɛ̌ ǹjì kæʼ. Ǹtwu yon yi wɛ̌ fluwà. Kæʼ ta wum, fluwà nyon pyìɔ̀ʼ ŋgyɔʼ.
60001025	Son, ti lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, yɛ ta tòn ɗwùmɗwùm.» Ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ nɛ tòn nɛ ni Ǹtwum Lwɛn yɛ ɓɛ shɛâ ɓyin nùn.
60002001	Kɛ à si li, kɛsênì nywi lɛ̀ ǹcǐ ɓyɛbbi. Ɓa ɓyin ɓɛ mɛ̀ ci-mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ, shìkì ɓyin ɓɛ kuʼ mɛ̀ ŋwum mɓì-mɓì. Ɓa ɓyin tæm ywum ɓwulu, shìkì ɓyin ɓɛ kuʼ mɛ̀ ci-ɓòɓo.
60002002	Son, yilênì lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, wɛ̌ ɓwɛnnzea ɓye sukuʼ mɛ̀ nywon yili. Ɓyin yili son li, ɓǎ ɓyin klwɔkaʼ, a kɛn ɓɛ̀n kwan sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓyin swæti.
60002003	Ntwiʼ sɛ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun, à si kɔa lɛ: «Ɓyin yɛnnâ wɛ̌ tà shɛ Nyɛli nyɛʼ ni ǹlim nlwɛn.»
60002004	Kwɛmmênì lɛ kɛ ke Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù, nun nɛ ɗyi ǹshimmbyiʼ nye ye mɛ̀ ci-ŋgwe nye nzwonnze, son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b twɛle nun wɛ̌ ǹshimmbyiʼ yon nɛʼ ye lwɛn kɛ mɛʼ yon. Nun Yesù nɛ ta ɓwum ǹzison fɛ.
60002005	Ɓyin kuʼ, ɓɛênì wɛ̌ ŋgæʼ mwu nye yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ nye nyon gwe lɛ̀ yon. Ɓyin yɛ tì kuʼ ɓɛ kwe ǹkwìn mɛ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ, ɓǎ ɓyin fɛ ɓyin nɛʼ kɛ she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ kɛ ntwiʼ Yesù Kristò. She màzwùm sɛ ta nun ǹlim lwukea.
60002006	À si wɛ̌ tà shɛ ɓɛ kɔe ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ ndɔʼ nyɛ̌ wai ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ɗèwà shon nun, nyɛ̌ nun lɛʼ lɛ: «Mùn yæ̀nnâ ǹshimmbyiʼ nye ye lwɛn, mùn kɛ̀â yon jenɛ wɛ̌ ǹshimmbyiʼ nye kɛ Sìôn. Mwum nɛ yɛ̌ zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ yon ɓǎ hwæli.»
60002007	Ǹshimmbyiʼ màzwùm yi swum twun kɛ mɛʼ yin, ɓyin ɓɛ ta mbyi Yesù ɗwon. Son, kɛ cǐ ɓwum ɓye tà ka mbyi nyon yili, yɛ ɓa swum twun, son sɛ ci ɓɛ kɔe kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Ŋgæʼ nɛ mɛ̀ ci-ŋgwe nye nzwonnze ti jenɛ ǹshimmbyiʼ nye.» Ɓɛ konndi tî kɔʼ kɛ cì ndɔʼ lɛ:
60002008	«Ǹshimmbyiʼ nye màzwùm yi swum nswili mbaʼ, à yi tì kuʼ wɛ̌ ǹgwɔ̀ʼ nyɛ̌ tǎ ɓwum pyìsi ŋgyɔʼ.» M̀bàʼ swiâ ɓon zwɛm ntwiʼ sɛ ɓon ɓyinnɔe lɛ ɓon ɓi ɓa mwù kɛ̌ kɛ lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Sɛ ciâ ɓon li, ɓǎ ǹyili Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b lwinni.
60002009	Ti lɛ̀ ɓyin, ɓyin ɓi jenɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum ye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̌n, ɓyin ɓɛ tì wɛ̌ mɛ̀ ci-mfɛ sàtìkæ̀ʼ kɛ cǐ Mvɛ̀n ndwun. Ɓyin ti ɓwum sanmea ɓyon, ɓyin konndì ɓɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓye kɛ fyaʼ yon. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ̀e ɓyin lɛ ɓyin shɛ ɓwum ywum lwukea yɛ nun tǎ cì, nun nɛ lon ɓyin, à kwannzi ɓyin kɛ njimmi nun, à kɛ̀ ɓyin kɛ ŋwanŋwan twun shon nun.
60002010	Kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî, ɓyin ɓe kǎn ǹkwìn ɓwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Son jenɛ, ɓyin ti ǹkwìn ɓwum ɓyon. Kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b ɓe kǎn ǹlim kwɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ ɓyin. Son jenɛ, à ti ǹlim kwɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ ɓyin.
60002011	Mɛ̀ ŋwè ɓyɛ̂m, mùn tà ɓyin swulea lɛ, m̀bɔ̀kì nɛ ɓyin ta tòn wɛ̌ mɛ̀ kyìn ɓye ta yòn kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, ɓa ɓyin kɛ tì mwù lɛ̀ ywum yɛ mɛ̀ nlim nyin yili. Ywum màzwùm woli kim yɛ gwannzì ǹzison shin.
60002012	Konnênì lɛ̀ kwǔ kɛ̀n shin, sɛ ɓɛ lwɛn kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum ɓɛ lìmmi kan M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Kwo fɛʼ ɓɛ twɛʼ ɓyin lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi, sɛ yɛ ɓon ɓɛ nywi dòlɛ̀ʼ lɛ ɓɛ limmì lwɛn nɛ ɓyin ta cì, ɓɛ fɛ ǹtwu lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kwan sɛ nun ywìmɛ ɓɛ̀n.
60002013	Kɛ ntwiʼ Yesù Kristò, ɓɛênì ywɔli lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ci-zwiʼ ɓɛ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ kɛ ŋgyɔʼ zwɛm. Ɓyin ɓɛ ywɔli lɛ̀ m̀vɛ̀n ndwun nɛ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ hwæn,
60002014	ɓon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ gwɛmnà ɓye nun kɛ̀e kɛ yi cìcì ɓǎ ɓyi ɓi yɛnnzi mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ ɓyɛbbi vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ, ɓyi ɓi twuli tì kuʼ ɓwum ɓye ta lwɛn cǐ.
60002015	Swum sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili à si lɛ ɓyin twɔʼ mɛ̀ shì-nlìmmì mɛ̀ ŋwum lɛ̀ lwɛn nɛ ɓyin ta cì.
60002016	Cìênì ywum hwæn wɛ̌ ɓwum ɓye lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mwù nyan, son, ɓa ɓyin fɔkàʼ lɛ, kɛ ɓyin ɓi lɛ̀ mwù nyin, ɓyin woli ɓyin ci ɓyɛbbi ɓe nyènye. Cìênì ywum yɛ lisaʼ lɛ ɓyin ɓi mɛ̀ ci-she Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
60002017	Ɓyin mwumnzi ɓwum hwæn, ɓyin yili mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓwum Yesù Kristò. Yiênì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓyin mwumnzi tì kuʼ m̀vɛ̀n ndwun.
60002018	Ɓyin, mɛ̀ ci-ncǐ she, ɓɛênì ywɔli lɛ̀ ɓwumŋkæ̀m ɓyin, ɓyin mwumnzi ɓon lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, kwo fɛʼ nyɛ̌ ǹsàsi, kwo fɛʼ nyɛ̌ ǹlim zwum ŋæ̀li.
60002019	À si lwɛn kɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b she mwum tǎ fyimni kwan sɛ ɓɛ ta nun vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi ɗinɗin, shìkì à lìmmì lɛʼ ndɔʼ, ntwiʼ sɛ nun yili M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
60002020	Yà se nɛ ɓyin yɛ cinni ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ci ɓyɛbbi, ɓyin kà fyimni kwan sɛ ɓɛ ta ɓyin ɓo? Se ɓǎn. Son, ɓɛshɛ ɓɛ yɛnnzi ɓyin vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ciâ lwɛn, ɓyin fyimnzi nun, à si swum lwɛn kɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
60002021	Kɛ ntwiʼ màzwùm sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b loin ɓyin lɛ ɓyin ci li. Ntwiʼ sɛ Yesù nun nɛʼ yɛnne vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ntwiʼ yin, li, à ɗonnzâ kuʼ ɓyin m̀bɔ̀kì ɓe lɛ̀ ɓyin ɗwon kuʼ ɓwæ̀b shon.
60002022	Nun, ǎ cìe kǎn ɓyɛbbi ndɔʼ, shìkì ǹzæ̀ʼ lɛʼ mɛ̀ mɓwɛ̀ʼ ndɔʼ kwan kuʼ nun ŋwum.
60002023	Kwan sɛ ɓɛ sɛmme nun, ǎ fyònnze kǎn ɓe lɛ̀ ǹsɛ̀m. Kwan sɛ ɓɛ yɛnnze nun vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ, ǎ shɛ̀e kǎn lɛ̀ ɓwum màzwùm lɛ ɓon ɓi yɛ yɛnni ɓe ɓon lɛ̀ ɓyi. Son, à tɛ̀le zwùm lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, nun nɛ tǎ kyìtæ̀ʼ linni kɛ mbyi nun.
60002024	Nun nɛʼ, Yesù Kristò nɛ shɛe mɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi nyɛʼ hwæn kɛ nywi yon kwan sɛ ɓɛ ywummɔe nun ŋgæʼ mɛ̀ ɓɔtɔʼ zwɛm. À shɛe nun li ɓǎ ɓwiʼ kyiilì lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi, ɓwiʼ ton tòn she lwinni. Mɛ̀ mbon ɓye ɓɛ ɗyɛmnzae nun, ɓon ɓɛ kimnzâ ɓyin.
60002025	Ɓyin ɓe mbyî wɛ̌ mɛ̀ pɔʼ ɓye ɓwuâ, son jenɛ, ɓɛ fyɔsâ ɓyin ɓe kɛ cǐ ci-mɓòn mɛ pɔʼ nɛ tǎ ǹzison shin ɓǒn.
60003001	Ti lɛ̀ ɓyin mɛ̀ yib, kyìbsênì mɛ̀ ɗwɛb ɓyin. Li, ɓɛshɛ ǹdɔʼ ni kɛ nyinnìm shan nun nyɛ̌ tà ka mbyi Yesù ɗwon, ɓyin shi fɛʼ nun lɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b shɛ̌, à yɛ̌ kwǔ kɛ̌n lwɛn shin yɛnni, à ɗunmi mbyi Yesù ɗwon.
60003002	Ntwiʼ sɛ nun yɛ̌ yɛn wɛ̌ tà shɛ kwǔ kɛ̀n shin si lwɛn ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ, kònndì lɛ̀ m̀mwumnzi yɛ ɓyin ta ti ɓon mwumnzi.
60003003	Ɓa ǹlim sukuʼ ɓyin ɗyi lɛ̀ m̀fɔ̀sǐ kwæʼ nywi shin. M̀fɔ̀sǐ kwæʼ nywi màzwùm yi lɛ: ǹlànnzǐ kwan kɛ ntwæʼ mwu nun, ǹswòn ywum nyànŋgaʼ, lɛ̀ ǹswì mɛ plè ye lǒn mèan.
60003004	Son, swum sɛ ɗyi lwɛn, a si lɛ mɛ̀ nlim nyin ɓɛ ǹlwukea. Mɛ̀ nlim ɓɛ tì kuʼ ɓyin zwum m̀flɔkea. Ntwiʼ lwu sɛ kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun tà ka gwàn, son màzwùm sɛ ta M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ǹlim lwukea ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ.
60003005	Mɛ̀ yib ɓye ɓe mbyî, ɓye ɓe M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɗwon, li nɛ ɓon ɓe kwæʼ nywi shan fɔ̀si, ɓɛ kyibsì tì kuʼ mɛ̀ ɗwɛb ɓyan.
60003006	Cɛênì fɛʼ Sarà nɛ ɓe myǐ Abràhâm, à ɓe nun mwumnzi, à lon nun lɛ nyɛli nyon. Ɓyin ɓi jenɛ wɛ̌ ɓwɛn ɓyon ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ci kuʼ lwɛn wɛ̌ nun, shìkì ɓyin yi kuʼ swum ndɔʼ.
60003007	Ti kuʼ ɓyin mɛ̀ ɗwɛb, kwan sɛ ɓyin yɛ tòn lɛ̀ mɛ̀ yib ɓyin, ɓa ǹlim fye ɓyin lɛ ɓɛ ɓa ǹlim zwum kimmi wɛ̌ ɓyin. Twɛlênì ɓon kyìbli kɛ mɛʼ yin, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin limmi lɛ ɓyin yɛ ǹzison ɗwùmɗwùm cinni fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓyin lɛ̀ ɓon m̀banmban. Ɓyin ci li, lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ mɛ̀ ŋkeli nyin ywo.
60003008	M̀mlɔ̀kàʼ nzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ̂m yi lɛ, ɓyin hwæn, tòênnì ŋwum fɔʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓyin ywɔʼ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim lɛ̀ ɓwùlu. Ɓyin yili tì ɓyin nɛʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun, ɓyin ci lwɛn lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni, ɓyin fyɔsì tì kuʼ ɓyin nɛʼ sisɔʼ kɛ mɛʼ ɓwulu.
60003009	Ɓɛshɛ mwum ndɔʼ cì wù ɓyɛbbi, ɓa wù fyɔ̀sì nun ɓe lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi. Mwum ndɔʼ sɛ̀m fɛʼ wû, ɓa wù fyɔ̀sì nun ɓe lɛ̀ ǹsɛ̀m. Son, fyònnzi nun lɛ: «M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ flɔa.» Ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b loen ɓyin lɛ ɓyin lwinnzi ywum màzwùm ɓǎ ɓyin yê ǹŋgæ̀nni yɛ nun cìe ɓyin ǹkàli lɛ nun yɛ̌ ɓyin fɛ.
60003010	Ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Mwum nɛ yili nun ndwæʼ tòn shon fɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋgyìn lan tì kuʼ nun nywi lwukea, à kyiilì lɛ̀ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ ɓyibbɔa, à ɗonnzi tì kuʼ ǹshɛ̀ mɛ mɓwɛ̀ʼ.
60003011	À yonnzì ǹyè lɛ̀ ǹcǐ ɓyɛbbi, à fyôn lwɛn cǐ, à kæb mbyi nɛ nun yɛ̌ cì flɔa ɗun kɛ nyinnìm ɓwum nun.
60003012	Ntwiʼ sɛ mɛʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yi kɛ nywi ɓwum lwinnɔa. Mɛ̀ ywiʼ ɓyon ta ywum yɛ ɓon ta cibbi ywo. Ti lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta ɓyɛbbi cǐ, ǎ tà ka zwiʼ ɗwǐ lɛ̀ ɓon.»
60003013	Ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ta ǹlim kɛ̌ kɛ ncǐ lwɛn nun, yà mwum nɛ yɛ ɓyin ɓyɛbbi cǐ?
60003014	Kwo fɛʼ ɓɛshɛ ɓyin yɛn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ntwiʼ lwɛn nɛ ɓyin ta cì, tǒn lwɛn si lɛ̀ ɓyin. Li, ɓa ɓyin yi ɓwum ɓye yili ɓon ci ɓyin ɓyɛbbi. Ɓa ɓyin ton kuʼ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ mfyonŋgaʼ.
60003015	Son, fɛênì Yesù Kristò ǹtwu kɛ mɛ nlim nyin nun, nun kyishon nɛ ɗyi Nyɛli nyin. Fɔ̀sênì swum sɛ ɓyin yɛ fyònnzì lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ta ɓyin swum sɛ ci ɓyin ta zwùm tɛ̀li lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò cibbi, li, ɓyin yɛ lìmmì swum sɛ ɓyin yɛ ɓon fyònnzi kwan mèan hwæn.
60003016	Kwan sɛ ɓyin yɛ ɓon fyònnzi, ɓyin fyonnzì ɓon sèbì kɛ ŋkwu pɛn nun. Ɓyin ɓɛ ǹlim zwum pyǐ kɛ nywi ywum yɛ ɓyin ta cì, li, kwan sɛ ɓwum ta mɛ̀ mɓwɛ̀ʼ shɛ̌ kɛ nywi yin, ɓɛ simmɔ̀ʼ ɓyin, kwɛ̀nnjin yɛ ɓon fyǒn ɓænni ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ limmâ ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓon shɛâ kɛ nywi kwǔ kɛ̌n lwɛn shin she kɛ mbyi Yesù Kristò nun.
60003017	Ǹdikàʼ she ɓyin ta vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta lwɛn cǐ, ɓɛshɛ ǹyili Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ, lɛ̀ she ɓyin yɛ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ta ɓyɛbbi cǐ.
60003018	Yesù Kristò nun nɛʼ ywie kæ̀mmì fɔʼ ɓǎ nun lwinnzi she shon ntwiʼ mɛ ɓyɛbbi nyɛʼ. Nun nɛ mwum ǹlwinni, à ywie ntwiʼ ɓwum ɓyibbɔa. À cìe li lɛ̀ nun kɛnnzì ɓyin kɛ cǐ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Ɓwum wue kwæʼ nywi shon, son, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe nun ǹzison ɓe.
60003019	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yìmnze nun li, kɛ nyě yi, à waʼ, à kɛ̀n lɛʼ-Nswæ̀b shɛ̌ lɛ̀ mɛ̀ swæ̀b ɓye ta tòn kpimmea kɛ cǐ ɓwum ywi.
60003020	Mɛ̀ swæ̌b màzwùm ɓe ɓwum ɓye fyinnze ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ kwan Nòê. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ɓænne ǹlim lɛ̀ ɓon ǹgyìn mèan kwan sɛ Nòê ɓe cìʼ ndwun pèa, son, ɓɛ yònnze kǎn mɛ̀ nlim. Son sɛ ci ɓwum ɓɛ sue kuʼ ɗun kwe ciʼ nun ɓe kwæʼ, ɓɛ ɓe ɓwum nìni ɓye sue mlǎʼ nywæ̀li.
60003021	Mlǎʼ màzwùm yi wɛ̌ mlǎʼ njimnzi yɛ ta ɓwum swæti jenɛ. Ǹjimnzi yɛ ɓɛ ta ɓyin jimnzi yɛ, a ɓa swum fɔʼ lɛ̀ m̀ɓɔsi yɛ ɓyin ta nywi ɓɔsi, son, yɛ lisaʼ m̀fɛ yɛ ɓyin ta ɓyin nɛʼ fɛ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ. Ǹjimnzi màzwùm ta ɓyin swæti kɛ ntwiʼ Yesù Kristò yìmnâ kɛ ywi nun.
60003022	Nun nɛ nèan kɛ ɗɛb, à ɓænnâ cǐ tòn kɛ fyaʼ ji Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, kɛ kwe à tǎ mɛ̀ cikpuʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b ywo ɓon lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋkimmɔʼ nɛ kwe nlim ɗɛb hwæn.
60004001	Kɛ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ nɛ Yesù yɛnni kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun ntwiʼ yin, kɛ̀ênì kɛ mwu yin nun lɛ ɓyin yɛ kuʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni wɛ̌ nun. Ntwiʼ mwum nɛ tǎ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni wɛ̌ Yesù, à kyììlaʼ lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi.
60004002	Kɛ tòn sɛ nun tǎ tòn kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan nun, à ɓà tî ywum cǐ wɛ̌ tà shɛ ǹlim yon ta yili, son, à yɛ̌ cì wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili.
60004003	Kɛ kwan sɛ ɓe mbyî nun, ɓyin ɓe kwan ɓwuli ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ kɛ ywum yɛ mɛ̀ nshì-nlìmmì yili ǹcì nun. Ywum màzwùm ɓe lɛ: ɓyin ɓe ɓyɛbbi cǐ kwan hwæn wɛ̌ tà shɛ mɛ̀ nlim nyin ɓe yili, ywum ɓyibbɔa yɛ ɓyin ɓe suʼ tæm, ɓyin lan sɔ̀à kɛ ǹdàli ŋgwìn mɛ swæ̀b nun. Ɓyin ɓe ǹkan ywi, ɓyin mwumnzi tì kuʼ yì fɔ̀kì mɛ swæ̀b, swum sɛ ɗyi swum kwɛ̀nnjin.
60004004	Son jenɛ, kwan sɛ mɛ̀ nshì-nlìmmì ta kɛ̌n wan yan ji, lɛ̀ ɓɛ yɛn lɛ ɓyin tà ka tî ɗun kɛ læm shan nun, shìmmea ta ɓon cǐ, ɓɛ ɗunmi ɓyin kɔlea.
60004005	Son, nywɔʼ ndɔʼ kà ɓɛ̀nkàʼ, ɓɛ yɛ ɗyi kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, ɓɛ ɗunmi sù lɛ̀ mɛ̀ ŋwum nyan swum sɛ ɓon ɓe cì. Nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, à ni kɛ mɓònŋgàʼ nun ɓǎ nun lannzì ɓwum ɓye kɛ lɛ̀ mɛʼ lɛ̀ ɓwum ɓye ywiâ nùn mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ.
60004006	Li nɛ ci, Yesù Kristò kɛ̀nne Ǹtwum Lwɛn shɛ̌ cɛ̌ ɓwum ɓye ywiâ nùn, ɓǎ ɓɛ cinni ǹzison m̀banmbɔʼ wɛ̌ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ Mpùn Nsanmi nun, kwo fɛʼ she kwan sɛ ɓon ɓe lɛ̀ mɛʼ, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b lànnzâ ɓon mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun tǎ ɓwum hwæn mɛ̀ kæ̀ʼ lànnzi.
60004007	M̀mlɔ̀kǎʼ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan ti kwukwâʼ. Kɛ à si li, ɓɛênì kwan hwæn ɓwum ɓye cinni mwù, ɓa kì ɓyin ɗonnzi ɓwæʼ ci ɓyin lɛ̀ ǹkeli Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
60004008	Swum zwimbyiʼ si lɛ, yilênì ɓwùlu kwan hwæn lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ. Ntwiʼ kwan sɛ ɓyin ta ɓwùlu yili, ɓyin ta ǹlim fyeli lɛ̀ ɓyɛbbi nɛ ɓon ta cì.
60004009	Yèênì ɓwùlu kɛ mɛ ɗwòn ɓyin lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ, ɓa ɓyin ŋgunnàʼ ɓon.
60004010	Kɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛe ɓyin mɛ̀ ŋkimmɔʼ ncǐ ywum kyikyi, à si lwɛn lɛ mwum hwæn ci kon lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yon, à ci she lɛ̀ yon, ɓǎ nun kpaʼ ɓwùlu.
60004011	Ɓɛshɛ mwum cinni ǹkimmɔʼ nshɛ̌ lɛʼ-Nswæ̀b, à shɛ kuʼ ǹzæ̌ʼ lɛʼ yɛ wai kɛ ŋwum Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b. Mwum nyɛ̌ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ mkpaʼ ɓwulu, à kpaʼ ɓon lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ nun. Kɛ nyè ywum màzwùm hwæn, ɓyin ci li ɓǎ ɓwum fɛ ǹtwu lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b kɛ ntwiʼ Yesù Kristò. Nun nɛ cinni ǹtwu lɛ̀ ǹkimmɔʼ kwan hwæn. Àmɛ̀n.
60004012	Mɛ̀ ŋwè ɓyɛ̂m, ɓa shìmmea ci ɓyin lɛ̀ mɛ̀ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ŋkimmɔa nɛ tà ɓyin kǐn ɓwɛbbi kɛ tòn shin nun, wɛ̌ swum nywæb ndɔʼ sɛ ɓɛn ɓyin nywi.
60004013	Fyòênnì dàlì nùn, ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɗuân kɛ vɛ̀nɛ̌ʼ fɔʼ nun lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò. Lɛ̀ nywɔʼ nɛ ɓwum yɛ ǹtwu yon yɛnni, ɓyin yɛ kuʼ ɓɛ lɛ̀ ǹdàli ǹzwɔnzwɔ̀ʼ.
60004014	Tǒn lwɛn si lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛshɛ ɓwum ta ɓyin sìmmɔa ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓi ɓwɛsɔʼ Yesù Kristò. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓyin ɓi kwan hwæn lɛ̀ M̀pùn Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ cinni ǹtwu à làn ywum hwæn kɛ nywi.
60004015	Ɓa kì mwum ndɔʼ kɛ nyinnìm shin nun yɛn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ntwiʼ sɛ à ni ci-ŋwukaʼ ɓwum, shindɔʼ à ni ci-nyibbɔʼ nywiʼ, kɛ̀ shindɔʼ, ci-ncìkàʼ mɛ lɛʼ mɓyibbɔa, kwo fɛʼ ci-ɗunnaʼ kɛ mɛ lɛʼ ɓwùlu nun.
60004016	Son, ɓɛshɛ mwum yɛn vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ ntwiʼ sɛ à ni mwum Yesù Kristò, ɓa kì kwɛ̀nnjin ɓæn nun. À fyôn M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b osɔ̀kɔ̀ʼ yili lɛ̀ ǹsean yɛ ɓɛ ta nun jin mwum Yesù Kristò sean nywi.
60004017	Kwan nlin kyìtæ̀ʼ wolâ. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ sɛti kyìtæ̀ʼ linni kɛ nywi ɓwum ɓyon. Ɓɛshɛ nun sɛti kyìtæ̀ʼ linni kɛ nywi nyɛʼ, a yɛ làn kɛ nywi ɓwum ɓye tà ka mwù kɛ̌ kɛ lɛʼ Ntwum Lwɛn yon nun lɛ?
60004018	Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «Ɓɛshɛ ɓwum lwinni yɛ swæʼ tɛ̀ʼ, ɓɛ ɓwum ɓyibbɔa ɓye lìmmi kan M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b, mbyi nyan yɛ̌ ɓɛ ɗyě lɛ?»
60004019	Li, ɓwum ɓye ta vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni ntwiʼ sɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ yili, ɓɛ kɛn mbyî lɛ̀ ǹcǐ lwɛn, ɓɛ shinnì tì ɓon nɛʼ kɛ fyaʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɔ̀ʼ ɓon, à cì tì ywum hwæn wɛ̌ tà shɛ nun shɛ̀e.
60005001	Jenɛ, mùn yili mùn lɛʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓye ɓwumŋkæ̀m nyenswæ̀b. Mǔn, mùn ni kuʼ mwumŋkæ̀m nyenswæ̀b wɛ̌ ɓyin, mùn ɓe tì kuʼ kwe kwan sɛ ɓɛ ɓe Yesù Kristò vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnnzi. Ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin, ɓwiʼ yɛ ǹtwu yɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yɛ̌ ɓwiʼ kwàsi cinnênì m̀banmban. Kɛ à si li, mùn tà ɓyin ɗɔa lɛ:
60005002	ɓænnênì lɛ ǹkwìn ɓwum ye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓyin fyaʼ lwɛn, ɓyin ɓon yon wɛ̌ tà shɛ ci-mɓòn mɛ pɔʼ tǎ konni lɛ̀ mɛ̀ pɔʼ ɓyon. Ɓyin ɓon yon lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili, ɓa kì sɛ ɓɛ ɓyin nywi wɛ̌ dòlɛ̀ʼ. Ɗyilênì mɛ̀ nlim nyin kɛ she màzwùm nun, shìkì ɓyin kɛ ǹlim kɛ lòn yɛ ɓɛ yɛ ɓyin ɗɛ̀bbi nun.
60005003	Ɓa ɓyin ywɔʼ ɓwum ɓɛ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓyin fyaʼ lɛ ɓyin konni lɛ̀ ɓon, son, lìseànì ɓon m̀bɔ̀kì kwǔ kɛ̀n she lwɛn sɛ ɓon yɛ ɗwon.
60005004	Ɓɛshɛ ɓyin ci li, nywɔʼ nɛ Ci-mɓòn mɛ pɔʼ ndwun yɛ̌ ɓɛ̌n, à yɛ̌ ɓyin ɗàsì ndwun fɛ, ɗàsì nyɛ̌ tà ka gwàn.
60005005	Ti lɛ̀ ɓyin mɛ̀ mbìpàn, kyìbsênì ɓwumŋkæ̀m ɓyin. Mùn shɛ̀ tì kuʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin hwæn lɛ: fyɔ̀sênì ɓyin nɛʼ sisɔʼ kɛ mɛʼ ɓwulu kɛ nyinnìm shin nun. Ntwiʼ sɛ ɓɛ kɔʼ kɛ ɗèwǎ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun lɛ: «M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̌b yili kan mɛ̀ ci-nshelaʼ nywi, ɓwum ɓɛ nun tǎ ǹlim kwɛ̀nnzi lɛ̀ ɓon, à ɓi ɓwum ɓye ta ɓon nɛʼ twɛli lɛ̀ yì lwæ̀b ɓe ɓwulu.»
60005006	Kɛ à si li, fyɔ̀sênì ɓyin nɛʼ ŋgyɔʼ kɛ swiʼ Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b, nun nɛ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ kɛ nywi ywum hwæn, ɓǎ nun wasi ɓyin nywɔʼ nɛ ǹgyìn nɛ nun kɛ̌ yɛ̌ wòlì.
60005007	Ɗonnzênì nun mɛ̀ lɛʼ mfyonŋgaʼ nyin fyaʼ hwæn, ntwiʼ sɛ nun nɛ ta konni lɛ̀ ɓyin.
60005008	Konnênì, ɓyin ton lɛ̀ mɛʼ. Ntwiʼ sɛ ci-ɓyìnnì nyin Satæ̀n tǎ yòn kɛ ke shin wɛ̌ gbɛ̂m nɛ tǎ fàn, à tǎ mwum nɛ nun yɛ̌ ji kæbbi.
60005009	Ɓa ɓyin ɗonnzi nun pon ɓǎ nun ci ɓyin swum ndɔʼ, son, ɗyiênì kimmi kɛ mbyi Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b nun. Ɓyin limmi lwɛn lɛ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni ɓyin ɓwum Yesù Kristò kɛ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan hwæn ta kuʼ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni wɛ̌ ɓyin.
60005010	Son, kɛ nyě yɛ ɓyin yɛ vɛ̀nɛ̀ʼ yɛnni kɛ kwan kwæʼ si nun, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ ci-kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim, à yɛ̌ ɓyin fyɔ̀si ɓe kɛ tǒn lwɛn nun, à kimnzi ɓyin, à ɗyili tì kuʼ ɓyin kimmi kɛ mbyi nyon nun. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b loân ɓyin lɛ̀ ɓyin kiìn tòn ɓyin lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò kɛ ntwu yon nun kwan hwæn.
60005011	Nun nɛ cinni ǹkimmɔʼ kwan hwæn. Àmɛ̀n.
60005012	Sìlvɛ̂n nɛ kpaʼ mùn lɛ̀ ǹkɔʼ mwɛn ɗèwà nɛ tòn nɛ. Mùn tǎ nun twɛli wɛ̌ ŋgyinni nyɛ̀m nɛ tǎ she Yesù Kristò cǐ lɛ̀ ǹlim fɔʼ. Mwǔ ŋkɔʼ ɗèwǎ màzwùm yi lɛ mùn kimnzi ɓyin ǹlim kɛ zwum, lɛ̀ mùn shɛ tì kuʼ ɓyin lɛ kwɛ̀nnzǐ nlim Mvɛ̀nnswæ̀b si tì kuʼ wɛ̌ tà shɛ mùn kɔʼ si. Ɓænnênì son mɛ̀ fyàʼ ɓî.
60005013	Ɓwum Yesù Kristò ɓye kɛ cɛ̌ Bàbìlôn, ɓye M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yæ̀n kuʼ wɛ̌ ɓyin, ɓɛ ta ɓyin hwæsi. Mwɛn nyɛ̀m Markù tà kuʼ ɓyin hwæsi.
60005014	Hwæsênì ɓyin nɛʼ lwɛn kɛ nyinnìm shin nun wɛ̌ tà shɛ sɛ yili lɛ mɛ̀ ŋgyinni hwæsi ɓon nɛʼ. Ɓyin ɓɛ ɗyi ɓæti lɛ̀ Yesù Kristò, M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b fɛ ɓyin flɔa, ɓyin hwæn.
61001001	Mùn Sìmôn Pìɛ̂r nɛ ta ɓyin ɗèwà ton sɛ kɔi. Mùn ni ci-she Yesù Kristò, mùn ɓɛ tì kuʼ ci-ntwum nyon. Mùn kɔʼ son lɛ̀ ɓyin ɓɛ kɛâ mɛ̀ nlim nyin kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, m̀banmban wɛ̌ ɓwiʼ. Kɛ̌ nlim màzwùm cinni ǹtwu kɛ mɛʼ yɛʼ, ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓyin m̀ban. M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ fɛ ɓwiʼ son kɛ nyě she lwinni sɛ Yesù Kristò cìe nun, nun nɛ ɗyi Ci-nswæti nyɛʼ, à ɓɛ tì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nyɛʼ.
61001002	M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b ŋgænnì ɓyin, à fɛ ɓyin flɔa kwan hwæn kɛ nlìmmì yɛ ɓyin limmi nun ɓon lɛ̀ Nyɛli nyɛʼ Yesù Kristò.
61001003	Kɛ ŋkimmɔʼ yon nun, Yesù Kristò ci ɓwiʼ limmì M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b nɛ lon ɓwiʼ lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ ton lɛ̀ nun kɛ ntwu yon nun, ɓwiʼ ci tì kuʼ lwɛn wɛ̌ nun. Li, kɛ nlìmmǐ màzwùm nun, à fɛâ ɓwiʼ ywum hwæn yɛ ta ɓwiʼ kpea kɛ mbyi nyon nun, lɛ̀ ɓwiʼ cinni kwǔ kɛ̀n she M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b yili.
61001004	Kɛ nyè ywum màzwǔm, à lwinnzi ǹkàli twun yɛ nun lɛlakàʼ ǹdìkàʼ ŋwê. À fɛâ ɓwiʼ yì ɗàsì lwukea. Yì ɗàsǐ màzwùm yɛ cì ɓyin nywælì ywum ɓyibbɔa yɛ ɓwum ta tæm kɛ cɛ̌ ŋgyɔ̂ʼ wan, ɓyin cinni tì kuʼ m̀fɔ̀kàʼ fɔʼ lɛ̀ M̀vɛ̀nnswæ̀b.
61001005	Kɛ à si li, mùn shɛ̀ ɓyin lɛ, kɛ ɓyin kɛâ ǹlim kɛ nywi Yesù Kristò, kpæmmênì mɛʼ, ɓyin konndì kwǔ kɛ̀n she lwɛn cinni. Kwan sɛ ɓyin ta kwǔ kɛ̀n she lwɛn cinni, ɓyin konndì tì kon cinni kɛ mwu.
